analyzed: caturthaḥ pādaḥ
adhikaraṇam

original: uktaṃ samāmnāyaidamarthyaṃ tasmāt sarvaṃ tadarthaṃ syāt / Jaim_1,4.1 /
analyzed: uktam samāmnāya aidamarthyam tasmāt sarvam tad artham syāt

original: iha guṇavidhitvena nāmadheyatvena vā saṃmatānāṃ sarveṣāmeva phalapadātiriktasubantānāṃ udbhitsomādipadānāṃ prāmāṇyamaprāmāṇyaṃ veti saṃśaye  #
analyzed: iha guṇa vidhi tvena nāmadheya tvena vā saṃmatānām sarveṣām eva phala pada atirikta sup antānām udbhid soma ādi padānām prāmāṇyam aprāmāṇyam vā iti saṃśaye
prāmāṇya prakāra asaṃbhavāt aprāmāṇyam

original: tathāhi --- “udbhidā yajeta paśukāmaḥ““somena yajete“tyādāvudbhidādipadebhyaḥ stutibuddheranutpatterna tāvadarthavādatvam /
analyzed: tathā hi udbhidā yajeta paśu kāmaḥ somena yajeta ityādau udbhida ādi padebhyaḥ stuti buddheḥ anutpatteḥ na tāvat arthavāda tvam
mantra tva prasiddhi abhāvāt ca na tat
eteṣām prayoga kāla uccāraṇe ca etad pratipādya arthasya yāga aṅga tā bodhaka pramāṇa bhāvena eteṣām prayoga samaveta artha smāraka tva anupapatteḥ ca
na ca vidhi antarbhāvaḥ
kāma śabda ādi abhāvena sādhya anabhidhāyaka tvāt
eka pada gatena yajinā eva karaṇa pratipādane eteṣām tad pratipādaka tva ayogāt
siddha rūpāṇām soma ādīnām vyāpāram antareṇa bhāvanā itikartavya tā tva anupapatteḥ ca
nāmadheya tve tu abhinna tvāt eva karaṇa anugrāhaka tva ādi rūpa itikartavyatā anupapattiḥ

original: na ca ---kathamapi bhāvanānvayāsaṃbhave 'pi yāge karaṇatvenānvayo bhavatviti --- vācyam;
analyzed: na ca katham api bhāvanā anvaya asaṃbhave pi yāge karaṇa tvena anvayaḥ bhavatu iti vācyam
kārakāṇām paraspara anvaya asambhavāt

original: ataḥ kathamapi kriyānvayāsaṃbhavādanākhyātatvena ca vidhibhāvanayoranabhidhānāt anyasya
analyzed: atas katham api kriyā anvaya asaṃbhavāt anākhyāta tvena ca vidhi bhāvanayoḥ anabhidhānāt anyasya
ca prakārasya nirvaktum aśakya tvāt aprāmāṇyam iti prāpte adhyayana vidhi adhyāpitasya
a prāmāṇya asaṃbhavāt prakāra antara asambhave pi vidhi antarbhāvasya spaṣṭa tvena tatra eva

original: guṇavidhitvena nāmadheyatvena vā vakṣyamāṇarītyā sarvānupapattiparihāreṇa prāmāṇyamiti siddham // 1 // 17 //
analyzed: guṇa vidhi tvena nāmadheya tvena vā vakṣyamāṇa rītyā sarva anupapatti parihāreṇa prāmāṇyam iti siddham  /
iti udbhida ādi pada prāmāṇya adhikaraṇam
sarvasya api adhyāya arthasya prathama sūtra śeṣa tva nirūpaṇam

original: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa “udbhidā yajeta” ityudāhṛtya kiṃ udbhidādiśabdāḥ guṇavidhayaḥ?
analyzed: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa udbhidā yajeta iti udāhṛtya kim udbhid ādi śabdāḥ guṇa vidhayaḥ

original: karmanāmadheyāni veti sandihya “uktaṃ samāmnāyaidamarthyaṃ tasmātsarvaṃ tadarthaṃ syādi” tyādyasūtreṇa pūrvapakṣaṃ kṛtvā
analyzed: karma nāmadheyāni vā iti sandihya uktam samāmnāya edamarthyam tasmāt sarvam tad artham syāt iti ādya sūtreṇa pūrvapakṣam kṛtvā

original: api vā nāmadheyaṃ syād yadutrattāvapūrvamavidhāyakatvāt / Jaim_1,4.2 /
analyzed: api vā nāmadheyam syāt a vidhāyaka tvāt
iti uttara sūtreṇa nāmadheya tvam siddhāntitam
tat etasya vicārasya dharma pramā upayoga ābhave artha vāda vat eva adhyayana vidhi vaśāt eva
guṇa vidhi tvena nāmadheya tvena vā ubhayathā api upayoga siddheḥ na ānarthakya āpatteḥ vākya artha vyākhyāna rūpeṇa
etad vicāra karaṇe vākyaśeṣa sāmarthyayoḥ adya api prāmāṇyasya anukta tvāt dvitīye kariṣyamāṇasya
vākya artha vicārasya a parisamāpya eva pramāṇa lakṣaṇam karaṇe saṃgati āpatteḥ ayuktam

original: ataḥ “athāto dharmajijñāsā” iti sūtreṇa jijñāsāpadena dvādaśānāmapi lakṣaṇānāmarthāḥ sāmānyataḥ pratijñāyante /
analyzed: atas atha atas dharma jijñāsā iti sūtreṇa jijñāsā padena dvādaśānām api lakṣaṇānām arthāḥ sāmānyatas pratijñāyante
atas eva etad vivaraṇe bhāṣyakṛtā kaḥ dharmaḥ
kathaṃlakṣaṇakaḥ
kāni asya sādhanāni
iti upakṣiptam

original: tatra kathaṃlakṣaṇa ityatra dharmapadānuṣaṅgeṇa thamuñprakṛtyā kiṃpramāṇaka ityarthena
analyzed: tatra kathaṃlakṣaṇaḥ iti atra dharma pada anuṣaṅgeṇa thamuñ prakṛtyā kiṃpramāṇakaḥ iti arthena
dharma pramāṇa nirūpaṇa rūpa prathama adhyāya artha pratijñām tha muñ pratyaya upātta prakārasya
prāmāṇya pratiṣṭhā sidhi artham ānuṣaṅgika tayā nirūpaṇam kriyate
na tu sākṣāt adhyāya artha tvam

original: tatrāpi dvitīyasūtre codyate 'neneti vyutpattyā vidhyuddeśātmakapravartakavākyavācinā codanāpadena vidhyātmakavedāvayavaprāmāṇyaṃ pratijñāya  #
analyzed: tatra api dvitīya sūtre codyate nena iti vyutpattyā vidhi uddeśa ātmaka pravartaka vākya vācinā codanā padena vidhi ātmaka veda avayava prāmāṇyam pratijñāya
tat eva ādya pādena antam upapāditam
tatas dvitīya sūtra pratijñāta irthe vasite punar ādya sūtra pratijñātam dharma pramāṇa antara bhūtayoḥ codanāvat veda avayava viśeṣayoḥ arthavāda mantrayoḥ  /
prāmāṇyam cintitam

original: tata evaṃ trivibhāgasya vedasya prāmāṇye tathaiva traividhye cintite nāmadheyamūlakasmṛtyabhāvena
analyzed: tatas evam tri vibhāgasya vedasya prāmāṇye tathā eva traividhye cintite nāmadheya mūlaka smṛti abhāvena
trividha veda upajīvya smṛti rūpa dharma pramāṇa antarasya ādya sūtra pratijñātam tat prāmāṇyam

original: nāmadheyacintātaḥ prāk madhya eva tṛtīyapādena cintitam /
analyzed: nāmadheya cintātaḥ prāk madhye eva tṛtīya pādena cintitam
tatas punar ādya sūtra pratijñātasya eva dharma pramāṇa antara rūpasya nāmadheyasya nāmadheya tāyāḥ
prasādhya tasya eva prāmāṇyam iha pratipādyate

original: tadevaṃ samasto 'pyadhyāyaḥ prathamasūtraśeṣa evetyavaśyaṃ prāmāṇyāprāmāṇyacintaiva prathame 'dhyāye yukteti vārtikakārābhiprāyamanusaṃdhāyādhikaraṇavicāramārabhate---  #
analyzed: tat evam samastaḥ api adhyāyaḥ prathama sūtra śeṣaḥ eva iti avaśyam prāmāṇya aprāmāṇya cintā eva prathame dhyāye yuktā iti vārtikakāra abhiprāyam anusaṃdhāya adhikaraṇa vicāram ārabhate
iha iti
nāmadheya prāmāṇya prakāra para tayā ekasya sūtrasya
koṣṭha śodhanikayā nāmadheya tva nirṇaya artham aparasya sūtrasya pravṛttiḥ iti nayanena upapattiḥ

original: yadyapi arthavādādhikaraṇoktarītyā sāmānyopayoge siddhe koṣṭhaśodhanikātvena viśeṣavicāro nāsaṃgato bhavet;
analyzed: yadi api arthavāda adhikaraṇa ukta rītyā sāmānya upayoge siddhe koṣṭha śodhanikā tvena viśeṣa vicāraḥ na asaṃgataḥ bhavet
tathā api etad sūtrasya nāmadheya tva virodhi guṇa vidhi tva hetu paratva abhāvena pūrvapakṣa paratva asaṃbhavāt
siddhānte niṣṭa āpādaka tva ayogāt ca na aikādhikaraṇya upapattiḥ iti etat sūtra dvaya pūrvapakṣa dvaya karaṇena
prāmāṇya svarūpa viṣaya tve syāḥ cintāyāḥ yājñika prasiddhi siddhāyāḥ pakṣa dvaye pi avicārita siddha tvam aṅgīkṛtya kiṃnāmadheya tāyāḥ dharma prāmāṇya prakāra tā
uta na iti prathama adhikaraṇe vicāryate
kathaṃlakṣaṇaḥ iti atra prakāra vāci thamuñ pratyaya prayogāt prakārasya api lakṣaṇa artha tvāt

original: tasya ca tripādyāṃ karaṇānnāsaṃgatiriti kalpayato nyāyasudhākārasya tu matadūṣaṇaṃ
analyzed: tasya ca tripādyām karaṇāt na asaṃgatiḥ iti kalpayataḥ nyāyasudhākārasya tu mata dūṣaṇam
kaustubhe eva draṣṭavyam
saṃbhāvyamāna guṇa vidhi nāmadheya tva anyatara prakārasya phala vācaka pade saṃbhavāt vicāra aviṣaya tvam sūcayitum phala pada atiriktā iti uktam
phala padam ca nimitta saṃskārya vācakānām api upalakṣaṇam
udbhid soma ādi ityādi padena same paurṇamāsyām iti deśa kāla padānām guṇa vidhi tve pi asaṃbhavat nāmatā śaṅkānām na udāharaṇa tvam iti uktam
tat ayuktam
mantra arthavāda vidhi atirikta tvena eva iha padānām udāharaṇa tvāt guṇa vidhi tva nāmadheya tva anyatara prakāreṇa
vidhi antarbhāvam aṅgīkṛtya evā iha prāmāṇya sādhanasya teṣu api saṃbhavena uttara adhikaraṇeṣu

original: ca nāmadheyatve sādhite tattaddhetorabhāve pariśeṣeṇa vidhitvasyāpyarthātsādhanena
analyzed: ca nāmadheya tve sādhite tad tad hetoḥ abhāve pariśeṣeṇa vidhi tvasya api arthāt sādhanena
tad viṣaya tva upapatteḥ iti sūcitam
udbhid soma ādi padānām api adhyayana vidhi upāttānām api prāmāṇya prakāra nirṇaya ārtha tvena adhikaraṇa pravṛtti nirūpaṇam
yadi api asmin adhikaraṇe dhyayana vidhi balena arthavāda vat eva prayojanavat tva siddheḥ ānarthakyena pūrvapakṣaḥ na uttiṣṭhati
navā arthavāda mantrayoḥ iva anyathā ākṣepa asaṃbhave dvāra asaṃbhavena ākṣepa vat iha ākṣepaḥ saṃbhavati
udbhid ādi śabdānām guṇa vidhi tvena api prāmāṇya upapatteḥ
tad tad viśeṣa adhikaraṇeṣu eva caturṣu guṇa vidhi tva āśaṅkā nirāsa mukhena nāmadheya tā rūpa dvāra viśeṣasya upapādayiṣya māṇa tvāt
atas na iha ādyam adhikaraṇam arthavāda viśeṣa adhikaraṇa vat racayitum śakyate
tathā api tad vidhi siddha prayojanānām api udbhida ādi padānām pūrva ukta vidhi uddeśa stuti prakāśana rūpa prakāra viśeṣa asaṃbhavena prayojanavat tvam ākṣipya
guṇa vidhi tva nāmadheya tva anyatas rūpa dvāra viśeṣeṇa vidhi uddeśa antargatyā prāmāṇyam sādhyate

original: ataeva --- vidhyuddeśāntargatisādhanamātreṇaiva siddhānte uparataṃ vārtikakṛtetyabhipretyaiva pūrvapakṣamāha --- prakāreti //
analyzed: ataeva vidhi uddeśa antargati sādhana mātreṇa eva siddhānte uparatam vārttika kṛtā iti abhipretya eva pūrvapakṣam āha prakāra iti

original: atra padaprāmāṇyanirūpaṇasya pādārthatvam pādāntaratvādanantarasaṃgatyabhāve 'pi na kṣatiriti draṣṭavyam //
analyzed: atra pada prāmāṇya nirūpaṇasya pāda artha tvam pāda antara tvāt anantara saṃgati abhāve pi na kṣatiḥ iti draṣṭavyam

original: evaṃ ceha vidhyuddeśāntargatyā ākṣepaṃ samādhāyottarādhikaraṇeṣu guṇavidhitvāśaṅkānirāsena nāmadheyatvena tadantargatiḥ sādhyata iti sarvamanavadyamiti  #
analyzed: evam ca iha vidhi uddeśa antargatyā ākṣepam samādhāya uttara adhikaraṇeṣu guṇa vidhi tva āśaṅkā nirāsena nāmadheya tvena tad antargatiḥ sādhyate iti sarvam anavadyam iti
bhāvaḥ
udbhid soma ādi padānām stāvaka tayā anupayogaḥ
vidhi uddeśa ādi anantargata tve upapādanīye udbhedana kartṛ tva guṇa yogena saṃbhāvita stuti pratīteḥ nirāsāya arthavāda tvam tāvat nirākaroti stuti buddheḥ iti
na vā vidhi eka vākya tā mātreṇa arthavāda tvam bhavati
bhūti kāma ādi padānām api tad āpatteḥ
apitu vidhi śeṣa tvena
na hi ayam vidhi śeṣaḥ
navā vidhi antargatena eka padena guṇa guṇi saṃbandha kīrtana ātmaka stuti dhiyaḥ utpattiḥ
yadi api vā utpadyeta

original: tathāpi “vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhe“tivat prathamāyā evāpattau tṛtīyopāttakaraṇatvānupapattiriti nārthavādatvamityarthaḥ //
analyzed: tathā api vāyuḥ vai kṣepiṣṭhā iti vat prathamāyāḥ eva āpattau tṛtīya upātta karaṇa tva anupapattiḥ iti na arthavāda tvam iti arthaḥ
mantraḥ iti evaṃvidha abhiyukta prasiddhi viṣaya tva rūpasya mukhya mantra lakṣaṇasya vidhi tad śeṣa tva bhinna tva rūpasya
vā vyāpaka lakṣaṇasya abhāvena mukhya mantra tva anupapatteḥ na mantra antargatiḥ iti āha
mantra tva prasiddhi abhāva iti
na api ūha pravara nāmadheyānām iva mukhya mantra tva abhāve pi anuṣṭheya artha smāraka tayā mukhya mantra kārya kara tvāt gauṇa mantra tvam api saṃbhavati iti āha
eteṣām iti
mantra tvena vidhi uddeśa tvena ca anupayoga samarthanam
na tāvat brāhmaṇa eka vākya tayā anuṣṭheya artha smāraka tva saṃbhavaḥ

original: “yajeta paśukāma” ityādeḥ brāhmaṇavākyasya vidhāyakatvena karmakālāprayojyatvāt tadekavākyatāpannasyāsya tadanupapatteḥ,
analyzed: yajeta paśu kāmaḥ ityādeḥ brāhmaṇa vākyasya vidhāyaka tvena karma kāla aprayojya tvāt tad ekavākya tā āpannasya asya tad anupapatteḥ
na api pṛthak bhūta tvena
etat abhidheyasya khanitra ādeḥ karmaṇi avidhānāt eva prakāśana anarha tvāt
na ca upāṃśu yāga vat eva sannidhāna avagata yāga aṅga tva nirvāhāya māntravarṇika dravya vidhi kalpanayā smāraka tva upapattiḥ
dravyasya bhāvanāyām yāge vā anvaya asaṃbhavena tad vidhi kalpanā anupapatteḥ

original: yāgajanakatvenākāṅkṣāyā arthākṣiptadravyeṇaiva nirāsāt na tadbalena bhāvanāyā ākāṅkṣantarakalpanayāpyanvayo yukta iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: yāga janaka tvena ākāṅkṣāyāḥ artha ākṣipta dravyeṇa eva nirāsāt na tad balena bhāvanāyāḥ ākāṅkṣa antara kalpanayā api anvayaḥ yuktaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
vidhi uddeśa rūpa veda avayava antarbhāvam nirasyati na ca iti
spaṣṭa akṣaram adhikaraṇa pūrvapakṣa antam
na ca evam pūrvapakṣe sādhita adhyayana vidhi dṛṣṭārtha tva bhaṅgaḥ
tasya pārāyaṇe pi upayogi prayoga prāśu bhāva rūpa dṛṣṭārtha tva bhaṅgaḥ
tasya pārāyaṇe pi upayogi prayoga prāśu bhāva rūpa dṛṣṭārtha tayā upapatteḥ apramāṇam mudbhida ādi śabdāḥ iti arthaḥ
vidhi uddeśa antarbhāvena siddhāntaḥ

original: adhyayanagatadṛṣṭārthatānirvāhe 'pi prayojanavadarthajñānārthatvasya sādhitasyābhaṅgāya prāmāṇyamastīti siddhāntamāha --- adhyayaneti //
analyzed: adhyayana gata dṛṣṭārtha tā nirvāhe pi prayojanavat artha jñāna artha tvasya sādhitasya abhaṅgāya prāmāṇyam asti iti siddhāntam āha adhyayana iti
tatra prakāra asaṃbhave pi ityasya prakāra antara asaṃbhave pi iti arthaḥ
iti prathamam udbhida ādi pada prāmāṇya adhikaraṇam
api vā nāmadheyam

original: ataḥ paraṃ kva guṇavidhitvaṃ kva vā nāmadheyatvamiti koṣṭhaśodhanikārthamārambhaḥ /
analyzed: atas param kva guṇa vidhi tvam kva vā nāmadheya tvam iti koṣṭha śodhanika artham ārambhaḥ

original: tadiha guṇe karmaṇi ca tulyavadvṛttikānāmudbhidādipadānāṃ vidheyaguṇasamarpakatvaṃ
analyzed: tat iha guṇe karmaṇi ca tulya vat vṛttikānām udbhida ādi padānām vidheya guṇa samarpaka tvam

original: nāmadheyatvaṃ veti cintāyāṃ bhidir vidāraṇe iti smṛtyā vidāraṇasamarthakhanitrādivacanatvaprasiddhernāmadheyatve
analyzed: nāmadheya tvam vā iti cintāyām bhidiḥ vidāraṇe iti smṛtyā vidāraṇa samartha khanitra ādi vacanatva prasiddheḥ nāmadheya tve
vaiyarthya prasaṅgāt ca guṇa vidhi tvam eva yuktam

original: tatraca guṇaviśiṣṭaṃ karmaiva phaloddeśena vidhīyata ityekaḥ pakṣaḥ /
analyzed: tatra ca guṇa viśiṣṭam karma eva phala uddeśena vidhīyate iti ekaḥ pakṣaḥ
prakṛta soma yāga anuvādena guṇa mātra vidhānam iti aparaḥ
na ca vinigamanā virahaḥ
itikartavya tā sannidhi viśeṣasya eva karma vidhi niyāmaka tvāt
na ca evam phala pada ānarthakyam

original: “sarvebhyo jyotiṣṭoma” iti vacanena tasya sarvaphalārthatvāvagateryajipadasya paśuphalopadhāyakayāgalakṣaṇāyāṃ tātparyagrāhakatvāt /
analyzed: sarvebhyaḥ jyotiṣṭomaḥ iti vacanena tasya sarva phala artha tva avagateḥ yaji padasya paśu phala upadhāyaka yāga lakṣaṇāyām tātparya grāhaka tvāt
atas eva na viśiṣṭa uddeśe vākya bhedaḥ
na ca utpatti śiṣṭa soma prābalyam
paśu kāma prayoga viśeṣa puraskāreṇa vihitasya khanitra ādeḥ sāmānya vihita soma ādi bādhaka tvāt

original: vastutastu --- prakṛtasomayāgāśritaḥ khanitrādiguṇa eva phaloddeśena vidhīyate iti tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ /
analyzed: vastutas tu prakṛta soma yāga āśritaḥ khanitra ādi guṇaḥ eva phala uddeśena vidhīyate iti tṛtīyaḥ pakṣaḥ

original: kāmyatvādeva ca nityasomabādha iti prāpte brūmaḥ--- nāyaṃ guṇavidhiḥ; gauravāt /
analyzed: kāmya tvāt eva ca nitya soma bādhaḥ iti prāpte brūmaḥ na ayam guṇa vidhiḥ gauravāt
tathā hi sarvatra eva tāvat śruddha dhātvartha karaṇaka bhāvanā vidhānāt ādyaḥ vidhi prakāraḥ yathā agnihotram juhoti iti
anya uddeśena tad vidhiḥ aparaḥ yathā agnihotram juhuyāt svarga kāmaḥ iti
etasya ca uddeśya vācaka pada antara sāpekṣa tvāt daurbalyam
dhātvartha uddeśena anya karaṇaka bhāvanā vidhiḥ tṛtīyaḥ yathā dadhnā juhoti iti

original: atra vidheyatāyā dhātvarthavṛttitvābhāvāt padāntarārthavṛttitvācca tato 'pi daurbalyam /
analyzed: atra vidheya tāyāḥ dhātvartha vṛtti tva abhāvāt pada antara artha vṛtti tvāt ca daurbalyam
dhātoḥ sādhutva arthatvam aṅgīkṛtya anya uddeśena anya karaṇaka bhāvanā vidhiḥ caturthaḥ yathā dadhnā indriya kāmasya juhuyāt iti
atra dhātvarthasya uddeśya tvena api asaṃbandhāt daurbalyam
guṇa viśiṣṭa dhātvartha karaṇaka bhāvanā vidhānāt pañcamaḥ yathā somena yajeta iti
atra viśeṣaṇa vidhi kalpanā ādeḥ ādhikyāt tatas pi daurbalyam

original: anyoddeśena pūrvoktaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ-- yathā “sauryaṃ caruṃ nirvaped brahmavarcasakāma” iti /
analyzed: anya uddeśena pūrva uktaḥ ṣaṣṭhaḥ yathā sauryam carum nirvapet brahmavarcasa kāmaḥ iti
ayantu sarva durbalaḥ

original: tadevaṃ udbhidguṇaviśiṣṭasya yāgasya phaloddeśena vidhāne ṣaṣṭhavidhiprakārāśrayaṇādatigauravam;
analyzed: tat evam udbhid guṇa viśiṣṭasya yāgasya phala uddeśena vidhāne ṣaṣṭha vidhi prakāra āśrayaṇāt ati gauravam
guṇasya yāge na anvayāt matu artha lakṣaṇā ca
nahi bhāvanāyām samāna pada upātta dhātvartha karaṇaka tva avaruddhāyām guṇasya karaṇa tvam saṃbhavati

original: atastasya yāgānvayāvaśyakatve yāgasya kārakatvāt kārakāṇāṃ ca parasparaṃ saṃbandhānupapatteḥ somena yajetetivadudbhidvatā yāgeneti matvarthalakṣaṇā'vaśyakīti  #
analyzed: atas tasya yāga anvaya āvaśyaka tve yāgasya kāraka tvāt kārakāṇām ca parasparam saṃbandha anupapatteḥ somena yajeta iti vat udbhidvatā yāgena iti matu artha lakṣaṇa āvaśyakī iti
prāñcaḥ

original: vastutastu dṛṣṭānte 'pi somasya karaṇatvenaiva bhāvanāyāmevānvayastatra tatra vakṣyate,
analyzed: vastutas tu dṛṣṭānte somasya karaṇa tvena eva bhāvanāyām eva anvayaḥ tatra tatra vakṣyate

original: yuktaśca; ekakaraṇāvaruddhe 'pi karaṇāntarasya bhinnanirūpitasya prakāratayā bhāvanānvayopapatteḥ /
analyzed: yuktaḥ ca eka karaṇa avaruddhe pi karaṇa antarasya bhinna nirūpitasya prakāra tayā bhāvanā anvaya upapatteḥ
nahi yāga karaṇa tvam bhāvanā nirūpitam
api tu svarga nirūpitam
atas ca yathā eva anya nirūpitam
tad karaṇa tvam prakāratayā bhāvanāyām anveti
tathā eva soma karaṇa tvam api yāga nirūpitam

original: ubhayatra tattannirūpakatvasya pārṣṭhikabodhalabhyatvācca na ko 'pi virodha iti nāsminnapi pakṣe yadyapi matvarthalakṣaṇā;
analyzed: ubhayatra tad tad nirūpaka tvasya pārṣṭhika bodha labhya tvāt ca na kaḥ pi virodhaḥ iti na asmin api pakṣe yadi api matu artha lakṣaṇā
tathā api viśeṣaṇa vidhi kṛta
guṇa yāga ubhaya viśiṣṭa bhāvanā vidhi gauravam āpadyamānam nā upahnotum śakyam

original: yathāca prāthamikabhāvanāsaṃbandhāṅgīkāre 'pi dvitīyabodhavelāyāṃ matvarthakalpanā tathoktaṃ kaustubhe kalpanādi /
analyzed: yathā ca prāthamika bhāvanā saṃbandha aṅgīkāre dvitīya bodha velāyām matu artha kalpanā tathā uktam kaustubhe kalpanā ādi
evam dvitīya tṛtīyayoḥ api jaghanya vidhi prakāra aṅgīkaraṇam doṣāya
agatyā ca dadhi soma ādau eva tat aṅgīkṛtam
teṣām tatra atyanta rūḍha tvena nāmadheya tva asaṃbhavāt

original: prakṛte tu yenaiva yogena khanitre pravṛttistenaiva yogenodbhidyate utpādyate phalamiti vyutpattyā karmaṇyapīti nāmatvasaṃbhavena dvitīyavidhiprakārāṅgīkaraṇāllāghavam
analyzed: prakṛte tu yena eva yogena khanitre pravṛttiḥ tena eva yogena udbhidyate utpādyate phalam iti vyutpattyā karmaṇi api iti nāmatva saṃbhavena dvitīya vidhi prakāra aṅgīkaraṇāt lāghavam

original: naca bhido vidāraṇa eva smṛteḥ śaktiḥ,
analyzed: na ca bhidaḥ vidāraṇe eva smṛteḥ śaktiḥ
bhidiḥ iti eva dhātu pāṭhāt
vidāraṇaḥ iti asya śakya artha mātra upalakṣaka tvasya vaiyākaraṇa siddha tvāt
atas vidāraṇe iva utpādane pi prayogāt tulya vat vṛttika tā
na ca nāmadheya ānarthakyam
saṃkalpa ādau sārthaka tvāt
kvicid phala upabandhaḥ ca yathā darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti
kvacid ca guṇa upabandhaḥ yathā saṃsthāpya paurṇamāsīm vaimṛdham anunirvapati iti
prakṛte ca saṃjñayā bheda siddhiḥ eva prayojanam

original: itarathā hi prakṛta eva karmaṇi guṇaphalasaṃbandhāpatterna karmāntaratvam /
analyzed: itarathā hi prakṛte eva karmaṇi guṇa phala saṃbandha āpatteḥ na karma antara tvam

original: naca yogasya phalodbhedanakāritvasyātiprasaktatvādapūrve karmaṇi rūḍhikalpane somādipadānāmapi tadāpattiḥ;
analyzed: na ca yogasya phala udbhedana kāri tvasya ati prasakta tvāt apūrve karmaṇi rūḍhi kalpane soma ādi padānām api tad āpattiḥ

original: sarvatra yogarūḍhisthale prācīnaprayogasyaiva kāraṇatāyāḥ kḷptatvena prakṛte tadakalpanāt /
analyzed: sarvatra yoga rūḍhi sthale prācīna prayogasya eva kāraṇatāyāḥ kḷpta tvena prakṛte tad akalpanāt
prayojanam spaṣṭam
iti dvitīyam udbhinnāmata adhikaraṇam

original: anirdhāritadvāraviśeṣeṇoktamapi prāmāṇyaṃ nirdhāraṇaṃ vinā na dṛḍhaṃ bhavatītyetadarthaṃ adhikaraṇāntaraṃ sūcayati --- ataḥ paramiti //
analyzed: anirdhārita dvāra viśeṣeṇa uktam api prāmāṇyam nirdhāraṇam vinā na dṛḍham bhavati iti etad artham adhikaraṇa antaram sūcayati atas param iti
tatra tad prakhya śāstra antara rahitānām udāharaṇa tve pi citra ādi śabdeṣu loka prasiddhi bādhena
nāmadheya tāyāḥ vākya bheda ādi sahakāri sāpekṣa tvena durupapāda tvāt tān vihāya avayava artha yogasya
pravṛtti nimitta tvāt matu artha lakṣaṇā prasaṃga mātra sahakṛta sāmānādhikaraṇyāt ca
vicāre saukaryāt teṣām udāharaṇa tvam darśayati tat iha iti
vacana tva prasiddheḥ iti

original: nanu --- vrīhyādipadavat samudāyarūpeṇa rūḍhatvābhāvātkathaṃ khanitravācitetyāśaṅkānirāsāya “bhidir vidāraṇa” ityādyuktam //
analyzed: nanu vrīhi ādi pada vat samudāya rūpeṇa rūḍha tva abhāvāt katham khanitra vāci tā iti āśaṅkā nirāsāya bhidiḥ vidāraṇaḥ ityādi uktam
udbhid śabdasya khanitra vāci tvam eva
na tu karma vāci tvam iti nirūpaṇam
tathā ca u t upasargasya ūrdhva tāyām bhidi dhātoḥ vidāraṇe kartṛ arthaka kvipaḥ tad samartha kartari
śakteḥ kvip antena ūrdhva vidāraṇa samartha khanitra prasiddhiḥ avayava prasidhyā samudāya rūpeṇa grahaṇa ādi uktā
karmaṇi tu ūrdhvavidāraṇa kartṛ tva abhāvāt kathañcid phalam udbhinatti prakāśayati iti evam
yogena phala udbhedana samartha tvena tad upapādane prakāśane lakṣaṇa āpattyā loka vyākaraṇa avagata avayava prasiddhi bādhā āpatteḥ
tad parihāra artham paṅkaja ādi śabdeṣu iva rūḍhi kalpanā āpatteḥ tad apekṣayā kḷpta avayava śaktyā eva avayava pratīta artha grahaṇam yuktam iti arthaḥ
yaji sāmānādhikaraṇya nirvāhāya kathañcid yāge vayava artha mātra saṃbhavaḥ

original: evamapi tena nāmadheyatāṅgīkāre dūṣaṇamāha --- nāmadheyatve iti //
analyzed: evam api tena nāmadheya tā aṅgīkāre dūṣaṇam āha nāmadheya tve iti
vidhi balāt eva viśeṣa avadhāraṇa siddheḥ nāmnaḥ api yāga tva jāteḥ tad avacchinna vyakti sāmānya rūpasya viśeṣa avadhāraṇa asaṃbhavāt punar api vyakti viśeṣa avadhāraṇa ārthatve
vaiyarthyam

original: guṇavidhipakṣe tu yāgabhāvanāpekṣitadravyasamarpakatvādarthavattvaṃ puruṣapravṛttiviśeṣakaratvaṃ ca labhyate ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: guṇa vidhi pakṣe tu yāga bhāvanā apekṣita dravya samarpaka tvāt arthavat tvam puruṣa pravṛtti viśeṣa kara tvam ca labhyate iti arthaḥ
yaḥ tu iha siddhānte sarva kārakāṇām bhāvanā anvayi tve samāna pada upātta yāga rūpa karaṇa avaruddhāyām

original: guṇasya karaṇatvena anvayāyogāt dhātvarthasya ca kārakatvena tatrāpi anvayāyogena
analyzed: guṇasya karaṇa tvena anvaya ayogāt dhātvarthasya ca kāraka tvena tatra api anvaya ayogena

original: pradhānabhūtapratyayena tadasaṃbhave guṇabhūte prātipadike matvarthalakṣaṇā pūrvapakṣe āpadyate,
analyzed: pradhāna bhūta pratyayena tad asaṃbhave guṇa bhūte prātipadike matu artha lakṣaṇā pūrvapakṣe āpadyate

original: sā na yuktā; svarganirūpitatvena yāgasyeva guṇasyāpi vyāpārabhedena bhāvanāyāṃ karaṇatvenānvayopapatteḥ /
analyzed: sā na yuktā svarga nirūpita tvena yāgasya iva guṇasya api vyāpāra bhedena bhāvanāyām karaṇa tvena anvaya upapatteḥ

original: ataśca yāgasya phalaniṣpādanadvārā bhāvanākaraṇatve 'pi somādeḥ karaṇāntarasya samāderadhikaraṇāntarasyeva
analyzed: atas ca yāgasya phala niṣpādana dvārā bhāvanā karaṇa tve pi soma ādeḥ karaṇa antarasya sama ādeḥ adhikaraṇa antarasya iva
yāga niṣpādana dvārā bhāvanā saṃbandhe bādhaka abhāvāt tathā eva prathama avagata bhāvanā saṃbandha nirvāhāya

original: aruṇaikahāyanīvat yāgasya pārṣṭhiko yāgasaṃbandha eva kalpyate /
analyzed: aruṇaikahāyanī vat yāgasya pārṣṭhikaḥ yāga saṃbandhaḥ eva kalpyate

original: tena na matvarthalakṣaṇāpattirityabhipretya pūrvapakṣe ādyaṃ viśiṣṭavidhipakṣaṃ upapādayati --- tatra ceti //
analyzed: tena na matu artha lakṣaṇa āpattiḥ iti abhipretya pūrvapakṣe ādyam viśiṣṭa vidhi pakṣam upapādayati tatra ca iti
pārṣṭhika bodhe pi atra matu artha lakṣaṇā nirāsaḥ
na ca evam pārṣṭhika anvaya velāyām eva aśruta matu artha vyavahāra āpattiḥ

original: tasyāmavasthāyāṃ śrutena karaṇatvenaiva yāgaṃ prati guṇasyānvayopapatteḥ /
analyzed: tasyām avasthāyām śrutena karaṇa tvena eva yāgam prati guṇasya anvaya upapatteḥ
nahi tadānīm yāgasya karaṇa tvam asti
yena an ākāṅkṣita tvāt anvayaḥ na bhavet
artha ākṣipta sādhya tvam ādāya karma tvāt

original: ato na kathamapi matvarthalakṣaṇāprasaktirasminnapi pakṣa ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: atas na katham api matu artha lakṣaṇa aprasaktiḥ asmin api pakṣe iti arthaḥ
tāṇḍya śākhāyām jyotiṣṭoma prakaraṇa anusāreṇa guṇa vidhi tva pakṣaḥ
ataeva yadi api viśiṣṭa vidhau na matu artha lakṣaṇā

original: tathāpi eteṣāṃ vākyānāṃ tāṇḍyaśākhāyāṃ jyotiṣṭomānantarameva pāṭhāt prakṛtajyotiṣṭomayāgānuvādenaiva
analyzed: tathā api eteṣām vākyānām tāṇḍya śākhāyām jyotiṣṭoma anantaram eva pāṭhāt prakṛta jyotiṣṭoma yāga anuvādena eva

original: dadhnā juhotītivat guṇavidhānaṃ bhaviṣyatītyabhipretya pakṣāntaramāha --- athaveti //
analyzed: dadhnā juhoti iti vat guṇa vidhānam bhaviṣyati iti abhipretya pakṣa antaram āha athavā iti
guṇa vidhi tva pakṣe vidhānā iva ityādi vārtika anusāreṇa matu artha lakṣaṇa āpatti śaṅkā nirāsau

original: yadyapi prakṛtavidhau yāgasya karaṇatvāt yathāprāptasyaivānuvādenehāpi kāraṇatvāt guṇānvaye matvarthalakṣaṇāpattiḥ;
analyzed: yadi api prakṛta vidhau yāgasya karaṇa tvāt yathāprāptasya eva anuvādena iha api kāraṇa tvāt guṇa anvaye matu artha lakṣaṇa āpattiḥ

original: tathāpi asādhitasya karaṇatvāyogādarthākṣepeṇa sādhyatvāvagamāttādrūpyamādāya yāge karaṇatvena guṇasyānvaye nānupapattiḥ /
analyzed: tathā api asādhitasya karaṇa tva ayogāt artha ākṣepeṇa sādhya tva avagamāt tādrūpyam ādāya yāge karaṇa tvena guṇasya anvaye nā anupapattiḥ
yat tu vidhāne vā anuvāde vā yāgaḥ karaṇam iṣyate

original: tatsamīpe tṛtīyāntastadvācitvaṃ na muñcati” iti vārtikaṃ,
analyzed: tad samīpe tṛtīyā antaḥ tad vāci tvam na muñcati iti vārtikam
tad uttara ardha anurodhāt same darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām yajeta ityādau yatra tṛtīyā anta nāmadheya sāmānādhikaraṇyam
tatra utpatti vākya avagata karaṇa tvasya eva anuvādaḥ na tu artha ākṣipta sādhyatvam iti etat param
jyotiṣṭoma vākyasya utpatti vidhi tva śaṅkayā prāpta śaṅkā antara nirākaraṇa artham soma vākyasya utpatti vidhi tva samarthanam
naca prāpaka vidhau api jyotiṣṭoma ādi upapada sattvena iha tasya api guṇa vidhi tva pūrvapakṣa udāharaṇa tvāt

original: tatra ca phalapadānurodhāt yāgasya karaṇatve guṇasyānvayānupapattyā matvarthalakṣaṇāpattiriti --- vācyam;
analyzed: tatra ca phala pada anurodhāt yāgasya karaṇa tve guṇasya anvaya anupapattyā matu artha lakṣaṇa āpattiḥ iti vācyam

original: yatropapadasya guṇe nirūḍhatvaṃ karmaṇi ca yogenāpyasaṃbhavadvṛttitā,
analyzed: yatra upapadasya guṇe nirūḍha tvam karmaṇi ca yogena api asaṃbhavat vṛtti tā

original: tatra somena yajetetyatrāprasiddhaśaktyantarakalpanāpekṣayā matvarthalakṣaṇāyā laghutvenāṅgīkārāt tatraiva karmotpattividhitve bādhakābhāvāt
analyzed: tatra somena yajeta iti atra aprasiddha śakti antara kalpanā apekṣayā matu artha lakṣaṇāyāḥ laghu tvena aṅgīkārāt tatra eva karma utpatti vidhi tve bādhaka abhāvāt
atas tad vihite karmaṇi iha yuktaḥ guṇa vidhiḥ iti arthaḥ
itikartavya tā iti
karma vidhi abhāve guṇa vidhi ayogāt avaśyam kasmiṃścid karma vidhāne bhyupagantavye jyotiṣṭoma vākya sannidhau
dīkṣaṇīya ādi bahu itikartavya tā āmnānāt tasyāḥ ca kartavya tā liṅga tvāt bhūyas tvena ubhaya śruti iti anena
nyāyena tasya eva karma vidhi tvam iti arthaḥ
bhāṣya vārtika ādi anusāreṇa somasya api bhāvanā karaṇa tvena eva anvaya nirūpaṇam
tatra tatra vakṣyate iti

original: saptamanavamādhyāyayoryajetetthamiti itikartavyatayā dhātvarthānvayanirāsenetthaṃ kuryāditi bhāvanānvayo bhāṣyakṛtā nirastaḥ /
analyzed: saptama navama adhyāyayoḥ yajeta ittham iti itikartavya tayā dhātvartha anvaya nirāsena ittham kuryāt iti bhāvanā anvayaḥ bhāṣyakṛtā nirastaḥ

original: “somena yajetetyatrāpi tadbhūtādhikaraṇoktena mārgeṇa dhātvarthakārakāṇāṃ aruṇaikahāyanyādivat paraspareṇāsaṃbandhya bhāvanāsaṃbaddhānāṃ uttarakālaṃ  #
analyzed: somena yajeta iti atra api tad bhūta adhikaraṇa uktena mārgeṇa dhātvartha kārakāṇām aruṇaikahāyanī ādi vat paraspareṇa a saṃbandhya bhāvanā a saṃbaddhānām uttarakālam
paraspara upakāri tvam
tathā ca saptama navama ādyayoḥ vakṣyati iti na soma viśiṣṭa dhātvartha vidhānam ityādinā vārtikakāreṇa

original: āghārāgnihotrādhikaraṇe tathā somatulyanyāyatvāt avaghātamantrasya bhāvanānvayino na pratiprahāramāvṛttirityetatpratipādanārtha ekādaśādhikaraṇe
analyzed: āghāra agnihotra adhikaraṇe tathā soma tulya nyāya tvāt avaghāta mantrasya bhāvanā anvayinaḥ na pratiprahāram āvṛttiḥ iti etad pratipādana arthaḥ ekādaśa adhikaraṇe
tathā saptame bhāvanā anvayataḥ paścāt aṃśayoḥ ārthikaḥ anvayaḥ

original: tataḥ karmāntare 'ṅgānāṃ prāptirāśaṅkyate kuta“ityādinā śāstradīpikāyāṃ ca vakṣyate ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tatas karma antare ṅgānām prāptiḥ āśaṅkyate kutas etyādinā śāstradīpikāyām ca vakṣyate iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ prācāṃ matakhaṇḍanena pūrvapakṣe matvarthalakṣaṇānāpattiṃ pradarśyādhunā yatpārṣṭhikabodhavelāyāmapi na tadāpattirityuktam,
analyzed: evam prācām mata khaṇḍanena pūrvapakṣe matu artha lakṣaṇa anāpattim pradarśya adhunā yat pārṣṭhika bodha velāyām api na tad āpattiḥ iti uktam
tat nirasitum āha yathā ca iti
pārṣṭhika anvaya velāyām somena yajeta iti atra matu artha lakṣaṇa āvaśyaka tā nirūpaṇam

original: ayamarthaḥ --- yadyapi sarvakārakāṇāṃ prathamato bhāvanayaiva saṃbandhaḥ;
analyzed: ayam arthaḥ yadi api sarva kārakāṇām prathamatas bhāvanayā eva saṃbandhaḥ
tathā api nirviṣaya kṛti saṃbandha ayogāt soma ādi gata vyāpāra apekṣāyām prāk phala karma tva yāga karaṇa tva gata nirūpaka apekṣāyāḥ

original: samānapadaśrutyā yāge phale caiva pratīteḥ pārṣṭhike phalayāgayoḥ saṃbandhe yāgasya
analyzed: samāna pada śrutyā yāge phale ca eva pratīteḥ pārṣṭhike phala yāgayoḥ saṃbandhe yāgasya
karaṇatayā eva avagatasya karma tvena prātīteḥ khanitra ādi kāraka antarasya karaṇa tvena eva anvaye
vaktavye bhinna arthayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya anupapattyā saṃbandha sāmānyena anvaya artham aśruta matu artha kalpanā āvaśyakī

original: paścāccāsādhitasya yāgasya karaṇatvānupapatteḥ karmatvabodhe sati khanitrādikārakāntarasya bhāvanāsaṃbandhavelāyāṃ śrutena kāraṇatvādinaiva  #
analyzed: paścāt ca asādhitasya yāgasya karaṇa tva anupapatteḥ karma tva bodhe sati khanitra ādi kāraka antarasya bhāvanā saṃbandha velāyām śrutena kāraṇa tva ādinā eva
viśeṣaṇa vidhi kāle nvayaḥ bhavati
atas pārṣṭhika anvaya kāle somavatā yajeta iti evam matvā artha lakṣaṇā a nivāryā
na ca evam asmad mate somasya vākyīya viniyoga āpattiḥ
pūrvam eva bhāvanā saṃbandha velāyām tad nirvāha artham matvā artha lakṣaṇa aṅgīkāre tad āpattau api

original: prathamata eva vinaiva lakṣaṇāṃ kārakāṇāṃ anyonyasaṃbandhamanādṛtya bhāvanānvayasya
analyzed: prathamatas eva vinā eva lakṣaṇām kārakāṇām anyonya saṃbandham an ādṛtya bhāvanā anvayasya

original: śrautatvena paścācca phalayāgayoḥ pārṣṭhikānvayavelāyāṃ sarvakārakāṇāṃ matvarthalakṣaṇayā
analyzed: śrauta tvena paścāt ca phala yāgayoḥ pārṣṭhika anvaya velāyām sarva kārakāṇām matu artha lakṣaṇayā
dhātvartha saṃbandha āśrayaṇe tad anāpatteḥ
viśiṣṭa vidhi pakṣe matu artha lakṣaṇa upapādana prakāraḥ kaustubha gataḥ

original: naca --- bhāvanānvayakāle karaṇatvenāvagatasomādikaraṇatvādīnāṃ yāgānvaye anupasthitānāṃ kathaṃ yāgasaṃbandhapratītiḥ?
analyzed: naca bhāvanā anvaya kāle karaṇa tvena avagata soma ādi karaṇa tva ādīnām yāga anvaye anupasthitānām katham yāga saṃbandha pratītiḥ
iti vācyam tasya matu artha saṃbandha sāmanya rūpeṇa upasthita tvena anupapatti abhāvāt
athavā soma karaṇakena yāgena iti samasta vākya kalpanayā vā upasthiti upapatteḥ

original: evamaruṇaikavākyepi yā aruṇā saikahāyanītyevaṃ luptamatubantavākyakalpanāpi draṣṭavyeti viśiṣṭavidhipakṣe matvarthalakṣaṇāpattiranivāryeti  #
analyzed: evam aruṇa eka vākye api yā aruṇā sā ekahāyanī iti evam lupta matup anta vākya kalpanā api draṣṭavyā iti viśiṣṭa vidhi pakṣe matu artha lakṣaṇa āpattiḥ anivāryā iti
kaustubhe uktam iti arthaḥ
ajñāta sandigdhasya udbhid padasya yaji samānādhikaraṇyena artha nirṇayaḥ iti nāmatva nirūpaṇam
iti vyutpattyā iti

original: udbhidyate utpādyate yasmādyāgena phalamiti hetorudbhinatti phalamiti vā vyutpattyetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: udbhidyate utpādyate yasmāt yāgena phalam iti hetoḥ udbhinatti phalam iti vā vyutpattyā iti arthaḥ
anyathā kartari kvipaḥ nuśāsanena karma vyutpatti pradarśanasya asaṅgata tva āpatteḥ
ayam arthaḥ padam ajñāta sandigdham prasiddhaiḥ apṛthaka śruti

original: nirṇīyate nirūḍhantu na svārthādapanīyate” iti vārtikoktarītyā udbhidādipadānāṃ khanitrādau samudāyaśakterabhāvāt avayavayogenāpi pācakādiśabdavalloke  #
analyzed: nirṇīyate nirūḍham tu na svārthāt apanīyate iti vārtika ukta rītyā udbhida ādi padānām khanitra ādau samudāya śakteḥ abhāvāt avayava yogena api pācaka ādi śabda vat loke
prayoga abhāvāt ajñāta artha tvam

original: yastu --- “surāṇāṃ vai balastamasā prāvṛto smāpidhānamāsīttasmin gavyaṃ vastvantarāsīttaṃ
analyzed: yaḥ tu surāṇām vai balaḥ tamasā prāvṛtaḥ u sma apidhānam āsīt tasmin gavyam vastu antar āsīt tam

original: devā nāśaknuvan bhettuṃ te bṛhaspatimabruvannimā utsṛjeti sa udbhideva balaṃ vyacyāvayat”
analyzed: devāḥ na aśaknuvan bhettum te bṛhaspatim abruvan imāḥ utsṛja iti saḥ udbhidā iva balam vyacyāvayat
iti arthavāde go yukta vivara apara paryāya bala cyāvana dvārasya vidāraṇasya pravṛtti nimitta tva avagamaḥ
tasya svārtha paratva abhāvena tādṛśa arthe pramāṇa abhāvāt na upayuktaḥ
tathā pika ādi śabda vat prayoga abhāve pi avayava artha yoga mātre khanitre iva yāge pi pravṛtti upapatteḥ akṣa ādi pada vat sandigdha tvam
atas prasiddha yaji pada sāmānādhikaraṇyāt nirṇeyam iti
utpādane pi iti
apūrve vastuni kenacid utpādite idam anena udbhinnam iti prayogāt iti arthaḥ
nāmnaḥ saṃkalpa dau sārthakya nirūpaṇam
saṃkalpa ādau iti
anuṣṭhāna kāle prayoga vidhi apekṣita laghu ākhyāna aupayika tvena sārthakyāt iti arthaḥ
yathā iti

original: darśapūrṇamāsapadasya nāmatvābhāve yajinā prakṛtatvāviśeṣeṇa ṣaḍyāgasādhāraṇyena prayājādyaṅgānāmapyupādānāt sarveṣāṃ phalasaṃbandhāpattiḥ
analyzed: darśa pūrṇamāsa padasya nāma tva abhāve yajinā prakṛta tva aviśeṣeṇa ṣaṣ yāga sādhāraṇyena prayāja ādi aṅgānām api upādānāt sarveṣām phala saṃbandha āpattiḥ

original: sati tu nāmadheye ṣaṇṇāmeva tatsiddhiriti phalasaṃbandharūpaṃ prayojanaṃ caturthe vakṣyate ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: sati tu nāmadheye ṣaṇṇām eva tad siddhiḥ iti phala saṃbandha rūpam prayojanam caturthe vakṣyate iti arthaḥ
yathā iti
vaimṛdha vākye paurṇamāsī nāmadheya abhāve prakaraṇāt amāvāsyā aṅga tvasya api āpattiḥ vaimṛdhasya

original: tatsattve tu vākyena prakaraṇabādhānna tadāpattiriti guṇopabandhaḥ prayojanamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tad sattve tu vākyena prakaraṇa bādhāt na tad āpattiḥ iti guṇa upabandhaḥ prayojanam iti arthaḥ
bheda siddhiḥ eva iti

original: evakāreṇa guṇaphalopabandharūpaprayojanāntarāsaṃbhave 'pi saṃkalpe ullekhavat bhedasiddhiriti dvitīyaṃ prayojanaṃ avyabhicāri labhyate ityarthaḥ  #
analyzed: eva kāreṇa guṇa phala upabandha rūpa prayojana antara asaṃbhave saṃkalpe ullekha vat bheda siddhiḥ iti dvitīyam prayojanam avyabhicāri labhyate iti arthaḥ
sūcitaḥ
tena na saṃkalpa ullekhana rūpa prayojana vyāvṛttiḥ iti bhāvaḥ
udbhedana kāri tva rūpa yoga arthasya atiprasaṅga śaṅkā
soma ādi padānām api iti

original: etena yadatra nyāyasudhākṛtānyaiśca paṅkajādipadavadudbhicchabdasya yogarūḍhiṃ parikalpya
analyzed: etena yat atra nyāyasudhā kṛta anyaiḥ ca paṅkaja ādi pada vat udbhid śabdasya yoga rūḍhim parikalpya
rūḍhi avacchedaka padma tva vat vidhi sāmarbhyena avagata vijātīya yāga tvam eva rūḍhi avacchedakam iti uktam
tad padma tvasya pramāṇa antara siddha tvena rūḍhi avacchedaka tva kalpane vidhi sāmarthyāt asiddhe
rūḍhi avacchedaka tva anupapattyāḥ rūḍhi kalpanā anupapatteḥ matu artha lakṣaṇa āpatti bhiyā rūḍhi kalpane
soma ādi padeṣu api tad āpatteḥ upekṣyam iti sūcitam

original: yadapi atiprasaṅgaparihārārthaṃ yajisāmānādhikaraṇyabalāt tadgatamevodbhedanakartṛtvaṃ pravṛttinimittamityākareṇa pakṣāntaramuktaṃ;
analyzed: yat api atiprasaṅga parihāra artham yaji sāmānādhikaraṇya balāt tad gatam eva udbhedana kartṛ tvam pravṛtti nimittam iti ākareṇa pakṣa antaram uktam
tat api yaji padena vijātīya yāga abhidhānāt tāvat mātra vṛtti udbhedana kartṛ tvasya pravṛtti nimitta tve
udbhid śabda vācya yāga antare pravṛtti nimitta antara kalpanā āpatteḥ tad artham pṛthak avayava śakti antara kalpanā āpatteḥ ayuktam
etena yat prakāśa kāraiḥ yogyatayā ekavākyatayā ca etad yāga janya paśu phala viśeṣa udbhedaka tvena pravṛtti nimittena yaugika tvāt na atiprasaṅgaḥ
tat api ayuktam
karma sāmānye eka rūpa pravṛtti nimitta asaṃbhavāt atas tiprasaṅgam anyathā pariharati sarvatra hi iti
artha antare prācīna prayoga abhāvena ukta atiprasaṅga vāraṇasya sva abhimatasya nirūpaṇam
ayam arthaḥ ghaṭa padasya ghaṭa viṣaya śakti niścaya ananubhava balāt tatra niyāmaka apekṣāyām ghaṭa pada prayoga rūpa vyavahārasya sahakāri kāraṇa tvam
loke kṛptam

original: prakṛte codbhicchabdasya karmaṇi śaktiniścayārthaṃ prācīnaprayogasya sahakārikāraṇatvāt
analyzed: prakṛte ca udbhid śabdasya karmaṇi śakti niścaya artham prācīna prayogasya sahakāri kāraṇa tvāt

original: yatra yatra tādṛśaprayogaḥ tatraiva śaktiniścaye satyanyasya jyotiṣṭomādestadabhāvādeva nopasthitiḥ /
analyzed: yatra yatra tādṛśa prayogaḥ tatra eva śakti niścaye sati anyasya jyotiṣṭoma ādeḥ tad abhāvāt eva nā upasthitiḥ

original: evañca yogenaiva nirvāhe yogarūḍhirnāma nātiriktā kalpanīyetyarthaḥ //
analyzed: evam ca yogena eva nirvāhe yoga rūḍhiḥ nāma na atiriktā kalpanīyā iti arthaḥ
yoga rūḍhi an aṅgīkāre pi paṅkaja ādi śabdasya anya ābodhaka tva upapattiḥ
evam paṅkaja ādi padeṣu api jñeyam

original: athavā --- paṅkajanikartṛtvasyāvayavaśaktyā bodhe 'pi tādṛśaśābdabodhaṃ prati tādṛśapūrvataraprayogābhāvajñānasya
analyzed: athavā paṅkaja nikartṛ tvasya avayava śaktyā bodhe tādṛśa śābda bodham prati tādṛśa pūrvatara prayoga abhāva jñānasya
athavā padma viśeṣyaka pūrvatara prayoga tva prakāraka jñānasya pratibandhaka tva kalpanāt na

original: avaśyaṃ hi padme śaktivādināpyuktagrahasya śaktikalpakatvamaṅgīkṛtya tadgrahasya niruktaśābdabodhaṃ prati pratibandhakatvaṃ vācyam /
analyzed: avaśyam hi padme śakti vādinā api ukta grahasya śakti kalpaka tvam aṅgīkṛtya tad grahasya nirukta śābdabodham prati pratibandhaka tvam vācyam
tat varam ukta grahasya eva pratibandhaka tvam vācyam iti sarvatra iti anena sūcitam

original: evañca prācīnaprayogasya śaktijñānaṃ prati sahakāritvena yatra naiva sahakārikāraṇaṃ,
analyzed: evam ca prācīna prayogasya śakti jñānam prati sahakāri tvena yatra na eva sahakāri kāraṇam

original: tatra śaktigrahābhāvādevetarabodhābhāve sthite sati yat samānādhikaraṇe ṣaṣṭhe tantraratne “yastvaprayogādevāprayoga iti vadanneva padmādiṣu  #
analyzed: tatra śakti graha abhāvāt eva itara bodha abhāve sthite sati yat samāna adhikaraṇe ṣaṣṭhe tantraratne yaḥ tu aprayogāt eva aprayogaḥ iti vadan eva padma ādiṣu
rūḍhim na icchati
sa vaktavyaḥ upapadyatām nāma pūrva pūrveṣām a prayogāt eva uttara uttareṣām a prayogaḥ
pratītiḥ tu ananya labhyā śaktim eva kalpayati
katham khalu aśaktāt paṅkaja padāt padma pratītiḥ
śabda pratipādita paṅka janana kriyā yoga vaśāt iti yadi brūyāt
pratibrūyāt enam anaikāntika tvāt iti
na khalu padma aikāntikam paṅka jananam
yatas tat niścāyayet
tasmāt śabda śaktiḥ eva kalpayitavyā iti
saced brūyāt satyam śabdāt eva padma pratītiḥ

original: sa tu prayogavaśādeva tatpratyāpayatī“ti na vācakaśaktiḥ kalpanīyeti,
analyzed: sa tu prayoga vaśāt eva tat pratyāpayati iti na vācaka śaktiḥ kalpanīyā iti
pratibrūyāt enam katham aśaktaḥ prayoga mātrāt eva pratyāpayet iti

original: prasaṅgo hi tathā syāditi sarve gavādiśabdāḥ śaktimantareṇaiva prayogamātrādeva svārthaṃ pratyāpayantīti śakyaṃ vaditum /
analyzed: prasaṅgaḥ hi tathā syāt iti sarve gavā ādi śabdāḥ śaktim antareṇa eva prayoga mātrāt eva sva artham pratyāpayanti iti śakyam vaditum
iti rūḍhi prasādhanāya uktam

original: tacchaktiṃ vināsmābhiḥ prayogavaśādeva pratyāyakatvānaṅgīkārānnāsmanmate prasajyate ityapi dhyeyam //
analyzed: tad śaktim vinā asmābhiḥ prayoga vaśāt eva pratyāyaka tva anaṅgīkārāt na asmad mate prasajyate iti api dhyeyam
yadi tu paṅkaja śabdāt paṅkaja nikartṛ tva prakāraka padma viśeṣyaka pratītiḥ anubhava siddhā iti ucyeta

original: tathāpyasmin pakṣe nirūḍhalakṣaṇayaiva tatpratītyupapatterna tadanurodhena rūḍheravakāśa iti na doṣaḥ //
analyzed: tathā api asmin pakṣe nirūḍha lakṣaṇayā eva tad pratīti upapatteḥ na tad anurodhena rūḍheḥ avakāśaḥ iti na doṣaḥ
evam ca yaji udbhid padayoḥ pravṛtti nimitta bhedāt nīlotpalayoḥ iva bhinna pravṛtti nimitta tve sati ekārtha vṛtti tva lakṣaṇasya artha sāmānādhikaraṇyasya api upapattiḥ

original: naca udbhitpadaśakyatāvacchedakasya phalotpādakatvasya paśukāmapadasamabhivyāhṛtākhyātapadādeva paśūtpādanahetunā yāgena paśūn bhāvayediti
analyzed: naca udbhid pada śakya tā avacchedakasya phala utpādaka tvasya paśu kāma pada samabhivyāhṛta ākhyāta padāt eva paśu utpādana hetunā yāgena paśūn bhāvayet iti
paśu kāma pada avagatasya api phala udbhedana hetu tvasya nāmadheyena anuvādāt
tad phalam ca itara vyāvṛtti saṃkalpa ullekha ādikam prāk eva uktam

original: ataśca yathā vākyāntarasiddhāgnidevatākatvānuvādo 'gnihotrapadena saṃkalpādiphalako na virudhyate,
analyzed: atas ca yathā vākya antara siddha agni devatāka tva anuvādaḥ gnihotra padena saṃkalpa ādi phalakaḥ na virudhyate
tathā eva sva vākya gata paśu kāma pada avagata phala hetutva anuvādaḥ pi nā anupapannaḥ
saṃjñā saṃjñi saṃbandhasya avidheya tva nirūpaṇa pūrvakam nāma tvena anvaye lāghava vādi nirūpaṇam

original: ataeva --- nāmatve saṃjñāsaṃjñisaṃbandhasyāpi vidhānāt vākyabhedāpattiḥ --- nirastā;
analyzed: ataeva nāma tve saṃjñā saṃjñi saṃbandhasya api vidhānāt vākya bheda āpattiḥ nirastā
nāmnaḥ na anuṣṭheya tvena sāmānādhikaraṇya avayava prasiddhibhyām eva ca siddheḥ tad saṃbandhasya avidheya tvena tad aprasakteḥ

original: ataeva nāmadheyārthaviśiṣṭayāgavidhāne 'pi nāmadheyārthasya pramāṇāntarāvagatatvena tadaṃśe viśeṣaṇavidherakalpanādeva viśiṣṭavidhitve 'pi  #
analyzed: ataeva nāmadheya artha viśiṣṭa yāga vidhāne pi nāmadheya arthasya pramāṇa antara avagata tvena tad aṃśe viśeṣaṇa vidheḥ akalpanāt eva viśiṣṭa vidhi tve pi
siddhānte lāghavam
pūrvapakṣe tu guṇavat tad gata liṅga saṅkhyā aṃśe viśeṣaṇa vidhi kalpanāt gauravam

original: siddhānte ca ākhyātopāttasaṅkhyādyanuvādakatayā vidheyatvena lāghavamiti viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: siddhānte ca ākhyāta upātta saṅkhyā ādi anuvādaka tayā vidheya tvena lāghavam iti viśeṣaḥ
etena yat yaugika tva pakṣa upapādanam vārtika kāra iyam paśu kāmaḥ yajeta iti etāvatā eva

original: siddhatvāt paśūdbhedahetunā paśūn bhāvayediti nāmadheyavidhyānarthakyāpatteḥ prauḍhavādamātramiti
analyzed: siddha tvāt paśu udbheda hetunā paśūn bhāvayet iti nāmadheya vidhi ānarthakya āpatteḥ prauḍha vāda mātram iti
nāmnaḥ vidheya tve pi dhātvartha paricchedaka tayā vidhi uddeśa antarbhāva nirūpaṇam

original: ato nāmadheyārthasyaiveha dhātvarthāvacchedakatayā āgneyādi sāhityasyeva svarūpataḥ
analyzed: atas nāmadheya arthasya eva iha dhātvartha avacchedaka tayā āgneya ādi sāhityasya iva svarūpataḥ
pramāṇa antara avagatānām vrīhyāruṇī ādīnām iva vā viśiṣṭa vidhinā vidhānāt vidhi uddeśa antargateḥ api upapatteḥ na kā api kṣatiḥ

original: yadyapi ajñātaviśeṣarūpajñāpana eva paricchedakatvavyavahārasyānyatra dṛṣṭatvāttasya ceha śabdāntarādipramāṇasahakṛtavidhinaiva siddherna nāmnaḥ  #
analyzed: yadi api ajñāta viśeṣa rūpa jñāpane eva paricchedaka tva vyavahārasya anyatra dṛṣṭa tvāt tasya ca iha śabda antara ādi pramāṇa sahakṛta vidhinā eva siddheḥ na nāmnaḥ

original: tathāpi jñāte 'pi viśeṣe ko 'sāviti jijñāsānivartakatvenaiva tasya paricchedakatvavyavahāra iti draṣṭavyam //
analyzed: tathā api jñāte viśeṣe saḥ iti jijñāsā nivartaka tvena eva tasya paricchedaka tva vyavahāraḥ iti draṣṭavyam
nāmadheya arthasya pramāṇa antara siddha tve pi bheda ādi jñāpaka tvena dharma prāmāṇya nirūpaṇam
na ca evam nāmadheya arthasya pramāṇa antara siddhatvena anūdyamāna tvāt anadhigata artha gantṛ tva abhāvena katham prāmāṇya saṃbhavaḥ
iti vācyam svārtha anuvādaka tve pi vidvat vākyayoḥ iva anadhigata bheda ādi jñāpaka tvena tad upapatteḥ
yatra api nāmadheya abhāve pi ananya para vidhi punaḥśravaṇa rūpa abhyāsāt eva bheda siddhiḥ yathā
samidhaḥ yajati tanūnapātam yajati ityādau tatra bheda jñāpaka tva abhāve pi nirdhārita rūpa viśeṣa pratipatteḥ nāmadheya adhīna tvāt ajñāta āthraka tva upapattiḥ
atas yuktam nāmadheya tvena dharme prāmāṇyam

original: (paśūdbhedanakāritvenodbhitpadasya karmaṇi na pravṛttiḥ kintu saṃjñātvena rūpeṇa saṃjñātvapratipattyarthayogāśrayaṇamiti somanāthīyāśayanirūpaṇam)
analyzed: paśu udbhedana kāri tvena udbhid padasya karmaṇi na pravṛttiḥ kintu saṃjñā tvena rūpeṇa saṃjñā tva pratipatti artha yoga āśrayaṇam iti somanāthīya āśaya nirūpaṇam
yat tu vārtika ukta pakṣa antara avalambanena somanāthena paśu udbhedana kāri tvasya paśu kāma pada vat ākhyātāt eva
siddheḥ nāmadheya ānarthakyam āśaṅkya yadi paśu udbhedana sādhanatvena yāgam udbhid padam
bodhayet tadā vaiyarthyam syāt
apitu saṃjñā rūpa tvena udbhid nāmaka tvena yāgam pratipādayati
evam ca vidhi samabhivyāhṛta dhātunā eva karma viśeṣa pratīti siddhau api sau karma viśeṣa
iti apekṣāyām asmin vākye dravya devatayoḥ aśravaṇena dravya devatā ādi upalakṣaṇena yāga viśeṣa pratipādana asaṃbhavāt
yāgaḥ yam iti tad viśeṣa pratipādana paratvāt udbhid padasya na vaiyarthyam

original: udbhitpadaṃ tu udbhitpadenānabhihitamapi pratyakṣaśrutatvamātreṇa svavācyamanyasmādvyāvartayat viśeṣaṇabhāvamanubhavati /
analyzed: udbhid padam tu udbhid padena anabhihitam api pratyakṣa śruta tva mātreṇa sva vācyam anyasmāt vyāvartayat viśeṣaṇa bhāvam anubhavati
śabda upasthitasya eva anvaya bodha viṣaya tvam iti niyamaḥ tu saṃjñā śabda vyatirikta viṣayaḥ

original: yadvā--- saṃjñāśabdānāṃ svarūpapravṛttinimittakatvamiti śābdikoktarītyodbhicchabdasyaiva svarūpabodhakatvaṃ saṃbhavatīti na kāpyanupapattiḥ
analyzed: yat vā saṃjñā śabdānām svarūpa pravṛtti nimittaka tvam iti śābdika ukta rītyā udbhid śabdasya eva svarūpa bodhaka tvam saṃbhavati iti na kā api anupapattiḥ

original: naca --- evaṃ paśūdbhedanakāritvasya vākyārthapratītiviṣayatvābhāvāt tadarthakayogāśrayaṇavaiyarthyamiti --- vācyam;
analyzed: naca evam paśu udbhedana kāri tvasya vākya artha pratīti viṣaya tva abhāvāt tad arthaka yoga āśrayaṇa vaiyarthyam iti vācyam
yatra arthe yasya śabdasya avayava yoga ādi saṃbhavaḥ tatra eva saṃjñā tvam na anyatra
ataeva etādṛśa śabdasya eva saṃjñā tvam iṣyate

original: ataeva somādiśabdānāṃ somena yajetetyatra na nāmatvam /
analyzed: ataeva soma ādi śabdānām somena yajeta iti atra na nāma tvam
tatas ca saṃjñā tva nirvāha artham eva udbhida ādi śabdānām karmaṇi yoga āśrayaṇam iti
tad vaiyarthya anavakāśaḥ

original: athavā udbhicchabdaḥ udbhicchabdābhidheyatvena rūpeṇa lakṣaṇayā karma pratipādayati /
analyzed: athavā udbhid śabdaḥ udbhid śabda abhidheya tvena rūpeṇa lakṣaṇayā karma pratipādayati

original: sā ca lakṣaṇā yogena svābhidheyatve sati pravartate nānyatheti tadarthaṃ yogāśrayaṇam /
analyzed: sā ca lakṣaṇā yogena sva abhidheya tve sati pravartate na anyathā iti tad artham yoga āśrayaṇam

original: lakṣaṇāpi nirūḍhatvāt matvarthalakṣaṇāpekṣayā jyāyasīti na guṇavidhipakṣoktadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: lakṣaṇā api nirūḍha tvāt matu artha lakṣaṇa apekṣayā jyāyasī iti na guṇa vidhi pakṣa ukta doṣa prasaṅgaḥ
avayava yogam vinā api saṃjñā tvam

original: tathāpi yogenodbhicchabdasya prasaktaguṇavidhitvanirāsamātrārthamiva karmaṇi yogasāmyapradarśanārthaṃ yogāśrayaṇamiti --- uktam //
analyzed: tathā api yogena udbhid śabdasya prasakta guṇa vidhi tva nirāsa mātra artham iva karmaṇi yoga sāmya pradarśana artham yoga āśrayaṇam iti uktam

original: tatprathame pakṣe padajanyapadārthopasthitereva vākyārthabodhe kāraṇatvena kḷptasyeha
analyzed: tad prathame pakṣe pada janya padārtha upasthiteḥ eva vākya artha bodhe kāraṇa tvena kḷptasya iha
tyāge pramāṇa abhāvāt anyathā svarga kāma pada adhyāhārasya viśvajit vākye gni mantre sūrya pada prakṣepasya ūhasya api apalāpa prasaṅgāt
dvitīye pakṣe śābdika ukteḥ yatra avayava artha saṃbhavaḥ tatra ḍittha aśvakarṇa ādi śabda paratvāt anyatra apravṛtteḥ yāga ākhyānam

original: vināpi ḍitthādiśabdeṣu saṃjñātvadarśanāt yatrāvayavārthayogasaṃbhavaḥ tatraiva saṃjñātvamiti
analyzed: vinā api ḍittha ādi śabdeṣu saṃjñā tva darśanāt yatra avayava artha yoga saṃbhavaḥ tatra eva saṃjñā tvam iti
niyamasya aprayojaka tvena prakṛte yoga āśrayaṇasya niṣphala tva āpatteḥ tṛtīye udbhid śabda abhidheya tvena
rūpeṇa lakṣaṇa āśrayaṇe matu artha lakṣaṇa āśrayaṇena guṇa vidhi tvasya yoga artha sahakṛtasya api upapatteḥ vede

original: “somena yajete” tyādau sarvasyā api lakṣaṇāyā nirūḍhalakṣaṇātvenaivāṅgīkāre matvarthalakṣaṇāpekṣayā
analyzed: somena yajeta ityādau sarvasyāḥ api lakṣaṇāyāḥ nirūḍhalakṣaṇā tvena eva aṅgīkāre matu artha lakṣaṇa apekṣayā
udbhid śabda abhidheya tva lakṣaṇāyāḥ nirūḍha tvena jyāyas tva kathanasya api ayukta tvāt ayuktam iti upekṣitam pūjya pādaiḥ
udbhid saṃjñakena yāgena iti eva atra śābda bodhaḥ
saṃjñā bodhaḥ tu mata nirūpaṇa khaṇḍane

original: etena --- saṃbhavatyadhikārthatve na nāmnaḥ paricchedārthavarṇanaṃ yuktam;
analyzed: etena saṃbhavati adhika artha tve na nāmnaḥ pariccheda artha varṇanam yuktam

original: kintu udbhitsaṃjñakena yāgeneti pratīteḥ saṃjñāviśiṣṭayāgabodha evodbhitpadādaṅgīkartuṃ yuktaḥ /
analyzed: kintu udbhid saṃjñakena yāgena iti pratīteḥ saṃjñā viśiṣṭa yāga bodhaḥ eva udbhid padāt aṅgīkartum yuktaḥ
na ca evam tarhi teṣām udbhid śabda svarūpa abhidheya tva prasaṅgaḥ iti vācyam
jāti viśiṣṭa pratīti janakānām gavā ādi padānām jāti vāci tva sādhaka nyāyena saṃjñā viśiṣṭa pratīti janakānām api eṣām saṃjñā vāci tva aṅgīkārasya iṣṭāpatti grasta tvāt
yadi śabda abhihitaiḥ go tva ādibhiḥ tādātmya ādinā saṃbaddha viśeṣya lakṣaṇa asaṃbhavena viśeṣya anabhidhāne
pi saṃjñā śabdānām śabda mātra abhidhāne saṃbandha abhāvena saṃjñi vilakṣaṇa anupapatteḥ
tad bodha artham saṃjñini api śakti kalpanāyām ati gauravam āśaṅkyeta
tadā astu saṃjñā aṃśe lakṣaṇā

original: naca --- evaṃ siddhānte 'pi lakṣaṇāyāstulyatve kimarthaṃ matvarthalakṣaṇāyāstyāga iti --- vācyam;
analyzed: naca evam siddhānte lakṣaṇāyāḥ tulya tve kimartham matvā artha lakṣaṇāyāḥ tyāgaḥ iti vācyam
atas udbhid saṃjñaka tva prakāraka bodha janaka tvena eva udbhid śabdasya paricchedaka tvam yuktam iti keṣāñcid uktam apāstam

original: anavagate saṃjñātve tādṛśaprātītijananāsaṃbhavāttadavagamasya udbhidvākyāt prāk mānāntareṇāsiddherasyaiva
analyzed: anavagate saṃjñā tve tādṛśa prātīti janana asaṃbhavāt tad avagamasya udbhid vākyāt prāk māna antareṇa asiddheḥ asya eva
vākyasya udbhidā yāgena iti nāmnaḥ yaji sāmānādhikaraṇyena anvaya bodhanena saṃjñā tva ākṣepaka tve

original: tenaiva prathamajātenānvayabodhena vākyaparyavasāne sati udbhitsaṃjñakeneti lākṣaṇikabodhāṅgīkārasya niryuktikatvāt /
analyzed: tena eva prathama jātena anvaya bodhena vākya paryavasāne sati udbhid saṃjñakena iti lākṣaṇika bodha aṅgīkārasya niryuktika tvāt

original: etadvākyādhīna siddhikasya etatsaṃjñakatvasya asminneva vākye siddhavannirdeśānupapatteśca /
analyzed: etad vākya adhīna siddhikasya etad saṃjñaka tvasya asmin eva vākye siddha vat nirdeśa anupapatteḥ ca

original: kiñca yadi śabdena sahārthasya saṃbandābhāvānna saṃjñini lakṣaṇāyāḥ saṃbhavastarhi saṃjñinārthenāpi sahaśabdasya saṃbandho durnirūpa eveti  #
analyzed: kiñca yadi śabdena saha arthasya saṃbanda abhāvāt na saṃjñini lakṣaṇāyāḥ saṃbhavaḥ tarhi saṃjñinā arthena api saha śabdasya saṃbandhaḥ durnirūpaḥ evā iti
na tena śabda lakṣaṇa asaṃbhavaḥ
atas jāti nyāya vaiṣamya abhāvāt saṃjñāyām eva śaktiḥ sañjñinī eva lakṣaṇā āpadyeta
atas eva saṃjñā śabdānām vācaka tvam iti evam saṃgacchate
tathāca somena yajeta iti atra api lākṣaṇika sāmānādhikaraṇya upapattyā kim iti viśiṣṭa vidhi gaurava aṅgīkaraṇam
yadi tu saṃjñini api viśiṣṭa śaktim aṅgīkṛtya mukhyam eva sāmānādhikaraṇyam
na evam soma vākye saṃbhavati
soma ādi padānām rūḍha tvāt iti ucyeta
tadā viśiṣṭa śakti kalpanā gaurava āpādaka nāmadheya tva aṅgīkāra apekṣayā yaugika tvena eva nāmadheya tvam yuktam āśrayitum

original: udbhitsaṃjñako 'yamiti vyavahārasya tāvatāpyupapatteratiprasaṅgaparihārasya pūrvoktavidhayaivopapatteḥ rūḍhyaṅgīkāre prayojanābhāvāt iti //
analyzed: udbhid saṃjñakaḥ yam iti vyavahārasya tāvatā api upapatteḥ atiprasaṅga parihārasya pūrva ukta vidhayā eva upapatteḥ rūḍhi aṅgīkāre prayojana abhāvāt iti
rūḍhyā eva udbhidā yajeta iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam iti bhāṭṭa alaṅkāra mata tad khaṇḍane

original: yattu --- bhāṭṭālaṅkārakṛtā sādhutvanirvāhāya svīkriyamāṇasya yogasya vākyāntare svānurūpapratītijanakatve 'pīha rūḍhyaiva yāgīyaviśeṣarūpaṃ
analyzed: yat tu bhāṭṭa alaṅkāra kṛtā sādhutva nirvāhāya svīkriyamāṇasya yogasya vākya antare sva anurūpa pratīti janaka tve pi iha rūḍhyā eva yāgīya viśeṣa rūpam
etad vidheḥ prāk phala udbhedana kāri tvasya anavagamena phala udbhedana kāri tva prakāraka bodhasya asaṃbhavāt

original: naca --- vaidikaṃ karma tatphalasādhanamiti vyāptibalādavagataṃ sāmānyataḥ phalodbhedanakāritvaṃ nimittīkṛtyodbhitpadapravṛttiriti --- vācyam;
analyzed: naca vaidikam karma tat phala sādhanam iti vyāpti balāt avagatam sāmānyatas phala udbhedana kāri tvam nimittīkṛtya udbhid pada pravṛttiḥ iti vācyam
veda vihita tva ātmaka vaidika tvasya itas prāk asiddheḥ
na ca phala sāmānya saṃbandhaḥ u pi udbhid vākya ja prathama bodhāt labhyaḥ iti yuktam
udbhid pada paśu kāma pade an apekṣya yajeta iti asya a pramāṇa tvāt
atas tra na yogena udbhid padasya yaji sāmānādhikaraṇyam
apitu rūḍhyā eva iti uktam

original: tadapi na; yoge svīkriyamāṇe kḷptāvayavaśaktyaiva tadupapattau rūḍhikalpane mānābhāvāt,
analyzed: tat api na yoge svīkriyamāṇe kḷpta avayava śaktyā eva tad upapattau rūḍhi kalpane māna abhāvāt

original: itarathā prokṣaṇādiśabdānāmapi rūḍhikalpanāpatteḥ matvarthalakṣaṇābhiyātiriktarūḍhikalpane somādipadānāmapi rūḍhikalpanayā nāmadheyatvāpatteśca
analyzed: itarathā prokṣaṇa ādi śabdānām api rūḍhi kalpana āpatteḥ matu artha lakṣaṇa abhiyā atirikta rūḍhi kalpane soma ādi padānām api rūḍhi kalpanayā nāmadheya tva āpatteḥ ca

original: uktaṃ ca --- dvitīyādyādhikaraṇe gurumatakhaṇḍane śāstradīpikāyām--- varaṃ ca matvarthalakṣaṇāprasiddhārthakalpanāt,
analyzed: uktam ca dvitīya ādya adhikaraṇe guru mata khaṇḍane śāstradīpikāyām varam ca matu artha lakṣaṇa aprasiddha artha kalpanāt
itarathā somena yajeta iti atra api soma padam nāma syāt iti

original: ata eva na yatra yogārthasyāpi pratītiranubhavasiddhā,
analyzed: atas eva na yatra yoga arthasya api pratītiḥ anubhava siddhā

original: yathā godadhyādiśabdeṣu na gamanādeḥ kintu gotvādijātereva tatra yogasya sādhutvānvākhyānamātrārthatvasvīkāreṇa
analyzed: yathā go dadhi ādi śabdeṣu na gamana ādeḥ kintu go tva ādi jāteḥ eva tatra yogasya sādhutva anvākhyāna mātra arthatva svīkāreṇa

original: rūḍhisvīkāre 'pi yatra tasyā api saṃbhavastatra tadarthatyāgenātiriktarūḍhikalpanaṃ niṣpramāṇakameva //
analyzed: rūḍhi svīkāre pi yatra tasyāḥ api saṃbhavaḥ tatra tad artha tyāgena atirikta rūḍhi kalpanam niṣpramāṇakam eva
bhāvinam phala udbhedana kāri tva jñānam ādāya udbhid śabdasya pravṛtti nirūpaṇa pūrvakam phala udbheda kāri tva prakāraka bodha janaka tvena eva nāmnaḥ dhātvartha paricchedaka tva upasaṃhāraḥ
na ca itas prāk phala udbhedana kāri tva bodha asaṃbhavaḥ
agnihotram juhoti iti etasmāt prāk karma svarūpasya eva ajñāne saṃpratipanna aṅga bhāvasya mantra varṇasya prāpti abhāve gni daivatya tva ajñāne gnihotra padāt api
tad bodha asaṃbhavasya tulya tvāt

original: ataśca bhāvinaṃ pravṛttinimittamādāya yathāgnihotrapadasya nāmatvamevamihāpyupapadyata eva tat /
analyzed: atas ca bhāvinam pravṛtti nimittam ādāya yathā agnihotra padasya nāma tvam evam iha api upapadyate eva tat
athavā karma sāmānyasya eva loke phala janaka tva kḷpteḥ tad sāmānya gṛhīta vyāptyā api
avagata phala udbhedana kāri tva bodha janaka tvena eva nāmadheya arthasya dhātvartha tā avacchedaka tvam iti
prāk uktam eva yuktam iti saṃkṣepaḥ
adhikaraṇa prayojanam nāmadheya prayojana kathanena eva sūcitam
iti dvitīyam udbhida ādi yaugika śabda yāga nāmadheya tā adhikaraṇam
adhikaraṇam
yasmin guṇa upadeśaḥ pradhānataḥ bhisambandhaḥ

original: atra guṇa eva rūḍhānāṃ “citrayā yajeta paśukāmaḥ” “pañcadaśānyājyāni” “saptadaśāni
analyzed: atra guṇaḥ eva rūḍhānām citrayā yajeta paśu kāmaḥ pañcadaśāni ājyāni saptadaśāni
pṛṣṭhāni trivṛt bahiṣpavamānaḥ ityādau citra ājya pṛṣṭha bahiṣpavamāna śabdānām guṇa vidhi tvam
karma nāma tvam vā iti cintāyām
dadhi ādi vat rūḍheṣu karma nāma tva asaṃbhavāt guṇa vidhi tvam eva eṣām

original: tatra citrāpade tāvatprātipadikena citratvaṃ strīpratyayena ca strītvaṃ vidhīyate /
analyzed: tatra citrā pade tāvat prātipadikena citra tvam strīpratyayena ca strī tvam vidhīyate
vidheyayoḥ ca paraspara sāhitya avagateḥ vidheya sāmarthya anurodhena prāṇi dravyaka yāgasya uddeśya tva avagateḥ

original: prakṛtānāmapi “dadhi madhu ghṛtaṃ payo dhānā udakaṃ taṇḍulāstatsaṃsṛṣṭaṃ prājāpatya”
analyzed: prakṛtānām api dadhi madhu ghṛtam payaḥ dhānāḥ udakam taṇḍulāḥ tat saṃsṛṣṭam prājāpatya
m iti etad vākya vihitānām yāgānām uddeśya tva asaṃbhave pi sarva prakṛti bhūta agnīṣomīya yāga uddeśena
sarva paśu yāga uddeśena vā vidhīyate
na ca aneka guṇa vidhāne vākya bhedaḥ
dhenuḥ dakṣiṇā iti vat ubhaya viśiṣṭa eka kāraka vidhānena a vākya bhedāt
evam ājya padena ghṛtam pṛṣṭha padena śarīra avayavaḥ

original: sa ca saṅkhyāviśiṣṭaḥ prakaraṇā “dājyaiḥ stuvate” “pṛṣṭhaiḥ stuvate” ityetadvākyavihitastotrāṅgatayā yathākramaṃ vidhīyate /
analyzed: sa ca saṅkhyā viśiṣṭaḥ prakaraṇā dājyaiḥ stuvate pṛṣṭhaiḥ stuvate iti etad vākya vihita stotra aṅga tayā yathākramam vidhīyate

original: evaṃ trivṛcchabdavācyaṃ tribhiṇḍidravyaṃ pavanakriyāviśiṣṭaṃ tathaiva tadvākyena vidhīyate /
analyzed: evam trivṛt śabda vācyam tribhiṇḍi dravyam pavana kriyā viśiṣṭam tathā eva tad vākyena vidhīyate

original: sarvatra dravyāṇāṃ stotrasamīpadeśe adṛṣṭārthaṃ sthāpanenaiva stotropakārakatā,
analyzed: sarvatra dravyāṇām stotra samīpa deśe adṛṣṭa artham sthāpanena eva stotra upakāraka tā
utpati vākyeṣu tu ājya ādi padam guṇa vākya prāpta tvāt anuvādaḥ

original: stotramātraṃ tu vidhīyate iti prāpte --- ( B2)
analyzed: stotra mātram tu vidhīyate iti prāpte
atha citra ādi śabda yāga nāmadheya tā adhikaraṇam
pūrva adhikaraṇa viṣaya vyāvṛtta viṣayam udāharati atra iti
guṇa eva iti
guṇa pade jāti kriyā yogayoḥ api upalakṣaṇe
tena ghṛta jāti vacana ājya padasya śarīra avayava vācaka pṛṣṭha padasya pavana kriyā yoga nimitta bahiṣpavamāna ādi śabdānām api saṃgrahaḥ
eva kāreṇa karmaṇi api saṃbhavat vṛttikānām yaugikānām anudāharaṇa tva sūcanena pūrva adhikaraṇa apravṛttiḥ uktā

original: yadyapi pavamānaśabdaḥ pavanakriyākartari yaugika iti pūrvādhikaraṇaviṣayatvānnehodāhartuṃ yuktaḥ;
analyzed: yadi api pavamāna śabdaḥ pavana kriyā kartari yaugikaḥ iti pūrva adhikaraṇa viṣaya tvāt na iha udāhartum yuktaḥ

original: tathāpi “sarvatra yaugikaiḥ śabdairdravyamevābhidhīyate” iti nyāyena pavanakriyākartari
analyzed: tathā api sarvatra yaugikaiḥ śabdaiḥ dravyam eva abhidhīyate iti nyāyena pavana kriyā kartari

original: dravya eva yogena rūḍhatvāt stotre ca pavanakriyākartṛtvāsaṃbhavāt udbhicchabdavadubhayatra
analyzed: dravye eva yogena rūḍha tvāt stotre ca pavana kriyā kartṛ tva asaṃbhavāt udbhid śabda vat ubhayatra
tulyavat vṛtti tva abhāvena nāma tva anupapatteḥ na pūrva adhikaraṇa viṣayatvam iti udāharaṇa tva upapattiḥ
yadi api tad prakhya tad vyapadeśa nyāyayoḥ api jāti ādi vacanānām evā udāharaṇa tvam
tathā api yatra tad nyāyayoḥ apravṛttiḥ teṣām iha udāharaṇa tve kalpyamāne dadhi soma ādi padānām api
tad nyāya aviṣayāṇām udāharaṇa tā āpattiḥ tad vāraṇāya yasmin vākye jāti guṇa vācaka śabdānām upādāne

original: sati prasaktavākyabhedaparihāro nāmatvena vinā na saṃbhavati teṣāmihodāharaṇatvam ityapi jñeyam /
analyzed: sati prasakta vākya bheda parihāraḥ nāma tvena vinā na saṃbhavati teṣām iha udāharaṇa tvam iti api jñeyam

original: ata eva “dadhnendriyakāmasye” ti vākye vākyabhedasaṃbhāvanāyāmapi tasya vinaiva nāmatayā parihartuṃ śakyatvānnodāharaṇatvam /
analyzed: atas eva dadhnā indriya kāmasya iti vākye vākya bheda saṃbhāvanāyām api tasya vinā eva nāma tayā parihartum śakya tvāt na udāharaṇa tvam
tathā ca tad prakhya tad vyapadeśa nyāya aviṣayāṇām jāti ādau eva nirūḍhānām nāma tā mātra kṛta prasakta vākya bheda parihāravat vākya gatānām śabdānām iha udāharaṇa tvam
iti bhāvaḥ
tān eva śabdān vākya gata tvena darśayati citrayā iti
ājyaiḥ stuvate ityādi utpatti vākya gata ājya ādi pada parityāgena guṇa vākya gatasya udāharaṇa tvena nirdeśe nimitta nirūpaṇam

original: yadyapi “ājyaiḥ stuvate” “ṣaṣṭhaiḥ stuvate” ityādyutpattivākyagatānāmapyeṣāṃ śabdānāṃ vicāraviṣayatvaṃ saṃbhavati /
analyzed: yadi api ājyaiḥ stuvate ṣaṣṭhaiḥ stuvate ityādi utpatti vākya gatānām api eṣām śabdānām vicāra viṣaya tvam saṃbhavati
stotra ādi samāna adhikaraṇa tṛtīyā anta pada abhidheya tvena nāmatā koṭeḥ tatra saṃbhavaḥ asti
tathā api teṣām anudāharaṇa tvam svayam evā āśaṅkā nirāsa vyājena adūre eva darśayiṣyate
yasmin guṇa upadeśaḥ iti sūtra avayava anurodhena guṇa vākya gatānām eva udāharaṇa tvam darśitam
udbhid adhikaraṇena citra adhikaraṇasya pratyudāharaṇa saṃgatiḥ
kvacid api aprasiddha tayā sandigdha arthānām padānām sāmānādhikaraṇyāt nāmatā nirṇayaḥ iti evaṃrūpa pūrva adhikaraṇa nyāya atyayena
pūrvapakṣi pratyavasthānāt pratyudāharaṇa rūpām anantara saṃgatim spaṣṭa tvāt an uktvā pūrvapakṣam āha
dadhi ādi vat iti
citrā śabdaḥ rūpa tva vyāpya avāntara jāti rūpa citra tva guṇa tva avacchinne guṇe rūḍhaḥ
ājya śabdaḥ ghṛta jātau
pṛṣṭha śabdaḥ śarīra avayava jātau
pavamāna śabdaḥ pūrva ukta rītyā dravye rūḍhaḥ iti arthaḥ
citra tva strī tva ubhaya vidhi sāmarthyena prāṇi dravyaka yāga uddeśya tva avagati nirūpaṇam
vidheya sāmarthya anurodhena iti

original: yathaiva “yasyobhāvagnī abhinimrocetāṃ punarādheyamasya prāyaścitti” riti vākye havirārtyadhikaraṇanyāyena
analyzed: yathā eva yasya ubhau agnī abhinimrocetām punarādheyam asya prāyaścittiḥ iti vākye haviḥ ārti adhikaraṇa nyāyena
nimitta viśeṣaṇasya ubhaya tvasya avivakṣayā anyatara agni anugamane pi prāyaścitta prāptau api
vidhīyamānasya ādhāna āsya agni dvaya utpādaka tva sāmarthyāt eva ubhaya agni anugamanasya eva nimitta tvāt na anyatara agni anugamane
tad prāptiḥ iti ṣaṣṭhe siddhāntayiṣyate

original: tena nyāyena vidheyayoḥ citratvastrītvayorāruṇyādivat dravyavṛttitvapratītyā vidheyasya
analyzed: tena nyāyena vidheyayoḥ citra tva strī tvayoḥ āruṇi ādi vat dravya vṛtti tva pratītyā vidheyasya
citra tva strī tva avacchinna karaṇa tvasya aprāṇini mukhya tayā niveśa ayogāt vidheya sāmarthya anurodhena
prāṇi dravyakasya eva iha api uddeśya tva avagateḥ tad uddeśena eva citra tva strī tva viśiṣṭa karaṇa tva vidhānam

original: ataeva --- prakṛte dadhyādiyāge citratvavidhāne ānarthakyatadaṅganyāyena dadhyādidravyeṣu avatārādvicitravarṇairdadhyādibhiryāga iti prakṛtayāge  #
analyzed: atas eva prakṛte dadhi ādi yāge citra tva vidhāne ānarthakya tad aṅga nyāyena dadhi ādi dravyeṣu avatārāt vicitra varṇaiḥ dadhi ādibhiḥ yāgaḥ iti prakṛta yāge
tad vidhānam iti api nirastam
paśu kāma pada anvaya anupapatteḥ ca
yāgānām iti
bahuvacanena aṣṭama ādya pāda adhikaraṇa vārtika svārasyena saṅkhyā adhikaraṇe yaḥ nyāyasudhā kṛta eka yāga pakṣaḥ uktaḥ
sa nirākṛtaḥ
tasya upapādana pūrvakam nirākaraṇam ca kaustubhe draṣṭavyam
atas dvādaśa adhikaraṇa vārtika uktaḥ neka yoga pakṣaḥ eva śreyān iti sūcitam
evam ca prakaraṇam ca bādhyeta prājāpatya yāgasya iti etat siddhāntavārtika gatam

original: yāgaḥ phalatayā vidhīyata” iti śāstradīpikāgataṃ caikavacanaṃ yāgatvasāmānyābhiprāyeṇa
analyzed: yāgaḥ phala tayā vidhīyate iti śāstradīpikā gatam ca ekavacanam yāga tva sāmānya abhiprāyeṇa
vyākhyeyam iti bhāvaḥ
agnīṣomīya paśau puṃstva kṛṣṇa sāraṅga ādi anavarodha nirūpaṇa pūrvakam tatra citra tva strī tvayoḥ niveśa upapādanam prācām anurodhena
yadi api prāṇi dravyaka yāgasya uddeśya tvam

original: tathāpi kathaṃ na prakṛtivikṛtisādhāraṇyena prāṇidravyakayāgamātre vidhānamityāśaṅkānirāsāya sarvaprakṛtibhūtetyuktam /
analyzed: tathā api katham na prakṛti vikṛti sādhāraṇyena prāṇi dravyaka yāga mātre vidhānam iti āśaṅkā nirāsāya sarva prakṛti bhūtā iti uktam
sautyasya ekādaśinī prakṛti tve pi ekādaśinīnām ca paśu gaṇa prakṛti tve pi agnīṣomīyasya
daikṣasya ca itareṣu iti āṣṭamika nyāyāt sarva prāṇi yāga prakṛti tva avagamena tatra eva prakṛtau

original: vādviruktatvā” diti tārtīyanyāyena niveśo na vikṛtyantareṣvityarthaḥ /
analyzed: vā a dvis ukta tvāt iti tārtīya nyāyena niveśaḥ na vikṛti antareṣu iti arthaḥ
naca prākaraṇika puṃstva kṛṣṇa sāraṅga tva ādi guṇa antara avarodhāt na an ārabhya adhītayoḥ citra tva strī tvayoḥ agnīṣomīye niveśa saṃbhavaḥ iti vācyam
utpatti vākya gata paśu pade striyām api paśu śabda prayogeṇa puṃstvasya avivakṣita tvāt

original: “chāgasya vapāyā“miti mantre śrutasyāpi puṃstvasyānārabhyādhītenāpi pratyakṣavidhivihitena strītvenāvarodhena vidhikalpanānupapatteḥ chāndasatayā  #
analyzed: chāgasya vapāyām iti mantre śrutasya api puṃstvasya an ārabhya adhītena api pratyakṣa vidhi vihitena strītvena avarodhena vidhi kalpanā anupapatteḥ chāndasa tayā
parihartum śakya tvāt
kṛṣṇasāraṅga ādi vidheḥ api citra tva āśraya tayā pakṣa prāpta kṛṣṇasāraṅga ādi rūpa niyama artha tayā api upapanna tvena avirodha īpapatteḥ ca
atas yukte agnīṣomīye tayoḥ niveśaḥ

original: evaṃ tāvatprācāṃ rītyāgnīṣomīyapaśuyāgamātre niveśa iti pūrvapakṣamupapādyādhunā svātantryeṇa pakṣāntaramāha --- sarvapaśuyāgeti //
analyzed: evam tāvat prācām rītyā agnīṣomīya paśu yāga mātre niveśaḥ iti pūrvapakṣam upapādya adhunā svātantryeṇa pakṣa antaram āha sarva paśu yāga iti
dvirukta tva ādi abhāva nirūpaṇa pūrvakam citra tva strī tvayoḥ sarva paśu saṃbandha nirūpaṇam
ayam bhāvāḥ yathā eva hi āśrāvaya ityādi saptadaśa akṣarāṇām prajāpati saṃjñānāḥ

original: vai saptadaśaḥ prajāpatiryajñamanvāyatta' mitividhinā sākṣādyajñamātroddeśena vidhāne
analyzed: vai saptadaśaḥ prajāpatiḥ yajñam anvāyatta miti vidhinā sākṣāt yajña mātra uddeśena vidhāne
pi na prakṛtau eva niveśaḥ
atideśāt pūrvam upadeśa pravṛttau atideśa kalpanasya eva abhāvena dvis ukta tva abhāvāt

original: ata eva parṇatādau juhūddeśena vidhāne sati tatprāptyarthamatideśāpekṣaṇāttataḥ pūrvaṃ pravṛttyabhāvena prāptikālavaiṣamyāt dviruktatvopapattiriti  #
analyzed: atas eva parṇa tā ādau juhū uddeśena vidhāne sati tad prāpti artham atideśa apekṣaṇāt tatas pūrvam pravṛtti abhāvena prāpti kāla vaiṣamyāt dvis ukta tva upapattiḥ iti
vaiṣamyam

original: tathaivehāpi sākṣādyāgamātroddeśena citratvastrītvayorvidhāne dviruktatvābhāvātprakṛtisādhāraṇyena prāṇidravyakayāgamātroddeśena nāyuktaṃ tadvidhānam
analyzed: tathā eva iha api sākṣāt yāga mātra uddeśena citra tva strī tvayoḥ vidhāne dvirukta tva abhāvāt prakṛti sādhāraṇyena prāṇi dravyaka yāga mātra uddeśena na ayuktam tad vidhānam
atas eva sarva paśu yāgeṣu paśoḥ upadiṣṭa tvāt na atra paśu rūpa dvāra saṃbandha artham api atideśa apekṣā
evam sthite yatra vāyavyaṃśu etam ityādau paśoḥ api atideśaḥ tatra dvis ukta tva prasaṅgāt tad sādhāraṇyena etad vidhāna asaṃbhave
pi yatra ā āgneyam savanīyam paśum upākaroti ityādau dravya devatā saṃbandha vyatirekeṇa
yāgasya eva asiddhyā dravya upadeśa avaśyaṃbhāvaḥ
tatra prāpti kāla vaiṣamya bhāvāt tādṛśa vikṛti sādhāraṇyena etat vidhānam na anupapannam iti yat pūjya pādaiḥ kaustubhe uktam
tat vāyavya vākye pi dravya devatā saṃbandha vyatirekeṇa yāga asiddheḥ tulya tvena tatra api
śveta dravya sāmānya saṃbandhena eva yāgasya kalpanā anurodhena śvetasya eva
dravya tvena anvayasya avaśya vaktavya tvāt atideśa pravṛtteḥ pūrvam eva upadeśena citra tva strī tvayoḥ tad paricchedaka tvena anvaya upapatteḥ

original: kiṃ taccitrastrīrūpaṃ śvetaṃ dravyamiti viśeṣākāṅkṣayaiva paśvatideśakalpanātsamānamiti
analyzed: kim tat citra strī rūpam śvetam dravyam iti viśeṣa ākāṅkṣayā eva paśu atideśa kalpanāt samānam iti
katham iva yuktam iti cintyam

original: ato vāyavyavākye śvetamityutpattiśiṣṭaśvetaguṇapuṃstvānurodhādeva citratvastrītvayorniveśo na saṃbhavatītyeva samādheyam //
analyzed: atas vāyavya vākye śvetam iti utpatti śiṣṭa śveta guṇa puṃstva anurodhāt eva citra tva strī tvayoḥ niveśaḥ na saṃbhavati iti eva samādheyam
virodhi an ākrānta sarva vikṛti paśu yāgeṣu citra tva strī tvayoḥ niveśa upasaṃhāraḥ

original: evaṃ caitādṛśavirodhyantaraṃ yasyāṃ vikṛtau tatra niveśāsaṃbhave 'pi yasyāṃ na tat tādṛśasarvapaśudravyakayāgamātroddeśena tadvidhānamiti dvitīyapakṣaniṣkarṣaḥ
analyzed: evam ca etādṛśa virodhi antaram yasyām vikṛtau tatra niveśa asaṃbhave yasyām na tat tādṛśa sarva paśu dravyaka yāga mātra uddeśena tad vidhānam iti dvitīya pakṣa niṣkarṣaḥ
na ca kḷpta upakāra atideśa prāpta pāñcadaśya avarodhena an ārabhya adhīta sāptadaśyasya sarva vikṛtiṣu niveśa asaṃbhava vat iha api kḷpta upakāra kṛṣṇasāraṅga avarodhe
katham tayoḥ niveśaḥ
iti vācyam pūrvokta rītyā virodha abhāvāt
prakaraṇa anadhītasya śara ādeḥ kḷpta upakāra atideśika bādhaka tva vat anārabhya adhītasya api ānarthakya pratihata nyāyena ātideśika bādhaka tva upapatteḥ ca

original: anyathā ya iṣṭyetivākyāvagatasya sadyaḥ kālatvasyāpi prākṛtatryahakālatvāvarodhādvikṛtiṣu niveśānāpatteḥ //
analyzed: anyathā yaḥ iṣṭyā iti vākya avagatasya sadyas kāla tvasya api prākṛta tri aha kāla tva avarodhāt vikṛtiṣu niveśa anāpatteḥ
atas yuktam vikṛtau api tad vidhānam
sarva paśu yāgeṣu tad vidhāne vākya bheda abhāva nirūpaṇam
nanu yāga anuvādena ubhaya guṇa vidhāne vidhi āvṛtti lakṣaṇa vākya bheda āpattiḥ
atas yatra meṣī yāge strī tvam prāptam

original: tatraiva citratvamātravidhānena tadaprasaktestadvikṛtimātra eva niveśāpattyā nāgnīṣomīye sarvapaśuyāge vā niveśapūrvapakṣo yuktaḥ /
analyzed: tatra eva citra tva mātra vidhānena tad aprasakteḥ tad vikṛti mātre eva niveśa āpattyā na agnīṣomīye sarva paśu yāge vā niveśa pūrvapakṣaḥ yuktaḥ
yat tu atra strī tva prāptyā meṣī yāga rūpa vikṛtau tad vidhānam

original: athavā “adityai trayo rohitaitā” iti vākyavihitavikṛtau citratvaprāptyā strītvasya vidhānamiti vinigamanāvirahāpādanaṃ somanāthadīkṣitasya,
analyzed: athavā adityai trayaḥ rohita etāḥ iti vākya vihita vikṛtau citra tva prāptyā strī tvasya vidhānam iti vinigamana a viraha āpādanam somanātha dīkṣitasya
tat ayuktam
aditiyāge utpatti śiṣṭa puṃstva avarodhe tad niveśa asaṃbhavasya eva niyāmaka tvāt

original: ataḥ kathamagnīṣomīye sarvapaśuyāge vā citratvastrītvaviśiṣṭakaraṇatvasyaikasyaivaikapadopāttasya vidhāne vidhyāvṛtteraprasakteravākyabhedaḥ?
analyzed: atas katham agnīṣomīye sarva paśu yāge vā citra tva strī tva viśiṣṭa karaṇatvasya ekasya eva eka pada upāttasya vidhāne vidhi āvṛtteḥ aprasakteḥ avākya bhedaḥ
yadi api kārakasya api utpatti vākyāt eva prāptatvāt tad viśiṣṭa vidhi asaṃbhave tad anuvādena ubhaya vidhāne vākya bheda tādavasthyam
tathā api tatra dravya āśritāyāḥ tasyāḥ prāptatve pi citra tva strī tva niṣṭha karaṇatayoḥ aprāptatvena vidhi upapattiḥ

original: dravyaguṇādīnāṃ vyāpārabhedena svarūpasaṃbandhaviśeṣarūpāṇāṃ śaktirūpapadārthāntararūpāṇāṃ vā karaṇatānāṃ bhedasyāvaśyakatvāt /
analyzed: dravya guṇa ādīnām vyāpāra bhedena svarūpa saṃbandha viśeṣa rūpāṇām śakti rūpa padārtha antara rūpāṇām vā karaṇatānām bhedasya āvaśyaka tvāt

original: ata eva anekāsāmapi karaṇatānāṃ ekayā tṛtīyayopādānena yugapadupasthiterna vākyabheda iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: atas eva anekāsām api karaṇatānām ekayā tṛtīyayā upādānena yugapad upasthiteḥ na vākya bhedaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
prakṛtau strī tva mātra vidhānam iti somānātha mata khaṇḍana pūrvakam prācīna mata vyavasthāpanam

original: yattu atra kṛṣṇasāraṅgatvādinā prakṛtau citratvasya prāptatvāt strītvamātravidhānenāpi vākyabhedaparihārasaṃbhavopapādanaṃ somanāthasya,
analyzed: yat tu atra kṛṣṇa sāraṅga tva ādinā prakṛtau citra tvasya prāpta tvāt strī tva mātra vidhānena api vākya bheda parihāra saṃbhava upapādanam somanāthasya
tat citra tva vidhi abhāve kṛṣṇa sāraṅga tva ādi vidheḥ anapekṣita apūrva vidhi tva āpatteḥ tad apekṣayā ukta prakāreṇa
vākya bheda parihāreṇa citra tvasya api vidhim aṅgīkṛtya kṛṣṇasāraṅga vidheḥ apekṣita niyama vidhi tva svīkārasya eva
yukta tvena tatas citra tva prāpti upapādanena vākya bheda parihāra saṃbhava kathanasya ayukta tvāt upekṣyam

original: ato viśiṣṭakārakavidhyaṅgīkāreṇa prācāmabhimata eva tatparihāro yuktaḥ //
analyzed: atas viśiṣṭa kāraka vidhi aṅgīkāreṇa prācām abhimataḥ eva tad parihāraḥ yuktaḥ

original: naca --- evaṃ phalasaṃbandhasyāpi yāge vidhānādviruddhatrikadvayāpattirvākyabhedo vā duṣpariharaḥ iti ---vācyam;
analyzed: naca evam phala saṃbandhasya api yāge vidhānāt viruddha trika dvaya āpattiḥ vākya bhedaḥ vā duṣpariharaḥ iti vācyam

original: atra ca meṣīyāge vā prakṛte dhānāyāge vā citratvavidhānamiti prakārāntareṇa pūrvapakṣakaraṇaṃ kaustubhe draṣṭavyam //
analyzed: atra ca meṣī yāge vā prakṛte dhānā yāge vā citra tva vidhānam iti prakāra antareṇa pūrvapakṣa karaṇam kaustubhe draṣṭavyam
evam citrā padasya guṇa vidhi paratvam upapādya ājya ādi padānām tad paratvam upapādayati evam iti
ājya pṛṣṭha vākyayoḥ pūrvapakṣa anuguṇa vākya artha anuṣṭhānayoḥ nirūpaṇam
ayam arthaḥ ājya pṛṣṭha vākyayoḥ astiḥ bhavantī paraḥ prathama puruṣaḥ pi a prayujyamānaḥ
iti anuśāsanena abhyanujñātasya asi dhātoḥ prathama puruṣa bahuvacana antasya adhyāhārāt tasya
ca aprāpta tvena vidhi kalpanayā pañcadaśa saṅkhyā viśiṣṭa ājya sattā prakaraṇāt stotra aṅga tayā vidhīyate

original: yadyapi svavyāpāre vidhinā puruṣo niyujyata iti nyāyādvidhiḥ puruṣavyāpārarūpāṃ bhāvanāmākṣipati,
analyzed: yadi api sva vyāpāre vidhinā puruṣaḥ niyujyate iti nyāyāt vidhiḥ puruṣa vyāpāra rūpām bhāvanām ākṣipati
tasyāḥ ca niravacchinnāyāḥ vyāpāra tva ayogāt avacchedaka artha apekṣāyām sattāyāḥ prayojya niṣṭhatvena puruṣa vyāpāra tva abhāvāt avacchedaka tva anupapattiḥ

original: tathāpi avāntaraprakaraṇāvagatastotrāṅgatvabalena pradhānadeśasthatvāvagateḥ tasya ca samīpasthāpanasaṃpādyatvena sthāpanākhyadhātvarthasyaiva  #
analyzed: tathā api avāntara prakaraṇa avagata stotra aṅga tva balena pradhāna deśa stha tva avagateḥ tasya ca samīpa sthāpana saṃpādya tvena sthāpana ākhya dhātvarthasya eva
kalpyate

original: ataścāsmin “agnimupadhāya stuvīte“tivat sthāpanasaṃpādyasattādvāreṇājyādīnāṃ stotropakārakatā pṛṣṭhavidhayā na virudhyate;
analyzed: atas ca asmin agnim upadhāya stuvīta iti vat sthāpana saṃpādya sattā dvāreṇa ājya ādīnām stotra upakāraka tā pṛṣṭha vidhayā na virudhyate
sāṃsiddhika dravya tvāt ca ājya ādīnām svarūpeṇa saṃkhyā anvaya anupapattyā tāvat saṅkhyāka amatra bhedasya ākṣepāt pañcadaśasu amatreṣu ghṛtāni stotra anuṣṭhāna kāle
sthāpanīyāni iti anuṣṭhānam
evam parāc mukha saptadaśa prāṇi sthāpanena pṛṣṭha stotram saṃpādya stotavyam iti
pañcadaśa ājya vidhāne stome ḍa vidhi virodha upapādanam

original: naca “stome ḍa vidhiḥ pañcadaśādyarthe” ityanuśāsanaśiṣṭaḍapratyayāntapañcadaśādiśabdānāṃ stotrīyarka saṅkhyākṛtastutisaṅkhyāvācitvam;
analyzed: na ca stome ḍa vidhiḥ pañcadaśa ādi arthe iti anuśāsana śiṣṭa ḍa pratyaya anta pañcadaśa ādi śabdānām stotrīya ṛka saṅkhyā kṛta stuti saṅkhyā vāci tvam
ṛcaḥ pi tatra praveśe prayojana abhāvena ājya ādi gata tvena api saṅkhyā vidhāna upapatteḥ

original: yadi tu paśvekatvādhikaraṇapūrvapakṣanyāyena saṅkhyāviśiṣṭadravyavidhāne saṅkhyāyā avivakṣāpattirāśaṅkyeta,
analyzed: yadi tu paśu ekatva adhikaraṇa pūrvapakṣa nyāyena saṅkhyā viśiṣṭa dravya vidhāne saṅkhyāyāḥ avivakṣā āpattiḥ āśaṅkyeta
tadā kaustubha ukta rītyā saṅkhyā dravya ubhaya viśiṣṭa sthāpana bhāvanāyāḥ eva stotra uddeśena vidhānam astu iti
evam iti
trivṛt bahiṣpavamāna śabdayoḥ traiguṇya vāyu ādi paratva khaṇḍana pūrvakam pavana kriyā viśiṣṭa dravya vāci tva vyavasthāpanam

original: atra prakāśakāraiḥ pavamānaśabdo yaugiko viśeṣyāpekṣaḥ san prakaraṇāt somenaiva viśeṣyeṇa saṃbadhyate,
analyzed: atra prakāśa kāraiḥ pavamāna śabdaḥ yaugikaḥ viśeṣya apekṣaḥ san prakaraṇāt somena eva viśeṣyeṇa saṃbadhyate
trivṛt śabdaḥ tu tṛca traya anukramaṇāt stotrīya anavaka vāci tvena trivṛt caru aśvavāla adhikaraṇe
sthāpitaḥ u pi pavamāna śabda sāmānādhikaraṇyāt atra stotrīya anavaka vāci tva tyāgena trivṛt rajjuḥ ityādau
traiguṇye pi prayogāt avayava yogena traiguṇya arthaka tvasya api avagateḥ iha traiguṇya paraḥ
traiguṇyam ca prakaraṇāt daśa muṣṭi parimāṇa soma parimāṇa apekṣayā iti sadasaḥ bahis pavamāna kriyā viśiṣṭa triguṇa saṅkhyā yukta soma dravyasya eva
pūrvavat vidhānam iti uktam tat nirasitum tri bhiṇḍi dravyam iti uktam
tasya ayam arthaḥ rūḍhyā tri bhiṇḍi apara paryāya latā vacana tva saṃbhave yaugika artha grahaṇe pramāṇa abhāvaḥ
atas eva yatra rūḍhi bādhaḥ tatra eva avayava artha grahaṇam
trivṛt rajjuḥ ityādau rajju sāmānādhikaraṇyasya yadi api yogena eva upapatteḥ na rūḍhi kalpanam
tathā api iha sāpekṣa artha grahaṇa apekṣayā nirapekṣa artha grahaṇam eva uktam

original: pavamānaśabdasya viśeṣyāpekṣāyāṃ svavākyopāttaviśeṣyalābhe saṃbhavati prākaraṇikaviśeṣyakalpanamayuktaṃ ca /
analyzed: pavamāna śabdasya viśeṣya apekṣāyām sva vākya upātta viśeṣya lābhe saṃbhavati prākaraṇika viśeṣya kalpanam ayuktam ca

original: etena --- trivṛcchabdapavamānaśabdayoḥ traiguṇyavāyuparatvamaṅgīkṛtya vyajanādinā sadaso bahirvāyuḥ kārya iti pūrvapakṣe 'nuṣṭhānamiti somanāthopanyastaṃ  #
analyzed: etena trivṛt śabda pavamāna śabdayoḥ traiguṇya vāyu para tvam aṅgīkṛtya vyajana ādinā sadasaḥ bahis vāyuḥ kāryaḥ iti pūrvapakṣe nuṣṭhānam iti somanātha upanyastam
mata antaram api nirastam

original: ato nyāyasudhākṛduktarītyā tribhiṇḍidravyameva pavanakriyāviśiṣṭaṃ vidhīyata ityeva yuktamiti //
analyzed: atas nyāyasudhākṛt ukta rītyā tribhiṇḍi dravyam eva pavana kriyā viśiṣṭam vidhīyate iti eva yuktam iti
pūrvapakṣe lāghavam darśayati
ājyaiḥ stuvate ityādau ājya ādi pada sārthakya ādinā pūrvapakṣa upasaṃhāraḥ

original: ājyapadaṃ tu ekastotrasaṃbandhitvenājyamantrayoḥ parasparasaṃbandhāvagamāt svasaṃbandhitayā lakṣitamantragatakaraṇasyānuvādamātramiti bhāvaḥ
analyzed: ājya padam tu eka stotra saṃbandhi tvena ājya mantrayoḥ paraspara saṃbandha avagamāt sva saṃbandhi tayā lakṣita mantra gata karaṇasya anuvāda mātram iti bhāvaḥ
yadi api saṃkhyā yukta vākye viśiṣṭa vidhi kṛta gauravam adhikam asti

original: tathāpi rūḍhyanurodhena somādivākye lakṣaṇāpādakaviśiṣṭavidherapyaṅgīkāre tadanāpādakaviśiṣṭavidheraṅgīkaraṇaṃ nāyuktamiti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: tathā api rūḍhi anurodhena soma ādi vākye lakṣaṇa āpādaka viśiṣṭa vidheḥ api aṅgīkāre tad anāpādaka viśiṣṭa vidheḥ aṅgīkaraṇam na ayuktam iti bhāvaḥ

original: (agnīṣomīyādau vākyabhedāpattyā puṃstvāvarodhena punaḥ strītvavidhānāyogācca citratvastrītvavidhānāsaṃbhavādinā siddhāntopapādanam)
analyzed: agnīṣomīya ādau vākya bheda āpattyā puṃstva avarodhena punar strītva vidhāna ayogāt ca citra tva strītva vidhāna asaṃbhava ādinā siddhānta upapādanam

original: yadyapi tṛtīyopāttaṃ karaṇatvamātraṃ vidhīyate iti śakyate vaktum;
analyzed: yadi api tṛtīya upāttam karaṇa tva mātram vidhīyate iti śakyate vaktum

original: tathāpi strītvasya yadvyāpāreṇa karaṇatā tadvyāpāreṇaiva puṃstvasya prakṛtau “ajo
analyzed: tathā api strī tvasya yad vyāpāreṇa karaṇa tā tad vyāpāreṇa eva puṃstvasya prakṛtau
gnīṣomīyaḥ ityādi vacana avagata puṃstva vidhi balāt eva tad karaṇa tvasya prāpta tvāt citrayā iti atra ekayā eva
tṛtīyayā karaṇa tvam anūdya pratyaya aṃśena strī tva vidhiḥ
prātipadika aṃśa yuktayā ca tayā citra tva viśiṣṭa karaṇa tva vidhiḥ iti vidheyānām eka abhidhāna pratipādya tva abhāvāt
vākya bheda āpattiḥ anivāryā eva iti abhiprāyeṇa pūrvapakṣe vākya bhedam āpādya siddhāntam āha prāptā iti
kathañcid karaṇa bhedaḥ

original: tathāpi prakṛtau puṃstvāvarodhānna strītvavidhisaṃbhava ityāha ---agnīṣomīya itīti //
analyzed: tathā api prakṛtau puṃstva avarodhāt na strī tva vidhi saṃbhavaḥ iti āha agnīṣomīyaḥ iti iti
pūrvapakṣi upapādita puṃstva prāpaka pramāṇa abhāva nirāsa artham ajaḥ gnīṣomīyaḥ iti śākhāntarīya vākya upanyāsaḥ kṛtaḥ
etat ca paśu kāma pada anupapatti prakṛta dadhi ādi yāga prakaraṇa bādhā āpattyoḥ api upalakṣaṇam
ataeva meṣī yāga dhānā yāgayoḥ api tad vidhānam nirastam
citrā vākye nāmadheya tvam upasaṃharati atas iti
nāmadheya tva pakṣe svatantra rūḍhi kalpanā āpattim nirasyati vicitra dravyaka tvena iti
na asmābhiḥ citrā śabde rūḍhiḥ aṅgīkriyate
kintu citra dravyaka tva saṃbandhena vaidika pracura prayogāt darśana ādi padeṣu iva nirūḍha lakṣaṇā iti

original: atra ca na bahudravyatayaiva citradravyakatvaṃ vivakṣitam,
analyzed: atra ca na bahu dravyatayā eva citra dravyaka tvam vivakṣitam
kintu dvi dravya tayā api

original: ata eva --- taittirīyaśākhāyāṃ “citrayā yajeta paśukāma iyaṃ vai citre” tyupakramya
analyzed: atas eva taittirīya śākhāyām citrayā yajeta paśu kāmaḥ iyam vai citre ti upakramya
āmnātānām puroḍāśa caru dravyakāṇām āgneya tvāṣṭra ādi sapta yāgānām caru puroḍāśa dravya tā mātreṇa eva

original: dravyadvayenāpi saṃpratipannadevatākatvābhāvena pṛthagyāgānāmanuṣṭhāne 'pi citradravyakatvopapatteḥ iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: dravya dvayena api saṃpratipanna devatāka tva abhāvena pṛthak yāgānām anuṣṭhāne pi citra dravyaka tva upapatteḥ iti bhāvaḥ
strī pratyayaḥ iti
ekavacanāt tasya api rājasūya padasya iva samudāya abhiprāyeṇa upapatteḥ api etat upalakṣaṇam
prāpta karma anuvādena citra tva strī tva rūpa aneka guṇa vidhāne vākya bhedāt karaṇa tvasya api
paśu gatasya prāpta tvena avidheya tayā ubhaya viśiṣṭa kāraka vidhi ayogāt ajaḥ gnīṣomīya

original: iti vacanena vihitaprākaraṇikapuṃstvāvarodhena strītvasya vidhyayogācca na guṇavidhiḥ /
