analyzed: iti vacanena vihita prākaraṇika puṃstva avarodhena strī tvasya vidhi ayogāt ca na guṇa vidhiḥ

original: ataḥ prakṛtānāmeva yāgānāṃ vicitradravyakatvena lakṣaṇayā citrāpadaṃ nāmadheyam /
analyzed: atas prakṛtānām eva yāgānām vicitra dravyaka tvena lakṣaṇayā citrā padam nāmadheyam
iṣṭi abhiprāyeṇa ca strī pratyayaḥ

original: evamājyādipadeṣvapi asamastatvena viśiṣṭasyāvyutpannatvāt prāptastotrānuvādena dravyasaṅkhyādyanekaguṇavidhau vākyabhedaḥ /
analyzed: evam ājya ādi padeṣu api asamasta tvena viśiṣṭasya avyutpanna tvāt prāpta stotra anuvādena dravya saṅkhyā ādi aneka guṇa vidhau vākya bhedaḥ

original: na ca- utpattivākya eva dravyaviśiṣṭastotravidhiritaratra tu saṅkhyāmātravidhirastviti - vācyam;
analyzed: na ca utpatti vākye eva dravya viśiṣṭa stotra vidhiḥ itaratra tu saṅkhyā mātra vidhiḥ astu iti vācyam
ghṛta ādīnām stotre karaṇa tva asaṃbhavena viśiṣṭa vidhi ayogāt
pañcadaśāni ityādi stuti gata ṛk saṅkhyā rūpa stoma vāci ḍapratyayasya guṇa vidhi tve n upapatteḥ ca
atas ājya ādi padam vākya dvaye śaktyā eva stotra nāmadheyam
ājya ādi pada abhidheya stotra anuvādena ca guṇa vākye sarvatra saṅkhyā mātra vidhiḥ
ājya utpatti vākye ca tad saṃjñakāni catvāri stotrāṇi
gamaka sahakṛta bahuvacanena tāvat tva avagamāt
evam pṛṣṭha utpatti vākye ṣaḍ anuṣṭheyāni tu
niyatāni catvāri
ādyayoḥ dvayoḥ bṛhat rathantarayoḥ antyayoḥ ca naudhasa śyaitayoḥ vacanena vikalpa vidhānāt
yathā ca atra tad tad dūṣaṇānām nirāsaḥ mata antara dūṣaṇāni ca
tāni kaustubhe draṣṭavyāni
iti tṛtīyam citrā nāmatā adhikaraṇam
pañcadaśāni ājyāni iti atra viśiṣṭasya avyutpanna tvena vākya bheda āpattyā

original: ājyaiḥ stuvate ityatrāpi ājyānāṃ stutyananvayitvena viśiṣṭavidhyasaṃbhavena cājyapadanāmadheyatvavyavasthāpanam)
analyzed: ājyaiḥ stuvate iti atra api ājyānām stuti ananvayi tvena viśiṣṭa vidhi asaṃbhavena ca ājya pada nāmadheya tva vyavasthāpanam
sarveṣām kārakāṇām bhāvanāyām eva anvaya niyamasya samāse ekārthībhāva lakṣaṇa sāmarthya apekṣita tva niyama anurodhena
tyāgena paraspara anvaya svīkāre pi tad abhāve paraspara anvayasya avyutpanna tvena vaiśiṣṭya ayogāt viśiṣṭa vidhāna anupapatteḥ vākya bheda āpattim ājya ādi
vākyeṣu api darśayati evam iti
a vākya bhedam āśaṅkya nirākaroti na ca iti
ghṛta ādīnām iti

original: ayamarthaḥ --- śabdaikasādhyaguṇiniṣṭhaguṇābhidhānarūpastutiṃ prati na ghṛtādīnāṃ karaṇatvaṃ saṃbhavati /
analyzed: ayam arthaḥ śabda eka sādhya guṇi niṣṭha guṇa abhidhāna rūpa stutim prati na ghṛta ādīnām karaṇa tvam saṃbhavati

original: ata eva “somena yajete“ti vanmatvarthalakṣaṇayāpi nājyānāṃ stotrasaṃbandhaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva somena yajeta iti vat matu artha lakṣaṇayā api na ājyānām stotra saṃbandhaḥ
na ca ājyānām api sannidhi sthāpana mātreṇa smāraka tvāt ratha ghoṣa ādi vat karaṇ tva upapattiḥ

original: ājñādānākhyopākaraṇe netrakarādivyāpārasyāpi loke karaṇatvadarśanāt rathaghoṣasya karaṇatvasaṃbhave 'pi stutāvanyatrākḷptasya karaṇasya kalpane  #
analyzed: ājñā dāna ākhya upākaraṇe netra kara ādi vyāpārasya api loke karaṇa tva darśanāt ratha ghoṣasya karaṇa tva saṃbhave pi stutau anyatra akḷptasya karaṇasya kalpane
dṛṣṭārtha tva āpatteḥ
na ca ājya padena lakṣita ghṛta saṃbandhi mantrāṇām tad karaṇa tva upapattiḥ
mantreṣu sthāpana ākhya ghṛta saṃbandhasya pramāṇa antareṇa aprāpteḥ

original: prakāśakatvena ca tatsaṃbandhasya prāptyā teṣāṃ vidhāne prākaraṇikamantrabādhāpatteriti /
analyzed: prakāśaka tvena ca tad saṃbandhasya prāptyā teṣām vidhāne prākaraṇika mantra bādha āpatteḥ iti
ghṛta saṃbandhi mantrāṇām karaṇa tve dūṣaṇa antaram api āha pañcadaśāni iti
yājñikānām pracura prayogāt stotrīya ṛk gata saṅkhyā vāci tvena eva avagatasya stoma śabdasya stotra sādhana mātra vṛtti saṅkhyā paratva kalpane pramāṇa abhāva
iti arthaḥ
stotra bhāvanā anuvādena saṅkhyā dravya viśiṣṭa bhāvanā vidhāna śaṅkā tad parihāra pūrvaka ājya vākya siddhānta upasaṃhāraḥ

original: yadyapi stotrabhāvanānuvāde 'pi prayājādibhāvanāntarasyeveha saṅkhyādravyaviśiṣṭabhāvanāntaravidhāne 'pi śakyate vākyabhedaḥ parihartum,
analyzed: yadi api stotra bhāvanā anuvāde pi prayāja ādi bhāvanā antarasya iva iha saṅkhyā dravya viśiṣṭa bhāvanā antara vidhāne pi śakyate vākya bhedaḥ parihartum
paścāt ca dravya saṅkhyayoḥ aruṇa ekahāyanyoḥ iva paraspara apekṣayā paricchedya paricchedaka bhāva kalpanāt na doṣaḥ

original: tathāpi bhāvanāyā avacchedakadhātvarthaṃ vinā vidhātumaśakteḥ sattāyāśca prayojyaniṣṭhatvena
analyzed: tathā api bhāvanāyāḥ avacchedaka dhātvartham vinā vidhātum aśakteḥ sattāyāḥ ca prayojya niṣṭhatvena
prayojaka vyāpāra rūpa bhāvanā avacchedaka tva asaṃbhavāt pṛthakkaraṇasya saṅkhyā saṃpādaka tvena ājya viṣayaka vyāpāra tva ayogāt
sthāpanasya prakaraṇa avagata aṅga bhāva uttara kalpyasya vyāpāra viśeṣa grāhi kathaṃbhāva ākāṅkṣā lakṣaṇa prakaraṇena
grahaṇasya nirvyāpāre saṃbhavena aṅga tva syai vā anavagateḥ anyonya āśraya grasta tvāt ayuktam avacchedaka tva kalpanam iti

original: vākyabhedāpatteḥ sarvathāparihāraṃ matvā siddhāntamupasaṃharati --- ata iti //
analyzed: vākya bheda āpatteḥ sarvathā parihāram matvā siddhāntam upasaṃharati atas iti
śakya saṃbandha abhāvāt ājya pade śakteḥ anyatra pavamāna ādi pade tad saṃbhavāt lakṣaṇāyāḥ ca bhāṣya vārtikā virodha nirūpaṇa pūrvaka upapādanam

original: yataḥ pañcadaśādivākye na viśiṣṭavidhisaṃbhavo 'ta ājyādyanuvādena vyaktaṃ saṅkhyāvidhiḥ /
analyzed: yatas pañcadaśa ādi vākye na ājya ādi anuvādena vyaktam saṅkhyā vidhiḥ
sa ca ājyānām prāptau saṃbhavati

original: sā ca prāptirutpattivākye ājyapadasya vākyabhedabhiyā rūḍhiparityāgena nāmadheyatve upapadyate /
analyzed: sā ca prāptiḥ utpatti vākye ājya padasya vākya bheda bhiyā rūḍhi parityāgena nāmadheya tve upapadyate
atas vākya dvaye nāmadheyam ājya ādi padam iti arthaḥ
śaktyā eva iti

original: ājyādipadeṣu śakyasaṃbandhābhāvena lakṣaṇāyā asaṃbhavāt stotrasāmānādhikaraṇyānupapattyā vākyabhedāpattibhiyā atiriktarūḍhikalpanamapi na doṣa  #
analyzed: ājya ādi padeṣu śakya saṃbandha abhāvena lakṣaṇāyāḥ asaṃbhavāt stotra sāmānādhikaraṇya anupapattyā vākya bheda āpatti bhiyā atirikta rūḍhi kalpanam api na doṣa
iti arthaḥ

original: ata eva yatra bahiṣpavamānaśabde anyeṣāṃ stotrāṇāṃ sadomaṇḍapamadhye audumbarīsaṃnidhāvanuṣṭhāne
analyzed: atas eva yatra bahiṣpavamāna śabde anyeṣām stotrāṇām sadaḥ maṇḍapa madhye audumbarī saṃnidhau anuṣṭhāne
pi bahiṣpavamāne sadasaḥ bahirbhāvasya āstāva rūpa deśa vidhānena eva prāpteḥ pavana kriyā āśraya soma prakāśaka mantraka tva saṃbandhena
nirūḍha lakṣaṇa asaṃbhavaḥ tatra na eva atirikta rūḍhi kalpanam

original: yadyapi bhāṣyavartikādau “prajāpatirdevebhya ātmānaṃ yajñaṃ kṛtvā prāyacchatte devā
analyzed: yadi api bhāṣya vartika ādau prajāpatiḥ devebhyaḥ ātmānam yajñam kṛtvā prāyacchat te devāḥ

original: anyonyasmā āgrāyaṇātiṣṭhanta tānabravīdājimasminniteti te ājimāyanni” tyupakramakena
analyzed: anyonyasmai āgrāyaṇā atiṣṭhanta tān abravīt ājim asmin ita iti te ājim āyan iti upakramakena
yat ājim īyuḥ tat ājyānām ājya tvam iti upa saṃhāra pareṇa ca arthavādena yajñam uddiśya bhoga artham

original: spardhamāneṣu deveṣu satsu yasmādasmin yajñe ājiṃ maryādāmita gacchateti prajāpatinokte
analyzed: spardhamāneṣu deveṣu satsu yasmāt asmin yajñe ājim maryādām ita gacchata iti prajāpatinā ukte

original: te devā etāni stotrāṇi kāṣṭhāṃ maryādāṃ kṛtvā āgatāstasmādetāni ājyarhatvādājyānītyarthakatvena
analyzed: te devāḥ etāni stotrāṇi kāṣṭhām maryādām kṛtvā āgatāḥ tasmāt etāni āji arha tvāt ājyāni iti arthaka tvena
tathā api udbhid pada anvākhyāna arthavāda vat eva asya api svārtha paratva abhāvena tādṛśa yoga sattve

analyzed: evam iha api agne ā yāhi vītaye ā naḥ mitrāvaruṇā āyāhi suṣuma hi tam indra agnī

original: atra “pañcabhyo hiṅkaroti sa tisṛbhiḥ sa ekayā sa ekayā pañcabhyo hiṅkaroti sa ekayā
analyzed: atra pañcabhyaḥ hiṅkaroti sa tisṛbhiḥ saḥ ekayā saḥ ekayā pañcabhyaḥ hiṅkaroti saḥ ekayā

original: utpattividhitvena vārtikakṛtā lekhanāt tadvidhividheyāni gamakasahakṛtabahuvacanabalāt ṣaṭ pṛṣṭhānītyāha --- evamiti //

original: atra “abhi tvā śūra nonumaḥ” “tvāmiddhi havāmahe” “kayā na ścitra ā bhuvat” “taṃ
analyzed: atra abhi tvā śūra nonumaḥ tvām id hi havāmahe kayā naḥ ścitraḥ ā bhuvat tam

āmnānāt teṣu ca krameṇa rathantara bṛhat vāmadevya naudhasa śyaita kāleyānām ṣaṇṇām samākhyānāt

analyzed: tatra api pañcabhyaḥ hiṅkaroti sa tisṛbhiḥ saḥ ekayā saḥ ekayā pañcabhyaḥ hiṅkaroti sa

abhyāsa saṃpādya tvam eva iti arthaḥ
pṛṣṭha padasya stotra viśeṣeṣu rūḍhau api arthavāda avirodhaḥ

original: yadyapi atrāpi “āpo vai ṛtviyamārcchan tāsāṃ vāyuḥ pṛṣṭhe vyavartata tato vāmaṃ vasu sanyabhavattanmitrāvaruṇau paryapaśyatā“mityādinā pṛṣṭhaśabdānvākhyānārthor'thavādaḥ
analyzed: yadi api atra api āpaḥ vai ṛtviyam ārcchan tāsām vāyuḥ pṛṣṭhe vyavartata tatas vāmam vasu sani abhavat tat mitrāvaruṇau paryapaśyatām ityādinā pṛṣṭha śabda anvākhyāna artha ūrthavādaḥ
tathā api agre ārtava yuktānām apām pṛṣṭhe vāyoḥ viparivartana ātmaka maithuna abhidhāna pūrvakam

original: vāmadevyotpattiṃ tatpadanirvacanaṃ coktvā tatpṛṣṭheṣu nyadadhurityanena vāmadevyasya
analyzed: vāmadevya utpattim tad pada nirvacanam ca uktvā tad pṛṣṭheṣu nyadadhuḥ iti anena vāmadevyasya

original: pṛṣṭhastotreṣu niveśamabhidhāyaitasyā yoneḥ pṛṣṭhāni ityādinā pṛṣṭhastotrasādhanānāṃ

rathantara bṛhat vairūpa vairāja śākvara raivata ākhyānām ṣaṇṇām sāmnām utpattim vāmadevyāt uktvā api

original: “tā vai vāmadevyaṃ putrāḥ pṛṣṭhānī“tyupasaṃhārāt rathantarādisāmasu pṛṣṭhaśabdānvākhyānārthatve
analyzed: tāḥ vai vāmadevyam putrāḥ pṛṣṭhāni iti upasaṃhārāt rathantara ādi sāmasu pṛṣṭha śabda anvākhyāna artha tve
pi stotra nāma tva anvākhyāna artha tva abhāvāt na rūḍhi kalpanāyām virodhaḥ

original: ata eva rūḍhisiddhaṃ caturṣu pṛṣṭhatvaṃ siddhavatkṛtyaivārthavāde pṛṣṭheṣu nyadadhurityanena pṛṣṭhapadānuvādaḥ saṃgacchate /
analyzed: atas eva rūḍhi siddham caturṣu pṛṣṭha tvam siddhavatkṛtya eva arthavāde pṛṣṭheṣu nyadadhuḥ iti anena pṛṣṭha pada anuvādaḥ saṃgacchate

original: etena pṛṣṭhākhyarathantarādiṣaṭsāmaprakṛtitvāt vāmadevyādiṣu pṛṣṭhaśabdaprasiddhiriti vārtikoktiḥ prauḍhivādamātrameva /

original: tatprakṛtitvena kathañcidvāmadevye pṛṣṭhaśabdaprasiddhisaṃbhave 'pyanyatra tatprakṛtitvābhāve “pṛṣṭheṣu nyadadhuri“ti pṛṣṭhapadaprayogasya
analyzed: tad prakṛti tvena kathañcid vāmadevye pṛṣṭha śabda prasiddhi saṃbhave pi anyatra tad prakṛti tva abhāve pṛṣṭheṣu nyadadhuḥ iti pṛṣṭha pada prayogasya

original: abvāyumaithunasparśajanyatvasya sākṣādvāmadevya eva saṃbhavena tatraiva pṛṣṭhatvasya
analyzed: ap vāyu maithuna sparśa janya tvasya sākṣāt vāmadevye eva saṃbhavena tatra eva pṛṣṭha tvasya
mukhya tayā aṅgīkartum ucita tvena tad janya tayā rathantara ādiṣu eva tad pada prayogasya gauṇa tā upapatteḥ ca

original: ataeva asya dvitīyasthāne niveśamātrābhidhāyitve 'pi na vāmadevye pṛṣṭhaśabdapravṛttinimittānvākhyānārthataivāsya spaṣṭaṃ pratīyamānā yuktā
analyzed: ataeva asya dvitīya sthāne niveśa mātra abhidhāyi tve pi na vāmadevye pṛṣṭha śabda pravṛtti nimitta anvākhyāna artha tā eva asya spaṣṭam pratīyamānā yuktā
tena ca ap vāyu maithuna ākhya sparśa utpanna janya tvasya pravṛtti nimitta tā pradarśanena spṛś dhātoḥ auṇādike
thak pratyaye kṛte titha pṛṣṭha kutha gūtha yūtha prothāḥ iti sūtreṇa sakāra lope nipātite

original: vraścādisūtreṇaca śakārasya ṣakārādeśe kṛte ṣṭutvāt pṛṣṭhaśabdasya vyutpattiruktā bhavati /
analyzed: vraśca ādi sūtreṇa ca śakārasya ṣakāra ādeśe kṛte ṣ ṭu tvāt pṛṣṭha śabdasya vyutpattiḥ uktā bhavati

original: yadyapica pṛṣṭhaśabdasthāne śaktikalpanābhiyā rathantarādiṣu pṛṣṭhastotrasādhanatvasaṃbandhena lakṣaṇaiva;
analyzed: yadi api ca pṛṣṭha śabda sthāne śakti kalpanā bhiyā rathantara ādiṣu pṛṣṭha stotra sādhanatva saṃbandhena lakṣaṇā eva
tathā api anvākhyāna vaśāt nirūḍha lakṣaṇā svīkāreṇa na vaiyarthyam anvākhyānasya

original: abhidhānaṃ ca prati mukhyapṛṣṭhastotrakaraṇatvānupapattyā lakṣaṇayā ṛcāṃ karaṇatvāvagatāvapi agītānāṃ karaṇatvavyāvṛttyā rathantarādisāmavidhireva
analyzed: abhidhānam ca prati mukhya pṛṣṭha stotra karaṇa tva anupapattyā lakṣaṇayā ṛcām karaṇa tva avagatau api agītānām karaṇa tva vyāvṛttyā rathantara ādi sāma vidhiḥ eva

original: ataeva rathantarādisāmamātravidhāne 'pi sāmnāmakṣarābhivyaktidvāraiva guṇābhidhāne 'pi karaṇatvādyogyatayaiva tadādhārargdvārakatvasya prāptirapi  #
analyzed: ataeva rathantara ādi sāma mātra vidhāne pi sāmnām akṣara abhivyakti dvārā eva guṇa abhidhāne pi karaṇa tvāt yogyatayā eva tad ādhāra ṛc dvāraka tvasya prāptiḥ api
na viruddhā

original: stotrīyasāmna eva tṛcānukaraṇatvānurodhena “yadyonyā” miti vacanenottarāsu tadvidhāne 'pi iha stotrīyatvābhāvāt nottarāṇāṃ prāptiḥ /
analyzed: stotrīya sāmnaḥ eva tṛca anukaraṇa tva anurodhena yat yonyām iti vacanena uttarāsu tad vidhāne pi iha stotrīya tva abhāvāt na uttarāṇām prāptiḥ
atas saptadaśāni pṛṣṭhāni pṛṣṭhaiḥ stuvate ekaviṃśam hotuḥ pṛṣṭham triṇavam

original: prakṛtau darśanāt pṛṣṭhaśabdasya mādhyandinapavamānānantarabhāviṣu ṣaṭsu stotreṣu
analyzed: prakṛtau darśanāt pṛṣṭha śabdasya mādhyandina pavamāna anantara bhāviṣu ṣaṭsu stotreṣu

original: yastu “bṛhatpṛṣṭhaṃ bhavati” “kaṇva rathantaraṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ” ityādau hotuḥ pṛṣṭhe viśiṣya
analyzed: yaḥ tu bṛhat pṛṣṭham bhavati kaṇva rathantaram pṛṣṭham ityādau hotuḥ pṛṣṭhe viśiṣya

original: pṛṣṭhaśabdaprayogo na vāmadevyādiṣu sa dhane dravyaśabdaprayogavat arjune pārthaśabdaprayogavacca
analyzed: pṛṣṭha śabda prayogaḥ na vāmadevya ādiṣu sa dhane dravya śabda prayoga vat arjune pārtha śabda prayoga vat ca

original: nanu ṣaṭpṛṣṭhāni cet kathaṃ caturṇāmevānuṣṭhānam iti?
analyzed: nanu ṣaṣ pṛṣṭhāni ced katham caturṇām eva anuṣṭhānam iti
atas āha anuṣṭheyāni iti
bṛhat rathantarayoḥ iti

original: bṛhadrathantarasāmapṛṣṭhayor “bṛhadvā rathantaraṃ vā pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavatī” tivacanena
analyzed: bṛhat rathantara sāma pṛṣṭhayoḥ bṛhat vā rathantaram vā pṛṣṭham bhavati tivacanena

original: vikalpavidhāne sati bṛhatpakṣe śyaitaṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ rathantarapṛṣṭhapakṣe naidhasaṃ pṛṣṭhamityantimapṛṣṭhadvayasya
analyzed: vikalpa vidhāne sati bṛhat pakṣe śyaitam pṛṣṭham rathantara pṛṣṭha pakṣe naidhasam pṛṣṭham iti antima pṛṣṭha dvayasya

original: yathācātra bṛhadrathantarayoḥ bhedādapūrvabhede satyapi rathantarabṛhaddharmāṇāṃ nāvamikasāṃkaryapūrvapakṣotthānaṃ tathopapādayiṣyate tatraiva  #
analyzed: yathā ca atra bṛhat rathantarayoḥ bhedāt apūrva bhede sati api rathantara bṛhat dharmāṇām na āvamika sāṃkarya pūrvapakṣa utthānam tathā upapādayiṣyate tatra eva
pūjya pādaiḥ
dūṣaṇa antarāṇi tad nirāsa prakāraḥ ca

original: nanu --- prakṛtau pṛṣṭhabahutve kaṇvarathantarādeḥ sarvapṛṣṭheṣu kautsādivanniveśāpattiḥ /
analyzed: nanu prakṛtau pṛṣṭha bahutve kaṇva rathantara ādeḥ sarva pṛṣṭheṣu kautsa ādi vat niveśa āpattiḥ
tathā viśvajit sarva pṛṣṭhaḥ iti atra prakṛti prāpta pṛṣṭha bahutvena eva sarva pṛṣṭha pada anuvāda upapattiḥ

original: ṣāḍahikānāṃ rathantarādipṛṣṭhānāṃ prāpteḥ saptame vakṣyamāṇāyā asidhyāpattiścetyata āha --- yathācātreti //
analyzed: ṣāḍahikānām rathantara ādi pṛṣṭhānām prāpteḥ saptame vakṣyamāṇāyāḥ asidhi āpattiḥ ca iti atas āha yathā ca atra iti
kaṇvarathantaram pṛṣṭham bhavati ityādi vaikṛta vidhau rathantaram pṛṣṭham bhavati
bṛhat pṛṣṭham bhavati iti prakṛta rathantara bṛhat sāma pada gata pṛṣṭha pada sāmānādhi karaṇya tulya nirdeśena ukta vairūpa sāma ityādi vacana vihitānām
vairūpa ādi sāmnām dāśamika nyāyena mahendra stotra viṣaya tvasya iva iha api tad viṣaya tva upapatteḥ na
sarva pṛṣṭheṣu niveśa āpattiḥ

original: ataeva --- nirūḍhivaśāt prakṛtau kṛtasya pṛṣṭhapadaprayogasyedameva phalam /
analyzed: ataeva nirūḍhi vaśāt prakṛtau kṛtasya pṛṣṭha pada prayogasya idam eva phalam

original: evañca kautsādeḥ tādṛśatulyanirdeśābhāvāt na tatraiva niveśaḥ /
analyzed: evam ca kautsa ādeḥ tādṛśa tulya nirdeśa abhāvāt na tatra eva niveśaḥ
apitu sarvatra eva iti na anupapattaḥ
sirvapṛṣṭha padena tu prākṛta grahaṇe anuvāda āpattyā vaiyarthya āpatteḥ vidheya para tā lābhāya

original: ṣāḍahikānāṃ grahaṇamiti “ṣaḍahādvā tatra codane“ti sūtravyākhyāne bhāṣyakāreṇa sarvapṛṣṭhapadasya
analyzed: ṣāḍahikānām grahaṇam iti ṣaṣ ahāt vā tatra codanā iti sūtra vyākhyāne bhāṣyakāreṇa sarva pṛṣṭhapadasya
vidhāyaka tva lābha puraskāreṇa eva darśitam
pārthasārathi mata tad dūṣaṇāni

original: ataeva --- prakṛtau pṛṣṭhabahutvaṃ nāstīti tatratyavyavahārasya codakāprāptaṃ pṛṣṭhabahutvaṃ nāstītyarthatayopapatterna kaścidvirodha iti /
analyzed: ataeva prakṛtau pṛṣṭha bahu tvam na asti iti tatratya vyavahārasya ca udaka aprāptam pṛṣṭha bahu tvam na asti iti artha tayā upapatteḥ na kaścid virodhaḥ iti
evaṃsthite etad doṣa bhiyā pārtha sārathinā nemapika vārtika svārasyena bṛhat pṛṣṭham

original: bhavati rathantaraṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavati” iti vākyadvaye mukhyamapi bṛhadrathantarapadaṃ
analyzed: bhavati rathantaram pṛṣṭham bhavati iti vākya dvaye mukhyam api bṛhat rathantara padam
svārtha sādhana lakṣaṇa artham aṅgīkṛtya tad viśiṣṭa stotra dvayasya eva māhendra saṃjñakasya
vidhānāt tatra eva pṛṣṭha śabdaḥ mukhyaḥ

original: “pṛṣṭhaiḥ stuvate” ityasya kaṇvamāhendrādīnāṃ caturṇāṃ stotrāṇāṃ gauṇyā vṛttyā pṛṣṭhapadena samudāyānuvādaḥ /
analyzed: pṛṣṭhaiḥ stuvate iti asya kaṇva māhendra ādīnām caturṇām stotrāṇām gauṇyā vṛttyā pṛṣṭha padena samudāya anuvādaḥ

original: tatprayojanaṃ “saptadaśāni pṛṣṭhānī” tyatra pṛṣṭhapadena sarveṣāṃ grahaṇāt caturṣu tatsaṅkhyāniveśaḥ /
analyzed: tad prayojanam saptadaśāni pṛṣṭhāni ti atra pṛṣṭha padena sarveṣām grahaṇāt caturṣu tad saṅkhyā niveśaḥ
utpatti vākye stotra sāmānādhikaraṇya abhāve pi pṛṣṭhapadasya stotra nāmatā siddhiḥ ca
anyathā utpatti vākye sāma samabhivyāhṛtasya api pṛṣṭha padasya guṇa abhidhāna arthatva sandeha āpatteḥ iti uktam
tat ayuktam

original: pṛṣṭhaśabdasya sarvatra śakttyā prayujyamānasyānyatra gauṇatvakalpane pramāṇābhāvāt /
analyzed: pṛṣṭha śabdasya sarvatra śakttyā prayujyamānasya anyatra gauṇa tva kalpane pramāṇa abhāvāt
na ca sāptamika vārtika ādi ukta gauṇa tva kalpanena virodhaḥ
tava api pṛṣṭhaiḥ stuvate iti vākyasya utpatti vidhi tva pradarśana para tatratya vārtika virodhasya tulya tvāt

original: ato 'nyataravārtikokteḥ prauḍhavādamātratve 'vaśyakalpye yatraiva gauṇatādidoṣaprasaṅga āpatati tasyaiva tatkalpanaṃ yuktam /
analyzed: atas nyatara vārtika ukteḥ prauḍha vāda mātra tve vaśya kalpye yatra eva gauṇa tā ādi doṣa prasaṅgaḥ āpatati tasya eva tad kalpanam yuktam

original: “bṛhatpṛṣṭhaṃ bhavati rathantaraṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavatī“ti vākyayoḥ mukhye jaghanyatāyā matvarthalakṣaṇāviśiṣṭavidhigauravāpādikāyā aṅgīkāre prayojanābhāvācca
analyzed: bṛhat pṛṣṭham bhavati rathantaram pṛṣṭham bhavati iti vākyayoḥ mukhye jaghanya tāyāḥ aṅgīkāre prayojana abhāvāt ca
atas na idam vākyam pṛṣṭha dvaya utpatti param
apitu māhendra stotra avāntara prakaraṇāt māhendra ākhya pṛṣṭha dvaya anuvādena sāma dvaya vidhi param

original: ataeva jaghanye pṛṣṭhapada eva svārthasādhanalakṣaṇayātra sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ jñeyam /
analyzed: ataeva jaghanye pṛṣṭha pade eva svārtha sādhana lakṣaṇayā atra sāmānādhikaraṇyam jñeyam

original: tayoreva māhendrasaṃjñakapṛṣṭhayoḥ bṛhadrathantaraṃ vā pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavatīti vacanādvikalpa ityeva yuktam //
analyzed: tayoḥ eva māhendra saṃjñaka pṛṣṭhayoḥ bṛhat rathantaram vā pṛṣṭham bhavati iti vacanāt vikalpaḥ iti eva yuktam

original: . etena --- “pṛṣṭhaiḥ stuvata” ityekasyaiva māhendrākhyapṛṣṭhastotrasya vidhāyakaṃ bṛhatpṛṣṭhaṃ bhavatīti vākyadvayaṃ pūrvavadevaikasmin stotre  #
analyzed: etena pṛṣṭhaiḥ stuvate iti ekasya eva māhendra ākhya pṛṣṭha stotrasya vidhāyakam bṛhat pṛṣṭham bhavati iti vākya dvayam pūrvavat eva ekasmin stotre
sāma dvaya vidhāyakam

original: tayośca satyapyekapṛṣṭhārthatve tattadṛkprakāśyāvāntarakāryabhedādvikalpāpattau “bṛhadvā rathantaraṃ vā pṛṣṭhaṃ bhavatī“ti vacanādeva vikalpaḥ
analyzed: tayoḥ ca sati api eka pṛṣṭha artha tve tad tad ṛc prakāśya avāntara kārya bhedāt vikalpa āpattau bṛhat vā rathantaram vā pṛṣṭham bhavati iti vacanāt eva vikalpaḥ

original: evañca sāmavidhivākya eva pṛṣṭhaśabdasya māhendrastotraparatvāt utpattivākyagatabahuvacanāntaḥ
analyzed: evam ca sāma vidhi vākye eva pṛṣṭha śabdasya māhendra stotra paratvāt utpatti vākya gata bahuvacana antaḥ

original: pṛṣṭhaśabdaḥ liṅgasamavāyāt “puroḍāśānalaṅkurvi” tyādau puroḍāśaśabda iva pṛṣṭhasamudāye gauṇaḥ /
analyzed: pṛṣṭha śabdaḥ liṅga samavāyāt puroḍāśān alaṅkurvi tyādau puroḍāśa śabdaḥ iva pṛṣṭha samudāye gauṇaḥ

original: bahuvacanasya ca pracayaśiṣṭasaṅkhyānuvādatvādavidheyatvena saṅkhyāyāḥ samidho yajatītivanna bhedakatvam /
analyzed: bahuvacanasya ca pracaya śiṣṭa saṅkhyā anuvāda tvāt avidheya tvena saṅkhyāyāḥ samidhaḥ yajati iti vat na bhedaka tvam
atas pramāṇa antara siddha stotra traya sahakṛta etad vākya vihita māhendra stotra abhiprāyam pṛṣṭhaiḥ iti bahuvacanam

original: “saptadaśāni pṛṣṭhānī“tyatrāpi gauṇamukhyasādhāraṇyena pṛṣṭhamātre saṅkhyāvidhiriti nyāyasudhākṛtkalpanamapi --- apāstam;
analyzed: saptadaśāni pṛṣṭhāni iti atra api gauṇa mukhya sādhāraṇyena pṛṣṭha mātre saṅkhyā vidhiḥ iti nyāyasudhākṛt kalpanam api apāstam
gauṇa tve pramāṇa abhāvāt

original: kiñca sāmavidhivākye pṛṣṭhapadasya māhendrastotramātravācitve sati pṛṣṭhairiti bahuvacanasyaiva
analyzed: kiñca sāma vidhi vākye pṛṣṭha padasya māhendra stotra mātra vāci tve sati pṛṣṭhaiḥ iti bahuvacanasya eva
pāśa adhikaraṇa nyāyena eka tva lakṣaṇayā api upapattau pṛṣṭhapade tatra tatra gauṇa tve pramāṇa abhāvāt tasya eva
saptadaśa saṅkhyā saṃbandha āpattiḥ
pṛṣṭha dvaye eva śaktiḥ iti vidhi rasāyana mata khaṇḍanam

original: apica sāmavidhivākye māhendrastotre eva pṛṣṭhapadasya śaktiriti nirdhāraṇe pramāṇābhāvaḥ /
analyzed: apica sāma vidhi vākye māhendra stotre eva pṛṣṭha padasya śaktiḥ iti nirdhāraṇe pramāṇa abhāvaḥ
tatra kriyā viśeṣa sāmānādhikaraṇya bhāvena stotra nāmatvasya eva asiddhau māhendra vācitvasya sutarām anavagateḥ

original: mama tu “pṛṣṭhaiḥ stuvate” iti stotrasāmānādhikaraṇyena sarvastotranāmatve 'vāntaraprakaraṇānmāhendraviśeṣapratītimātre na doṣaḥ /
analyzed: mama tu pṛṣṭhaiḥ stuvate iti stotra sāmānādhikaraṇyena sarva stotra nāma tve vā antara prakaraṇāt māhendra viśeṣa pratīti mātre na doṣaḥ

original: apica stotratrayasya prāpakapramāṇābhāve tatpracayaviśiṣṭasaṅkhyānuvādāyogāt saṅkhyāvidheyatvāvaśyakatvāt pṛṣṭhabhedo durnivāraḥ /
analyzed: apica stotra trayasya prāpaka pramāṇa abhāve tad pracaya viśiṣṭa saṅkhyā anuvāda ayogāt saṅkhyā vidheya tva āvaśyaka tvāt pṛṣṭha bhedaḥ durnivāraḥ
atas nyākṣipta śaktika tvāt pṛṣṭhaiḥ stuvate iti eva utpatti vākyam

original: tena vidheyāni ṣaṭ stotrāṇi pṛṣṭhanāmadheyāni natu vidhirasāyanoktarītyā pṛṣṭhadvayaṃ,
analyzed: tena vidheyāni ṣaḍ stotrāṇi pṛṣṭha nāmadheyāni na tu vidhi rasāyana ukta rītyā pṛṣṭha dvayam
nava api nyāyasudhā ukta diśā ekam eva pṛṣṭham iti
sva mata prasakta dūṣaṇa nirāsa pūrvaka mata antara dūṣaṇāni kaustubhe draṣṭavyāni iti arthaḥ
vākya bheda āpattyā citra ādi nāmadheya tva upasaṃhāraḥ

original: ataḥ siddhaṃ guṇavākye vākyabhedāpattyotpattivākye bahiṣpavamānājyapṛṣṭhapadānāṃ nāmadheyatvam /
analyzed: atas siddham guṇa vākye vākya bheda āpattyā utpatti vākye bahiṣpavamāna ājya pṛṣṭhapadānām nāmadheya tvam

original: citrāpadantu phalavākye eva vākyabhedāpattyā prājāpattyayāgānāṃ nāmadheyamiti /
analyzed: citrā padam tu phala vākye eva vākya bheda āpattyā prājāpattya yāgānām nāmadheyam iti
prayojanam pūrva uttarapakṣa pratipādanena spaṣṭa tvāt na uktam
iti tṛtīyam citra ādi pada nāmadheya tā adhikaraṇam
adhikaraṇam
tat prakhyan ca anya śāstram
tad prakhyam

original: iha rūḍhānāṃ yaugikānāṃ ca saṃbhavatprāptikānām “agnihotraṃ juhoti” “āghāramāghārayati”
analyzed: iha rūḍhānām yaugikānām ca saṃbhavat prāptikānām agnihotram juhoti āghāram āghārayati

original: “samidho yajati” ityādau agnihotrādipadānāṃ guṇavidhitvaṃ karmanāmatvaṃ veti cintāyāṃ
analyzed: samidhaḥ yajati ityādau agnihotra ādi padānām guṇa vidhi tvam karma nāma tvam vā iti cintāyām
prasiddheḥ guṇa vidhi tvam eva yuktam
na ca atra vākya bhedaḥ
vidheya aneka tva abhāvāt

original: ato 'gnihotrapade agnaye hotramasminniti vyutpattyā upasarjanārtho 'gnirdevatā home vidhīyate /
analyzed: atas gnihotra pade agnaye hotram asmin iti vyutpattyā upasarjana arthaḥ gniḥ devatā home vidhīyate

original: na ca “yadagnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāyaṃ juhoti” ityanena tasyāḥ prāptatvādavidhānam;
analyzed: na ca yat agnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāyam juhoti iti anena tasyāḥ prāpta tvāt avidhānam
tatra aneka guṇa upādānena viśiṣṭa karma antara vidheḥ āvaśyaka tayā etad vākya vihite karmaṇi tad prāpteḥ abhāvāt
atas yatra darvī homa ādau āgneyaḥ mantraḥ paṭhitaḥ
tādṛśa darvī homa anuvādena devatā mātram anena vidhīyate
vacanena tad prāpti saṃbhave māntravarṇika vidheḥ akalpanīya tvāt
viśiṣṭa karmāntaram vā
āghāra vākye dvitīya anta āghāra padena kṣaraṇa samartham ājya ādi drava dravyam abhidhīyate
dhātunā ca kṣaraṇa ākhyaḥ saṃskāraḥ tad uddeśena vidhīyate

original: aviniyuktasya ca saṃskārāyogāt prakaraṇakalpitavākyenopāṃśuyājāṅgatayā dravadravyaṃ vidhīyate /
analyzed: a viniyuktasya ca saṃskāra ayogāt prakaraṇa kalpita vākyena upāṃśuyāja aṅga tayā drava dravyam vidhīyate
caturgṛhītam vai etat abhūt tasya āghāram āghārya iti anena vā prayāja aṅga bhūta caturgṛhīta rūpa viśeṣa samarpaṇam
sarvathā āghāra padam dravya param

original: na nāmadheyamiti prāpte --- mantravarṇakalpyavidhinaiva devatāprāptisambhave asya
analyzed: na nāmadheyam iti prāpte mantra varṇa kalpya vidhinā eva devatā prāpti sambhave asya

original: pūrvapravṛttyā vidhikalpakatve vaiphalyāpatteḥ abhyudayaśiraskatvasya ca sambhavati

analyzed: prathama vidhi āpādaka dhātvartha vidhau anyāyya tvāt na tāvat darvī homa anuvādena devatā vidhiḥ
na api viśiṣṭa karma antara vidhiḥ

original: “agnirjyotirjyotiragniḥ svāheti sāyaṃ juhoti sūryo jyotirjyotiḥ sūryaḥ svāheti prātarjuhotī“ti vacanaviniyuktamantravarṇenaiva devatāprāpteḥ,
analyzed: agniḥ jyotiḥ jyotiḥ agniḥ svāhā iti sāyam juhoti sūryaḥ jyotiḥ jyotiḥ sūryaḥ svāhā iti prātar juhoti iti vacana viniyukta mantra varṇena eva devatā prāpteḥ

original: “yadagnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāyaṃ juhoti yat sūryāya ca prajāpataye ca prāta“rityatra tu lāghavāt sāyaṃprātaḥkālīnadevatāsamuccayaviśiṣṭaprajāpatimātra-  #
analyzed: yat agnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāyam juhoti yat sūryāya ca prajāpataye ca prātar iti atra tu lāghavāt sāyam prātar kālīna devatā samuccaya viśiṣṭa prajāpati mātra
vidhānam
ataeva yathā eva kevala devatya mantra liṅga vaśena kevalayoḥ devatā tvam
tathā agniḥ jyotiḥ agniḥ svāhā iti prātar iti miśra liṅgaka mantra varṇāt miśrayoḥ api tat
atas ca yat agnaye ca iti vākya stha agni sūrya padam sāyam prātar kālīna devatā lakṣakam
sāyam prātar padam ca tātparya grāhakam

original: caśabdopasthitasamuccayasya ca prajāpatāvanvayasya nipātopasargārthatvena vyutpannatvānna vidheyānekatā /
analyzed: caśabda upasthita samuccayasya ca prajāpatau anvayasya nipāta upasarga artha tvena vyutpanna tvāt na vidheya anekatā

original: ataścāgnerdevatātvādinā agnihotrahome prāptatvādagnihotrapadaṃ agnerhema ityevaṃ vyutpattyā nāmadheyam /
analyzed: atas ca agneḥ devatā tva ādinā agnihotra home prāpta tvāt agnihotra padam agneḥ hemaḥ iti evam vyutpattyā nāmadheyam

original: evamāghāre 'pi upāṃśuyāje “sarvasmai vā etadyajñāya gṛhyate yaddhruvāyāmājya“mityanenaiva
analyzed: evam āghāre pi upāṃśuyāje sarvasmai vai etat yajñāya gṛhyate yat dhruvāyām ājyam iti anena eva
dravyasya prāpta tvāt prayāja ājya uddeśena saṃskāra vidhāne pi dvitīya vidhi prakāra āpatteḥ lāghavāt
bhāva vyutpannam āghāra padam nāmadheyam
vidheyaḥ ca dhātu lakṣyaḥ homaḥ eva

original: “indra ūrdhvo adhvara ityāghāramāghārayatī“ti mātravarṇikendradevatāyāścaturgṛhītaṃ vetyanena ca dravyasya lābhāt /
analyzed: indraḥ ūrdhvaḥ adhvaraḥ iti āghāram āghārayati iti mātravarṇikā indra devatāyāḥ caturgṛhītam vā iti anena ca dravyasya lābhāt
evam samidh ādiṣu api vakṣyate
sarvatra dvitīyā karaṇatva lakṣaṇa arthā iti na virodhaḥ
iti caturtham tatprakhyā adhikaraṇam
guṇa vidhi nirāsa hetoḥ matu artha lakṣaṇā vākya bheda āpatti rūpasya pūrva adhikaraṇa dvaya pratipāditasya atra abhāvāt
pūrvapakṣa utthānena pratyudāharaṇa rūpām anantara saṃgatim spaṣṭa tvāt an uktvā vicāra viṣayībhūtānām
śabda viśeṣāṇām udāharaṇa tvam darśayati iha iti
atra ca yaugikānām eva matu artha lakṣaṇā parihāreṇa atra cintā
uttara adhikaraṇe tu sāṃvijñāyikānām
vākya bheda asaṃbhavāt iti vārtika granthāt iha yaugikānām eva udāharaṇa tva bhramam vyāvartayitum rūḍhānām iti uktam
atas eva vidvat vākya ādi gata paurṇamāsī amāvāsyā samidh ādi śabdānām api udāharaṇa tvam sūcitam
na hi teṣām matu artha lakṣaṇā parihāra vākya bhedā saṃbhava tad vyapadeśaiḥ nāmadheya tā siddhiḥ asti
atas iha eva tad prakhya nyāyena nāmatā prasādhanam kartavyam iti udāharaṇa tvam
vārtika granthaḥ tu neyaḥ
udbhid citrā tad vyapadeśa nyāyaiḥ tad prakhya nyāya āgata artha tāni rūpaṇam
saṃbhavat prāptikānām iti anena rūḍheṣu citra adhikaraṇa tad vyapadeśa adhikaraṇa viṣaya tvam
sūcayatā nyāya antara pratipādanena yaugikeṣu ca udbhid adhikaraṇa nyāya aviṣaya tvena api pṛthak adhikaraṇa ārambhasya
vaiyarthyam parihṛtam
tatas ca adhikaraṇa trayeṇa asaṃbhavat nāmadheya tvānām yaugikānām rūḍhānām vā śabdānām nāmadheya tvam
tad prakhya śāstra rūpa nyāya antareṇa guṇa vidhi tva nirāsa pūrvakam iha sādhyate iti yuktaḥ
pṛthak ārambhaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
na ca evam pratyudāharaṇa tva aviśeṣāt tad vyapadeśa adhikaraṇasya citra adhikaraṇa anantaram ārambha āpattiḥ
tad prakhyā adhikaraṇa pratyudāharaṇa tvena api tasya anantara saṃgati upapatteḥ
na hi yatra yasya saṃgatiḥ
tasya tatra abhidhānam iti
apitu yat yatra abhidhīyate
tatra tasya kācid saṃgatiḥ vācyā iti
tena tad prakhyā adhikaraṇasya abhidhīyamānasya saṅgati sadbhāvāt na doṣaḥ
ataeva yaugika tva sāmānyāt asya udbhid adhikaraṇa anantaram eva ārambha prasaṃgaḥ iti ca nirastam
rūḍhānām api atra udāharaṇa tvena tad sāmānyāt citra adhikaraṇa anantaram ārambhasya api vaktum śakya tvāt

original: ataḥ pūrvādhikaraṇadvayena yaugike rūḍhe ca cintite tadaivobhayavidhamupasthitamanyato 'saṃbhavannāmadheyatākamiha prathamaṃ vicāryata iti  #
analyzed: atas pūrva adhikaraṇa dvayena yaugike rūḍhe ca cintite tadā eva ubhayavidham upasthitam anyatas saṃbhavat nāmadheyatākam iha prathamam vicāryate iti
na kā api anupapattiḥ
prasiddheḥ iti
agnihotra padasya guṇe karmaṇi ca tulya vat vṛtti abhāvena guṇa vidhi tva vyavasthāpanam
pravṛtti viśeṣa kara tvasya api upalakṣaṇam etat
na ca iha yaugikeṣu udbhid nyāyena nāma tva āśaṅkā
vakṣyamāṇa rītyā karmaṇi agni devatāka tva rūpa avayava yogasya aprasiddha tvena guṇe karmaṇi
ca tulya vat vṛttika tva yoga abhāvena tad vaiṣamyāt bahuvrīhi samāsa anta agnihotra pada antargata agni padasya
sva rūpeṇa eva vidheya guṇa samarpaka tayā guṇe pi yoga abhāvaḥ
atas soma ādi pada vat eva prasiddhi ādibhiḥ guṇa vidhi tvam iti arthaḥ
matu artha lakṣaṇāyāḥ vakṣyamāṇa bahuvrīhi anta tā āśrayaṇena matu arthasya lābhāt karmaṇaḥ
nuvādya tvena viśiṣṭa vidhi abhāvāt ca yaugikeṣu su nirasya tayā tām an āśaṅkya anantara adhikaraṇa upanyasta guṇa vidhi tva nirāsa hetum
vākya bheda āpattim āśaṅkya nirasyati na ca iti
agnihotra pade vyadhikaraṇa bahuvrīhi samarthanam

original: atra juhoter “hupāmāśrubhasivasibhyastranni” tyauṇādike tranpratyaye kṛte sārvadhātukārdhadhātukayoriti
analyzed: atra juhoteḥ hu pāma aśru bhasi vasibhyaḥ tran ni tya auṇādike tran pratyaye kṛte sārvadhātuka ārdhadhātukayoḥ iti
guṇe kṛte hotra śabda vyutpatteḥ hotra śabdena ca hūyamāna dravyasya ukta tvāt agniḥ hetram asmin iti
na tāvat agnihotra pade samāna adhikaraṇa bahuvrīhi samāsa saṃbhavaḥ

original: nāpi “saptamīviśeṣaṇe bahuvrīhā“viti jñāpakabalena kaṇṭhekāla iti vadagnau hotramasminniti lakṣaṇānugatasya vyadhikaraṇabahuvrīherapi saṃbhavaḥ;
analyzed: nā api saptamī viśeṣaṇe bahuvrīhau iti jñāpaka balena kaṇṭhe kāle iti vat agnau hotram asmin iti lakṣaṇa anugatasya vyadhikaraṇa bahuvrīheḥ api saṃbhavaḥ
tasya yat āhavanīye juhoti iti anena eva agni adhikaraṇa tvasya prāpteḥ pūrvapakṣa asādhaka tvāt
na api agneḥ hetram iti ṣaṣṭhī tatpuruṣaḥ
juhoti sāmānādhikaraṇya anupapatteḥ
saṃbandha viśeṣa a parijñānāt ca
caturthī samāsasya api prakṛti vikāra bhāve eva iṣṭa tvena iha aprāpteḥ
śauṇḍa ādi gaṇa pāṭha abhāvāt ca na saptamī tatpuruṣasya api saṃbhavaḥ
atas samāsa antara asaṃbhavāt juhoti sāmānādhikaraṇya anurodhena bahuvrīheḥ eva vaktavya tve
lakṣaṇa ananugatam api tam siddhānte bhāṣya vārtikakārābhyām api aṅgīkṛtam kathañcid chāndasa tayā
pūrvapakṣe svīkṛtya guṇa vidhi tvam upapādayati atas iti
upasarjana arthaḥ iti

original: yathaiva “lohitoṣṇīṣā ṛtvijaḥ pracarantī“tyanyapadārthabhūtartvijāṃ prāptau upasarjanabhūtaṃ lohitoṣṇīṣaṃ vidhīyate,
analyzed: yathā eva lohita uṣṇīṣāḥ ṛtvijaḥ pracaranti iti anya padārtha bhūta ṛtvijām prāptau upasarjana bhūtam lohita uṣṇīṣam vidhīyate

original: tathaiva hotrasya dravyādeḥ prāptatvena viśeṣaṇībhūtārtho 'gnidevatātvaṃ vidhīyata ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: tathā eva hotrasya dravya ādeḥ prāptatvena viśeṣaṇībhūta arthaḥ gni devatā tvam vidhīyate iti arthaḥ

original: (phalavākyādinā karmaprāptyabhāvena viśiṣṭavidhinaiva pūrvapakṣaḥ kartavya iti śaṅkā)
analyzed: phala vākya ādinā karma prāpti abhāvena viśiṣṭa vidhinā eva pūrvapakṣaḥ kartavyaḥ iti śaṅkā
nanu evam atra anyatas karma prāpti abhāvāt na tad anuvādena guṇa vidhi saṃbhavaḥ

original: ato guṇavidhāviva viśiṣṭavidhāvapi bahuvrīhiṇaiva matvarthalābhāccitrādivākye iva viśiṣṭavidhau matvarthalakṣaṇāyā aprasakteḥ viśiṣṭavidhinaiva  #
analyzed: atas guṇa vidhau iva viśiṣṭa vidhau api bahuvrīhiṇā eva matu artha lābhāt citra ādi vākye iva viśiṣṭa vidhau matu artha lakṣaṇāyāḥ aprasakteḥ viśiṣṭa vidhinā eva
guṇa vidhi tva pūrvapakṣaḥ yuktaḥ
na ca phala vākyena karma vidhānam
tathā api phala saṃbandhasya api tatra karaṇe gaurava lakṣaṇa vākya bheda āpatteḥ

original: ata eva kāladvayopādānādyatsāyaṃ ca prātaśca juhotītyatrāpi na karmavidhānam /
analyzed: atas eva kāla dvaya upādānāt yat sāyam ca prātar ca juhoti iti atra api na karma vidhānam

original: na vā guṇadvayasyāpyādhikyāt “yadagnaye ca prajāpataya” ityatrāpi tadvidhānam /
analyzed: na vā guṇa dvayasya api ādhikyāt yat agnaye ca prajāpataye iti atra api tad vidhānam
naca etad vākye na eka guṇa upādānāt vākya bheda anāpatteḥ karma vidhānam āvaśyakam iti vācyam

original: etadvākyavihitakarmaṇo 'gneḥ prāptatvenāgnividhānānupapattyā tatprakhyaśāstratāyā eva prāpteḥ nāmatāyā evāpatteḥ //
analyzed: etad vākya vihita karmaṇaḥ gneḥ prāptatvena agni vidhāna anupapattyā tad prakhya śāstra tāyāḥ eva prāpteḥ nāma tāyāḥ eva āpatteḥ
sūrya vākya vihita karma anuvādena agni vidhāna asaṃbhavaḥ
tatra somanāthīya mata khaṇḍanañca
sūrya vākya vihite ca karmaṇi utpatti śiṣṭa sūrya prajāpati avarodhāt agni devatāyāḥ niveśa asaṃbhavāt ca
yat tu somanāthena sūrya vākye sūrya samuccita prajāpati vidhānasya ekena eva caśabdena
lābhāt sūrya pada uttara cakāra vaiyarthya āpattyā sūryasya api etad vākya vihita agni samuccaya vidhānāt utpatti śiṣṭa sūrya prajāpati avaruddhe
pi karmaṇi agneḥ niveśaḥ

original: ata eva “yadagnaye ce” ti vākyavihitakarmaṇyagneḥ prāptatvāt parasparasamuccayārthatvamapyāśritamiti --- uktam /
analyzed: atas eva yat agnaye ca iti vākya vihita karmaṇi agneḥ prāptatvāt paraspara samuccaya ārtha tvam api āśritam iti uktam
tat yat samabhivyāhṛtaḥ caśabdaḥ tad samabhivyāhṛta samuccayasya eva itaratra pratipādaka tvam
caśabdasya vyutpatti siddham iti sūrya samuccayasya prajāpatau saṃbhave pi agni samuccayasya
sūrye saṃbhavāt ayuktam
āruṇi ādi vat eka vākya upādānena samuccaya prāpteḥ dvitīya cakārasya evam api vaiyarthyāt ca
agni vākye sūrya samuccayam ādāya cakāra upapatteḥ
paraspara samuccaya ārtha tve māna abhāvāt ca

original: “yatsāyaṃ ca prātaśca juhotī“tyasya “yadagnayece“ti vākyavihitakarmaṇi tattatkālasyotpattiśiṣṭatayā sāyaṃprātaḥkālayoḥ samucacyaniveśānupapatternirviṣayatvāpatteśca
analyzed: yat sāyam ca prātar ca juhoti iti asya yat agnaye ca iti vākya vihita karmaṇi tat tat kālasya utpatti śiṣṭa tayā sāyam prātar kālayoḥ samucacya niveśa anupapatteḥ nirviṣaya tva āpatteḥ ca
yat sāyam iti vākya vihita karma anuvādena guṇa vidhi tva śaṅka nirāsaḥ
na ca yat sāyam ca iti vākya vihita karma anuvādena eva atra agni rūpa guṇa vidhiḥ
tasya yat agnaye ca iti vākya vihita karma upasthitau prakaraṇa antara nyāyena karma antara viṣayaka tva anupapatteḥ
guṇāt tad saṃbhave vā anupādeya guṇa dvayasya asaṃbhavāt
samuccayasya ekatra niveśa ayogena āgneya vākyā eva adṛṣṭa dvaya āpādaka karma dvaya vidhi āpatteḥ ati gaurava āpattyāḥ eva niyāmaka tvāt
na ca sāyam prātar vākya vihita sāyam prātar kāla viśiṣṭa karma anuvādena yat agnaye ca iti vākyābhyām agni ādi devatā vidhiḥ
aneka guṇa upādānena vidhi āvṛtti lakṣaṇa vākya bheda āpatteḥ
yat tu atra prakāśa kāraiḥ sāyam prātar kāla viśiṣṭa anuvāda tāyām api vākya bheda āpattiḥ iti uktam

original: tat sāyaṃprātaḥpadayoravyayatvena tadarthasya svasamabhivyāhṛtārthe 'nvayasya vyutpannatvena tadaprasakterupekṣyam //
analyzed: tat sāyam prātar padayoḥ avyaya tvena tad arthasya sva samabhivyāhṛta arthe nvayasya vyutpanna tvena tad aprasakteḥ upekṣyam
guṇa viśiṣṭa karma vidhi pakṣa śaṅkāyāḥ sāyam yat agnaye ca ityādi vākyānām agnihotra vākya śeṣa tā upapādana pūrvaka upasaṃhāraḥ tatra prakāśa mata khaṇḍanam ca
atas lāghavāt agnihotra vākye eva guṇa viśiṣṭa karma vidhiḥ
tatra eva sāyam prātar vākyena sāyam prātar kāla vidhiḥ

original: avyayārthasya caśabdārthenāpyanvayasya vyutpannatvena agnihotravākyavihitakarmānuvādena sāyaṃprāptaḥkālasamuccayavidhāne 'pi na vākyabhedaḥ
analyzed: avyaya arthasya caśabda arthena api anvayasya vyutpanna tvena agnihotra vākya vihita karma anuvādena na vākya bhedaḥ
asya eva ca guṇa vidhi tayā api agnihotra padena anuvādāt phala nimitta vākyābhyām phala nimitta saṃbandhaḥ
yat agnaye ca iti vākya vihita karma antarayoḥ etad vākya vihita karma aṅga tvam eva a phalava tvena prakaraṇa sattvāt
yat tu prakāśakāraiḥ viśiṣṭa vidhi aṅgīkāre pi tayoḥ viśvajit nyāyena svarga artha tvam uktam
tad aṅga tvasya eva prakaraṇāt āpatteḥ ayuktam

original: ato viśiṣṭavidhitvenaiva pūrvapakṣo yukta ityāśaṅkāmiṣṭāpattyaiva parihariṣyate //
analyzed: atas viśiṣṭa vidhi tvena eva pūrvapakṣaḥ yuktaḥ iti āśaṅkām iṣṭa āpattyā eva parihariṣyate
kevala guṇa vidhi tva pakṣaḥ prācīna matena iti tad mata rītyā yat agnaye vākyena agni prāpti śaṅkā vākya bheda āpatti ādinā tad aparihāra ādikam ca
tatra prācām rītyā tad siddhānti abhimata vidhitsita guṇa prāpaka rūpa tad prakhya śāstra nyāyena
nirākaraṇa pūrvakam karma prāpteḥ atra sattvāt kevala guṇa vidhi tvam samarthayitum āha yat agnaye ca iti
anena vākyena agnihotra vākya vihita karma anuvādena samuccitayoḥ api agni prajāpatyoḥ dvayoḥ api vidhāne vākya bhedaḥ
na ca atra viśiṣṭa eka kāraka vidhinā sa parihartum śakyaḥ
vibhakti bhedena kāraka bhedāt

original: ata eva kārakāṇāṃ kriyayaivānvayāccaśabdārthe samuccaye 'nvayāvyutpatterna kārakadvayasamuccayavidhānenāpi tatparihāraḥ /
analyzed: atas eva kārakāṇām kriyayā eva anvayāt caśabda arthe samuccaye nvaya a vyutpatteḥ na kāraka dvaya samuccaya vidhānena api tad parihāraḥ
etena agniḥ jyotiḥ jyotiḥ agniḥ svāhā iti mantra viniyoga anyathā anupapatti kalpita vidhitaḥ gneḥ prāpta tvāt samuccita prajāpati vidhānāt na vākya bhedaḥ
iti api nirastam
agnaye iti asya api kāraka tvena caśabda arthe anvaya asaṃbhavena agni samuccita tad vidhāna anupapatteḥ

original: nāpyagnaye iti vākye mantravarṇaprāptāgnidevatānuvādakamagnaya iti padamaṅgīkṛtya kevalaprajāpatividhānādavākyabhedaḥ,
analyzed: na api agnaye iti vākye mantra varṇa prāpta agni devatā anuvādakam agnaye iti padam aṅgīkṛtya kevala prajāpati vidhānāt avākya bhedaḥ
tathātve brāhmaṇa vākya gata caturthī anta pada bodhita devatā tva viśiṣṭa prajāpati avaruddhe
māntravarṇika devatā kalpanā anupapatteḥ mantrasya aindrī nyāyena prajāpati mātra prakāśaka tva āpattyā agnaye
iti anuvāda anupapatteḥ

original: sūryavākye 'pi sūryapadānuvādāpattyā prajāpatimātravidhāna ekenaiva vākyena home prajāpatiprāptyupapattau vākyadvayavaiyarthyācca /
analyzed: sūrya vākye sūrya pada anuvāda āpattyā prajāpati mātra vidhāne ekena eva vākyena home prajāpati prāpti upapattau vākya dvaya vaiyarthyāt ca
tad tad kāla viśiṣṭa homa uddeśena prajāpati vidhāne pūrva ukta rītyā viśiṣṭa uddeśe vākya bheda anāpattau api
prajāpataye juhoti iti etāvatā api tad vidhi siddheḥ sāyam prātar padayoḥ api vaiyarthya āpatteḥ ca

original: ato 'vaśyaṃ “yadagnayece“ti vākyadvaye devatādvayakāladvayaviśiṣṭakarmāntaradvayasyaiva vidheyatvānnaitadvākyavihite karmaṇi tena devatāprāptiriti  #
analyzed: atas vaśyam yat agnaye ca iti vākya dvaye devatā dvaya kāla dvaya viśiṣṭa karmāntara dvayasya eva vidheya tvāt na etad vākya vihite karmaṇi tena devatā prāptiḥ iti
na tad prakhya śāstra tvam

original: etadvihitakarmadvayasyaiva sāyaṃ ca prātaśca juhotītyanena samuccayavidhiḥ /
analyzed: etad vihita karma dvayasya eva sāyam ca prātar ca juhoti iti anena samuccaya vidhiḥ
samuccitāt homa dvayāt ekam eva phalam
asmin pakṣe karma dvayasya viśvajit nyāyena svarga artha tvam
phala vākyasya agnihotra padena anuvāda asaṃbhavāt asmin eva phalavati karma dvaye dadhi ādi vākyaiḥ dravya vidhiḥ
phala vākye ca etat homa āśrita agneḥ phala artha tayā vidhānam iti jñeyam
tad prakhya śāstra abhāvāt agnihotra pada nāma tva nirūpaṇam
ataeva yat agnaye ca iti vākya vihita karmaṇā agneḥ tad prakhya śāstra sattvāt agnihotra padam asya eva nāmadheyam iti api apāstam

original: nāmadheyatvapakṣe tasyāvidheyatvāt karmaṇa eva vidheyatve vaktavye tasyāpi prāptervidhānāyogāt,
analyzed: nāmadheya tva pakṣe tasya avidheya tvāt karmaṇaḥ eva vidheya tve vaktavye tasya api prāpteḥ vidhāna ayogāt
karma antara vidhau ca tatra dravya devatā ākhya rūpa abhāvāt vidhāna anupapatteḥ
atas ca anyatas devatāyāḥ ca prāptau agnaye hotram iti anuvāda anupapattyā nāma tva asaṃbhavāt guṇa vidhi tvam eva iti arthaḥ
agnihotra vākyasya darvī homa anuvādena guṇa vidhi tva nirūpaṇam

original: kasmin karmaṇi tarhi guṇavidhānamityata āha --- ato yatreti //
analyzed: kasmin karmaṇi tarhi guṇa vidhānam iti atas āha atas yatra iti
darvī homaḥ iti ca juhoti codanā coditānām keṣucid ācāra prāpta darvī saṃbandhāt vaiśvadeva śabda vat ca
sarveṣām liṅga samavāyena darvī āmnānāt tad prakhya nyāyena yat ekayā juhuyāt darvī homam
kuryāt iti arthavāda avagata karma sāmānādhikaraṇya siddha nāmadheyam aṣṭame sādhayiṣyate
tādṛśa dūra stha darvī homa anuvādena api yat āhavanīye juhoti iti anena dūra stha homa anuvādena api upādeya āhavanīya vidhi vat iha api upādeya agni devatā vidhiḥ iti arthaḥ

original: teṣvapi yeṣu taddhitena caturthyā vāgniranyā vā devatāvihitā tatrānenāgnividhinānupapattervaiyarthyaparihārāyāgneyo mantraḥ paṭhita ityuktam
analyzed: teṣu api yeṣu taddhitena caturthyā vā agniḥ anyā vā devatā vihitā tatra anena agni vidhinā anupapatteḥ vaiyarthya parihārāya āgneyaḥ mantraḥ paṭhitaḥ iti uktam
tatas ca mantra varṇa kalpya agni devatā vidheḥ pūrva pravṛttyā devatā vidhiḥ
atas vihita devatāka darvī homa anuvādena agnihotra padena agni devatā vidhiḥ iti

agnihotra vākye nimitta phala ādi asaṃbandha āpattyā sūrya devatā samarpaka tvena ca darvī homa sūrya vākya vihata karmaṇoḥ anuddeśya tva nirūpaṇa pūrvaka sāyaṃhoma anuvāda para prakāśakāra mata nirūpaṇam
tad khaṇḍanam ca

original: yattu --- asmin pakṣe phalanimittavākyābhyāṃ darvīhomānāṃ agnihotrapadanirdiṣṭatvenāgnihotrapadānuvādasaṃbhave 'pi dūrasthatayā viparivṛtterna  #
analyzed: yat tu asmin pakṣe phala nimitta vākyābhyām darvī homānām agnihotra pada nirdiṣṭa tvena agnihotra pada anuvāda saṃbhave dūra stha tayā viparivṛtteḥ na
phala nimitta saṃbandhaḥ kriyate
na api yat sūryāya ca iti vākya vihita prātar hema karmaṇaḥ
tasya agni devatya tva abhāve agnihotra padena anuvāda ayogāt atas yat agnaye ca iti vākya vihita sāyaṃhomasya eva

original: ata eva sāyaṃhomasya phalavattvena prakaraṇāt prātarhemasya sāyaṃprātaśca juhotītivākyenāgneyanyāyena vihitakarmadvayasya ca sāyaṃhomāṅgatvam
analyzed: atas eva sāyaṃhomasya phalavat tvena prakaraṇāt prātar hemasya sāyam prātar ca juhoti iti vākyena āgneya nyāyena vihita karma dvayasya ca sāyaṃhoma aṅga tvam

original: sāyaṃprātaśceti vākyadvayavihitakarmaṇoreva agnirjayotiriti mantravidhānāttatraiva māntravarṇikī devatā,
analyzed: sāyam prātar ca iti vākya dvaya vihita karmaṇoḥ eva agniḥ jayotiḥ iti mantra vidhānāt tatra eva māntravarṇikī devatā
na tu yat agnaye ca iti vākya dvaya vihita karma dvaye

original: tatra liṅgādeva mantraprāptau punarvidhyānarthakyāpatteriti vākyavyavasthāpanaṃ prakāśakāraiḥ kṛtam //
analyzed: tatra liṅgāt eva mantra prāptau punar vidhi ānarthakya āpatteḥ iti vākya vyavasthāpanam prakāśa kāraiḥ kṛtam
tat ayuktam

original: asmin pūrvapakṣe kvāpyagnihotrapadasya nāmatvāsiddheḥ guṇavidhitvenāgnihotrapadenānuvādāyogātsāyaṃhomasya “yadagnayece“ti vākyavihitasya phalasaṃbandhānupapatteḥ,
analyzed: asmin pūrvapakṣe kvāpi agnihotra padasya nāma tva asiddheḥ guṇa vidhi tvena agnihotra padena anuvāda ayogāt sāyaṃhomasya yat agnaye ca iti vākya vihitasya phala saṃbandha anupapatteḥ
agni devatāka tva mātreṇa agnihotra padasya tatra pravṛttau yat sāyam ca iti vākya vihita kevala agni devatya karma antarasya api tad āpatteḥ aṅgatva ukteḥ aprayojaka tvāt ca
parama siddhānte iva sāyam prātar vākya vihita karma dvaye mantra varṇa prāpta agni sūrya devatye
agni sūryayoḥ prāptyā tatra eva yat agnaye ca iti vākya dvaya vihita karma dvayasya eva svarga arthasya
yat sāyam ca iti vākyena samuccaya vidhānam
phala nimitta vākyābhyām dūra sthasya api darvī homasya guṇa vidhau anuvādya tvena upasthitasya āśraya tva upapatteḥ tad āśritasya agnihotra pada samarpita agni devatā rūpa guṇasya
phale nimitte ca vidhiḥ

original: athavā --- “yadagnaye ce“ti vākyadvayavihitahomadvayasyāpi prakaraṇādāśrayatvāpattestadāśritasyaiva vā guṇasya vidhānam /
analyzed: athavā yat agnaye ca iti vākya dvaya vihita homa dvayasya api prakaraṇāt āśraya tva āpatteḥ tad āśritasya eva vā guṇasya vidhānam

original: naca --- agnidevatye prathame sāyaṃhome agneḥ sattvenāvirodhādāśrayatvasaṃbhave 'pi sūryadevatye home kathamagnerniveśaḥ?
analyzed: naca agni devatye prathame sāyaṃhome agneḥ sattvena avirodhāt āśraya tva saṃbhave sūrya devatye home katham agneḥ niveśaḥ

original: iti --- vācyam; kāmyatayā agnidevatyatābādhakatvena niveśopapatterityevaṃ vākyavyavasthā pūrvasūcitaiva yuktā /
analyzed: iti vācyam kāmya tayā agni devatya tā bādhaka tvena niveśa upapatteḥ iti evam vākya vyavasthā pūrva sūcitā eva yuktā
na ca yat agnaye ca iti vākya dvaya vihita karmaṇoḥ liṅgāt eva mantra prāptau mantra viniyoga vidhi vaiyarthyam
ataeva miśra liṅga karma viniyoga āmnāna balāt tayoḥ api etad aṅga tvāt gauṇyā vṛttyā eva aindrī nyāyena kevala agni sūrya prakāśaka tvam eva iti sarvam sustham
tatra upapattayaḥ ca
evam tāvat homa anuvādena guṇa vidhi tva pūrvapakṣasya upapāditasya api darvī homeṣu mantra varṇāt agni prāpti saṃbhave
tatas pūrva pravṛttyā aśravaṇe pi phala antara abhāvāt vaiyarthya āpatteḥ ayukta tām matvā

original: pūrvaṃ śaṅkitaṃ viśiṣṭakarmāntaravidhimeva pūrvapakṣe pakṣāntareṇa darśayati--- viśiṣṭeti //
analyzed: pūrvam śaṅkitam viśiṣṭa karma antara vidhim eva pūrvapakṣe pakṣa antareṇa darśayati viśiṣṭa iti

original: asmiṃśca pakṣe sarvavākyavyavasthā āśaṅkāvyājenaiva darśitā prāk /
analyzed: asmin ca pakṣe sarva vākya vyavasthā āśaṅkā vyājena eva darśitā prāk
phala nimitta vākya gatam agnihotra padam bahuvrīhi anta pada nirdiṣṭa agni devatāka karma paricaya artham sat darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām iṣṭvā somena yajeta iti
na tu nāmadheyam
asmin eva karma antare dadhi ādi vākyaiḥ prakaraṇāt dravya vidhiḥ
athavā ākāṅkṣā viśeṣāt dvedhā havīṃṣi iti vat homa pada saṅkoce pramāṇa abhāvāt asmin

original: pradhānabhūte karmaṇi “yadagnayece“ti vākyadvayavihite aṅgabhūte karmadvaye 'pi ca
analyzed: pradhāna bhūte karmaṇi yat agnaye ca iti vākya dvaya vihite aṅga bhūte karma dvaye ca
kaustubha ukta rītyā tad vidhiḥ iti arthaḥ
kṣaraṇa samartham iti
tathā ca ghṛ kṣaraṇa dīptyoḥ iti dhātu pāṭhe paṭhita ghṛ dhātoḥ āṅ pūrvakāt svārtha ṇic antāt
a kartari ca kārake saṃjñāyām iti sūtrāt a kartari iti anuvartamāne erac iti a c pratyaye

original: kṛte “ṇeraniṭī“ti sūtreṇa ṇilope kṛte āghāryate 'sāvāghāraiti karmavyutpattyā kṣaraṇasamarthadravyaparamāghārapadam,
analyzed: kṛte ṇeḥ an iṭi iti sūtreṇa ṇi lope kṛte āghāryate sau āghāraḥ iti karma vyutpattyā kṣaraṇa samartha dravya parama āghāra padam
na tu bhāva vyutpattyā karma nāmadheyam
tathātve pravṛtti nimitta bheda abhāvena udbhida ādi vaiṣamyāt tad anupapatteḥ iti arthaḥ
dvitīyayā ājyasya prakaraṇa kalpita vākyena upāṃśuyāga aṅga tva nirūpaṇam
prakaraṇa kalpita vākya padārtha nirūpaṇañca

original: ājyādītyādipadena “caturgṛhītaṃ vā” iti vākyādājyasya prāpteḥ tatprakhyaśāstratāyā nirāsaḥ sūcitaḥ /
analyzed: ājya ādi iti ādi padena caturgṛhītam vā iti vākyāt ājyasya prāpteḥ tad prakhya śāstra tāyāḥ nirāsaḥ sūcitaḥ
etena prāptam ājya rūpam yat drava dravyam tat param iti arthaḥ

original: nacaivamājyādyabhidhānepi tasya dvitīyayā prādhānyāt vidheyatvābhāvena guṇavidhitvāsaṃbhavaḥ,
analyzed: na ca evam ājya ādi abhidhāne api tasya dvitīyayā prādhānyāt vidheya tva abhāvena guṇa vidhi tva asaṃbhavaḥ

original: yadā tu bhūtabhāvyupayogābhāvena saktūnāmiva saṃskāryatvānupapattyā dvitīyāyāstṛtīyārthalakṣakatvena taducyate,
analyzed: yadā tu bhūta bhāvi upayoga abhāvena saktūnām iva saṃskārya tva anupapattyā dvitīyāyāḥ tṛtīyā artha lakṣaka tvena tat ucyate

original: tadā na saṃskārakarmatvasaṃbhava ityata āha --- aviniyuktasyaceti //
analyzed: tadā na saṃskāra karma tva saṃbhavaḥ iti atas āha a viniyuktasya ca iti

original: kṣaraṇākhyasaṃskārasya dravyagatabhūtabhāvyupayogaṃ vinānupapatteḥ “adhvaryuṃ vṛṇīta” ityādāviva viniyogavidhiḥ kalpyate /
analyzed: kṣaraṇa ākhya saṃskārasya dravya gata bhūta bhāvi upayogam vinā anupapatteḥ adhvaryum vṛṇīte ityādau iva viniyoga vidhiḥ kalpyate
sa ca kṣaraṇasya prakaraṇe āmnānāt prākaraṇika apūrva sādhanībhūta dravya saṃskāra tvena
vidhāna sāmarthyāt kalpyamānaḥ prākaraṇika dravya saṃskāra tvena vidhāna sāmarthyāt kalpyamānaḥ

original: prākaraṇikadravyāpekṣayāgārthatayaiva kalpayituṃ yukta ityupāṃ śuyāgāṅgatvameva saṃbhavati /
analyzed: prākaraṇika dravya apekṣa yāga arthatayā eva kalpayitum yuktaḥ iti upām śuyāga aṅga tvam eva saṃbhavati

original: tataśca siddhāntyabhimatanāmatāvirodhenāghāravākye guṇatayā nirṇītasyāghārapadārthasya kalpitavākyena vidhānena guṇavidhitvaṃ nānupapannam
analyzed: tatas ca siddhānti abhimata nāmatā virodhena āghāra vākye guṇatayā nirṇītasya āghāra padārthasya kalpita vākyena vidhānena guṇa vidhi tvam na anupapannam
prakaraṇa kalpita vākyena iti asya ayam arthaḥ
kṣaraṇasya prakaraṇa pāṭha kalpita viniyoga vākyena iti
prākaraṇika viniyoge
tena dravyasya itikartavya tā tva abhāvāt itikartavya tā ākāṅkṣā lakṣaṇa prakaraṇa agrāhya tve pi na kṣatiḥ

original: tasya ca kṣaramavidhereva saṃskāravidhyānarthakya bhiyā prakaraṇasanāthasyopāṃśuyājoddeśena saṃskāryadravyaviniyogaparyantateti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tasya ca kṣaram a vidheḥ eva saṃskāra vidhi ānarthakya bhiyā prakaraṇa sanāthasya upāṃśuyāja uddeśena saṃskārya dravya viniyoga paryanta tā iti bhāvaḥ
evam ca u pāṃśuyājam antarā yajati iti utpatti vākyam eva prakaraṇa sanātham saṃskṛta āghāra dravya viśiṣṭa yāga vidhāyakam āśritya

original: matubyuktavākyasyaiva prakaraṇena kalpanena matvarthalakṣaṇāparihārakleśo 'pi śāstradīpikāsūcito nāpatati;
analyzed: matup yukta vākyasya eva prakaraṇena kalpanena matu artha lakṣaṇā parihāra kleśaḥ pi śāstradīpikāsu ucitaḥ nā āpatati

original: kṣaraṇasaṃskṛtena dravyeṇopāṃśuyājaṃ kuryādityevaṃ vaiyadhikaraṇyenaiva vākyasya kalpanāt //
analyzed: kṣaraṇa saṃskṛtena dravyeṇa upāṃśuyājam kuryāt iti evam vaiyadhikaraṇyena eva vākyasya kalpanāt
saktu vākyasya āghāra vākya vaiṣamya nirūpaṇam
na ca evam saktuṣu api viniyoga kalpanā āpattiḥ

original: saktūnāṃ homena bhasmībhāvena bhāvyupayogitvāsaṃbhavādviniyogānāśrayaṇe 'pi iha kṣaraṇarūpasyāsādhāraṇasya
analyzed: saktūnām homena bhasmībhāvena bhāvi upayogi tva asaṃbhavāt viniyoga an āśrayaṇe iha kṣaraṇa rūpasya a sādhāraṇasya
loke pānīya jala ādi viṣaya saṃskāraka tva darśanāt tasya eva kḷptasya pratyabhijñāyamāna tvāt abhiṣava yukta pūtīkānām iva avaśiṣṭasya
bhāvi upayogi tva saṃbhavena dvitīyā balāt viniyoga kalpanā upapatteḥ vaiṣamyāt
atas eva upāṃśuyājasya anena eva dravyeṇa nairākāṅkṣyāt hrauva ājyam anyatra eva avatiṣṭhate

original: athavā --- anenājyapayaḥprabhṛtidravyamātre vihite “sarvasmā” iti vākyenājyānuvādena dhruvādhikaraṇatvavidhāne 'pi na kṣatiḥ //
analyzed: athavā anena ājya payaḥ prabhṛti dravya mātre vihite sarvasmai iti vākyena ājya anuvādena dhruva adhikaraṇa tva vidhāne pi na kṣatiḥ
viniyoga vidhi kalpanayā upāṃśu yāga artha tvam iti prācīna mata asvārasya nirūpaṇa pūrvaka pakṣa antara anusaraṇam
evam tāvat viniyoga vidhi kalpanayā upāṃśuyāja artha tvam prācām rītyā uktam
na tu etat yuktam
viniyuktasya saṃskāra yogya tā
saṃskāra vidhi balāt ca viniyoga kalpanā iti anyonya āśraya āpatteḥ

original: adhvaryvādestu tattatkarmaṇi samākhyākalpitavidhita eva kartṛtvena viniyogadarśanādadhvaryukarmakasya varaṇasaṃskārasya vidhānādvaiṣamyam /
analyzed: adhvaryu ādeḥ tu tad tad karmaṇi samākhyā kalpita vidhitaḥ eva kartṛ tvena viniyoga darśanāt adhvaryu karmakasya varaṇa saṃskārasya vidhānāt vaiṣamyam

original: kiñca prākaraṇikapratyakṣavacanena sarvapakṣārthaṃ vihitena dhrauvājyenaivopāṃśuyājenairākāṅkṣyānna tatra viniyogavidhikalpanāvasaraḥ /
analyzed: kiñca prākaraṇika pratyakṣa vacanena sarva pakṣa artham vihitena dhrauva ājyena eva upāṃśuyājena airākāṅkṣyāt na tatra viniyoga vidhi kalpanā avasaraḥ
yat tu dhruva adhikaraṇa tva mātra vidhānam uktam
tadā ājya mātra uddeśena tad vidhāne laṅkaraṇa artha ājye pi tad āpatteḥ yajati viśeṣaṇa tve viśiṣṭa uddeśa āpatteḥ ayuktam
atas tatra dhruva adhikaraṇaka ājya grahaṇa bhāvanā vidhānam eva yajña uddeśena yuktam
na upāṃśuyāja artha tvam iti a parituṣya pakṣa antaram āha caturgṛhītam vā iti
ayam arthaḥ āghāram āghārayati iti anena kṣaraṇa samartha dravya eka deśa saṃskāra tvena

original: kṣaraṇe vihite kiṃ taddravyamiti viśeṣajijñāsāyāṃ caturgṛhītamiti viśeṣasamarpaṇamātramāgneyaṃ
analyzed: kṣaraṇe vihite kim tat dravyam iti viśeṣa jijñāsāyām caturgṛhītam iti viśeṣa samarpaṇa mātram āgneyam
caturdhākaroti iti vat kriyate
evam ca saṃskāryasya viniyoga apekṣāyām na akḷpta upāṃśuyāja artha tā kalpyā

original: apitu “caturjuhvāṃ gṛhṇāti prayājebhyastat” iti vākyata eva prayājārthateti lāghavam /
analyzed: apitu catuḥ juhvām gṛhṇāti prayājebhyaḥ tat iti vākyataḥ eva prayāja artha tā iti lāghavam

original: “indra ūrdhvo adhvaraḥ sa divispṛśa” ityāghāramāghārayatītyanena tu mantramātraṃ kṣaraṇāṅgatayā rathaghoṣādivat smārakatvena vidhīyate iti  #
analyzed: indraḥ ūrdhvaḥ adhvaraḥ sa divispṛśe iti āghāram āghārayati iti anena tu mantra mātram kṣaraṇa aṅgatayā ratha ghoṣa ādi vat smāraka tvena vidhīyate iti
na doṣaḥ iti
āghāra vākye nāmadheya tve vaiyarthyam agnihotra vākye dvitīya anupapattiḥ ca iti nirūpaṇam
evam ca asmin pakṣe guṇa vidhi tva asaṃbhave siddhānti abhimata nāma tā nirodhena eva āghāra padam
guṇa para mātram iti etāvatā api siddhānta asiddhim sarvathā padena sūcayan āghāra vākye pūrvapakṣam upasaṃharati sarvathā iti
karma nāmadheya tve āghāre pṛthak saṃkalpa abhāvena ullekha viśeṣa prayojana asaṃbhavāt vaiyarthyam

original: kathañcidagnihotrapade tatsaṃbhave 'pi ubhayatrotpattivākye karmaṇaḥ karaṇatvāddvitīyānupapattirapi sarvathāpadena sūcitā //
analyzed: kathañcid agnihotra pade tad saṃbhave pi ubhayatra utpatti vākye karmaṇaḥ karaṇa tvāt dvitīya anupapattiḥ api sarvathā padena sūcitā
somanātha mata khaṇḍana pūrvakam sānnāyya uddeśena saṃskāra vidhānam iti pakṣa antarasya nirūpaṇam

original: vastutastu --- sānnāyyayāgīyapayasa evāghārapadenānuvādasaṃbhave taduddeśenaivātra saṃskāravidhānamityapi śakyate pūrvapakṣe vaktum /
analyzed: vastutas tu sānnāyya yāgīya payasaḥ eva āghāra padena anuvāda saṃbhave tad uddeśena eva atra saṃskāra vidhānam iti api śakyate pūrvapakṣe vaktum

original: yattu --- atra sānnāyyādidravyasyāghārapadena vidhānādāghārapadenānuvādāsaṃbhava iti nyāyasudhāsvārasyena --- somanāthenoktam,
analyzed: yat tu atra sānnāyya ādi dravyasya āghāra padena vidhānāt āghāra padena anuvāda asaṃbhavaḥ iti nyāyasudhā svārasyena somanāthena uktam
tat āghāra padasya pūrvapakṣe rūḍha tva aṅgīkāra ayogena aprakṛta ājya payaḥ paratvena iva sānnāyya payaḥ paratvena api anuvāda saṃbhavāt upekṣyam
atas sānnāyya paratvena api guṇa paratva saṃbhavena nāmatā niṣedha upapatteḥ iti api suvacam iti

original: evaṃ vidvadvākyagatayo rūḍhayorapi paurṇamāsyamāvāsyāpadayoḥ guṇaparatavopapādanaṃ kaustubhe draṣṭavyam //
analyzed: evam vidvat vākya gatayoḥ rūḍhayoḥ api paurṇamāsī amāvāsyā padayoḥ guṇa para tava upapādanam kaustubhe draṣṭavyam
agnihotra vākye guṇa guṇa viśiṣṭa karma antarayoḥ vidhāna asaṃbhava nirūpaṇam
agnihotra pade tāvat guṇa vidhi tva asaṃbhava pūrvakam nāmadheya tva siddhāntam āha mantra varṇa kalpya iti
vyākhyāta pūrvam etat
na api iti

original: atraca nyāyasudhākṛtā so 'nyata eva prāpto “yadagnayece“ti ṭupṭīkāyāmuktatvādihāpi
analyzed: atra ca nyāyasudhā kṛtā saḥ nyatas eva prāptaḥ yat agnaye ca iti ṭupṭīkāyām ukta tvāt iha api
devatā vyavasthā pare vākye vākya antara prāptaḥ kālaḥ nu udyataḥ iti āghāra agnihotra adhikaraṇe
vakṣyamāṇa tvāt atra bhāṣye yat agnaye ca ityasya eva agni prāpaka tvena upanyasta tvāt
ti brāhmaṇa vākyāt eva agni prāptiḥ uktā
tad nirāsāya āghāra agnihotra adhikaraṇa vārtika uktām māntravarṇikīm agni prāptim āha agniḥ jyotiḥ iti
tad upādāna pūrvaka nirāsa prakāraḥ ca eva kāreṇa sūcitaḥ kaustubhe draṣṭavyaḥ
yat agnaye ca ityasya devatā samarpaka tva śaṅkā tad parihāra ādi pūrvaka māntravarṇika devatā prāpti nirūpaṇam

original: nanu --- kathaṃ yadagnayeceti vākyābhyāṃ caturthyā prajāpaterdevatātvasya pratyakṣata eva vidhānena nairākāṅkṣye sati mantravarṇakalpyavidhināgnervidhānaṃ  #
analyzed: nanu katham yat agnaye ca iti vākyābhyām caturthyā prajāpateḥ devatā tvasya pratyakṣatas eva vidhānena nairākāṅkṣye sati mantra varṇa kalpya vidhinā agneḥ vidhānam
yujyate

original: kalpakatve 'pi vā caturthyā balavattvenāgnidevatābādha eva prasajyate ityāśaṅkānirāsāyāha ta0---yadagnayeceti //
analyzed: kalpaka tve vā caturthyā balavat tvena agni devatā bādhaḥ eva prasajyate iti āśaṅkā nirāsāya āha
yadi api agnaye iti caturthī upātta kārakasya na ca arthe nvaya saṃbhavaḥ
tathā api agnaye iti padasya vakṣyamāṇa rītyā upalakṣaka tvena anuvādaka tvāt tad samabhivyāhārasya
tātparya grāhaka tva kalpanayā arthāt tad samuccaya siddheḥ na caśabdasya arthena anvayaḥ iti
sāyam prātar kālīna devatā samuccaya viśiṣṭā iti anena sūcitam
prajāpati devatayā agni bādha śaṅkā parihārau
etena pūrva pravṛtta agni vidhim apekṣya vidhīyamānaḥ prajāpatiḥ utpatti śiṣṭa guṇa avaruddhe

original: utpannaśiṣṭa iva nātideśaṃ labhate agneḥ prajāpatiṃ prati śeṣatvāpattiśceti varadarājoktaśaṅkā --- apāstā,
analyzed: utpanna śiṣṭaḥ iva na atideśam labhate agneḥ prajāpatim prati śeṣa tva āpattiḥ ca iti varadarāja ukta śaṅkā apāstā

original: anyataḥ prāptahomābhiṣavasamānakartṛkatvavidhinā homābhiṣavayorbhakṣaṇāṅgatvavat ihāpi anyato 'ṅgatvenāvadhṛtāgnisamuccaya- viśiṣṭatadvidhānopapattestadaprasakteḥ
analyzed: anyatas prāpta homa abhiṣava samāna kartṛka tva vidhinā homa abhiṣavayoḥ bhakṣaṇa aṅga tva vat iha api anyatas ṅga tvena avadhṛta agni samuccaya viśiṣṭa tad vidhāna upapatteḥ tad aprasakteḥ
atas eva paraspara samuccita devatā vidhānāt na paraspara bādhaka tā api
miśra mantra viniyoga vaiyarthya śaṅkā parihārau
miśrayoḥ api tat iti

original: nacaivaṃ kevalaliṅgakamantrapāṭhādevopāṃśuyāje viṣṇvādīnāmivāgneḥ sūryasya ca prāptestadviniyogavaiyarthyam,
analyzed: na ca evam kevala liṅgaka mantra pāṭhāt eva upāṃśuyāje viṣṇu ādīnām iva agneḥ sūryasya ca prāpteḥ tad viniyoga vaiyarthyam
tad tad kālīna prayoga viṣaya vyavasthā ārthatvena sārthakyāt

original: evaṃ miśraliṅgamantravidhyorapi ubhayadevatāprakāśakatayā kāladvaye 'vyavasthāprāptau vyavasthārthatvena sārthakyamanusandheyam //
analyzed: evam miśra liṅga mantra vidhyoḥ api ubhaya devatā prakāśaka tayā kāla dvaye vyavasthā prāptau vyavasthā artha tvena sārthakyam anusandheyam
agneḥ pūrvā āhutiḥ ityādi krama vidhi upapatti pūrvaka samuccaya vi śiṣṭa prajāpati vidhāna upapattiḥ

original: nanu caśabdārthasya prajāpateśca vidhāne vākyabheda ityata āha --- caśabdopasthiteti //
analyzed: nanu caśabda arthasya prajāpateḥ ca vidhāne vākya bhedaḥ iti atas āha caśabda upasthitā iti
etena vākya bheda āpatteḥ yat agnaye ca iti vākya dvaye viśiṣṭa karma antara vidhiḥ api pūrvapakṣi uktaḥ nirastaḥ
karma antara vidhau tatra liṅgāt eva ubhaya devatā liṅgaka śuddha mantrayoḥ prāptatvena tad viniyojaka vidhi dvaya vaiyarthya āpatteḥ ca

original: nacaiva “magneḥ pūrvāhutiḥ prajāpateruttare“ti kramavidhyanyathānupapattyaiva samuccayasiddheretatsamuccayavidhānaṃ vyartham, na,
analyzed: na ca eva m agneḥ pūrvā āhutiḥ prajāpateḥ uttarā iti krama vidhi anyathā anupapattyā eva samuccaya siddheḥ etat samuccaya vidhānam vyartham na
vaikalpika tve pi prayoga bhedena pūrva uttara bhāva vidhāyaka tva upapatteḥ
atas ekasmin prayoge samuccaya vidhāna upapatteḥ

original: tayośca “yadagnayece” ti pāṭhakramādeva kramasiddheḥ kramavākyamanuvāda eva //
analyzed: tayoḥ ca yat agnaye ca iti pāṭha kramāt eva krama siddheḥ krama vākyam anuvādaḥ eva
yat tu atra tatas ca brāhmaṇena agni sūryayoḥ śuddhayoḥ devatā tva vidhānāt jyotiṣṭva guṇa viśiṣṭa vidhiḥ iti
nyāyasudhā grantha svārasya bhrameṇa māntravarṇika devatā vidhi pakṣe jyotiṣṭva ādi guṇa viśiṣṭayoḥ eva agni sūryayoḥ devatā tvam iti
prakāśa kāraiḥ uktam

original: ga0tat na; upāṃśuyāje viṣṇurupāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ prajāpatirupāṃśu yaṣṭavya iti vākyaśeṣe
analyzed: na upāṃśuyāje viṣṇuḥ upāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ prajāpatiḥ upāṃśu yaṣṭavyaḥ iti vākya śeṣe
śuddhānām eva viṣṇu ādīnām saṃkīrtanāt māntravarṇika vidhi kalpanāyām api guṇa viśiṣṭayoḥ devatā tva akalpana vat iha api
dhūmaḥ eva agneḥ divā dadṛśe agneḥ pūrva āhutiḥ yat agnaye ca iti vākya śeṣe śuddhayoḥ eva
saṃkīrtanāt guṇa viśiṣṭayoḥ devatā tva akalpanayā lāghavāt śuddhayoḥ eva tad upapatteḥ
agnihotra pada nāma tva upasaṃhāraḥ
atas gnihotra vākye śāstra antara prāpta agni devatāka tva yogena api agnihotra pada pravṛtteḥ
saṃbhavāt asādhāraṇa para tā jñāpaka abhāve ca dhātvartha vidhānasya saṃbhavataḥ tyāga ayogāt na
homa anuvādena guṇa vidhiḥ

original: śuddhadhātvarthavidhānasaṃbhave viśiṣṭavidhergurubhūtasyāśrayaṇaṃ na yuktamityabhipretya nāma dheyatvamupasaṃharati --- ataśceti //
analyzed: śuddha dhātvartha vidhāna saṃbhave viśiṣṭa vidheḥ guru bhūtasya āśrayaṇam na yuktam iti abhipretya nāma dheya tvam upasaṃharati atas ca iti
agnihotra pade saptamī bahuvrīhi caturthī tatpuruṣa khaṇḍanena ṣaṣṭhī tatpuruṣa vyavasthāpanam
atra bhāṣyakṛtā yasmin agnaye hotram homaḥ tat agnihotram iti ukteḥ vyadhikaraṇa caturthī bahuvrīhiḥ āśritaḥ
nyāyasudhā kṛtā agneḥ hetram yasmin iti ṣaṣṭhī bahuvrīhiḥ
tatra ubhayatra api lakṣaṇā
na tu gatiḥ spaṣṭā
taittirīyaiḥ āmnāyamāna anta udātta svara anupapattiḥ api

original: ataḥ svaralakṣaṇānugataḥ ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣa eva hotraśabdaṃ bhāve vyutpādya āśrayituṃ yukta iti sūcayituṃ viśeṣato 'gnerhetraṃ iti vyutpattipradarśanaṃ  #
analyzed: atas svara lakṣaṇa anugataḥ ṣaṣṭhī tatpuruṣaḥ eva hotra śabdam bhāve vyutpādya āśrayitum yuktaḥ iti sūcayitum viśeṣataḥ gneḥ hetram iti vyutpatti pradarśanam
kṛtam

original: tatra yadyapi kātyāyanamate prakṛtivikṛtibhāvābhāve 'pi aśvaghāsādipade ivehāpi caturthīsamāsa eva yuktaḥ;
analyzed: tatra yadi api kātyāyana mate prakṛti vikṛti bhāva abhāve aśva ghāsa ādi pade iva iha api caturthī samāsaḥ eva yuktaḥ

original: tathāpi mahābhāṣyakāreṇa tanmattapratyākhyānāvasare 'śvaghāsādipade 'pi ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣasyaivāśrayaṇāt ihāpi tadāśrayaṇe na ko 'pi doṣaḥ /
analyzed: tathā api mahābhāṣyakāreṇa tad matta pratyākhyāna avasare śvaghāsa ādi pade ṣaṣṭhī tatpuruṣasya eva āśrayaṇāt iha api tad āśrayaṇe na kaḥ doṣaḥ
na ca pūrvapakṣe iva saṃbandha viśeṣa aprasiddhiḥ
siddhānte anyatas prāpta agni devatākatva anuvādaka tvena anyatas siddha devatā tva rūpa viśeṣeṇa ṣaṣṭhī upapatteḥ

original: pūrvapakṣe tu tasyādhunaiva vidheyatvānna pūrvaṃ saṃbandhaviśeṣeḥ saṃbhavatīti vaiṣamyam /
analyzed: pūrvapakṣe tu tasya adhunā eva vidheya tvāt na pūrvam saṃbandha viśeṣeḥ saṃbhavati iti vaiṣamyam
yadi api prakāśakāraiḥ caturthī tatpuruṣaḥ upi uktaḥ
tathā api tasya kartṛ karaṇe kṛtā bahulam iti sūtra gata bahula grahaṇa siddhasya ananya gati tvena āśrayaṇa apekṣayā asya eva

original: tatpuruṣasya yuktatvaṃ matvā pūrvapade lakṣaṇāpattimapi lakṣaṇasvarānanugatasamāsāpekṣayā
analyzed: tatpuruṣasya yukta tvam matvā pūrva pade lakṣaṇa āpattim api lakṣaṇa svara ananugata samāsa apekṣayā
jyāyaḥ tvena aṅgīkṛtya pūjya pādaiḥ ayam eva ādṛtaḥ
yaḥ tu nyāyaprakāśe saptamī bahuvrīhiḥ api āśritaḥ
tasya svara anugatasya api dūṣaṇam kaustubhe draṣṭavyam
atra ca hotra padasya dravya para tve agni saṃbandhi dravyavatva prakāraka bodha janaka tve
nāmadheya arthasya dhātvartha avacchedaka tva saṃbhave pi hotra padasya bhāva para tve agnihotra ākhya homasya
na dhātvartha avacchedaka tvam saṃbhavati
rūpa antara abhāvena svasmin svasya eva avacchedaka tva anupapatteḥ

original: na hi saṃbhavati agnisaṃbandhihomena homeneṣṭaṃ kuryāditi /
analyzed: na hi saṃbhavati agni saṃbandhi homena homena iṣṭam kuryāt iti
ataeva bhāṣyakāra nyāya sudhākāra ādibhiḥ dravya para tvam āśritam

original: tathācātra hotraśabdasya dravyaparatayā lakṣaṇayā dadhyādidravyasaṃbandhyarthakatvena prakāśakāroktaḥ ṣaṣṭhītatpuruṣapakṣa eva yuktaḥ;
analyzed: tathā ca atra hotra śabdasya dravya para tayā lakṣaṇayā dadhi ādi dravya saṃbandhi arthaka tvena prakāśakāra uktaḥ ṣaṣṭhī tatpuruṣa pakṣaḥ eva yuktaḥ
tathā api asmin pakṣe hotra pade lakṣaṇa āpatteḥ
agni devatāka homa tva rūpa rūpa antara prakāraka homa viśeṣyaka pratīti janaka tvena dhātvartha avacchedaka tva upapatteḥ bhāva vyutpannaḥ eva āśritaḥ hotra śabdaḥ

original: tatra ca juhotipadenaiva viśeṣyābhidhānāt viśeṣyaparamapyagnihotrapadaṃ viśeṣyāṃśe 'nuvādakamityadoṣaḥ //
analyzed: tatra ca juhoti padena eva viśeṣya abhidhānāt viśeṣya param api agnihotra padam viśeṣya aṃśe nuvādakam iti adoṣaḥ
sūrya home pi prātaḥkālike gnihotra pada pravṛtti upapādanam
yadi api ca āhavanīye homaḥ na aparayoḥ iti gārhapatya anvāhāryapacanayoḥ hema niṣedhāt āhavanīya
eva āhuti dvaya vidhānena prātar heme greḥ avidhānāt na idam agni devatāka homa tvam pravṛtti nimittam saṃbhavati

original: tathāpi “dve āhavanīye juhoti catastro gārhapatye catastro 'nvāhāryapacane” iti daśāhutipakṣe,
analyzed: tathā api dve āhavanīye juhoti catastraḥ gārhapatye catastraḥ nvāhāryapacane iti daśa āhuti pakṣe

original: “dve āvanīye dve gārhapatye dve anvāhāryapacane” iti ṣaḍāhutipakṣe ca prātarhemepi
analyzed: dve āvanīye dve gārhapatye dve anvāhāryapacane iti ṣaṣ āhuti pakṣe ca prātar hema ipi
gārhapatya anvāhāryapacanayoḥ agnaye gṛhapataye svāhā agnaye saṃveśa pataye svāhā ityādi māntravarṇika agni devatya homa sadbhāvāt agni
hotra śabda pravṛttiḥ na anupapannā
prakāra antareṇa agnihotra padasya prātar heme pravṛtti nirūpaṇa pūrvaka nāmadheya tva upasaṃhāraḥ

original: vastutastu --- ekasyaivāgnihotrahomasya “sāyaṃ ca prātaśca juhotī“ti vākyena prayogadvayavidhānāttasya
analyzed: vastutas tu ekasya eva agnihotra homasya sāyam ca prātar ca juhoti iti vākyena prayoga dvaya vidhānāt tasya
jyotiṣṭoma vat kāla bhede karma bheda abhāvāt vijātīya homa tva avacchinne agni devatāka tvasya
sāmānādhikaraṇyena sattva ādi uktā eva tad pada pravṛttiḥ iti
vakṣyate ca eka deśa pravṛtti nimittena api tad prakhya nyāyena nāmadheya upapattiḥ vaiśvadeva adhikaraṇe
atiprasaṅga nirākaraṇam udbhid pada vat eva jñeyam
atas siddham tad prakhya nyāyena agnihotra padam nāma dheyam
tasya eva agnihotra saṃjñakasya karmaṇaḥ phala nimitta vākyayoḥ upapādanāt tad saṃbandhaḥ iti
siddhānta anuguṇam sūtra yojanam
atra ca sūtre yasmin guṇa upadeśaḥ iti sūtrāt yasmin iti

original: “apivā nāmadheya” miti tatpūrvasūtrācca nāmadheyamityanuṣajya tasya vidhitsitasya guṇasya prakhyaṃ prakhyāpakamanyacchāstraṃ yasmin tadagnihotrādipadaṃ  #
analyzed: api vā nāmadheyam iti tad pūrva sūtrāt ca nāmadheyam iti anuṣajya tasya vidhitsitasya guṇasya prakhyam prakhyāpakam anyat śāstram yasmin tat agnihotra ādi padam
nāmadheyam iti arthaḥ
caturgṛhīta vākyāt dravyasya mantra varṇāt devatāyāḥ ca lābhāt āghāra padasya kṣaraṇa ātmaka pravṛtti nimittena homa nāmadheya tva upapādanam
āghāra pade pi nāmadheya tvam sādhayati evam iti
caturgṛhītam vā iti anena ca iti

original: asya vākyasyāyamarthaḥ --- yadetajjauhavaṃ caturgrahaṇasaṃskṛtamabhūttasya tatsaṃbandhyāghārasaṃjñakamāghāraṇaṃ kṛtvā ito 'smāt prācīnaṃ prathamaṃ  #
analyzed: asya vākyasya ayam arthaḥ yat etat jauhavam caturgrahaṇa saṃskṛtam abhūt tasya tad saṃbandhi āghāra saṃjñakam āghāraṇam kṛtvā itas smāt prācīnam prathamam
trīn trīn prayājān yajati iti
atra ca balavat pratyabhijñānena āghāra vākya vihitasya prakṛtasya eva āghāraṇa ākhya karmaṇaḥ
prayāja artha jauhava caturgṛhīta eka deśa saṃbandhaḥ vidhīyate
tena na āghāraṇa antara vidhiḥ

atas eva caturgṛhīta saṃbandha para tvena anya artha tvāt āghāra padasya nāma tvāt ananya ākṣipta śaktikena āghāram āghārayati iti anena eva devatā uddeśa pūrvaka dravya tyāga prakṣepa rūpa homasya abhidhānam

original: caturgṛhītavākyenājyarūpasya dravyasya māntravarṇikyā devatāyāśca lābhādāghārayatinā lakṣaṇayā tadupapatteḥ /
analyzed: caturgṛhīta vākyena ājya rūpasya dravyasya māntravarṇikyāḥ devatāyāḥ ca lābhāt āghārayatinā lakṣaṇayā tad upapatteḥ

original: tatra cāghārapadaṃ homasya prakṣepāṃśena kṣaraṇātmakatvāt kṣaraṇātmakapravṛttinimittena nāmadheyamiti pravṛttinimittabhedāt na tadaikyamādāya  #
analyzed: tatra ca āghāra padam homasya prakṣepa aṃśena kṣaraṇa ātmaka tvāt kṣaraṇa ātmaka pravṛtti nimittena nāmadheyam iti pravṛtti nimitta bhedāt na tad aikyam ādāya
vaiyarthyam āśaṅkanīyam
kṣaryamāṇa dravyaka tvam āghāra pada pravṛtti nimittam iti somanātha mata khaṇḍanam
yat tu caturgṛhītam iti anena eva ājya prāpteḥ kṣaraṇa ātmaka tvam prāptam iti tad nimitta nāmadheya saṃbhavāt iti
śāstradīpikā svārasyam anurudhya ājyasya drava dravya tvena svatas kṣaraṇa ātmaka tvāt kṣaryamāṇa dravyaka tvam
pravṛtti nimittam ādāya āghāra padam nāmadheyam iti somanāthena uktam

original: tanna; ājyagatakṣaraṇātmakatāyā dhātunaiveha vidheyatvenājyaprāpteḥ kṣaraṇātmakatve hetutvāsaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: tat na ājya gata kṣaraṇa ātmaka tāyāḥ dhātunā eva iha vidheya tvena ājya prāpteḥ kṣaraṇa ātmaka tve hetu tva asaṃbhavāt
nahi idam agnihotra ādi pada vat ājya ādi guṇa yoga nimittam nāma
apitu dhātvartha gata kṣaraṇa ātmaka tva yogena iti tat eva pravṛtti nimittam yuktam
atas eva dvitīya vidhi prakāra āpatteḥ eva na sānnāyyīya payaḥ saṃskāra para tvam āghāra padasya
nā api pañcama vidhi prakāra āpatteḥ viniyoga bhaṅgena dravya viśiṣṭa āghāra vidhānam api
etena eva caturgṛhīta vākyena viśeṣa samarpaṇam iti api nirastam
tasya āghārya iti etāvatā eva abhīṣṭa siddhau tatra āghāram ityasya vaiyarthya āpatteḥ ca
atas yuktam nāmadheya tvam
āghāra yāgasya sannipatti ārāt upakāraka tvayoḥ sviṣṭakṛtaḥ iva sa upapatti kamirūpaṇam

original: ayaṃ ca yāgaḥ sviṣṭakṛdiva tyāgāṃśenārādupakārako 'pi prakṣepāṃśenādyaprayājatrayasādhanībhūtājyasaṃskārakatvāt sannipatyopakārakopi svīkriyate,
analyzed: ayam ca yāgaḥ sviṣṭakṛt iva tyāga aṃśena ārāt upakārakaḥ api prakṣepa aṃśena ādya prayāja traya sādhanībhūta ājya saṃskāraka tvāt sannipatya upakārakaḥ api svīkriyate
sannipatya upakāraka tva saṃbhave ārāt upakāraka tva kalpanasya tadvat evān nyāyya tvāt

original: ataeva --- tasyāghāramiti saṃbandhasāmānyaparāpi ṣaṣṭhyājyasya yajannitivanna guṇatvaparā;
analyzed: ataeva tasya āghāram iti saṃbandha sāmānya parā api ṣaṣṭhī ājyasya yajan iti vat na guṇa tva parā
anyatra prayāja traye viniyuktasya anyatra viniyoga ayogāt
apitu bhāvi upayogi tvāt prādhānya parā eva

original: ataścāghārottaramapi jauhavanāśe prayājanārthaṃ tadutpādane punarāghārakaraṇaṃ vikṛtiṣu vācanikaprayājaparyudāse uttarāghāranivṛttiḥ //
analyzed: atas ca āghāra uttaram api jauhava nāśe prayājana artham tad utpādane punar āghāra karaṇam vikṛtiṣu vācanika prayāja paryudāse uttara āghāra nivṛttiḥ
saṃskāra karmaṇaḥ pi āghāra nāma tva prayojanam
na ca evam saṃskāra karma tve tasya saṃskārya nirūpya tvena eva avaccheda siddheḥ nāmadheya ānarthakyam
sati api avacchedaka antare nāma āmnāna vaśena etad avacchinnasya eva abhyudaya śiraska tva kalpanayā aṃśum gṛhṇāti iti vat saṃskāra karmaṇi api nāma arthavatva upapatteḥ iti
abhighāraṇasya ārāt upakāraka tva mātram iti sva siddhāntasya pūrvatana mata prayojana ādi nirasana pūrvakam sopapattikam upapādanam
vastutas tu saṃskāra karma tve dravya saṃbandha aṃśe pi apūrva vidhi tva āpatteḥ niyama vi
dhi lāghava anurodhena tasya iti ṣaṣṭhyā guṇa tva mātram aṅgīkṛtya ārāt upakāraka tvam eva prayāja ādi vat yuktam āśrayitum
atas eva devatā uddeśa prakṣepa dravya tyāga samudāya rūpa homa padāthrasya avayava bheda kalpanayā bhāvi upayoga aṅgīkaraṇam api na yuktam
sviṣṭakṛt ādau tu dṛṣṭārtha tvam dvitīyā śruti balāt atas tad āśrayaṇam

original: iha tu saṃskārakarmatve 'pi adṛṣṭakalpanāyā āvaśyakatvāddravyabhedāṅgīkaraṇaṃ niṣpramāṇakam /
analyzed: iha tu saṃskāra karma tve pi adṛṣṭa kalpanāyāḥ āvaśyaka tvāt dravya bheda aṅgīkaraṇam niṣpramāṇakam
atas tuṣa upavāpa vat para prayukta dravya upajīvi tve pi saṃskāra karma tva abhāvāt na ukta phala siddhiḥ

original: vikṛtiṣu vācanikaparyudāse paraṃ yatkiñcidājyenāghārakaraṇe 'pi na jauhavājyanāśe;
analyzed: vikṛtiṣu vācanika paryudāse param yat kiñcid ājyena āghāra karaṇe na jauhava ājya nāśe
kapāla vat para prayukta tvāt

original: paraprayuktatvaṃ ca caturgṛhītavākye etacchabdena prayājatrayasādhanatvānuvādavaiyarthyabhiyāvagatamiti na kiñcidanupapannam /
analyzed: para prayukta tvam ca caturgṛhīta vākye etad śabdena prayāja traya sādhanatva anuvāda vaiyarthya bhiyā avagatam iti na kiñcid anupapannam

original: ataeva --- bhāṣye pradhānakarmatvameva spaṣṭamuktamiti pārthasārathimatānuyāyinaḥ prakāśakārāḥ /
analyzed: ataeva bhāṣye pradhāna karma tvam eva spaṣṭam uktam iti pārthasārathi mata anuyāyinaḥ prakāśakārāḥ

original: taduktaṃ śāstradīpikāyām --- “dṛṣṭaṃ ca saṃskārāṇāmapi nāmadheyamaṃśuṃ gṛhṇātyantaryāmaṃ gṛhṇātī“ti /
analyzed: tat uktam śāstradīpikāyām dṛṣṭam ca saṃskārāṇām api nāmadheyam aṃśum gṛhṇāti antaryāmam gṛhṇāti iti
na ca asya saṃskāra tvam
indraḥ ūrdhvaḥ adhvaraḥ iti āghārayati iti māntravarṇika indra devatā tvāt yāga siddheḥ iti
āghāra karmaṇaḥ saṃskāra karma tvam iti somanātha matasya śāstradīpikā mata viruddha tva varṇanam

original: atra ca yāgasyāśravaṇāt pūrvapakṣyuktaṃ āghārasya saṃskārarūpatvaṃ aṅgīkṛtyapi prathamato
analyzed: atra ca yāgasya aśravaṇāt pūrvapakṣi uktam āghārasya saṃskāra rūpa tvam aṅgīkṛti api

original: nāmadheyavaiyarthyaṃ parihṛtya spaṣṭameva nacāsya granthena tatpradūṣya yāgatvaprasādhanena
analyzed: nāmadheya vaiyarthyam parihṛtya spaṣṭam eva na ca asya granthena tat pradūṣya yāga tva prasādhanena
nāma tā anupapattiḥ parihṛtā iti gamyate

original: evaṃ sthite saṃskārakarmatvāṅgīkāreṇaiva prastarapraharaṇavadubhayarūpatātparyeṇaitadgranthavyākhyānaṃ somanāthakṛtaṃ kathamiva yuktamiti na  #
analyzed: evam sthite saṃskāra karma tva aṅgīkāreṇa eva prastara praharaṇa vat ubhaya rūpa tātparyeṇa etad grantha vyākhyānam somanātha kṛtam katham iva yuktam iti na
vidmaḥ

original: atraca prakṣepāṃśenārādupakārakatve 'pi sānnāyyāṅgabhūtendradevatāsmārakatvena sannipatyopakārakatvamāśaṅkya nirastaṃ kaustubhe tatraiva draṣṭavyam
analyzed: atra ca prakṣepa aṃśena ārāt upakāraka tve pi sānnāyya aṅga bhūta indra devatā smāraka tvena sannipatya upakāraka tvam āśaṅkya nirastam kaustubhe tatra eva draṣṭavyam
samidh ādi padānām api nāma tva upapādanam

original: evaṃ samidādipadamapi abhyāsādhikaraṇavakṣyamāṇarītyā mantravarṇaprāptasamiddevatākatvena pravṛttinimittena nirūḍhalakṣaṇayā nāmadheyamityāha  #
analyzed: evam samidh ādi padam api abhyāsa adhikaraṇa vakṣyamāṇa rītyā mantra varṇa prāpta samidh devatāka tvena pravṛtti nimittena nirūḍha lakṣaṇayā nāmadheyam iti āha
evam iti
ādi padena paurṇamāsī amāvāsyā ādīnām api nāmadheya tva saṃgrahaḥ
agnihotram ityādi dvitīyā tad bahuvacana upapattiḥ
pūrvapakṣi uktām dvitīya anupapattim pariharati sarvatra iti
asādhitasya karaṇa tva anupapatteḥ artha ākṣipta sādhyatvam ādāya anuvādinī dvitīya ekārtha samavāya saṃbandhena karaṇa tva lākṣikā iti arthaḥ

original: “samidho yajatī” tyatra bahuvacanaṃ tu “samidho bahvīriva yajatī“ti vākyaśeṣesamiddevatānāṃ bahutvāvagamāt tadanuvādakamiti na doṣaḥ //
analyzed: samidhaḥ yajati iti atra bahuvacanam tu samidhaḥ bahvīḥ iva yajati iti vākya śeṣe samidh devatānām bahutva avagamāt tad anuvādakam iti na doṣaḥ
pūrva uttara kalpa prayojanam prakāśa kārīya tad khaṇḍanam ca
prayojanam pūrva uttara pakṣa upanyāsena eva spaṣṭa tvāt na uktam
yat tu prakāśakāraiḥ pūrvapakṣe darvī homānām agni devatāka tvam
siddhānte na iti prayojanam uktam
tad pūrvapakṣa upapādana velāyām eva yatra āgneyaḥ mantraḥ paṭhitaḥ iti anena pūjya pādaiḥ nirasta prāyam iti upekṣyam
iti caturtham tatprakhyā adhikaraṇam
adhikaraṇam
tad vyapadeśam ca
śyenena abhicaran yajeta ityādau pūrva ukta bādhaka abhāvāt prasiddheḥ śyena ādi padānām guṇa vidhi tvam eva
prakṛta soma yāga āśritaḥ guṇaḥ phala uddeśena vidhīyate
viśiṣṭa karmāntaram vā

original: nacaivaṃ “yathā vai śyeno nipatyādatte evamayaṃ bhrātṛvyaṃ nipatyādatte“ityarthavāde svasyaiva svopamānupapattiḥ;
analyzed: na ca evam yathā vai śyenaḥ nipatya ādatte evam ayam bhrātṛvyam nipatya ādatte iti arthavāde svasya eva sva upamā an upapattiḥ
upakrama nirṇīta vidhi anurodhena upasaṃhāra stha arthavādasya anyathā neya tvāt

original: “te tadvilāsā iva tadvilāsā” ityādivadananvayālaṅkārasyābhede anuguṇatvācceti prāpte --- nāyamananvayālaṅkāraḥ;
analyzed: te tad vilāsāḥ iva tad vilāsāḥ ityādi vat ananvaya alaṅkārasya abhede anuguṇa tvāt ca iti prāpte na ayam ananvaya alaṅkāraḥ
tathātve sarveṣām arthavāda padānām upamāna antara abhāva lakṣaka tva āpatteḥ

original: tadvaraṃ bhūyo 'nugrahasya nyāyyatvāt upakramastha evaikasmin pade rūpakavidhayā
analyzed: tat varam bhūyas nugrahasya nyāyya tvāt upakrama sthe evā ekasmin pade rūpaka vidhayā

original: luptopamāvidhayā vā gauṇīṃ vṛttimaṅgīkṛtya nāmadheyatvaṃ dvitīyavidhiprakārāpādakaṃ yuktamāśrayitum /
analyzed: luptopamā vidhayā vā gauṇīm vṛttim aṅgīkṛtya nāmadheya tvam dvitīya vidhi prakāra āpādakam yuktam āśrayitum

original: arthavādastu rūpakādyapekṣitasādṛśyopapādanārthaḥ sanvinaiva lakṣaṇāṃ pūrṇopamālaṅkāravidhayā vidheyayāgastutyartho na virudhyate /
analyzed: arthavādaḥ tu rūpaka ādi apekṣita sādṛśya upapādana arthaḥ san vinā eva lakṣaṇām pūrṇa upamā alaṅkāra vidhayā vidheya yāga stuti arthaḥ na virudhyate
tat siddham caturbhiḥ eva prakāraiḥ sarvatra nāma tvam iti
iti pañcamam tad vyapadeśa adhikaraṇam
saṃgati nirdeśa pūrvaka viṣaya vākya upanyāsaḥ ca

original: tatprakhyaśāstratākhyapūrvanyāyātyayena pratyavasthānāt pratyudāharaṇasaṃgatiṃ spaṣṭatvādapradarśyaiva viṣayopanyāsapūrvakaṃ pūrvapakṣamāha  #
analyzed: tad prakhya śāstra tā ākhya pūrva nyāya atyayena pratyavasthānāt pratyudāharaṇa saṃgatim spaṣṭa tvāt a pradarśya eva viṣaya upanyāsa pūrvakam pūrvapakṣam āha
śyenena iti

original: ādipadena “athaiṣa sandaṃśenābhicaran yajeta” athaiṣa gavābhicaryamāṇo yajete“tyādivākyānāṃ saṃgrahaḥ /
analyzed: ādi padena atha eṣa sandaṃśena abhicaran yajeta atha eṣa gavā abhicaryamāṇaḥ yajeta ityādi vākyānām saṃgrahaḥ
atha eṣaḥ iti ānupūrvī śyena vākye prathamatas draṣṭavyā

original: atra bahuṣu bhāṣyādipustakeṣu “gavābhicaran yajete“ti vākyaṃ likhitaṃ dṛśyate,
analyzed: atra bahuṣu bhāṣya ādi pustakeṣu gavā abhicaran yajeta iti vākyam likhitam dṛśyate
tad anurodhena navīna grantheṣu api tathā
tathā api lekhaka pramādāt eva tat lekhanam draṣṭavyam
anyathā yathā gāvaḥ gopāyanti iti vākya śeṣa anvaya anupapatteḥ
yam uddiśya abhicāraḥ tasya yāgena gopana asaṃbhavāt yāga kartuḥ aprastuta gopana ukteḥ asaṃbhavāt
atas bhicaryamāṇaḥ iti eva yuktam
tadā ahi anya kṛta abhicāra karmībhūtasya yāga kartṛ tvāt para kṛtāt abhicārāt yāgena go vat rakṣaṇam asya yajamānasya bhavati iti upapadyate

original: ata evādhikaraṇamālāyāṃ śrīvidyāraṇyagurubhistathā somanāthena śāstradīpikāṭippaṇe abhicaryamāṇa ityeva dhṛtaṃ vākyam //
analyzed: atas eva adhikaraṇa mālāyām śrī vidyāraṇya gurubhiḥ tathā somanāthena śāstradīpikā ṭippaṇe abhicaryamāṇaḥ iti eva dhṛtam vākyam
udbhid citrā tad prakhya nyāyānām śyena vākye pravṛttyā pūrvapakṣa pravṛtti nirūpaṇam
udbhida ādi adhikaraṇa aviṣayatām darśayati pūrva ukta iti
na tāvat udbhid adhikaraṇa viṣaya tā

original: tatra guṇe karmaṇi ca tulyavadvṛttikānāmeva guṇaparatve matvarthalakṣaṇāpatternāmatvaṃ sādhitaṃ,
analyzed: tatra guṇe karmaṇi ca tulya vat vṛttikānām eva guṇa paratve matu artha lakṣaṇa āpatteḥ nāma tvam sādhitam

original: na tu dadhisomādipādānāṃ rūḍhānāmapīti tadvadevehāpi guṇavidhitvasaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: na tu dadhi soma ādi pādānām rūḍhānām api iti tadvat eva iha api guṇa vidhi tva saṃbhavāt
nā api vākya bheda rahita tvena citra anyāya viṣaya tā
