tad prakhya śāstra antara abhāvāt eva na pūrva adhikaraṇa viṣaya tā iti arthaḥ
ataeva dadhi soma ādi pada vat eva atyanta nirūḍha tvena prasiddheḥ pūrvapakṣa siddhiḥ iti āha prasiddheḥ iti
śyena ādi ityādi padena sandaṃśa go padayoḥ saṃgrahaḥ
jyotiṣṭoma ādi guṇa vidhiḥ iti śāstradīpikāyāḥ guṇa phala saṃbandha paratvam kevala guṇa vidhi tva para nyāya sudhā nirāsaḥ ādi padena aprakṛta viśvajit saṃgraha para somanātha khaṇḍanam

original: atra nyāyasudhākṛtā prasidhyādibhiḥ pūrvapakṣa udbhidādīnāmiveti dṛṣṭāntopādānājjyotiṣṭome guṇavidhiriti pūrvapakṣatātparyavarṇanaṃ kṛtaṃ,
analyzed: atra nyāyasudhā kṛtā prasidhi ādibhiḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ udbhida ādīnām iva iti dṛṣṭānta upādānāt jyotiṣṭome guṇa vidhiḥ iti pūrvapakṣa tātparya varṇanam kṛtam

original: tatphalapadavaiyarthyāpatteḥ viśiṣṭānuvāde ca vākyabhedāpatterayuktamiti sūcayannindriyakāmādhikaraṇanyāyena tadvidhitvaṃ samarthayati ---
analyzed: tad phala pada vaiyarthya āpatteḥ viśiṣṭa anuvāde ca vākya bheda āpatteḥ ayuktam iti sūcayan indriya kāma adhikaraṇa nyāyena tad vidhi tvam samarthayati
etena guṇa vidhiḥ jyotiṣṭoma ādiṣu iti śāstradīpikā gatasya ādi śabdasya
tirātraḥ iti atra aneka guṇa upādānena viśiṣṭa karma antara vidheḥ āvaśyaka tvāt tasya viśvajita

original: ādipadena saṃgraha iti somanāthakṛtaṃ vyākhyānaṃ --- apāstam;
analyzed: ādi padena saṃgrahaḥ iti somanātha kṛtam vyākhyānam apāstam
prakṛta karmaṇaḥ āśraya tva saṃbhave prakṛtasya tad kalpane pramāṇa abhāvāt

original: udbhidadhikaraṇetvaprakṛtalaukikakarmaṇi guṇavidhitvasyopakṣiptasya pratibandhottaraṃ dātumaprakṛtavaidikaviśvajidupanyāsaḥ kṛta iti spaṣṭameva  #
analyzed: udbhid adhikaraṇe tu aprakṛta laukika karmaṇi guṇa vidhi tvasya upakṣiptasya pratibandha uttaram dātum aprakṛta vaidika viśvajit upanyāsaḥ kṛtaḥ iti spaṣṭam eva  /
śāstradīpikāyām pratīyate

original: ata eva tadagre jyotiṣṭomasyaivāśrayatvābhiprāyeṇa pūrvapakṣopasaṃhāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva tad agre jyotiṣṭomasya eva āśraya tva abhiprāyeṇa pūrvapakṣa upasaṃhāraḥ kṛtaḥ

original: ata eva prakāśakāraiḥ “śyenasya sāmavaidikatvāttatra ca śākhābhedenānyasyāpi prakṛtatvasaṃbhavādādiśabda” ityādigranthena saṃbhavābhiprāyeṇādiśabdaḥ  #
analyzed: atas eva prakāśa kāraiḥ śyenasya sāmavaidika tvāt tatra ca śākhā bhedena anyasya api prakṛta tva saṃbhavāt ādi śabdaḥ iti ādi granthena saṃbhava abhiprāyeṇa ādi śabdaḥ
śāstradīpikā gataḥ vyākhyātaḥ

original: ataḥ prakṛtajyotiṣṭomāśritasya śyenapakṣyādiguṇasya phaloddeśena yuktaṃ vidhānam /
analyzed: atas prakṛta jyotiṣṭoma āśritasya śyena pakṣi ādi guṇasya phala uddeśena yuktam vidhānam

original: kāmyatvāccotpattiśiṣṭasyāpi somasya nityasya bādhanamapi nāyuktamiti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: kāmya tvāt ca utpatti śiṣṭasya api somasya nityasya bādhanam api na ayuktam iti bhāvaḥ
yadi tu na ca atra karmaṇi pravṛtti nimittam kiñcid asti
vati artha upādānena karmaṇi pravṛttau atyanta viprakṛṣṭā gauṇa tā syāt
tatra varam matu artha lakṣaṇā

original: sādhanaṃ hi pratītamatyantāvinābhāvāt svasādhyāṃ kriyāmakleśenaiva pratipādayati
analyzed: sādhanam hi pratītam atyanta avinābhāvāt sva sādhyām kriyām akleśena eva pratipādayati
vinā evam atup lopena iti vārtike gauṇī apekṣayā matu artha lakṣaṇāyāḥ jyāyas tva abhidhānāt phala uddeśena
guṇa vidhau tad aprasakteḥ vārtika kṛtaḥ na ayam pakṣaḥ sammataḥ
viprakṛṣṭa artha vidhānena
dhātu pārārthya āpatteḥ ca
lakṣaṇā guṇa vidhau iti siddhānta bhāṣya virodha āpatteḥ ca iti ālocyate
tadā udbhid ādīnām iva iti pūrvapakṣa bhāṣyasya guṇa vidhi tva mātra sāmye pi avirodhāt udbhid adhikaraṇe
viśiṣṭa vidheḥ pūrvapakṣita tva dyāthāśrute pi avirodham abhipretya vārtika anuguṇam viśiṣṭa karmāntara vidhānam api
pakṣa antareṇa āha viśiṣṭa iti
jyotiṣṭoma uddeśena kevala guṇa vidhau vārtika abhiprāya nirūpaṇa para nyāyasudhāyāḥ prakāśa kāraiḥ khaṇḍanam

original: etena --- “sādhanaṃ hī” ti vārtikagranthasya jyotiṣṭomoddeśena vidhīyamānasya śyenādestatsādhanatvapratīteḥ svasādhyalakṣakatvamuktami“ti nyāyasudhākṛtāṃ  #
analyzed: etena sādhanam hi iti vārtika granthasya jyotiṣṭoma uddeśena vidhīyamānasya śyena ādeḥ tad sādhanatva pratīteḥ sva sādhya lakṣaka tvam uktam iti nyāyasudhākṛtām
tad vyākhyānam apāstam
anuvāde matvartha lakṣaṇā bhāvasya śataśas upapādita tvena matvartha lakṣaṇā jyāyastva pratipādana para sakala vārtika granthasya asāmañjasya āpatteḥ

original: ato viśiṣṭakarmāntaravidhāna- pūrvapakṣa eva vārtikatātparyamiti prakāśakārāḥ //
analyzed: atas viśiṣṭa karmāntara vidhāna pūrvapakṣaḥ eva vārtika tātparyam iti prakāśa kārāḥ
guṇa phala saṃbandha pakṣasya iva viśiṣṭa vidhi pakṣasya api vārtika ārūḍha tvam
vastutas tu vidheyam stūyate vastu bhinnayā upamayā sadā
na hi tena eva tasya eva stutiḥ tadvat iti iṣyate

original: “guṇavidhāne ca śyenadravyaṃ vidhīyata” iti tadeva stotavyam /
analyzed: guṇa vidhāne ca śyena dravyam vidhīyate iti tat eva stotavyam

original: naca “tasyaivātmanaivopamānaṃ yukta“miti siddhāntavārtikagranthāt śyenākhyaguṇamātravidhānasyaiva pūrvapakṣo na tu viśiṣṭavidhānasya;
analyzed: na ca tasya eva ātmanā eva upamānam yuktam iti siddhāntavārtika granthāt śyena ākhya guṇa mātra vidhānasya eva pūrvapakṣaḥ na tu viśiṣṭa vidhānasya
siddhānte iva yāgena upamāna upameya bhāva upapatteḥ tad dūṣaṇa anupapatteḥ
jyotiṣṭoma uddeśena guṇa vidhi pūrvapakṣaḥ na upamāna upameya bhāva anupapattyā dūṣitaḥ pi tu gaurava prastuta tvāt eva

original: ata eva matvarthalakṣaṇopanyāsādviśiṣṭavidhipakṣo 'pyastu tatsammata ityabhipretyaiva pūjyapādaissamānakakṣādvayamapi darśitam /
analyzed: atas eva matu artha lakṣaṇa upanyāsāt viśiṣṭa vidhi pakṣaḥ api astu tad sammataḥ iti abhipretya eva pūjya pādaiḥ samāna kakṣā dvayam api darśitam
vārtike viśiṣṭa vidhi pakṣa nirāsaḥ tu sphuṭa tvāt na uktaḥ iti dhyeyam

original: (yathā vai śyena iti vākyaśeṣavirodhaḥ prathamapakṣa iti śaṅkā)
analyzed: yathā vai śyenaḥ iti vākya śeṣa virodhaḥ prathama pakṣe iti śaṅkā
na ca evam iti

original: ādyapakṣe “yathā vai śyena” ityarthavāde ayamiti prathamāntena vidheyaśyenasyaiva
analyzed: ādya pakṣe yathā vai śyenaḥ iti arthavāde ayam iti prathama antena vidheya śyenasya eva
parāmarśāt ekasmin bheda abhāve tad ghaṭita upamāna upameya bhāva asaṃbhavāt artha kalpanayā gauṇa tvena
nāma tvam eva yuktam iti āśaṅkā arthaḥ
anyathā neya tvāt iti
viśiṣṭa vidhi pakṣe yaṃ śabdasya śyena dravyaka yāga rūpa viśeṣya para tvam aṅgīkṛtya upamāna upameya
bhāva upapattau api iha rāma rāvaṇayoḥ yuddham rāma rāvaṇayoḥ iva i tyādau iva kālpanika avasthā ādi kṛta bheda kalpanayā upamāna antarā
bhāva lakṣaṇayā vā anyathā neyatvam iti arthaḥ
nanu ayam eva doṣaḥ iti āśaṅkā nirāsāya upakrama iti uktam
tathā ca upakrameṇa upasaṃhāra anyathā nayanam na doṣaḥ

original: na hyatra vidhyuddeśaḥ sandigdho yena yena vākyaśeṣeṇa nirṇīyeta /
analyzed: na hi atra vidhi uddeśaḥ sandigdhaḥ yena yena vākyaśeṣeṇa nirṇīyeta
etad abhāve somena yajeta ityādau iva guṇa vidhi tvasya tvayā api aṅgīkartavya tvāt iti arthaḥ
vastutas tu ayam śabdena samāna vibhaktika tvāt upamāna bhūta śyenasya eva parāmarśena abheda
eva upamāna antara abhāva dyotakasya upameyena upamāna tva kathana rūpa ananvaya alaṅkārasya upapatteḥ na
doṣaḥ iti āha te tad vilāsāḥ iva iti
na kevalam bhīti nitānta kāntiḥ nitambinī sā eva nitambinī iva

original: yāvadvilāsā iva lāsyavāsā” iti caraṇatrayamasya jñeyam //
analyzed: yāvat vilāsā iva lāsya vāsāḥ iti caraṇa trayam asya jñeyam
ananvaya alaṅkārasya dharma bhede pravṛttiḥ iti somanātha matasya bhinnayoḥ api aikya adhyāsena upapattyā khaṇḍanam
yat tu atra somanāthena uktam na ca atra ananvaya alaṅkāraḥ śaṅkā arhaḥ
ananvaye hi dharma aikyam āvaśyakam
iha tu matsya ādi ādāna bhrātṛvya ādāna rūpa dharma bhedena an anvaya aprasakteḥ

original: dharmabhede 'pyananvayāṅgīkāre “dharmārthakāmamokṣeṣu samaṃ prapede yathā tathaivāvarajeṣu vṛtti” mityādāvapi ananvayāpattyā dharmabhedanibandhaniyamocchedāpattiḥ
analyzed: dharma bhede pi ananvaya aṅgīkāre dharma artha kāma mokṣeṣu samam prapede yathā tathā eva avarajeṣu vṛtti m ityādau api ananvaya āpattyā dharma bheda nibandha niyama uccheda āpattiḥ
na ca evam iha dharma bheda nibandhana upamā eva astu iti vācyam
upamāna upameyayoḥ bhinna śabda nirdeśe eka dharmika tva apratītyā dharma bheda nibandhana eka dharmika upamāyāḥ prakṛte iti
tat na bhinnayoḥ api dharmiṇoḥ sādṛśyena aikya vivakṣayā eka dharma tva upapatteḥ
itarathā siddhānte pi sādhāraṇa dharma aikya abhāvena upamāna upameya bhāva anupapatteḥ
dharma artha kāma mokṣe ṣu iti atra upamāna upameyayoḥ abheda abhāvāt eva ananvaya aprasakteḥ upamāna upameyayoḥ bhinna śabda nirdeśa
eka dharmika tva apratītyā ityādi kalpanāyām dharma artha kāma mokṣeṣu ityādau dharma bheda nibandhana upama ukteḥ anucita tvāt ca

original: ata eva vārtike ananvayālaṅkāro yathā “rāmarāvaṇayoryuddhaṃ” ityādinā śaṅkitaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva vārtike ananvaya alaṅkāraḥ yathā rāma rāvaṇayoḥ yuddham ityādinā śaṅkitaḥ
atas śyena mātrasya eva phala uddeśe vidhāne nanvaya alaṅkāra vidhayā abhede pi upamāna upameya bhāva upapatteḥ viśiṣṭa vidhi pakṣe ca

original: sutarāṃ siddhānta iva tadupapatterna rūḍhityāgena nāmatvaṃ yuktam //
analyzed: sutarām siddhānte iva tad upapatteḥ na rūḍhi tyāgena nāma tvam yuktam
na ca viśiṣṭa vidhau matu artha lakṣaṇā eva doṣaḥ
tasyāḥ lakṣita lakṣaṇa apekṣayā iva gauṇī apekṣayā jyāyaḥ tvāt
gauṇyā hi abhidhayā avinābhūte pravṛttiḥ lakṣaṇā iṣyate

original: lakṣyamāṇaguṇairyogādvṛtteriṣṭā tu lakṣaṇā” iti tatsiddhisūtragatavārtikoktarītyā guṇalakṣaṇāyā ādhikyāt gurubhūtatvaṃ spaṣṭam /
analyzed: lakṣyamāṇa guṇaiḥ yogāt vṛtteḥ iṣṭā tu lakṣaṇā iti tad siddhisūtra gata vārtika ukta rītyā guṇa lakṣaṇāyāḥ ādhikyāt guru bhūta tvam spaṣṭam
api ca matu artha lakṣaṇāyām śrauta arthasya śyena ādeḥ lohita uṣṇīṣa ādi vat vākya arthe nvaya aparityāgāt itaratra tu

original: gauṇārthāvagame śrutyarthasyāvivakṣitasya vākyārthe 'nanvayācchrutipīḍeti saiva jyāyasīti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: gauṇa artha avagame śruti arthasya avivakṣitasya vākya arthe nanu ayāt śruti pīḍā iti sā eva jyāyasī iti bhāvaḥ
abhede upamāna upameya bhāva anupapattyā kālpanika bhedena api tad anupapatti ādinā ca śyena nāma tva siddhānta upakramaḥ
na ayam guṇa phala saṃbandha vidhiḥ
tathātve ṛthavāda avagata upamāna anupapatteḥ
yadi api ca iyam stutiḥ na atyanta svārtha satya tvam apekṣate
tathā api ālambana apekṣa tvāt na upamānasya bhedam vinā upapattiḥ
na ca aupacārika bheda kalpanā yuktā

original: tathātve ekasyā eva vyakteḥ kālabhedenopamānatvakalpanetāvadyayā śyenavyaktyā pūrvaṃ nipatya māṃsādanaṃ kṛtaṃ,
analyzed: tathātve ekasyāḥ eva vyakteḥ kāla bhedena upamāna tva kalpanā itāvadyayā śyena vyaktyā pūrvam nipatya māṃsa adanam kṛtam

original: tayā vairiṇo vyāpādanaṃ kriyate ityarthāpatternipatyādatta iti bhūtakālalakṣaṇā,
analyzed: tayā vairiṇaḥ vyāpādanam kriyate iti artha āpatteḥ nipatya ādatte iti bhūta kāla lakṣaṇā
yathā evam śabdābhyām samabhivyāhṛtayoḥ śyena pada sarvanāmnoḥ bhinna arthaka tvena pratīyamānayoḥ ekārtha tva kalpanā iti aneka doṣa āpatteḥ
evam ekasmin api kāle vyakti bhedena upamāna kalpanāyām śyena pada sarvanāmnoḥ śyena tva avacchinna upasthāpakayoḥ grāhya tad itara vyakti lakṣaka tva āpattiḥ
punar ca vidheya tā avacchedaka śyena tva avacchinnasya stuti abhāvaḥ iti aneka doṣa āpattiḥ
vastutas tu ananvaye na aupacārika bheda kalpanayā upamāna upameya bhāva kalpanam
rasa vighāta āpatteḥ
kintu upamāna abhāva lakṣaṇayā ananya anvita tva khyāpanam eva
atas ca atra api upamāna antara abhāva pratipādane nekeṣu padeṣu lakṣaṇa āpattiḥ tad apekṣayā ekasmin upakrama sthe

original: 'pi śyenapada eva nirūḍhalakṣaṇayā nāmatvāśrayaṇaṃ yuktamityabhipretya siddhāntamāha ---nāyamiti //
analyzed: pi śyena pade eva nirūḍha lakṣaṇayā nāmatva āśrayaṇam yuktam iti abhipretya siddhāntam āha na ayam iti
nyāyya tvāt iti
jaghanyānām api bhūyasām anugrahaḥ kartavyaḥ
mukhya anugrahaḥ tu sama saṃkhya viṣaye iti dvādaśe vakṣyamāṇa tvāt nyāyya tvam iti arthaḥ
atra ca bhinnayoḥ āhārya abheda kalpanā ātmaka rūpaka vidhayā gauṇī iti keṣāñcid matam anusṛtya āha rūpaka vidhayā iti
vede rūpaka vidhayā gauṇa vṛtti asaṃbhavena lupta upamā vidhayā nāma tva vyavasthāpanam
vastutas tu vede kalpaka puruṣa abhāvāt na kvāpi rūpakam

original: ata eva --- “yadyadhyāsena vaktṛṇāṃ gauṇī vṛttiḥ prakalpate /
analyzed: atas eva yadi adhyāsena vaktṛṇām gauṇī vṛttiḥ prakalpate

original: vede sā na kathañcitsyādadhyāropayiturvinā” iti vārtike tatsiddhisūtre samāropitatadbhāvo gauṇīti mataṃ --- nirastam /
analyzed: vede sā na kathañcid syāt adhyāropayituḥ vinā iti vārtike tad siddhi sūtre samāropita tad bhāvaḥ gauṇī iti matam nirastam
atas abheda āropa asaṃbhavāt sādhāraṇa dharma vāci pada abhāvāt vidhi gata śyena pade luptā upamā iti abhipretya pakṣa antaram āha luptā upamā iti
gauṇī vṛttiḥ iti anena śakti antara kalpanā āpattiḥ nirastā
yadi api gauṇī itas matu artha lakṣaṇā jyāyasī
tathā api vidhau tad āpattiḥ

original: mama tvanuvādabhūte nāmadheya iti vaiṣamyānna doṣaḥ //
analyzed: mama tu anuvāda bhūte nāmadheye iti vaiṣamyāt na doṣaḥ
dvitīya vidhi iti anena viśiṣṭa vidhi pakṣaḥ gaurava āpatteḥ nirastaḥ

original: evañca prasiddhaśyenātiriktaṃ tatsadṛśaṃ ca yāgarūpamabhicāraphalajanakaṃ śyenapadapratipādyamityetāvadavagate
analyzed: evam ca prasiddha śyena atiriktam tad sadṛśam ca yāga rūpam abhicāra phala janakam śyena pada pratipādyam iti etāvat avagate
jyotiṣṭomasya saṃjñā antara avarodhāt tatra anupapatteḥ saṃjñayā eva karma antara tva siddhiḥ

original: nirūḍhyaṅgīkāraprayojanaṃ tu “samānamitarat śyenene“tyādau prasiddhaśyenayāgopasthitireva na tu rūḍhyā śyenapakṣiṇo grahaṇam /
analyzed: nirūḍhi aṅgīkāra prayojanam tu samānam itarat śyenena ityādau prasiddha śyena yāga upasthitiḥ eva na tu rūḍhyā śyena pakṣiṇaḥ grahaṇam

original: naca yāgasya bhrātṛvyādānasādhanatvena śyenasādṛśyopapatteḥ vidheyavetasāvakastutyarthamapāṃ stutiriva yāgastutiḥ;
analyzed: na ca yāgasya bhrātṛvya ādāna sādhana tvena śyena sādṛśya upapatteḥ vidheya vetasa avaka stuti artham apām stutiḥ iva yāga stutiḥ
vidheya gatāyāḥ eva stuteḥ anyatra saṃcāra darśanāt
na ca yāga vidhau api tad viśeṣaṇa tayā dravyasya api vidheya tā upapattiḥ
sākāṅkṣasya upakramasya upasaṃhāra anusaraṇa upapādanam
etāvatā ca guṇa phala saṃbandha vidhāne viprakṛṣṭa vidhāna dhātu pārārthya āpattau viśiṣṭa vidhi aṅgīkāre

original: ca gauravāpattau ca dvitīyavidhiprakārāpādakatvoktyā sūcitāyāṃ yadi kaścidatropasaṃhāraprābalyamāpādayettaṃ
analyzed: ca gaurava āpattau ca dvitīya vidhi prakāra āpādaka tva uktyā sūcitāyām yadi kaścid atra upasaṃhāra prābalyam āpādayet tam
pratyāha arthavādaḥ tu iti
ayam arthaḥ na atra upasaṃhāra anurodhena upakrama anyathākaraṇam

original: kintu pūrvoktadoṣāpattyā lāghavena śyenanāmakayāgavidhāne niścite śyenaśabdasya yāganāmatvāya
analyzed: kintu pūrva ukta doṣa āpattyā lāghavena śyena nāmaka yāga vidhāne niścite śyena śabdasya yāga nāma tvāya
jyotiṣṭoma nāmnaḥ iva pravṛtti nimitta apekṣā anurodhena eva vākyaśeṣa upadarśita sādṛśya avalambanena
gauṇa tva aṅgīkaraṇam iti upakrama ākāṅkṣayā eva vākyaśeṣa anusaraṇam
atas eva yatra ca evam upakramasya ākāṅkṣā
tatra tad viruddha upasaṃhāra artha anusaraṇam na eva aṅgīkriyate

original: yathā --- avakābhiragniṃ vikarṣatītyatrāvakāśabdasya “āpo vai śāntā” ityarthavādānusāreṇa nāpsu lakṣaṇābhyupeyate,
analyzed: yathā avakābhiḥ agnim vikarṣati iti atra avakā śabdasya āpaḥ vai śāntāḥ iti arthavāda anusāreṇa na apsu lakṣaṇā abhyupeyate
guṇavāda sūtre eva stutiḥ iti vidhi stutyoḥ vaiyadhikaraṇya parihārāt
upasaṃhāra mātra prābalya vādinaḥ tatra api apsu lakṣaṇa āpattiḥ durvārā eva
atas tatra nirākāṅkṣasya na vākyaśeṣa anusaraṇam iti nā upasaṃhāra prābalya āpattiḥ iti
etat ca apekṣitā iti padena pūjya pādaiḥ dhvanitam
pakṣi paratve eva arthavāda āñjasye pi upakrame śyena nāma tva nirṇayāt tad anusāreṇa upasaṃhāra nayanam iti upakrama parākrama vāda gata viṣaya anuvādaḥ

original: yattu --- atropakramaparākramavāde pakṣiparatva evārthavādāñjasyaṃ yāgaparatve cānāñjasyamupapāditam,
analyzed: yat tu atra upakrama parākrama vāde pakṣi paratve eva arthavāda āñjasyam yāga paratve ca anāñjasyam upapāditam

original: tathāhi --- pakṣadvaye 'pi tāvattatropamānabhāgasya “yathā śyenaḥ pakṣī nipatya matsyādikamādatte ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tathā hi pakṣa dvaye pi tāvat tatra upamāna bhāgasya yathā śyenaḥ pakṣī nipatya matsya ādikam ādatte iti arthaḥ
tatra matsya ādikam iti asya anupādāne pi prasiddhasya eva dṛṣṭāntīkartavya tayā tad lābhāt
upameya bhāgasya tu evam ayam yajamānasya śatrum mārayati iti arthaḥ

original: pakṣiṇi yāgecobhayatrāpi śatrormukhyasya nipatyādānasyāsaṃbhavāt pakṣipakṣe phale yāge vā sādhanatvena viniyuktasya pakṣiṇaḥ śatrorādāne vyāpārāsaṃbhavāt
analyzed: pakṣiṇi yāge ca ubhayatra api śatroḥ mukhyasya nipatya ādānasya asaṃbhavāt pakṣi pakṣe phale yāge vā sādhana tvena viniyuktasya pakṣiṇaḥ śatroḥ ādāne vyāpāra asaṃbhavāt
yāga pakṣe kriyāyām nipatana ādāna kriyayoḥ sarvathā eva asaṃbhavāt ca

original: evañca vākyaśeṣasya pakṣiparatve yathā śyenapakṣī nipatya matsyādikamādatte evamayaṃ phale yāge vā viniyuktaḥ śyenaḥ pakṣī yajamānasya śatruṃ  #
analyzed: evam ca vākyaśeṣasya pakṣi para tve yathā śyena pakṣī nipatya matsya ādikam ādatte evam ayam phale yāge vā viniyuktaḥ śyenaḥ pakṣī yajamānasya śatrum
mārayati iti arthaḥ
atra śyena pakṣi niṣṭhayoḥ loka prasiddha matsya ādi ādāna vidhi uddeśa upātta dviṣat māraṇayoḥ eva upa māna upameya bhāvaḥ pratīyate

original: na tu śyenasyaiva śyeneneti nātra bhedena sādṛśyānupapattiḥ /
analyzed: na tu śyenasya eva śyenena iti na atra bhedena sādṛśya anupapattiḥ
yadi api tayoḥ sādhāraṇa dharmaḥ na upāttaḥ

original: tathāpi yathā jale svacchandaṃ viharato matsyasya śyenakṛtanipatyādānaṃ jhaṭityaśaṅkitopasthitaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: tathā api yathā jale svacchandam viharataḥ matsyasya śyena kṛta nipatya ādānam jhaṭiti a śaṅkita upasthitam bhavati
tathā tat kṛtam dviṣatām māraṇam api iti gamyamāna sādhāraṇa dharmaḥ sti eva
tathā ca kapyāsam puṇḍarīkam evam akṣiṇī ityādau iva gamyamāna sādhāraṇa dharmeṇa upamāna upameya bhāva nirdeśe na kadācid anupapattiḥ

original: avaśyaṃ ca tasya sādhāraṇadharmasya gamyamānatvaṃ pakṣāntare 'pyabhyupagantavyam /
analyzed: avaśyam ca tasya sādhāraṇa dharmasya gamyamāna tvam pakṣa antare pi abhyupagantavyam

original: anyathā dviṣanmāraṇamātrasya vidhyuddeśagatatvena vākyaśeṣāt dṛṣṭāntabalena tadavagataśaighryānavagame tataḥ pravṛttiviśeṣakarastutiviśeṣālābhaprasaṃgāt
analyzed: anyathā dviṣat māraṇa mātrasya vidhi uddeśa gata tvena vākyaśeṣāt dṛṣṭānta balena tad avagata śaighrya anavagame tatas pravṛtti viśeṣa kara stuti viśeṣa alābha prasaṃgāt

original: tathāca pracchannatayā gṛhaṃ praviśya pracchannatayaiva nirgate caitre tasya pracchannatayā gṛhapraveśamātraṃ jānānamanyaṃ prati yathā devadatto  #
analyzed: tathā ca pracchanna tayā gṛham praviśya pracchanna tayā eva nirgate caitre tasya pracchanna tayā gṛha praveśa mātram jānānam anyam prati yathā devadattaḥ
gṛham praviṣṭaḥ

original: tathaivāyaṃ nirgata iti vākyena devadattaniṣṭhayoreva praveśanirgamanayoḥ pracchannakṛtatvarūpagamyasādhāraṇadharmeṇopamānopameyabhāva ucyate,
analyzed: tathā eva ayam nirgataḥ iti vākyena devadatta niṣṭhayoḥ eva praveśa nirgamanayoḥ pracchanna kṛta tva rūpa gamya sādhāraṇa dharmeṇa upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ ucyate

original: na tu devadattasyeva devadatteneti mukhya evopamānopameyabhāvaḥ,
analyzed: na tu devadattasya iva devadattena iti mukhyaḥ eva upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ
tathā atra api iti upapadyate
ayam iti asya ca sannihita prathama anta pada ukta pakṣi paratve ārjavam lakṣyate
yāga paratve tu vākya śeṣa sthasya ayam ityasya vyavahita yajña mātra karaṇa parāmarśi tvena anārjava prasaṃgāt pakṣi yāgayoḥ ca āmukhyaḥ upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ
anugata sādhāraṇa dharma abhāvena mukhya sādṛśyasya asaṃbhavāt
pakṣiṇi matsya ādi karmakam mukhyam nipati ādānam
yāge bhrātṛvya karmakam māraṇam eva

original: tadevāśaṅkitopasthitikatvaguṇayogena tathopacaritaṃ mukhyaṃ nipatyādānamiti tatprayojyaṃ pakṣiyāgayoramukhyameva sādṛśyam /
analyzed: tat eva āśaṅkita upasthitika tva guṇa yogena tathā upacaritam mukhyam nipatya ādānam iti tat prayojyam pakṣi yāgayoḥ amukhyam eva sādṛśyam
naca yāga paratva pakṣe pi pakṣi yāga gatayoḥ matsya ādi ādāna bhrātṛvya māraṇayoḥ eva upamāna upameya tvam ucitam iti vācyam
tāvatā yāge śyena śabda pravṛtti nimittasya śyena sādṛśyasya alābhāt upasaṃhāra anusāreṇa śyena śabda gauṇa tva ukti ayogāt

original: evamāñjasye vidyamāne 'pi upakrame lāghavānusāreṇa yāgamātravidhinirvāhāya śyenaśabdasya
analyzed: evam āñjasye vidyamāne pi upakrame lāghava anusāreṇa yāga mātra vidhi nirvāhāya śyena śabdasya
yāga nāmadheya tva siddhaye pravṛtti nimitta ākāṅkṣāyām rūḍhasya tatra mukhya pravṛtti nimitta asaṃbhave
vākyaśeṣasya amukhya sādṛśya paratva kalpitam iti atra upakrama anusāreṇa upasaṃhāraḥ nītaḥ iti
arthavādasya śyena yāga ubhaya dṛṣṭānta dārṣṭāntika bhāvaḥ eva upapattyā upakrama parākrama khaṇḍanam
tat ayuktam
ayam iti sarvanāmnā śyenāt anyasya eva arthasya pratīyamāna tvena śyena parāmarśa ayogāt eka śyena niṣṭha kriyayoḥ upamāna upameya bhāva anupapatteḥ

original: sādhanatvena viniyuktavyaktyantaramādāyāyaṃśabdena parāmarśe śyenatvāvacchinnapratiyogitākabhedasya pratīyamānasya bādhāpatteḥ /
analyzed: sādhanatvena viniyukta vyakti antaram ādāya ayam śabdena parāmarśe śyena tva avacchinna pratiyogitāka bhedasya pratīyamānasya bādha āpatteḥ

original: yadyatra “yathā śyeno nipatyādatte evaṃ dviṣanta” mityetāvadeva syāttadekaśyenaniṣṭhakriyayoḥ saṃbhavedapi saḥ /
analyzed: yadi atra yathā śyenaḥ nipatya ādatte evam dviṣantam iti etāvat eva syāt tat eka śyena niṣṭha kriyayoḥ saṃbhavet api saḥ
na ca etat asti

original: ata eva dṛṣṭānte 'pi ayaṃpadasattve tanniṣṭhakriyayorupamānopameyabhāvo durupapāda eva /
analyzed: atas eva dṛṣṭānte pi ayam pada sattve tad niṣṭha kriyayoḥ upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ durupapādaḥ eva
ākare pi saṃbhavati tu bheda kalpanā iti uktvā aupacārika bheda kalpanā ityādinā pratīyamāna bheda nirvāhāya parākrāntam
tava api yathā evam śabdayoḥ api vyavahitena anvaya āpattyā sāmañjasya abhāvasya tulya tvāt ca
atas pratīyamāna bheda nirvāhāya yāga śyenayoḥ eva upamāna upameya bhāvaḥ samañjasaḥ

original: evañca pravṛttinimittasamarpakatayā vatyarthakavākyaśeṣasya svādhyāyavidhyavagataṃ dṛṣṭaṃ prayojanaṃ labhyate /
analyzed: evam ca pravṛtti nimitta samarpaka tayā vati arthaka vākyaśeṣasya svādhyāya vidhi avagatam dṛṣṭam prayojanam labhyate

original: tava tu anyathāpi stutau vatyarthenaiva prarocitamabhyudayakārītyevaṃ niyamādṛṣṭakalpanāpattiriti //
analyzed: tava tu anyathā api stutau vati arthena eva prarocitam abhyudaya kāri iti evam niyama adṛṣṭa kalpanā āpattiḥ iti

original: etacca yathaivaṃśabdābhyāṃ samabhivyāhṛtayoḥ śyonasarvanāmnorna bhinnārthatvena pratīyamānayorekārthatvakalpanetyādinā bhinnārthatvakathanena  #
analyzed: etat ca yathā evam śabdābhyām samabhivyāhṛtayoḥ śyona sarvanāmnoḥ na bhinna artha tvena pratīyamānayoḥ ekārtha tva kalpanā ityādinā bhinna artha tva kathanena
bimba pratibimba bhāva mūlaka pūrṇa upamā alaṅkāra vidhayā lakṣaṇām vinā eva yāga stuti artha tvam arthavādasya iti nirūpaṇam
vinā eva lakṣaṇām iti
upamāna antara abhāva lakṣaṇām vinā iti arthaḥ
pūrṇa upamā alaṅkāra vidhayā iti
atra ca pūrva ukta rīti āśaṅkita upasthita tva ādi guṇa yogena matsya ādi ādāna dviṣat māraṇayoḥ eka dharma tva vivakṣayā pūrṇopamatvam eṣṭavyam
yāge hi pravṛtti nimitta pratibandhaka aruci nirāsāya stutiḥ apekṣitā

original: dravye tu svataḥ pravṛttyabhāvāt na tatstutiratyantamapekṣyata iti tatstutyā tatsādhyayāgastutikalpaneti viprakarṣo viśeṣa iti yāgastutyartha  #
analyzed: dravye tu svatas pravṛtti abhāvāt na tad stutiḥ atyantam apekṣyate iti tad stutyā tad sādhya yāga stuti kalpanā iti viprakarṣaḥ viśeṣaḥ iti yāga stuti artha
iti anena sūcitam
sandaṃśa ādi nāma tva vyavasthāpanam

original: evaṃ sandaṃśādipadānāmapi “yathā ha durādānaṃ sandaṃśenādadītaivametenādatta” ityarthavāde taptāyaḥ piṇḍagrahaṇasādhanalohamayasandaṃśenopamānadaśarnānnāmadheyatvaṃ  #
analyzed: evam sandaṃśa ādi padānām api yathā ha durādānam sandaṃśena ādadīta evam etena ādatte iti arthavāde tapta ayaḥ piṇḍa grahaṇa sādhana loha maya sandaṃśena upamāna daśa ṛnāt nāmadheya tvam
jñeyam

original: apivā nāmadheyamityatra kva guṇavidhitvaṃ kva nāmadheyatvamiti koṣṭhaśodhanikārthamārambha iti pratijñātaṃ,
analyzed: api vā nāmadheyam iti atra kva guṇa vidhi tvam kva nāmadheya tvam iti koṣṭha śodhanika artham ārambhaḥ iti pratijñātam
tad nāma tve prakāra catuṣṭaya apekṣa tām sūcayitum upasaṃharati tat siddham iti
atra udbhid adhikaraṇe yaugika tvam eva nāmatā sādhakam

original: tadāpattyabhāve 'pi phale yāge vā guṇavidhipūrvapakṣasya yaugikatvenaiva nirāsena nāmatāprasādhanenāyuktatvāt,
analyzed: tad āpatti abhāve pi phale yāge vā guṇa vidhi pūrvapakṣasya yaugika tvena eva nirāsena nāmatā prasādhanena ayukta tvāt
matu artha lakṣaṇa āpatti mātreṇa soma ādau nāmatā anaṅgīkārāt ca
atas yaugika tvena saha cāturvidhyam jñeyam
ataeva śāstradīpikāyām yaugikasya iva uktam
nāma tve utpatti śiṣṭa balīyaḥ tvasya pañcama prakāra tā mata nirūpaṇam tad khaṇḍanañca
vaiśvadeva adhikaraṇa gata nyāya sudhā avalambanena utpatti śiṣṭa guṇa balīyaḥ tvasya api nāmadheya tve prakāra tvam icchanti kecid
yathā āhuḥ vaiśvadeva adhikaraṇe guṇa antara avaruddha tvāt na avakāśyaḥ paraḥ
na vaiṣamyāt tasmāt nāma eva yujyate iti
tad nirāsa sūcanāya eva kāraḥ
tad nirāsaḥ tatra eva nirūpayiṣyate
vaiśvadeva jyotiḥ ādi padānām yathāsaṃbhavam udbhida ādi adhikaraṇa viṣaya tva upapādanam
paunaruktya parihāraḥ ca
sarvatra iti anena etat uktam bhavati
yadi api atha eṣa jyotiḥ atha eṣa sarva jyotiḥ iti atra jyotiḥ ādi pade prathama nirdiṣṭe
dravyasya kratu vācaka pada samabhivyāhāra abhāve tad aṅga tvena viniyoga ayogāt prakaraṇena
ca siddha rūpasya aviniyogāt etena sahastra dakṣiṇena yajeta iti uttara vākya gata etad śabdena
pūrva vākya gata prathamā nirddiṣṭānām parāmarśena jyotiṣṭoma yāga anuvādena etad śabda upanīta tayā
guṇa para tā āśaṅkā bhavati

original: tathāpi tadanuvādena teṣāṃ guṇānāṃ sahastradakṣiṇāyāśca vidhāne vākyabhedāpatteścitrāpadavadeva na guṇaparatvam,
analyzed: tathā api tad anuvādena teṣām guṇānām sahastra dakṣiṇāyāḥ ca vidhāne vākya bheda āpatteḥ citrā pada vat eva na guṇa paratvam
apitu nāma tvam eva
vākya bheda āpādaka guṇa ādeḥ ca karma antara kalpanasya ucita tvāt

original: etadabhiprāyeṇāsminnadhikaraṇe te 'pi cavākyāntareṣu yadā tṛtīyānirdeśaṃ pratipadyante,
analyzed: etad abhiprāyeṇa asmin adhikaraṇe te ca vākya antareṣu yadā tṛtīyā nirdeśam pratipadyante

original: tadā vicāryanta iti vārtike tadvyapadeśādhikaraṇavicāryatvaṃ jyotirādipadānāmāpātataḥ
analyzed: tadā vicāryante iti vārtike tad vyapadeśa adhikaraṇa vicārya tvam jyotiḥ ādi padānām āpātataḥ
pratīyamānam api tad vyapadeśa rahita tvena ayuktam matvā jyotiḥ ādi śabdānām udbhida ādi adhikaraṇeṣu
yathāsaṃbhavam niveśaḥ bhaviṣyati iti abhiprāyeṇa nyāyasudhā kṛtā vyākhyātam
atas tatra api yuktam nāmadheya tvam
evam darvī homa vaiśvadeva ādi padānām api nāmadheya tvam tad prakhya nyāyena draṣṭavyam
vaiśvadeva adhikaraṇe tu tat eva vaiśvadeva padasya ākṣipya samādhīyate

original: aṣṭame tviha siddhameva nāmadheyatvam apūrvatādivicārārthaṃ prasaṅgāduktamiti na paunaruktyamiti /
analyzed: aṣṭame tu iha siddham eva nāmadheya tvam apūrva tā ādi vicāra artham prasaṅgāt uktam iti na paunaruktyam iti
prayojanam ādya pūrvapakṣe soma bādhena śyena pakṣiṇā jyotiṣṭoma anuṣṭhānam
dvitīya pakṣe prāṇi dravyaka tvāt agnīṣomīya vidhi antaḥ
siddhānte tu soma dravyakaḥ soma yāga vikṛtiḥ iti spaṣṭa tvāt na uktam
iti pañcamam tad vyapadeśa adhikaraṇam
adhikaraṇam
nāmadheye guṇa śruteḥ syāt vidhānam iti ced

original: pūrvamubhayatra viśiṣṭavidhipūrvapakṣe yāni dūṣaṇāni matvarthalakṣaṇādīni dattāni tānīha ākṣipyante /
analyzed: pūrvam ubhayatra viśiṣṭa vidhi pūrvapakṣe yāni dūṣaṇāni matu artha lakṣaṇa ādīni dattāni tāni iha ākṣipyante
yadi hi yāgasya kāraka tvam syāt
tatas soma ādīnām kāraka antarāṇām tad anvaya anupapatteḥ bhavet matu artha lakṣaṇā
ubhaya śiṣṭa bhāvanā vidhānam vā
na tu etat asti
yāgasya kriyā rūpa tva aṅgīkārāt

original: ataśca tasmin sarvakārakāṇāṃ bhāvanāvadeva vinaiva matvarthalakṣaṇāṃ vinaiva ca vairūpyaṃ saṃbandhopapattiḥ /
analyzed: atas ca tasmin sarva kārakāṇām bhāvanāvat eva vinā eva matu artha lakṣaṇām vinā eva ca vairūpyam saṃbandha upapattiḥ

original: yāgasya ca kriyātve 'pi saṃbandhasāmānyena bhāvanānvayo na virudhyate /
analyzed: yāgasya ca kriyā tve pi saṃbandha sāmānyena bhāvanā anvayaḥ na virudhyate
bhāvanā vā vaiyākaraṇa vat atiriktā na eva aṅgīkriyate
atas ca udbhid ādiṣu api sarvatra guṇa vidhi tvam eva

original: vājapeyodāharaṇaṃ tu mūle guṇasūtrānurodheneti prāpte --- pacatītyasya pākaṃ karoti pākena karotīti vivaraṇāddhātvarthasya karmatvakaraṇatvānyatarakārakatvenaiva  #
analyzed: vājapeya udāharaṇam tu mūle guṇa sūtra anurodhena iti prāpte pacati ityasya pākam karoti pākena karoti iti vivaraṇāt dhātvarthasya karmatva karaṇa tva anyatara kāraka tvena eva
bhāvanā anvayaḥ
bhāvanā ca yathā atiriktā tathā vakṣyate
atas ca itara kārakāṇām dhātvartha anvaya anupapatteḥ agatyā ubhaya viśiṣṭa bhāvanā vidhānam soma ādau aṅgīkṛtam
prācīna rītyā vā matu artha lakṣaṇā

original: anyathā śrutyaiva phalaguṇayoryāgānvaye phalānvayārthaṃ yāgasyopādeyatvavidheyatvaguṇatvāni guṇānvaye coddeśyatvānuvādatvaprādhānyānīti viruddhatrikadvayāpatteḥ
analyzed: anyathā śrutyā eva phala guṇayoḥ yāga anvaye phala anvaya artham yāgasya upādeya tva vidheya tva guṇa tvāni guṇa anvaye ca uddeśya tva anuvāda tva prādhānyāni iti viruddha trika dvaya āpatteḥ
upādeya tva ādi nirukti ādikam ca kaustubhe draṣṭavyam
atas matu artha lakṣaṇa ādi bhiyā viśiṣṭa vidhi anupapatteḥ nāmadheya tvam eva udbhida ādīnām
iti ṣaṣṭham viśiṣṭa vidhi ākṣepa adhikaraṇam vājapeya adhikaraṇam
adhikaraṇa catuṣṭayena asya ākṣepikām saṅgatim darśayati viśiṣṭa vidhi pakṣe iti
yāga anuvādena guṇa vidhi pakṣasya api upalakṣaṇam
agre matu artha lakṣaṇa ādīni iti ādi śabda bahuvacanayoḥ upādānāt
matu artha lakṣaṇa ādīni iti

original: (tantrasaṃbandhenākṣepo yatra yatra pūrvanyāyaviṣayeṣu bhavati tasya sarvasyodāharaṇatvopapādanam)
analyzed: tantra saṃbandhena ākṣepaḥ yatra yatra pūrva nyāya viṣayeṣu bhavati tasya sarvasya udāharaṇa tva upapādanam
ādi padena yāga anuvādena guṇa vidhāna pūrvapakṣe yat phala pada ānarthakyam

original: phaloddeśena tadvidhau guṇapadānarthakyamiti doṣadvayaṃ tadvyapadeśanyāyaśceti saṃgṛhyate /
analyzed: phala uddeśena tad vidhau guṇa pada ānarthakyam iti doṣa dvayam tad vyapadeśa nyāyaḥ ca iti saṃgṛhyate
tantra saṃbandhena iha pūrvapakṣe tayoḥ api uddhārāt
na tu nyāyasudhākṛt uktasya api pūrva nyāya catuṣṭayasya grahaṇam
tantra saṃbandhena pūrva nyāya ākṣepa asaṃbhavāt

original: nahi yaugikatvanyāyena sāmānādhikaraṇyena coktaṃ nāmatvaṃ tantrasaṃbandhena nirākartuṃ śakyate,
analyzed: nahi yaugika tva nyāyena sāmānādhikaraṇyena ca uktam nāmatvam tantra saṃbandhena nirākartum śakyate
na vā citra adhikaraṇa ukta vākya bhedaḥ

original: guṇadvayasya yāgadvaye tantratvopapattāvapi vidhyanvayatantratve pramāṇābhāvena tadasaṃbhavāt,
analyzed: guṇa dvayasya yāga dvaye tantra tva upapattau api vidhi anvaya tantra tve pramāṇa abhāvena tad asaṃbhavāt
nā api tad prakhya tad vyapadeśau api

original: ato yatra yatra viśiṣṭavidhipūrvapakṣastatrāpādyamānamatvarthalakṣaṇākṣepo yatra yāgānuvādena guṇavidhipūrvapakṣastatra phalapadānarthakyādidoṣākṣepaśceha  #
analyzed: atas yatra yatra viśiṣṭa vidhi pūrvapakṣaḥ tatra āpādyamāna matu artha lakṣaṇa ākṣepaḥ yatra yāga anuvādena guṇa vidhi pūrvapakṣaḥ tatra phala pada ānarthakya ādi doṣa ākṣepaḥ ca iha
kriyete
tatra api na agnihotra vākye viśiṣṭa vidhi pūrvapakṣe bahuvrīhiṇā eva matvartha bhānāt matvartha lakṣaṇāyāḥ

original: aprasakternaitadākṣepa iti sūcayituṃ saṃbhavābhiprāyeṇa yatra yatreti vīpsopādānaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: aprasakteḥ nā etad ākṣepaḥ iti sūcayitum saṃbhava abhiprāyeṇa yatra yatra iti vīpsā upādānam kṛtam

original: ata eva tatprakhyānyaśāstrodāharaṇaṃ samidādivākyaṃ viśiṣṭavidhipakṣe matvarthalakṣaṇāprasakteḥ tadākṣepārthaṃ bhavatyevodāharaṇam //
analyzed: atas eva tad prakhyānya śāstra udāharaṇam samidh ādi vākyam viśiṣṭa vidhi pakṣe matu artha lakṣaṇa aprasakteḥ tad ākṣepa artham bhavati eva udāharaṇam

original: evaṃ śyenavākye viśiṣṭavidhipūrvapakṣe tantrasaṃbandhena matvarthalakṣaṇānirāse sati
analyzed: evam śyena vākye viśiṣṭa vidhi pūrvapakṣe tantra saṃbandhena matu artha lakṣaṇā nirāse sati
viśiṣṭa yāga vidheḥ nirduṣṭa tvāt śyena bhinnasya yāgasya upameya tā upapatteḥ viśiṣṭha vidhi gauravasya

original: rūḍhyanurodhena somādivākya iva svīkāre bādhakābhāvāt pūrvādhikaraṇasyāpi ākṣepāttaduttaramapyārambho na virudhyate //
analyzed: rūḍhi anurodhena soma ādi vākye iva svīkāre bādhaka abhāvāt pūrva adhikaraṇasya api ākṣepāt tad uttaram api ārambhaḥ na virudhyate

original: etena --- matvarthalakṣaṇākṣepe udbhidadhikaraṇānantarameva asyārambhāpatteḥ asāṅgatyopapādanaṃ nyāyasudhākṛto --- nirastam /
yattu --- kaustubhe pūjyapādaiḥ tadvyapadeśanyāyastu naivoddhartuṃ śakyata ityuktam,
analyzed: yat tu kaustubhe pūjya pādaiḥ tad vyapadeśa nyāyaḥ tu na eva uddhartum śakyate iti uktam

original: ata eva nyāyasudhāyāṃ viśiṣṭavidhimaṅgīkṛtyaiva tadvyapadeśanyāyākṣepo darśitaḥ //
analyzed: atas eva nyāyasudhāyām viśiṣṭa vidhim aṅgīkṛtya eva tad vyapadeśa nyāya ākṣepaḥ darśitaḥ
yat tu prakāśa kāraiḥ tad anusāreṇa pūjya pādaiḥ ca kaustubhe gnihotra vākye prasakta matu artha lakṣaṇa ākṣepa asaṃbhave
pi vājapeya udāharaṇe tad prakhya nyāya viṣaye bahuvrīhi apekṣayā karmadhārayam laghu tvena āśritya
tatra prasaktāyāḥ matu artha lakṣaṇāyāḥ ākṣepa saṃbhavaḥ

original: ata eva ākṣepasya sādhāraṇye 'pi tatprakhyanyāyaviṣaye 'pi matvarthalakṣaṇāprasaktidyotanāya vājapeyavākyopanyāsa ākare --- ityuktam,
analyzed: atas eva ākṣepasya sādhāraṇye pi tad prakhya nyāya viṣaye pi matu artha lakṣaṇa aprasakti dyotanāya vājapeya vākya upanyāse ākare iti uktam

original: tat peyaviśeṣaṇasya karmadhārayapakṣe pūrvanipātāpatteḥ svaravisaṃvādāpatteśca prauḍhivādamātram //
analyzed: tat peya viśeṣaṇasya karmadhāraya pakṣe pūrva nipāta āpatteḥ svara visaṃvāda āpatteḥ ca prauḍhi vāda mātram
yat api nyāyasudhāyām apūrva vājapeya udāharaṇa ānarthakyam parihṛtam
vājam peyam asmin iti bahuvrīhiṇā eva matvartha lābhāt matvartha lakṣaṇa anāpatteḥ
peyasya ca vāja śabda vācya anna viśeṣaṇa tva upapatteḥ pāna arha tva viśiṣṭa eka artha vidhāna upapatteḥ a vākya bhedāt tad prakhyānya śāstra tad vyapadeśayoḥ ca abhāvāt

original: tadapi na; tathātve udbhinnyāyāviṣayatvāyāgnihotrapade iva bahuvrīherāśrayaṇe matvarthalakṣaṇāyā aprasaktau tantrasaṃbandhena taduddhārārthaitadadhikaraṇaviṣayatvasyāpyanāpatteḥ
analyzed: tat api na tathātve udbhinnyāya aviṣaya tvāya agnihotra pade iva bahuvrīheḥ āśrayaṇe matu artha lakṣaṇāyāḥ aprasaktau tantra saṃbandhena tad uddhāra artha etad adhikaraṇa viṣayatvasya api anāpatteḥ
siddhānte tu surā graha vidhānāt tad prakhya tayā eva ākare bhihitayā guṇa vidhi nirāsa siddheḥ tad nirāsasya anapekṣaṇāt ca

original: ato yaugikatvavākyabhedatatprakhyanyāyānvinā yāni dūṣaṇāni matvarthalakṣaṇādīni tāni iha ākṣipya samādhīyanta iti bhāvaḥ //
analyzed: atas yaugika tva vākya bheda tad prakhya nyāyān vinā yāni dūṣaṇāni matu artha lakṣaṇa ādīni tāni iha ākṣipya samādhīyante iti bhāvaḥ

original: (dhātvarthasya bhāvanāyāṃ saṃbandhasāmānyena tatra ca guṇādīnāṃ karaṇatvādinā cānvayanirūpaṇapūrvakaṃ viśiṣṭavidhyasaṃbhavarūpapūrvapakṣopapādanam)
analyzed: dhātvarthasya bhāvanāyām saṃbandha sāmānyena tatra ca guṇa ādīnām karaṇa tva ādinā ca anvaya nirūpaṇa pūrvakam viśiṣṭa vidhi asaṃbhava rūpa pūrvapakṣa upapādanam
tad anvaya anupapatteḥ iti
kārakāṇām kriyayā eva anvayāt kāraka antarībhūtaḥ dhātvarthaḥ tad śabda arthaḥ
udbhid adhikaraṇe matu artha lakṣaṇā parihāreṇa guṇasya bhāvanāyām eva kāraka tvena anvayasya
svayam sādhita tvāt guṇa yāga ubhaya viśiṣṭa bhāvanā vidhāna āśrayaṇena yat gautavam tat api āśrayaṇīyam
syāt iti āha ubhaya iti
na tu etat iti
yajeta iti atra yāga gata karmatva karaṇatva pratipādaka śabda abhāvāt iti śeṣaḥ
yadi api bhāva artha adhikaraṇe tirikta bhāvanā sādhayiṣyate

original: tathāpi tasya yatnarūpasya kārakājanyatvāt na tatra kārakāṇāṃ anvayaḥ saṃbhavati;
analyzed: tathā api tasya yatna rūpasya kāraka ajanya tvāt na tatra kārakāṇām anvayaḥ saṃbhavati
dhātvartha dvārakā āśrayaṇe tad apekṣayā tatra eva tad anvayasya yukta tvāt
atas sarvāṇi api kārakāṇi dhātvarthena eva anvīyante

original: ata e kārakānvayitvāt na tasya kārakatvam,
analyzed: atas e kāraka anvayi tvāt na tasya kāraka tvam

original: apitu kriyārūpatvameveti yathaiva siddhānte sakalakārakānvitabhāvanā kriyārūpaiva satī pratyayenocyate,
analyzed: apitu kriyā rūpa tvam eva iti yathā eva siddhānte sakala kāraka anvita bhāvanā kriyā rūpā eva satī pratyayena ucyate

original: tathaiva dhātunā mamāpi kriyārūpa evārtha ucyate /
analyzed: tathā eva dhātunā mama api kriyā rūpaḥ evā arthaḥ ucyate
atas eva na bhāvanā vat eva karma tva karaṇa tva ādi kṛta vairūpyam api
evam ca sakala kāraka viśiṣṭasya dhātvarthasya saṃbandha sāmānyena eva anvayaḥ
prakṛti pratyayau saha artham brūtaḥ iti anuśāsanam api saṃbandha sāmānya abhiprāyam

original: ata eva etadanuśāsanabalādeva nirūḍhalakṣaṇayā saṃbandhasya padārthavidhayā bhānam /
analyzed: atas eva etad anuśāsana balāt eva nirūḍha lakṣaṇayā saṃbandhasya padārtha vidhayā bhānam

original: naca kārakātiriktasya naiva bhāvanāyāmanvaya iti niyamo 'sti;
analyzed: na ca kāraka atiriktasya nā eva bhāvanāyām anvayaḥ iti niyamaḥ sti
etasya eva revatīṣu iti vākye bhāvanāyāḥ ca api tad anvaya aṅgīkārāt
athavā pradhāna anvaya anurodhena bhāvanāyām eva kārakāṇām anvayaḥ

original: tathāpi dhātvarthasya saṃbandhasāmānyenaiva tasyāmanvayādekasmin yāge guṇanirūpite
analyzed: tathā api dhātvarthasya saṃbandha sāmānyena eva tasyām anvayāt ekasmin yāge guṇa nirūpite

original: karmatve phalanirūpite ca karaṇatve aṅgīkriyamāṇe 'pi śābdabodhe tena tena rūpeṇa
analyzed: karma tve phala nirūpite ca karaṇa tve aṅgīkriyamāṇe śābda bodhe tena tena rūpeṇa

original: pratītyabhāvāt na vairūpyāpattiriti karaṇatvenānavagamāt na tadanvayārthaṃ matvarthalakṣaṇādyāpattirityabhipretyāha --- yāgasyeti //
analyzed: pratīti abhāvāt na vairūpya āpattiḥ iti karaṇa tvena anavagamāt na tad anvaya artham matvā artha lakṣaṇa ādi āpattiḥ iti abhipretya āha yāgasya iti

original: bhāvārthādhikaraṇaṃ asiddhaṃ matvaitadvicārapravṛttiriti pakṣāntareṇāha --- bhāvanā veti //
analyzed: bhāvārtha adhikaraṇam asiddham matvā etad vicāra pravṛttiḥ iti pakṣa antareṇa āha bhāvanā vā iti
udāharaṇa antara parityāgena vājapeya udāharaṇa āśayaḥ
tatra nyāyasudhā prakāśa kārayoḥ mata khaṇḍanam ca
yadi api vājapeya pade bahuvrīhi āśrayaṇe na matu artha lakṣaṇā prasaktiḥ
karmadhāraye peya padasya pūrva nipāta āpattiḥ
tathā api bahuvrīheḥ āśrayaṇe na anya padārthaḥ yāgaḥ pūrvapakṣe bhipretaḥ

original: yena vājapeyasubantenopāttaṃ dravyaṃ guṇatvena vidhīyata iti pūrvapakṣāśayena matvarthalakṣaṇāprasaktirna saṃbhavatītyucyate,
analyzed: yena vājapeya sup antena upāttam dravyam guṇa tvena vidhīyate iti pūrvapakṣa āśayena matu artha lakṣaṇa aprasaktiḥ na saṃbhavati iti ucyate

original: kintu vājaṃ annaṃ peyam yasminniti surādravyavat yat karma tadevānyapadārthatvena vivakṣitamityabhiprāyaḥ /
analyzed: kintu vājam annam peyam yasmin iti surā dravya vat yat karma tat eva anya padārtha tvena vivakṣitam iti abhiprāyaḥ
tathā ca samāsena eva anya padārtha tayā surā dravya viśiṣṭa karma vidhāna āśayena prācīnaiḥ
prasajyat matu artha lakṣaṇāka vājapeya udāharaṇam eva kimartham darśitam iti śaṅkām pariharati vājapeya iti
guṇa sūtra pravṛtti prayojanam
guṇa sūtra anurodhena iti
atra ca
tulya tvāt kriyayoḥ na
iti guṇa sūtram vājapeyasya anna dravyaka tvena dravya sādṛśyasya balavat tvāt aiṣṭika vidhi antarasya
pūrvapakṣe prāpte soma dharmāṇām dīkṣā upasad ādīnām aprāptau saptadaśa dīkṣaḥ vājapeyaḥ
saptadaśa upasatkaḥ vājapeyaḥ iti dīkṣā upasad anuvāda liṅga darśana anupapatti pradarśana artham

original: taddhi vājapeya eva saṃbhavati nānyatreti tadanurodhena vājapeyodāharaṇaṃ na tu nyāyasudhākṛtprakāśakāroktarītyetyarthaḥ //
analyzed: tat hi vājapeye eva saṃbhavati na anyatra iti tad anurodhena vājapeya udāharaṇam na tu nyāyasudhākṛt prakāśa kāra ukta rītyā iti arthaḥ

original: (dhātvarthasya saṃbandhasāmānyena bhāvanānvayanirāsena karmatvakaraṇatvādinānvayanirūpaṇapūrvakaṃ somena yajetetyādau sarvatra matvarthalakṣaṇā
analyzed: dhātvarthasya saṃbandha sāmānyena bhāvanā anvaya nirāsena karma tva karaṇa tva ādinā anvaya nirūpaṇa pūrvakam somena yajeta ityādau sarvatra matvartha lakṣaṇā
yadi saṃbandha sāmānyena yāga bhāvanayoḥ anvayaḥ tatas guṇa phalayoḥ ekasya api ayogya tvāt yāga anvaya anupapattiḥ
yāga saṃbandhi bhāvanāyāḥ phala guṇa ākāṅkṣā bhāvāt

original: ato yāgakaraṇakabhāvanāyā eva sādhanākāṅkṣitatvena tattadrūpeṇaivānvayo yuktaḥ /
analyzed: atas yāga karaṇaka bhāvanāyāḥ eva sādhana ākāṅkṣita tvena tad tad rūpeṇa eva anvayaḥ yuktaḥ

original: yadā pūrvoktavivaraṇānurodhādbhāvanāyāḥ dhātvarthātirekeṇa dhātvarthasya ca karaṇatvakarmatvānyatarakārakatvapratītistadā sutarāṃ tenaiva rūpeṇānvayaḥ
analyzed: yadā pūrva ukta vivaraṇa anurodhāt bhāvanāyāḥ dhātvartha atirekeṇa dhātvarthasya ca karaṇa tva karma tva anyatara kāraka tva pratītiḥ tadā sutarām tena eva rūpeṇa anvayaḥ
vidhi samabhivyāhāra sattve dhātvarthasya a puruṣa arthasya karaṇa tvena eva bhāvanā anvayaḥ

original: tadabhāve puruṣārthatvāvagatau vā karmatvenaiveti na saṃbandhasāmānyenānvaya iti
analyzed: tad abhāve puruṣa artha tva avagatau vā karma tvena eva iti na saṃbandha sāmānyena anvayaḥ iti

original: karaṇatvena bhāvanānvaye pārṣṭhikānvayavelāyāṃ yogyatvāt phalenaivānvayaḥ syānnatu
analyzed: karaṇa tvena bhāvanā anvaye pārṣṭhika anvaya velāyām yogya tvāt phalena eva anvayaḥ syāt na tu

original: guṇena vidhisamabhivyāhāre satyapi kathañcit karmatvābhyupagame guṇenaivānvayaḥ,
analyzed: guṇena vidhi samabhivyāhāre sati api kathañcid karma tva abhyupagame guṇena eva anvayaḥ
syāt na phalena
ubhaya rūpa tva avagati aṅgīkaraṇam tu yugapad bodhe viruddham

original: śrūyamāṇasyaiva kramikabodhadvayajanakatvasvīkāre āvṛttilakṣaṇo vākyabheda ityabhipretyāha--- ataśceti //
analyzed: śrūyamāṇasya eva kramika bodha dvaya janaka tva svīkāre āvṛtti lakṣaṇaḥ vākya bhedaḥ iti abhipretya āha atas ca iti
vinā ubhayoḥ guma phalayoḥ yāga anvaye prasakta viruddha trika dvaya svarūpa ādi nirūpaṇam
matvā artha lakṣaṇām vinā eva śrutyā eva ubhayoḥ yāga anvaye viruddha trika dvaya āpattim āha anyathā iti
yugapad bodhe hi sādhyasya phala ādeḥ
prayojana tvāt prādhānyam

original: sādhanasya tu sādhyārthatvena pārārthyāt śeṣatvāparaparyāyaṃ guṇatvaṃ prasiddhameva /
analyzed: sādhanasya tu sādhya artha tvena pārārthyāt śeṣa tva apara paryāyam guṇa tvam prasiddham eva
prādhānyasya ca kṛti uddeśya tvam vinā anupapatteḥ uddeśya tva āpādaka tvam
aprāptasya ca uddeṣṭum aśakya tvāt prāpta anukīrtana rūpa anuvāda āpādaka tvam
evam śeṣa tvasya śeṣi pāratantrya āpādya tva lakṣaṇa upādeya tva āpādaka tvam
upādeya tvasya ca vidhi adhīna tvāt vidheya tva āpādaka tvam iti evam sādhana tve guṇa tva upādeya tva vidheya tvam trikam

original: sādhyatve prādhānyoddeśyatvānuvādyatvaṃ ca trikamekasya yāgasya viruddham /
analyzed: sādhya tve prādhānya uddeśya tva anuvādya tvam ca trikam ekasya yāgasya viruddham
kramika bodhe ca vidhi apekṣita tvena karaṇa tva avagateḥ prāthamika tvasya āvaśyaka tvāt ajñāta pūrvasya eva
yāgasya phala saṃbandha karaṇena tat prati yāgasya ajñāta jñāpana viṣaya tva ākhyam vidheya tvam

original: karaṇatvāvasthāyāṃ ca jñātasya yāgasya guṇasaṃbandhavelāyāṃ uttarakālamanuvādājjñātajñāpanaviṣayatvākhyamanuvādyatvaṃ guṇaṃ prati /
analyzed: karaṇa tva avasthāyām ca jñātasya yāgasya guṇa saṃbandha velāyām uttarakālam anuvādāt jñāta jñāpana viṣaya tva ākhyam anuvādya tvam guṇam prati

original: tadidaṃ yāgaguṇayorutpattividhikramāṅgīkāre pūrvaṃ yāgasyotpattiranantaraṃ guṇasyeti vairūpyam /
analyzed: tat idam yāga guṇayoḥ utpatti vidhi krama aṅgīkāre pūrvam yāgasya utpattiḥ anantaram guṇasya iti vairūpyam

original: tathā phalaṃ prati yāgasya śeṣatvāparaparyāyaṃ guṇatvaṃ guṇaṃ prati ca śeṣitvāparaparyāyaṃ prādhānyamiti śrūyamāṇasyaiva kramikaviniyogavidhiparatvāṅgīkāre  #
analyzed: tathā phalam prati yāgasya śeṣa tva apara paryāyam guṇa tvam guṇam prati ca śeṣi tva apara paryāyam prādhānyam iti śrūyamāṇasya eva kramika viniyoga vidhi para tva aṅgīkāre
vairūpyam

original: tathā phalaṃ prati yāgasyopādeyatvaṃ guṇaṃ prati coddeśyatvamiti prayogavidhikramāṅgīkāre ca vairūpyaṃ ceti doṣāpattirityarthaḥ //
analyzed: tathā phalam prati yāgasya upādeya tvam guṇam prati ca uddeśya tvam iti prayoga vidhi krama aṅgīkāre ca vairūpyam ca iti doṣa āpattiḥ iti arthaḥ
nanu upādeya tva vidheya tva guṇa tva trike uddeśya tva anuvādya tva prādhānya trike ca kim idam upādeya tvam
kiñca uddeśya tvam nāma
na ca kṛti vyāpya tvam upādeya tvam
tad viparyayaḥ n upādeya tva apara nāmadheyam uddeśya tvam iti prakāśa kāra uktam sādhu

original: samādirūpadeśasya darśapūrṇamāsottaratvādikālasya rathantarasāmatvādernimittasya vrīhyādeḥ saṃskāryasya kṛtivyāpyatvasattvenopādeyatvāpatteḥ,
analyzed: sama ādi rūpa deśasya darśa pūrṇamāsa uttara tva ādi kālasya rathantara sāma tva ādeḥ nimittasya vrīhi ādeḥ saṃskāryasya kṛti vyāpya tva sattvena upādeya tva āpatteḥ
kartṛ tadgata ekatva ādeḥ kṛti vyāpya tva abhāvena upādeya tva anāpattyā uddeśya tva āpatteḥ ca
prakṛte pi yāge kṛti vyāpya tva sattvena uddeśya tva anāpatteḥ ca iti atas āha upādeya tva ādi iti
śeṣa tva ādi svarūpasya asaṃkīrṇasya spaṣṭa jñāna tayā upādeya tva mātra nirukti pratijñā upapādanam
śeṣatva ākhya guṇatvasya kṛti uddeśya tva apara paryāya śeṣi tva rūpa pradhānatvasya pravartaka liṅga vyāpāra ātmaka
pravartanā viṣaya tva ākhya vidheya tva anuvādya tvasya ca spaṣṭa rūpatayā asaṅkīrṇa tvena jñātum
śakya tvāt upādeya tvasya pāratantrya āpādya tva lakṣaṇasya śeṣa tve pi kāla deśa ādau abhāvāt atas
eva prādhānyāt tad anyathā anupapattyā kalpyamāna uddeśya tvasya tatra sarva saṃpratipannasya asaṃbhavena
tatra eva svarūpa jijñāsā udayāt tad svarūpa jñānam eva upayogi iti abhiprāyeṇa guṇa tva ādīni vihāya upādeya tva ādi iti uktam
nirduṣṭa tayā uddeśya tva upādeya tvayoḥ nirvacanam
ādi padena uddeśya tva saṃgrahaḥ
prakṛta vidhi prayukti aviṣaya tvam uddeśya tvam tad abhāvaḥ ca upādeya tvam
asti ca idam uddeśya tvam svarga ādi phale kāla deśa ādau ca
sama ādi rūpa deśa ādeḥ kṛti vyāpya tve pi loka siddha sama upajīvanena api prakṛta vidhi upapatteḥ
paśu ādi vat prakṛta vidhi prayukta uttaravihāra deśa prāpaṇāt i rūpa kriyā antara vyāpya tva abhāvena

original: ata eva paśvādidravyasya tanniṣṭhaguṇādeśca vastuto lokasiddhatve 'pi vihāradeśaprāpaṇādikriyāviṣayatvena prakṛtavidhiprayuktiviṣayatvānnātivyāptiḥ
analyzed: atas eva paśu ādi dravyasya tad niṣṭha guṇa ādeḥ ca vastutas loka siddha tve pi vihāra deśa prāpaṇa ādi kriyā viṣaya tvena prakṛta vidhi prayukti viṣaya tvāt na ativyāptiḥ
evam āhavanīya ādeḥ ādhāna vidhi prayukta ādhāna niṣpanna tvena yat āhavanīye juhoti ityādi prakṛta vidheḥ utpatti aprayojaka tve
pi praṇayana prāduṣkaraṇa ādi kriyā antara vyāpya tvena rūpeṇa prayukti viṣaya tva sattvāt na ativyāptiḥ

original: evaṃ puroḍāśakapālasyāpi vihāradeśe sthitasya hastagrahaṇādirūpakriyāviṣayatvena prakṛtavidhiprayuktatvaṃ jñeyam /
analyzed: evam puroḍāśa kapālasya api vihāra deśe sthitasya hasta grahaṇa ādi rūpa kriyā viṣaya tvena prakṛta vidhi prayukta tvam jñeyam

original: saṃskāryasya vrīhyāde r“vrīhibhiryajete“ti vākye prayuktiviṣayatve 'pi saṃskārabodhakaprakṛtavidhau prayuktiviṣayatvābhāvāduddeśyatvāvighātaḥ
analyzed: saṃskāryasya vrīhi ādeḥ vrīhibhiḥ yajeta iti vākye prayukti viṣaya tve pi saṃskāra bodhaka prakṛta vidhau prayukti viṣaya tva abhāvāt uddeśya tva avighātaḥ
ākhyāta upātta kartuḥ tad eka tva ādeḥ ca prakṛta vidhi aprayukta tve pi kṛti nirūpita samavāya ghaṭita saṃbandhena eva bhāvanā anvayāt na ativyāptiḥ

original: yatra tu puruṣasya saṃskāryatvaṃ tatra karmatāsaṃbandhenaivānvayānnāvyāptiḥ /
analyzed: yatra tu puruṣasya saṃskārya tvam tatra karmatā saṃbandhena eva anvayāt na avyāptiḥ
atas ca śeṣatva vyāpya tvena pāratantrya āpādya tva lakṣaṇasya upādeya tvasya prādhānya vyāpya tvena
ca uddeśya tvasya api anaṅgīkārāt kāla deśa ādiṣu śeṣatve pi ca upādeya tva tad abhāva rūpa uddeśya tvayoḥ anupapattiḥ
prakṛte ca prakṛta vidhi prayukti aviṣaya tva rūpa uddeśya tvasya tad abhāva rūpa upādeya tvasya mithas virodhāt na tantra saṃbandha saṃbhavaḥ
iti kaustubhe draṣṭavyam iti

original: evaṃ ca yugapadbodhe viruddhatrikadvayāpatteḥ kramikatvāṅgīkāre ca pūrvoktavairūpyāpatteḥ
analyzed: evam ca yugapad bodhe viruddha trika dvaya āpatteḥ kramika tva aṅgīkāre ca pūrva ukta vairūpya āpatteḥ
śrūyamāṇasya eva krameṇa śrūyamāṇaḥ vidhiḥ anyatara paraḥ
vidhi apekṣita tvāt yogya tvāt ca bhāva artha adhikaraṇa nyāyena

original: karaṇatvameva śābdaṃ prāthamikabhāvanānvaye iti pārṣṭhikabodhavelāyāmapi tenaiva rūpeṇa phalānvayo,
analyzed: karaṇa tvam eva śābdam prāthamika bhāvanā anvaye iti pārṣṭhika bodha velāyām api tena eva rūpeṇa phala anvayaḥ
na tu karma tayā guṇena
tasya phala saṃbandha uttara kālīna tvena ārthika tvāt

original: ataśca guṇasyāpi prāthamikabhāvanānvaye asmaduktarītyā karaṇatvenaiva saṃjāte dvitīyabodhavelāyāṃ
analyzed: atas ca guṇasya api prāthamika bhāvanā anvaye asmad ukta rītyā karaṇa tvena eva saṃjāte dvitīya bodha velāyām

original: yāgasaṃbandhasyāvaśyakatve yāgasya phalaṃ prati karaṇatvāt karaṇībhūtaguṇānvayārthaṃ
analyzed: yāga saṃbandhasya āvaśyaka tve yāgasya phalam prati karaṇa tvāt karaṇībhūta guṇa anvaya artham
āvaśyakī matu artha lakṣaṇā

original: yeṣāṃ tu prācāṃ mate prathamato 'pi na guṇasya karaṇatvena bhāvanānvayasteṣāṃ tu prathamata eva sā āvaśyakī duruddharetyabhipretyopasaṃharati  #
analyzed: yeṣām tu prācām mate na guṇasya karaṇa tvena bhāvanā anvayaḥ teṣām tu prathamatas eva sā āvaśyakī duruddharā iti abhipretya upasaṃharati
atas iti
udbhida ādīnām iti ādi padena yaugika tva sāmyāt vājapeya padasya api saṃgrahaḥ
vājapeya pade yaji sāmānādhikaraṇya upapatti artham bahuvrīhi āśrayaṇena guṇe karmaṇi ca tulya vat vṛttika tva saṃpādanam

original: yadyapi karmadhārayapakṣe guṇe eva yaugikasya vājapeyaśabdasyaikahāyanyādiśabdasyeva matvarthalakṣaṇayā guṇavidhiparatvamevāpadyate,
analyzed: yadi api karmadhāraya pakṣe guṇe eva yaugikasya vājapeya śabdasya ekahāyanī ādi śabdasya iva matu artha lakṣaṇayā guṇa vidhi paratvam eva āpadyate

original: na tu udbhidādipadasyeva guṇe karmaṇi ca tulyavadvṛttikatvam;
analyzed: na tu udbhida ādi padasya iva guṇe karmaṇi ca tulya vat vṛttika tvam

original: tathāpi matvarthalakṣaṇāpattyā guṇaparatve niraste yajisāmānādhikaraṇyopapattyarthaṃ jaghanyasya bahuvrīherevāśrayaṇena tatprakhyanyāyena nāmadheyatvaṃ  #
analyzed: tathā api matu artha lakṣaṇa āpattyā guṇa paratve niraste yaji sāmānādhikaraṇya upapatti artham jaghanyasya bahuvrīheḥ eva āśrayaṇena tad prakhya nyāyena nāmadheya tvam
na a sulabham
yadi api bahuvrīhau anya padārtha lakṣaṇa āpattyā nāma tva āśrayaṇam api lakṣaṇa āpādakam

original: tathāpi tasyā nirūḍhatvena padārthabodhavelāyāṃ jātatvāt śrutitulyatvena padāntarasāmānādhikaraṇyavattvena vākyārthalakṣaṇāto jyāyastvamiti  #
analyzed: tathā api tasyāḥ nirūḍha tvena padārtha bodha velāyām jāta tvāt śruti tulya tvena pada antara sāmānādhikaraṇyavat tvena vākya artha lakṣaṇātaḥ jyāyaḥ tvam iti
na doṣaḥ
yadā tu mad ukta rītyā pūrvapakṣe bahuvrīhiḥ eva
tadā tu tulya vat vṛttika tvāt na kaḥ pi doṣaḥ
tad prakhya nyāyena vājapeya nāmatva upapādanam
atas yuktam tad prakhya nyāyena nāma tvam

original: saṃbhavati ca saptadaśānāṃ prājāpattyasomagrahāṇāṃ viśeṣata āmnānavat prājāpatyānāṃ
analyzed: saṃbhavati ca saptadaśānām prājāpattya soma grahāṇām viśeṣataḥ āmnāna vat prājāpatyānām

original: saptadaśa surāgrahān gṛhṇātīti viśeṣata āmnānāt somagrahāṇāṃ āhavanīyādhvaryukartṛkapracāravat
analyzed: saptadaśa surā grahān gṛhṇāti iti viśeṣataḥ āmnānāt soma grahāṇām āhavanīya adhvaryu kartṛka pracāra vat
surā grahāṇām mārjālīye pratiprasthātṛ vāja sṛt kartṛka pracāra vidhānāt surā grahaiḥ api
vājapeya yāga abhyāsāt tad prakhya nyāyaḥ

original: tatra ca mārjālīye surāgrahaṇamanukampanamātraṃ kṛtvā vājasṛtāṃ bhakṣaṇaṃ homo 'pi veti pakṣadvaye 'pi yāgābhyāse na vivādaḥ /
analyzed: tatra ca mārjālīye surā grahaṇam anukampana mātram kṛtvā vāja sṛtām bhakṣaṇam vā iti pakṣa dvaye pi yāga abhyāse na vivādaḥ

original: evaṃ sthite yadyapi ca sākṣātsurāsaṃbandhitvaṃ yāge na prasiddham /
analyzed: evam sthite yadi api ca sākṣāt surā saṃbandhi tvam yāge na prasiddham

original: tathāca “saptadaśasurāgrahān gṛhṇātī“tyanena grahaṇasaṃskṛtānāṃ surāṇāṃ viniyogāpakṣeyā tena madhugrahaṃ niṣkīṇāti,
analyzed: tathā ca saptadaśa surā grahān gṛhṇāti iti anena grahaṇa saṃskṛtānām surāṇām viniyoga apakṣeyā tena madhu graham niṣkīṇāti

original: taṃ sabrahmaṇe sapātramiti śapathaśrutyā surāpratigrahakartṛpūrvadattasya hiraṇyapātrasthamadhugrahasya
analyzed: tam sa brahmaṇe sa pātram iti śapatha śrutyā surā pratigraha kartṛ pūrva dattasya hiraṇya pātra stha madhu grahasya

original: surāgrahaṇaniṣkrayārthatvena viniyogāt madhugrahasyāpi ca sapātrasya brahmasaṃpradānake
analyzed: surā grahaṇa niṣkraya artha tvena viniyogāt madhu grahasya api ca sa pātrasya brahma saṃpradānake

original: dāne viniyogātparaṃparayā yāge surāsaṃbandhitvasiddhiriti pūjyapādānāṃ kaustubhe
analyzed: dāne viniyogāt paraṃparayā yāge surā saṃbandhi tva siddhiḥ iti pūjya pādānām kaustubhe
surā saṃbandhi tva upapādana prayāsa karaṇam vṛthā eva
yadi api agnīṣoma ādi pada vat vājapeye bṛhatsāmakasya viṣṇau iti asyām ṛci vājapeya stotrasya ante

original: āmnānāttenaiva kratusamāpteḥ vājapeyastotrakṛtasamāptimattvenaiva vājapeyapadapravṛttiḥ śakyate eva vaktuṃ;
analyzed: āmnānāt tena eva kratu samāpteḥ vājapeya stotra kṛta samāptimat tvena eva vājapeya pada pravṛttiḥ śakyate eva vaktum

original: tathāpi “prajāpatirakāmayata vājamāpnuyāt svargalokamiti sa etaṃ vājapeyamapaśyadvājaṃ
analyzed: tathā api prajāpatiḥ akāmayata vājam āpnuyāt svarga lokam iti saḥ etam vājapeyam apaśyat vājam

original: peyo vā eṣa vājapeyaḥ etena svargaṃ lokaṃ āpnotī“ti tāṇḍibrāhmaṇe arthavāde vājarūpānnapeyatvayogenaiva
analyzed: peyaḥ vai eṣa vājapeyaḥ etena svargam lokam āpnoti iti tāṇḍi brāhmaṇe arthavāde vāja rūpa anna peya tva yogena eva

original: vājapeyaśabdanirvacanāt vājaṃ peyamasminniti yogārthasyaiva anusaraṇaṃ mīmāṃsakānāmiti dhyeyam /
analyzed: vājapeya śabda nirvacanāt vājam peyam asmin iti yoga arthasya eva anusaraṇam mīmāṃsakānām iti dhyeyam

original: prayojanaṃ pūrvapakṣe vyaktatve 'pi dravyasādṛśyena balavataiṣṭikavidhyantaḥ siddhānte spaṣṭatvācca noktam //
analyzed: prayojanam pūrvapakṣe vyakta tve dravya sādṛśyena balavatā aiṣṭika vidhi antaḥ siddhānte spaṣṭa tvāt ca na uktam
iti ṣaṣṭham viśiṣṭa vidhi ākṣepa adhikaraṇam vājapeya adhikaraṇam
adhikaraṇam
tad guṇāḥ tu vidhīyeran avibhāgāt vidhāna arthe

original: “āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo 'māvāsyāyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ cācyuto bhavatī” tyādau āgneyaśabdo guṇavidhiḥ
analyzed: āgneyaḥ ṣṭākapālaḥ māvāsyāyām paurṇamāsyām ca acyutaḥ bhavati tyādau āgneya śabdaḥ guṇa vidhiḥ
karma nāmadheyam iti cintāyām agneḥ mantra varṇāt eva prāpta tvāt āgneya padam nāmadheyam

original: iti prāpte --- puroḍāśakarmikāyā bhāvanāyā mantrāpekṣābhāvānmantrasya ca tatrāyogyatvānnopāṃśuyāja
analyzed: iti prāpte puroḍāśa karmikāyāḥ bhāvanāyāḥ mantra apekṣā abhāvāt mantrasya ca tatra ayogya tvāt na upāṃśuyāja
iva mantrasya devatā kalpaka tvam
na ca āghāra vat vācanikaḥ viniyogaḥ mantrasya
yena tad kalpaka tvam saṃbhāvyeta
na ca mantrasya aṣṭākapāla karmaka bhāvanā aṅga tve pramāṇam asti
prakaraṇasya upāṃśuyāja ādiṣu api aviśiṣṭa tvāt
na api kramaḥ
brāhmaṇa pāṭha krama apekṣayā mantra pāṭha krama vaiparītyasya pañcame vakṣyamāṇa tvāt
atas tad prakhya nyāya abhāvāt nāma tva anupapatteḥ dravya devatā ubhaya viśiṣṭa bhāvanā vidhi pratīteḥ tasya
ca yāgam antareṇa anupapatteḥ bhū dhātunā tad lakṣaṇāt sakala viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭa yāga bhāvanā vidhānena
arthāt viśeṣaṇānām api vidhi kalpanāt guṇa vidhiḥ eva āgneya śabdaḥ
prayojanam āgneyam payaḥ ityādau nāma atideśena āgneya vidhi antaḥ pūrvapakṣe
siddhānte tu sānnāyya vidhi antaḥ
iti saptamam āgneya adhikaraṇam
ākṣepa samādhāna arthasya api pūrva adhikaraṇasya nāma tā sādhaka tvāt ākṣepa samādhānābhyām

original: sādhitasya nāmatvasyeha siddhānte 'pavādakaraṇāt āpavādakīṃ saṅgatiṃ spaṣṭatvādanabhidhāya
analyzed: sādhitasya nāma tvasya iha siddhānte pa vāda karaṇāt āpavādakīm saṅgatim spaṣṭa tvāt an abhidhāya
viṣaya vākya pradarśana pūrvikām cintām darśayati
prākṛta vaikṛta vākya antarāṇām api etad adhikaraṇa viṣaya tvam

original: ādipadena “agnīṣomīyamekādaśakapālaṃ aindraṃ dadhyamāvāsyāyā“miti prākṛtānāṃ “āgneyaṃ paya” “aindraḥ puroḍāśa” iti vaikṛtānāṃ ca vākyānāṃ saṃgrahaḥ
analyzed: ādi padena agnīṣomīyam ekādaśa kapālam aindram dadhi amāvāsyāyām iti prākṛtānām āgneyam payaḥ aindraḥ puroḍāśaḥ iti vaikṛtānām ca vākyānām saṃgrahaḥ
āgneya nāmatā guṇa vidhitva paratva nirāsena sarva viśiṣṭa vidhi viṣayatvam etad adhikaraṇasya iti nyāyasudhākāra mata tad khaṇḍane
atra nyāyasudhā kṛtā āgneya padasya aṣṭākapāla ādi dravya sāmānādhikaraṇyāt karmaṇaḥ ca a śravaṇāt mantrataḥ tu

original: virodhe syādi” tyadhikaraṇe pañcame āgneyāgnīṣomīyayoḥ brāhmaṇakramaviparyayeṇa mantrakramāmnānasya
analyzed: virodhe ti adhikaraṇe pañcame āgneya agnīṣomīyayoḥ brāhmaṇa krama viparyayeṇa mantra krama āmnānasya

original: vakṣyamāṇatvena kramaviniyuktamantrābhāvāt śrutyaviniyuktānāṃ ca mantrāṇāṃ svārthasamavāyakalpakatvābhāvāt
analyzed: vakṣyamāṇa tvena krama viniyukta mantra abhāvāt śruti a viniyuktānām ca mantrāṇām sva artha samavāya kalpaka tva abhāvāt
māntravarṇika devatā kalpanā anupapatteḥ dravya devatā saṃyogena api yāgasya kalpayitum aśakya tvāt āgneyam

original: caturdhā karotī” tyādivyavahārasya ca dravyaviṣayatvena karmanāmānapekṣatvānniṣprayojanatvenāpi
analyzed: caturdhā karoti ityādi vyavahārasya ca dravya viṣaya tvena karma nāma anapekṣa tvāt niṣprayojana tvena api
nāma tva āśaṅkā anupapatteḥ na nāma tva cintā yuktā

original: ataḥ pūrvādhikaraṇe tantrasaṃbandhānupapattyā viśiṣṭavidhau niraste kvacidapi tarhyanāvṛttena
analyzed: atas pūrva adhikaraṇe tantra saṃbandha anupapattyā viśiṣṭa vidhau niraste kvacid api tarhi anāvṛttena
pratyayena viśiṣṭa vidhiḥ na saṃbhavati iti āśaṅkya viśiṣṭa vidhi vyutpādanāya eva etat adhikaraṇam
tad vyutpādanasya ca utpatti śiṣṭa guṇa balīyaḥ tva siddhiḥ prayojanam
tasya nāmatā
soma viśiṣṭe hi utpanne śuddha anuvāda asaṃbhavāt na khanitra ādiḥ tatra iti udbhid ādeḥ nāma tā sidhyati

original: śrutena tu pratyayena śuddhaṃ yāgaṃ vidhāyopapadānarthakyaparijihīrṣayā tadarthavidhināyāśrutapratyayāntarakalpane
analyzed: śrutena tu pratyayena śuddham yāgam vidhāya upapada ānarthakya parijihīrṣayā tad artha vidhinā āyā śruta pratyaya antara kalpane
śrutasya eva āvṛtti kalpane śuddha yāga anuvādena udbhid somayoḥ vihitayoḥ tulya bala tvena vikalpa upapatteḥ na

original: nāmatā sidhyatīti nāmadheyatvaṃ draḍhayituṃ viśiṣṭavidhiriha vyutpādyate saprayojanaḥ /
analyzed: nāma tā sidhyati iti nāmadheya tvam draḍhayitum viśiṣṭa vidhiḥ iha vyutpādyate sa prayojanaḥ

original: evañca sarvecātra viśiṣṭavidhayaḥ udāharaṇamiti bhāṣyavārtikayorguṇavidhināmadheyacintā pūrvāpavādatvena saṅgatiṃ vaktuṃ kṛtā /
analyzed: evam ca sarve ca atra viśiṣṭa vidhayaḥ udāharaṇam iti bhāṣya vārtikayoḥ guṇa vidhi nāmadheya cintā pūrva apavāda tvena saṅgatim vaktum kṛtā

original: athavā -- guṇavidhyasaṃbhave sthite vaiyarthyaparihārāya saṃbhavamātreṇa nāmatvamuktam /
analyzed: athavā guṇa vidhi asaṃbhave sthite vaiyarthya parihārāya saṃbhava mātreṇa nāma tvam uktam

original: tadayukta miti sūcayituṃ yathābhāṣyavārtikaṃ guṇavidhiḥ karmanāmadheyamiti cintāyāṃ niveśitam /
analyzed: tat ayuktam iti sūcayitum yathā bhāṣya vārtikam guṇa vidhiḥ karma nāmadheyam iti cintāyām niveśitam

original: ayamāśayaḥ --- na tāvadatra viśiṣṭavidhivyutpādanaṃ nāmatvavicāre saṅgatam;
analyzed: ayam āśayaḥ na tāvat atra viśiṣṭa vidhi vyutpādanam nāmatva vicāre saṅgatam
utpatti śiṣṭa guṇa balīyaḥ tva sidhyā viśiṣṭa vidhi vicārasya sa prayojana tve pi tad balīyaḥ tvena
vājina yāga vat guṇa viśiṣṭa karma antarasya eva udbhid ādi vākyeṣu āpattyā guṇa vidhi tva nirāsa asaṃbhavena
nāma tā āyāma sādhaka tvāt
yadi vājina vākye rūḍhi balīyaḥ tvena vājina padasya utpatti śiṣṭa guṇa balīyaḥ tvena api na nāma tā iti ucyeta
tadā udbhida ādi padānām arūḍhatvena tulya vat vṛttika tayā eva nāmatā siddheḥ kim utpatti śiṣṭa guṇa balīyaḥ tvena

original: kiñca viśiṣṭavidhyabhāve 'pi na khanitrasya vikalpaḥ saṃbhavati;
analyzed: kiñca viśiṣṭa vidhi abhāve pi na khanitrasya vikalpaḥ saṃbhavati
udbhid ādi vākyeṣu yāga anuvāda asiddheḥ
somena yajeta iti vākyasya pūrva pravṛtti āśrayaṇena śuddha yāga vidhāne tadānīm eva upasthita upapada ānarthakya parihārāya

original: kalpitenāvṛttena tenaiva vā vidhipratyayena svavākyopasthitayāgānuvādena some vihite
analyzed: kalpitena āvṛttena tena eva vā vidhi pratyayena sva vākya upasthita yāga anuvādena some vihite

original: tenaiva nirākāṅkṣīkṛte yāgenaiva vākyāntaropāttakhanitrādividhānaṃ saṃbhavatīti tatra
analyzed: tena eva nirākāṅkṣīkṛte yāgena eva vākya antara upātta khanitra ādi vidhānam saṃbhavati iti tatra
karma antara vidhānasya eva āpattiḥ na tu vikalpaḥ
nahi utpatti śiṣṭa guṇa balīyaḥ tve nirākāṅkṣa tā āpādana atiriktam anyat kiñcid karaṇam asti
tat tu viśiṣṭa vidhi abhāve pi sukaram iti

original: ataeva --- tatra viśiṣṭavidhiṃ matvarthalakṣaṇāpattyā nirasya yaugikatvādinaiva nāmatvamākare
analyzed: ataeva tatra viśiṣṭa vidhim matu artha lakṣaṇa āpattyā nirasya yaugika tva ādinā eva nāma tvam ākare
sādhitam iti asaṅgatam viśiṣṭa vidhi vyutpādanam api ca sannikṛṣṭa vidhau asaṃbhava nibandhana tvāt viprakṛṣṭayoḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣyayoḥ yugapad vidheya tvasya
sannikṛṣṭa vidhāna artham ca tasya asaṃbhavaḥ viprakṛṣṭa vidhāna artham tasya asaṃbhavaḥ ca abhyupagantavyaḥ

original: syāditi yugapat viruddhasaṃbhavāsaṃbhavāyogānna kvacit sakṛcchrutena pratyayena viśiṣṭavidhiḥ
analyzed: syāt iti yugapad viruddha saṃbhava asaṃbhava ayogāt na kvacid sakṛt śrutena pratyayena viśiṣṭa vidhiḥ
saṃbhavati iti tvad ukta pūrvapakṣasya somena yajeta iti atra iva āgneya ādi vākyeṣu api saṃbhavāt aneka guṇa upādāna nimitta vākya bheda āpatti hetuka pūvrapakṣa abhidhānam āgneya ādi vākye
bhāṣyakārasya śūnya hṛdaya tām eva āpādayet
atas saṅga ta tvāt guṇa vidhi nāmadheya vicāraḥ eva yuktaḥ iti
tad prakhya nyāyena āgneya pada nāma tva upapādanam

original: kathaṃ tarhi nyāyasudhoktadūṣaṇasamūhe vidyamāne nāmatāpūrvapakṣasiddhirityata āha --- agneriti //
analyzed: katham tarhi nyāyasudhā ukta dūṣaṇa samūhe vidyamāne nāmatā pūrvapakṣa siddhiḥ iti atas āha agneḥ iti

original: ayamarthaḥ --- yadyapyāgneyavākye bhavatinā sattāmātropādānādvidherbhāvanāyāḥ tadavacchedakayogyadhātvarthasya vā nopādānaṃ;
analyzed: ayam arthaḥ yadi api āgneya vākye bhavatinā sattā mātra upādānāt vidheḥ bhāvanāyāḥ tad avacchedaka yogya dhātvarthasya vā na upādānam

original: tathāpi aprāptārthatvādvidhiṃ prakalpya bhūdhātośca bhāvanāṃ vinānupapatteḥ bhāvanākṣepāttayaiva
analyzed: tathā api aprāpta artha tvāt vidhim prakalpya bhū dhātoḥ ca bhāvanām vinā anupapatteḥ bhāvanā ākṣepāt tayā eva
vā bhāvanā abhidhānāt tasyām ca prathama anta aṣṭākapāla pada ukta dravyasya anvaya asaṃbhave saktu vat prathamāyāḥ
karaṇa tva lakṣaṇayā aṣṭākapāla karaṇikāyām tasyām bhāvanāyām agneḥ api viśeṣaṇa tvena aneka vidhi nimitta gaurava āpatteḥ
tad prakhya nyāyena nāmadheyam āgneya padam
saṃbhavati ca atra mantra varṇasya agni devatā prāpakasya sattvāt tat prakhyat nyāyaḥ
mantra brāhmaṇa pāṭhayoḥ an anyādṛśa tvena anyādṛśa tve pi anuṣṭhāna sādeśyāt agniḥ mūrdhā ityādīnām āgneya ādi viniyogena māntravarṇika devatā prāpti samarthanam
agniḥ mūrdhā iti puronuvākyāyāḥ bhuvaḥ yajñasya iti yājyāyāḥ ca adhikāra ākhya prakaraṇena
sthānena vā aṣṭākapāla bhāvanā aṅgatva avagateḥ upāṃśuyāja vat śruti aviniyoge pi devatā kalpaka tva upapatteḥ
ataeva dravya samāna adhikaraṇasya api āgneya padasya nyāyena nāmatā siddhau karma vyadhikaraṇa dvitīya anta agnihotra āghāra pada vat nāmatvam karaṇa tva lakṣaṇayām
na anupapannam
na ca adhikārasya upāṃśuyāja ādiṣu api aviśeṣāt kramasya ca brāhmaṇa pāṭha apekṣayā mantrāṇām

original: vaiparītyādasaṃbhavatt kathaṃ prathamasya prathamamityevaṃ pāṭhakramāt mantrāṇāmaṅgatvamiti dūṣaṇam;
analyzed: vaiparītyāt asaṃbhavat katham prathamasya prathamam iti evam pāṭha kramāt mantrāṇām aṅga tvam iti dūṣaṇam

original: vājasaneyiśākhāyāṃ prathamamāgneyasya paścādagnīṣomīyasyaiva brāhmaṇapāṭhāmnānāt mantrāṇāṃ pāṭhakramopapatteḥ;
analyzed: vājasaneyi śākhāyām prathamam āgneyasya paścāt agnīṣomīyasya eva brāhmaṇa pāṭha āmnānāt mantrāṇām pāṭha krama upapatteḥ
sarva śākhā abhijña tvena viśvasta tantra vārtikakāraiḥ lekhanāt śākhā antare mantra pāṭha krama an āmnānasya anumātum api aśakya tvāt ca
mantrataḥ tu virodhe syāt iti atra tu yatra api vyutkrama āmnānam
tatra api iṣṭa siddhiḥ upapāditā
na tu tāvatā sarvatra api vyutkrama āmnānam

original: tadapyagnīṣomīyānantare paṭhitasyāpyāgneyasya “śiro vā etadyajñasya yadāgneyo hṛdayamupāṃśuyājaḥ
analyzed: tat api agnīṣomīya anantare paṭhitasya api āgneyasya śiraḥ vai etat yajñasya yat āgneyaḥ hṛdayam upāṃśuyājaḥ
pādau agnīṣomīyaḥ iti anena aprāpta artha tvena vidhi kalpanayā sva sthānāt apakṛṣya agnīṣomīya paśu yāga vat apakṛṣya anuṣṭhāna avagateḥ anuṣṭhāna
lakṣaṇa sthāna kramāt paśu dharmāṇām agnīṣomīya aṅga tvasya iva yājyā anuvākyā yugalasya aṅga tva avagatiḥ iti
kaustubha darśita prakāreṇa aṅga tvasya sulabha tvāt ca
āgneyaḥ iti taddhitasya devatā pramāpaka tva śaṅkā tad nirasane

original: naca --- taddhitasya sarvadaivataprāpakapramāṇāpekṣayā balavatvāttenaiva devatāvidhānena durbalamāntravarṇikadevatākalpanaṃ na yuktamiti ---
analyzed: na ca tad hitasya sarva daivata prāpaka pramāṇa apekṣayā balavat tvāt tena eva devatā vidhānena durbala māntravarṇika devatā kalpanam na yuktam iti
virodhe tad prābalye pi avirodhe na eka vidhi gaurava āpādaka tvena taddhitasya tad kalpaka tva ayogāt
sarvatra agni kalibhyām ḍhak vaktavyaḥ iti prāc dīvyatīyeṣu tasya idam tasya apatyam

original: “sāsya devatā” “tasya samūhaḥ” “tatra bhava” ityādisāmānyaviśeṣeṣu anekeṣu saṃbandheṣu
analyzed: sā asya devatā tasya samūhaḥ tatra bhavaḥ ityādi sāmānya viśeṣeṣu anekeṣu saṃbandheṣu
ḍhak pratyayasya smaraṇāt āgneya padasya sandigdha artha tvena niyamena devatā vidhāyi tva anupapatteḥ ca
nāmadheya tve tu pramāṇa antara balāt eva devatā taddhita nirṇaya upapatteḥ
atas yuktā eva mantra varṇāt devatā prāptiḥ iti
bhāvanāyāḥ ca avacchedaka dhātvartha apekṣāyām tad avacchedaka yogya dhātvartha aśravaṇe pi devatā saṃbandha kalpita yāgasya eva paścāt avagatasya api avacchedaka tva upapattiḥ

original: iṣyate cābhyuditeṣṭivākye bhāvanāntaravidhipakṣe guṇasaṃbandhavākyeṣu paścādavagatasyaiva dhātvarthasyāvacchedakatvam /
analyzed: iṣyate ca abhyudita iṣṭi vākye bhāvanā antara vidhi pakṣe guṇa saṃbandha vākyeṣu paścāt avagatasya eva dhātvarthasya avacchedaka tvam
atas eva jyotiḥ gauḥ āyuḥ ityādau aprāpti phala kalpita vidhi anyathā anupapatti siddha bhāvanā ākṣipta anirdhārita dhātvartha viśeṣasya eva
jyotiḥ ādi nāma iti avadhārite paścāt avyakta tva ādi sādṛśyena atidiṣṭa dravya devatā saṃbandhena
yāga rūpa viśeṣa nirdhāraṇam iṣṭam

original: ataśca siddhānta iva paścādavagatasyaiva yāgasyabhūdhātunā lakṣaṇayā bhāvanāvidhānopapatteryuktamāgneyapadasya nāmatvam //
analyzed: atas ca siddhānte iva paścāt avagatasya eva lakṣaṇayā bhāvanā vidhāna upapatteḥ yuktam āgneya padasya nāma tvam

original: yathācātra nāmadheyasya nāniṣprayojanatvaṃ tathā adhikaraṇaprayojanakathanavyājena darśayiṣyate /
analyzed: yathā ca atra nāmadheyasya na a niṣprayojana tvam tathā adhikaraṇa prayojana kathana vyājena darśayiṣyate

original: yattu --- prakāśakārai “rāgneyaṃ caturdhā karotī” tyatra āgneyakarmaṇaścaturdhākaraṇāsaṃbhave 'pi caturāvṛttiḥ prayojanam --- ityuktam,
analyzed: yat tu prakāśakāraiḥ rāgneyam caturdhā karoti iti atra āgneya karmaṇaḥ caturdhākaraṇa asaṃbhave catur āvṛttiḥ prayojanam iti uktam
tat puroḍāśam caturdhā karoti iti śākhā antara vākya upasaṃhāreṇa āgneya padasya agni devatā upalakṣita puroḍāśa
paratva avagateḥ puroḍāśasya eva caturdhākaraṇa rūpa vibhāga vidhi pratīteḥ ayuktam iti dūṣitam kaustubhe
atas nyāyasudhākṛt āpādita sakala dūṣaṇa parihāreṇa su dṛḍhaḥ nāmadheya tva pūrvapakṣaḥ iti abhipretya upasaṃharati āgneya padam iti
āgneya padam agnīṣomīya padānām api upalakṣaṇam
ayogya tvāt vācanika viniyoga abhāvāt ca upāṃśuyāja āghāra ādiṣu iva mantra saṃbandha asaṃbhavāt māntravarṇika devatā prāpti asaṃbhavāt āgneya pada nāma tva asaṃbhava upapādanam
na idam nāmadheyam
tad prakhya śāstra abhāvāt
yadi hi aṣṭākapāla karaṇikā atra bhāvanā vidhīyeta
tatas tasyām tvad ukta vidhayā māntravarṇika devatā prāpteḥ sattvāt syāt nāmadheyam
na tu etat asti
aṣṭākapāla kartṛka bhavanena ākṣiptāyām bhāvanāyām aṣṭākapālasya karma tvena eva anvayāt aṣṭākapāla utpatti janaka vyāpāra rūpeṇa eva aṣṭākapāla bhāvanā vidheyā
na tu siddha aṣṭākapāla karaṇikā a nirdhārita dhātvartha viśeṣa avacchinnā yāga ādi bhāvanā iti tasyām agni ādi devatā prakāśaka yājyā anu
vākyā yugalasya katham api anvaya anupapatteḥ yājyā anuvākyā samākhyā sahakṛta liṅgena anyatra eva
viniyogāt anuṣṭhāna lakṣaṇa sthāna bādhāt ca aṣṭākapāla bhāvanā aṅga tve pramāṇa bhāvāt māntravarṇika devatā prāpteḥ asaṃbhava
iti abhipretya siddhāntam āha puroḍāśa karmikā iti

original: upāṃśuyāje tu pratyakṣayajiśravaṇāttatra yogyatayā sthānena mantrānvayopapatteryuktaṃ
analyzed: upāṃśuyāje tu pratyakṣa yaji śravaṇāt tatra yogya tayā sthānena mantra anvaya upapatteḥ yuktam

original: māntravarṇikadevatākalpanamityabhipretya vaiṣamyaṃ darśayituṃ nopāṃśuyāja iveti vyatirekadṛṣṭāntopādānam /
analyzed: māntravarṇika devatā kalpanam iti abhipretya vaiṣamyam darśayitum na upāṃśuyāje iva iti vyatireka dṛṣṭānta upādānam
nanu kṣaraṇa ātmaka āghāra karmaṇām api indraḥ ūrdhvaḥ iti mantrasya ākāṅkṣā yogyatayoḥ abhāvena anvaya ayogāt

original: kathaṃ tadanvayena devatāprāptyā yāgakalpanamityāśaṅkāṃ pariharan vaiṣamyamāha --- naceti //
analyzed: katham tad anvayena devatā prāptyā yāga kalpanam iti āśaṅkām pariharan vaiṣamyam āha na ca iti
tatra liṅgāt anvaya ayoge pi iti āghāram āghārayati iti iti karaṇena śrutyā eva viniyoga anyathā anupapattyā

original: devatāyāgayordvayorapi kalpanāt karaṇasya ca homatvakalpanena virodhāpādanānnāmatopapattiriti
analyzed: devatā yāgayoḥ dvayoḥ api kalpanāt karaṇasya ca homa tva kalpanena virodha āpādanāt nāmatā upapattiḥ iti
vaiṣamyam iti arthaḥ
pūrva ukta rītyā mantra pāṭha krama upapattau api ayogya tvāt eva mantra tvasya anupapattim abhisaṃdhāya
pūrvapakṣi āpādita aneka vidhi nimittaka gaurava parihāreṇa siddhāntam upasaṃharati atas iti
dravya devatā iti
āgneyaḥ iti taddhitena devatā tva viśiṣṭa dravya abhidhānāt aṣṭākapāla padasya ete puroḍāśam
kūrmam bhūtam sarpantam apaśyan iti arthavāda avagata aṣṭa avacchinna kapāla saṃskṛta puroḍāśa dravya vācaka tvāt aprāpta artha tvāt arthavāda samabhivyāhārāt ca

original: laṭo leḍarthakatvaniścayena vidhibhāvanayoḥ pratītau tasyāṃ bhāvanāyāṃ puruṣavyāpārarūpāyāṃ
analyzed: laṭaḥ leṭ arthaka tva niścayena vidhi bhāvanayoḥ pratītau tasyām bhāvanāyām puruṣa vyāpāra rūpāyām

original: aṣṭākapālasya kartṛtvānupapatteḥ prathamayā karaṇatvalakṣaṇayā aṣṭākapālasya karaṇatvenānvaye
analyzed: aṣṭākapālasya kartṛ tva anupapatteḥ prathamayā karaṇa tva lakṣaṇayā aṣṭākapālasya karaṇa tvena anvaye
agni devatā tvasya api ca kāraka tvena anvaye sakala kāraka viśiṣṭa ākṣipta yat kiñcid dhātvartha karaṇa tva iṣṭa sāmānya bhāvyaka tve
buddhe paścāt haviḥ samabhivyāhṛta devatā tvasya yāgam antareṇa asaṃbhavāt bhāvanā apekṣitasya
dhātvarthasya yāga tva avadhāraṇe api śābdatva siddhi artham bhū dhātunā yāga lakṣaṇayā yāvat vākya upātta viśeṣaṇa viśiṣṭa eka yāga bhāvanā vidhānāt na
śrutasya pratyayasya avṛtti prasaṅgaḥ

original: viśeṣaṇavidhikalpanākṛtaṃ ca gauravamanyato prāptatvādāpadyamānaṃ na duṣyati /
analyzed: viśeṣaṇa vidhi kalpanā kṛtam ca gauravam anyatas prāpta tvāt āpadyamānam na duṣyati

original: na ca taddhitasya devatāvidhāyakatve liṅgādeva mantraprāpteḥmantrakramāmnānavaiyarthyam;
analyzed: na ca taddhitasya devatā vidhāyaka tve liṅgāt eva mantra prāpteḥ mantra krama āmnāna vaiyarthyam
agniḥ mūrdhā iti mantra viśeṣa prāptaye tad sārthakyāt

original: ata eva yatra “kapāleṣu śrapayatī“tyādinā pramāṇāntareṇa kapālānāṃ tadadhikaraṇatvasya śrapaṇākhyasaṃskāraviśeṣasya ca prāptiḥ,
analyzed: atas eva yatra kapāleṣu śrapayati ityādinā pramāṇa antareṇa kapālānām tad adhikaraṇa tvasya śrapaṇa ākhya saṃskāra viśeṣasya ca prāptiḥ
tatra utpatti vākye tad viśeṣa vidheḥ akalpanāt nā eva tat kṛtam gauravam

original: nacaivaṃ aṣṭatvasya pramāṇāntarāprāpteḥ samāsabhaṅgāpattyā bhāvanāyā yāgena vaiśiṣṭyāsaṃbhavāt kapālānuvādenāṣṭatvasya yāgasya ca vidhāne vākyabhedaḥ;
analyzed: na ca evam aṣṭa tvasya pramāṇa antara aprāpteḥ samāsa bhaṅga āpattyā bhāvanāyāḥ yāgena vaiśiṣṭya asaṃbhavāt kapāla anuvādena aṣṭa tvasya yāgasya ca vidhāne vākya bhedaḥ
eka prasara tā bhaṅga āpattyā prāptānām api kapālānām viśiṣṭa veṣeṇa aprāpta viśeṣaṇa vidhi kalpaka vidhāna upapatteḥ
atas eva tad aṃśe prāpta tvāt na viśeṣaṇa vidhi kalpanā

original: ataśca viśiṣṭayāgabhāvanāvidhānopapattermantrāṇāmapi tatkrameṇaivāpakarṣasiddherna “śiro ve” tyasyāpakarṣavidhitvakalpanamāpadyate iti guṇavidhirevāgneyaśabda  #
analyzed: atas ca viśiṣṭa yāga bhāvanā vidhāna upapatteḥ mantrāṇām api tad krameṇa eva apakarṣa siddheḥ na śiraḥ vā iti asya apakarṣa vidhi tva kalpanam āpadyate iti guṇa vidhiḥ eva āgneya śabda
iti bhāvaḥ
nāma atideśena iti
balavataḥ api dravya sādṛśyasya codanā liṅga sādṛśya rūpa tvāt tad apekṣayā api balavatā nāma atideśena iti arthaḥ
iti saptamam āgneya guṇa tā adhikaraṇam
adhikaraṇam
barhiḥ ājyayoḥ a saṃskāre śabda lābhāt a tad śabdaḥ

original: barhirājyapuroḍāśādiśabdānāṃ saṃskṛteṣu kuśādiṣu śāstrasthaiḥ prayujyamānatvād yūpādiśabdavatsaṃskāramātravācitve
analyzed: barhiḥ ājya puroḍāśa ādi śabdānām saṃskṛteṣu kuśa ādiṣu śāstra sthaiḥ prayujyamāna tvāt yūpa ādi śabda vat saṃskāra mātra vāci tve

original: saṃskāraviśiṣṭakuśādivācitve vā prāpte --- jātiṃ vihāya kairapyaprayujyamānatvāt
analyzed: saṃskāra viśiṣṭa kuśa ādi vāci tve vā prāpte jātim vihāya kaiḥ api a prayujyamāna tvāt

original: saṃskāraṃ vināpi ca loke 'barhirādāya gāvo gatāḥ' 'ājyaṃ krayyaṃ' 'puroḍāśena me
analyzed: saṃskāram vinā api ca loke barhiḥ ādāya gāvaḥ gatāḥ ājyam krayyam puroḍāśena me
mātā prahelakam dadāti ityādau prayujyamāna tvāt avyabhicārāt lāghavāt ca kuśa tva ādi jāti vāci tvam eva
prayojanam tu yūpa avaṭa staraṇa artha barhiḥ ādau pūrvapakṣe saṃskāra karaṇam
siddhānte na iti
iti aṣṭamam barhiḥ adhikaraṇam
pūrva adhikaraṇeṣu sa apavāde karma nāma tve sādhite prasaṅgāt dravya viṣaya nāmnām abhidheya vicāreṇa

original: guṇaviśeṣavidhivicāra iti prāsaṅgikīṃ prakaraṇasaṅgatiṃ tathā āgneyādiśabdānāṃ devatoddeśyakadravyatyāgātmakayāgasya
analyzed: guṇa viśeṣa vidhi vicāraḥ iti prāsaṅgikīm prakaraṇa saṅgatim tathā āgneya ādi śabdānām devatā uddeśyaka dravya tyāga ātmaka yāgasya
kriyā garbha saṃbandha nimitta devatā viśiṣṭa dravya vāci tvāt tad dvāreṇa kriyā nimitta tve
abhihite barhiḥ ādi śabdānām saṃskāra ātmaka kriyā nimitta tā asti uta na iti vicārāt buddhi sthāna ātmikām anantara saṅgatim
ca spaṣṭa tvāt an abhidhāya saṃskṛta balīyaḥ tva ādi rūpa pūrvapakṣa hetoḥ saṃskāra nimitta tve
gaurava āpatti rūpa siddhānta hetoḥ ca upalakṣaṇa tvam
ca abhipretya viṣaya traya pradarśana pūrvakam pūrvapakṣam āha barhiḥ ājya iti
yājñika prasiddhāḥ barhiḥ ādi śabdānām saṃskṛta paratva upapādanam
śāstra sthaiḥ iti anena śāstra sthānām asaṃskṛte prayogaḥ pīlu adhika karaṇa nyāyena bādhyate

original: kvacicchāstrasthānāmapyasaṃskṛte prayogaścāśvabālādhikaraṇanyāyena yājñikaprasiddhyā bādhyata iti śāstrasthapadasya yājñikaprasiddhaparatayā  #
analyzed: kvacid śāstra sthānām api asaṃskṛte prayogaḥ ca aśva bāla adhikaraṇa nyāyena yājñika prasiddhyā bādhyate iti śāstra stha padasya yājñika prasiddha para tayā
sūcitam
evam ca asaṃskṛta prayogasya prādeśika tvena aśiṣṭa stha tvena tad daurbalyāt sādṛśyasya upapatteḥ na
yājñika prayogasya avigīta tva āpādana kṣamatvam iti arthaḥ yūpa ādi śabdānām iva saṃskṛta vāci tvasya
barhiḥ ādi śabdaḥ upapattiḥ
nanu barhiḥ lunāti ājyam utpunāti puroḍāśam prathayati ityādi saṃskāra vidhiṣu barhiḥ ādi uddeśena
saṃskāra vidhānāt uddeśyānām lavana ādi saṃskṛtānām kuśa ādīnām pūrva avagame saṃskāra vidhi vaiyarthyam

original: anavagame tūddeśyatvāyogāt sutarāṃ tadvidhānānupapattiriti jātivācitvamevopapadyate ityata āha --- yūpādiśabdavaditi //
analyzed: anavagame tu uddeśya tva ayogāt sutarām tad vidhāna anupapattiḥ iti jāti vāci tvam eva upapadyate iti atas āha yūpa ādi śabda vat iti

original: yathā palāśaṃ takṣatīti prakṛtya śrute tatra yattakṣati tadyūpamiti viparītavacanavyaktyāśrayaṇena chedanasaṃskṛtapalāśanāmatvaṃ yūpaśabdasyāvasīyate,
analyzed: yathā palāśam takṣati iti prakṛtya śrute tatra yat takṣati tat yūpam iti viparīta vacana vyakti āśrayaṇena chedana saṃskṛta palāśa nāmatvam yūpa śabdasya avasīyate
evam iha api darbhaiḥ stṛṇīta iti barhiḥ staraṇa arthe mantre kuśa vāci darbha śabda darśanāt
barhiḥ śabdasya yat lunāti tat barhiḥ iti vacana vyakti āśrayaṇena lavana ādi saṃskṛta kuśa nāmatva avadhāraṇāt
piṣṭāni saṃyauti piṇḍam karoti iti śravaṇāt ca puroḍāśa śabdasya prathana ādi saṃskṛta piṣṭa piṇḍa nāma tva avadhāraṇāt utpavana ādīnām
ca kathañcid vṛtta viṣaya tvam utprekṣya ājya śabdasya utpavanāt i saṃskṛta ghṛta nāma tva avadhāraṇāt yūpa ādi vat vacana vyakti viparyaya āśrayaṇena
saṃskāra vidhi vaiyarthyam iti arthaḥ
ādi padena āhavanīya pada saṃgrahaḥ

original: tatrāpi yathā nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇanyāyena yūpādipadānāṃ saṃskāreṣveva śaktiḥ /
analyzed: tatra api yathā na agṛhīta viśeṣaṇa nyāyena yūpa ādi padānām saṃskāreṣu eva śaktiḥ

original: athavā ---- saṃskārāṇāmanekatvādanekaśaktikalpanāpattestadviśiṣṭakāṣṭha eveti matabhedaḥ tadvadihāpīti matabhedaṃ sūcayituṃ vāśabdaḥ //
analyzed: athavā saṃskārāṇām aneka tvāt aneka śakti kalpanā āpatteḥ tad viśiṣṭa kāṣṭhe eva iti mata bhedaḥ tadvat iha api iti mata bhedam sūcayitum vā śabdaḥ
jātim vihāya aprayujyamāna tvena jāti vāci tvam eva barhiḥ ādi śabdānām iti siddhāntaḥ
na barhiḥ ādi śabdānām saṃskāra viśiṣṭa jātimat dravye śaktiḥ
gaurava āpatteḥ
atas eva na saṃskāreṣu api
a tad jātimati saṃskṛte pi prayoga abhāvāt ca

original: evaṃ satyapi yadi saṃskārarahite prayogo na syāttato gauravamapyaṅgīkṛtya tadvācitāṅgīkriyeta,
analyzed: evam sati api yadi saṃskāra rahite prayogaḥ na syāt tatas gauravam api aṅgīkṛtya tad vācitā aṅgīkriyeta
asti ca tatra api prayogaḥ

original: ata eva etādṛśaprayogasya yūpādiṣvabhāvāt svīkriyata eva saṃskāravācitvam /
analyzed: atas eva etādṛśa prayogasya yūpa ādiṣu abhāvāt svīkriyate eva saṃskāra vāci tvam

original: jātimapahāya prayujyamānatvena śāstrasthaiḥ saha virodhābhāvānna śāstrasthaprasiddhyāpi
analyzed: jātim apahāya prayujyamāna tvena śāstra sthaiḥ saha virodha abhāvāt na śāstra stha prasiddhyā api

original: bādha iti tadanurodhena ca na vacanavyaktivaiparītyāśrayaṇaṃ yuktamityabhipretya
analyzed: bādhaḥ iti tad anurodhena ca na vacana vyakti vaiparītya āśrayaṇam yuktam iti abhipretya
siddhāntam āha jātim vihāya iti
kaiḥ api iti anena virodhaḥ darśitaḥ
prayojanantu iti

original: saṃskāravācakānāṃ śabdānāṃ khalevālyāṃ yūpaśabdasyeva nāmātideśena saṃskāraprāpakatvāt saṃskārakaraṇamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: saṃskāra vācakānām śabdānām khalevālyām yūpa śabdasya iva nāma atideśena saṃskāra prāpaka tvāt saṃskāra karaṇam iti arthaḥ
evam yūpa añjana artha ājye
tathā jyotiṣṭoma aṅga pravargya homa pūrva uttara kālayoḥ rohiṇābhyām vai devāḥ svargam
lokam āyan ityādinā ahar rātra devatāke homa dvaye vihite rohiṇa nāmaka puroḍāśa dvayasya
dravya tvena vidhānāt tatra āgnīdhra kartṛka gārhapatya adhiśrayaṇa mātra anuṣṭhāne pi itara saṃskāra an anuṣṭhānam siddhānte
pūrvapakṣe tad anuṣṭhānam iti api jñeyam

original: atra cottarādhikaraṇaprayojanavaddarbhaiḥ stṛṇīteti mantre maudgecarau puṇḍarīkapadasyevohānūhaprayojanāntaramapi draṣṭavyam /
analyzed: atra ca uttara adhikaraṇa prayojana vat darbhaiḥ stṛṇīta iti mantre maudgecarau puṇḍarīka padasya iva ūha anūha prayojana antaram api draṣṭavyam
etad siddha jāti vāci tvam aṅgīkṛtya eva barhiḥ dharmāṇām aṅga pradhāna sādhāraṇa barhiḥ dharma artha tvāt yūpa avaṭa staraṇa artha barhiṣi tad dharma prāptim āśaṅkya
nirākariṣyate iti apaunaruktyam
iti aṣṭamam barhiḥ adhikaraṇam
adhikaraṇam
prokṣaṇīṣu artha saṃyogāt

original: prokṣaṇīśabdasyāpi pūrvavatsaṃskāravācitve 'prokṣaṇībhirudvejitāḥ sma' iti loke saṃskāraṃ
analyzed: prokṣaṇī śabdasya api pūrvavat saṃskāra vāci tve prokṣaṇībhiḥ udvejitāḥ smaḥ iti loke saṃskāram

original: vihāyāpi jātimātre prayogadarśanāt rūḍhyā jalatvajātivācitve vā prāpte --- kḷptāvayavayogenopapattau
