analyzed: vihāya api jāti mātre prayoga darśanāt rūḍhyā jala tva jāti vāci tve vā prāpte kḷpta avayava yogena upapattau
rūḍhi kalpane pramāṇa abhāvaḥ
ataeva aśvakarṇa ādi śabde yoga bādhe eva tad kalpanam
na ca apām audāsīnya avasthāyām prakṛṣṭa ukṣaṇa sādhana tva rūpa yoga abhāvaḥ
phala upadhāna asaṃbhave pi ukṣaṇa sva rūpa yogya tvasya sambhavāt
na ca evam rathakāra pade pi rathakartṛ tva rūpa yoga sambhavena jāti viśeṣe śakti kalpanā anupapattiḥ
anuśāsana balena tad kalpanāt
kartṛ tva svarūpa yogyatvasya a vyāvartaka tvena varṣāsu rathakārasya i tyasya vaiyarthya āpatteḥ ca
prokṣaṇī śabde tu rūḍhi kalpane pramāṇa abhāvāt yaugika tvam eva

original: prayojanaṃ vikṛtau ghṛtaṃ prokṣaṇamityādau prokṣaṇīrāsādayetyavikṛtaḥ prayogaḥ saṃskāravācitvapakṣe,
analyzed: prayojanam vikṛtau ghṛtam prokṣaṇam ityādau prokṣaṇīḥ āsādaya iti avikṛtaḥ prayogaḥ saṃskāra vāci tva pakṣe
ghṛtam āsādaya iti jāti vāci tve
prokṣaṇam āsādaya iti yaugika tve draṣṭavyam
iti navamam prokṣaṇi adhikaraṇam
pūrvavat iti
anena ca prakaraṇa saṅgatiḥ āpavādakī ca anantara saṅgatiḥ sūcitā

original: prokṣaṇīrāsādayetyādau utpavanābhimantraṇādisaṃskāraviśiṣṭe prayogādādyaṃ tadvināpi prayogājjātivācitvena dvitīyaṃ ca pūrvapakṣamāha ---- saṃskāreti
analyzed: prokṣaṇīḥ āsādaya ityādau utpavana abhimantraṇa ādi saṃskāra viśiṣṭe prayogāt ādyam tat vinā api prayogāt jāti vāci tvena dvitīyam ca pūrvapakṣam āha saṃskāra iti
kalpya rūḍhi apekṣayā kḷpta yoga prābalyena prokṣaṇa śabdasya prakṛṣṭa ukṣaṇa sādhanatva paratvena siddhānta upakramaḥ
apām audāsīnya avasthāyām prakṛṣṭa ukṣaṇa sādhanatva abhāvena avayava arthasya akḷpta tvāt taila ādau avayava artha sadbhāve
pi prokṣaṇī śabda aprayogāt saṃskāra vat yogya tvasya api anvayataḥ vyatirekataḥ ca vyabhicārāt
pravṛtti nimitta tva asaṃbhavāt aśvakarṇa ādi śabda vat jale iti rikta śakti kalpanasya āvaśyaka tvāt
kḷpta samudāya prasidhyā ca avayava artha prasiddhi bādhasya rathakāra adhikaraṇe vakṣyamāṇa tvāt
tadvat eva samudāya prasidhyā ap tva jāti vāci tvam iti arthaḥ
samudāya prasiddheḥ akḷpta tvāt ghṛta ādau api prokṣaṇa pada prayoga darśanāt ca prakṛṣṭa ukṣaṇa sādhanatva yogyatva rūpa yogārthasya eva grahaṇam iti siddhānta upakramaḥ
satyam samudāya prasiddheḥ prābalyam
yadi tasyāḥ kḷpta tvam bhavet
apām audāsīnya avasthāyām api prakṛṣṭa ukṣaṇa sādhanatva yogyatā mātreṇa avayava śaktyā eva viśiṣṭa artha bodha upapattau atirikta samudāya śakti kalpane māna abhāvāt
anyathā yaugika pada mātra uccheda āpatteḥ na āptva jāti vāci tvam
taila ādiṣu sati api prakṛṣṭa ukṣaṇa sādhanatvena prokṣaṇa pada vāci tve strīpratyaya bahuvacanayoḥ ananvayāt eva
prokṣaṇī śabda aprayoga upapatteḥ tad rahita prātipadika prayoga mātrasya ghṛtam prokṣaṇam
bhavati ityādau dṛṣṭa tvāt ca prokṣaṇa prayogasya iti abhipretya siddhāntam āha kḷpta iti
yaugika artha pratīti asaṃbhava sthale rūḍheḥ kḷpti sthale ca ukta adhikaraṇa apravṛtti nirūpaṇam

original: yatra tu sarvathā nāvayavārthapratītisaṃbhavaḥ tatreṣṭa eva samudāyaprasidhyā kḷptāvayavaprasiddhibādha ityāha ----- ataeveti //
analyzed: yatra tu sarvathā na avayava artha pratīti saṃbhavaḥ tatra iṣṭaḥ eva samudāya prasidhyā kḷpta avayava prasiddhi bādhaḥ iti āha ataeva iti

original: nanu yogyatayā rathakaraṇavṛttitvasya jātiviśeṣe 'pi saṃbhavāt pratyuta “nemiṃ nayanti
analyzed: nanu yogyatayā ratha karaṇa vṛtti tvasya jāti viśeṣe saṃbhavāt pratyuta nemim nayanti
ṛbhavaḥ yathā iti mantra liṅgāt teṣām api rathakaraṇa vṛtti tva avagamāt rathakāra śabdasya api
yaugika tva āpattau yaugika tva aviśeṣāt traivarṇikasya eva lāghavāt rathakāra padena grahaṇa āpattiḥ iti āśaṅkām anūdya
pariharati na ca evam iti
anuśāsana iti

original: “ṛbhūṇāntve” ti mantravarṇarūpānuśāsanabalena rathakāraśabdasya jātiviśeṣaparatāvagateḥ sāmānyapravṛttayogyatābādha ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: ṛbhūṇān tve ti mantra varṇa rūpa anuśāsana balena rathakāra śabdasya jāti viśeṣa para tā avagateḥ sāmānya pravṛtta yogyatā bādhaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: sāmānyato yogyatāmātreṇa yogāṅgīkāre traivarṇikasya sarvadā rathakartṛtvasaṃbhavena nimittatvānupapattervarṣāvidhigatarathakārapadavaiyathyramapyāpādayati  #
analyzed: sāmānyatas yogyatā mātreṇa yoga aṅgīkāre traivarṇikasya sarvadā rathakartṛ tva saṃbhavena nimitta tva anupapatteḥ varṣā vidhi gata rathakāra pada vaiyathyram api āpādayati
kartṛ tva iti

original: ataśca varṣāvidhivākye phalopahitarathakartṛtvenaiva yogo vācyastādṛśasya caudāsīnyāvasthe
analyzed: atas ca varṣā vidhi vākye phala upahita rathakartṛ tvena eva yogaḥ vācyaḥ tādṛśasya ca audāsīnya avasthe
saudhanvana apara paryāye jāti viśeṣe yogena vyabhicārāt atirikta rūḍhi kalpanam āvaśyakam iti
vaiṣamyam iti arthaḥ
vikṛtau iti
somāraudra caru dravyaka vikṛtau iti arthaḥ
a vikṛtaḥ iti
sarvatra prāk īkaraṇāt prokṣaṇa prātipadika mātrasya kvacid api saṃskāre pi a prayogāt
prokṣaṇī śabdasya eva saṃskṛta vācitā abhyupagamāt īkāra bahuvacana upādāne api ghṛta ādi nivṛtteḥ
prokṣaṇam āsādaya iti ūha asaṃbhavāt avikṛtaḥ iti arthaḥ
yaḥ tu ghṛtam prokṣaṇam iti prayogaḥ
sa na utpavana ādi saṃskāra paraḥ
tathātve ghṛta pada sāmānādhikaraṇyāya prokṣaṇa pade utpavana ādi kārya prokṣaṇa kriyā sādhana lakṣaṇa āpatteḥ

original: atastatra prokṣaṇaśabdaṃ bhāvalyuḍantatvena prokṣaṇakriyāmātrābhidhāyakaṃ yaugikamaṅgīkṛtya tasyāṃ ghṛtasya sādhanatvena lakṣaṇayā vidhānam
analyzed: atas tatra prokṣaṇa śabdam bhāva lyuṭ anta tvena prokṣaṇa kriyā mātra abhidhāyakam yaugikam aṅgīkṛtya tasyām ghṛtasya sādhana tvena lakṣaṇayā vidhānam

original: arthādaupadeśikatvāt apāṃ bādha iti na kvāpi prokṣaṇaprātipadikasya saṃskāraparatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: arthāt aupadeśika tvāt apām bādhaḥ iti na kvāpi prokṣaṇa prātipadikasya saṃskāra para tvam iti bhāvaḥ
ghṛtam āsādaya iti iti
ghṛtasya sūrya ādi vat prākṛta apūrva kārya āpanna tvāt avācaka prokṣaṇī pada nivṛtteḥ yuktaḥ ghṛta pada prakṣepa rūpa ūhaḥ iti arthaḥ
prokṣaṇīḥ āsādaya iti
yaugika tve prokṣaṇa prātipadikāt ap sāmānādhikaraṇyena prayuktayoḥ bahuvacana ikārayoḥ ghṛta ṛtha lopena
nivṛtteḥ ca udaka prāpta prokṣaṇa prāti padikasya alopāt tat eva apradhāna liṅga vaśāt napuṃsaka ekavacana anta tayā uhyam
na ca vidhi gata śabda niyamaḥ nigade dravya viṣaye sti
yena ghṛta śabdasya eva vidhi gatasya prayogaḥ śakyeta
daśame devatā viṣaye eva tad niyamasya vakṣyamāṇa tvāt iti arthaḥ
iti navamam prokṣaṇi adhikaraṇam
adhikaraṇam
tathā a nirmanthye  /
nirmanthyena iṣṭakāḥ pacanti iti atra nirmanthya śabdasya pūrvavat saṃskāra vāci tve nirmanthyam ānaya

original: pakṣyāma iti laukikaprayogena niraste manthanakarmatvasya pākasādhanībhūte 'gnāvabhāvena
analyzed: pakṣyāmaḥ iti laukika prayogena niraste manthana karma tvasya pāka sādhanībhūte gnau abhāvena
manthana prayojya tvasya ca pāka navanīta ādau api sattvena atiprasaṅgāt araṇi prayojya agni tva avāntara vyāpya jāti vāci tve
prāpte manthana prayojya tva yogena eva upapattau ukta rūḍhi kalpane pramāṇa abhāvāt atiprasaṅgasya
ca pāka ādau prācīna prayoga abhāvena eva ābodhaka tva upapatteḥ nirākartum śakya tvāt navanīte

original: ca vācyatvasyāpi vaktuṃ śakyatvād yaugika eva nirmanthyaśabdaḥ /
analyzed: ca vācya tvasya api vaktum śakya tvāt yaugikaḥ eva nirmanthya śabdaḥ

original: evañca “nirmanthyeneṣṭakā” ityatrāgneḥ pākasāmarthyādeva prāptatvānmanthanamātravidhiriti tasyāpi prayogamadhye karaṇaṃ siddhāntaprayojanam
analyzed: evam ca nirmanthyena iṣṭakāḥ iti atra agneḥ pāka sāmarthyāt eva prāpta tvāt manthana mātra vidhiḥ iti tasya api prayoga madhye karaṇam siddhānta prayojanam
iti daśamam nirmanthya adhikaraṇam
pūrvavat eva prakaraṇa saṃgatim sūtra gata tathāśabda sūcitām tathā eva tad sūcitām ātideśikīm
ca anantara saṅgatim saṃśayam ca spaṣṭa tvāt an abhidhāya agni cayana prakaraṇa gatam vākyam udāhṛtya
pūrva adhikaraṇa vat eva ādya pakṣa dvayam pūrva pakṣa dvayam pūrva pakṣa tvena abhidhatte nirmanthya iti
paśau adhimanthana śakala vidhāna ādi aṅgaka manthanasya jātāya anubrūhi iti preṣitena dhanañjayam raṇe

original: iti mantreṇa prakāśanādisaṃskārāṇāṃ ca vihitatvāttatsaṃskṛte vahnau śāstrasthānāṃ
analyzed: iti mantreṇa prakāśana ādi saṃskārāṇām ca vihita tvāt tad saṃskṛte vahnau śāstra sthānām
nirmanthya śabda prayogāt saṃskāra vāci tvam iti ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: etena --- saṃskāranimittatvāt nirmanthya eva vidhīyate iti prakāśakāroktam,
analyzed: etena saṃskāra nimitta tvāt nirmanthyaḥ eva vidhīyate iti prakāśakāra uktam

original: athavā --- paśāvapi saṃskāravidhānādādhānaprakṛtasaṃskārāṇāmiva vinigamanāvirahāt pāśukasaṃskārāṇāmapi vācyatvamiti somanāthenoktam --- apāstam;
analyzed: athavā paśau api saṃskāra vidhānāt ādhāna prakṛta saṃskārāṇām iva vinigamana avirahāt pāśuka saṃskārāṇām api vācya tvam iti somanāthena uktam apāstam
ādhāna kṛta saṃskāra viśiṣṭe kvacid api yājñikānām nirmanthya śabda prayogasya adarśanāt
atas eva cāturmāsya atithi ādiṣu paśu vat nirmanthya śabda prayogaḥ darśitaḥ
dvitīyam pūrvapakṣam upapādayitum ādyam dūṣayati nirmanthyamānayā iti

original: nanu pūrvādhikaraṇanyāyena karmatvayogenaiva tacchabdapravṛttyupapattāvatiriktaśaktikalpane pramāṇābhāvāt kathaṃ jātivācitvapakṣotthānam?
analyzed: nanu pūrva adhikaraṇa nyāyena karma tva yogena eva tad śabda pravṛtti upapattau atirikta śakti kalpane pramāṇa abhāvāt katham jāti vāci tva pakṣa utthānam
tena eva ca gatārtha tvāt adhikaraṇa antara ārambha vaiyarthyam ca iti āśaṅkā dvayam nirasitum āha mathana karma tvasya iti
nirmanthya śabdasya iti sūtra anuśiṣṭa karma tva artha ka ṇyat pratyaya anta tvena
gnau abhāvena saṃskāra vat eva vyabhicāri tvāt
pratikṣaṇam ca agni ādi saṃsargi dravyasya upacaya apacayābhyām parimāṇa prakāśa bhedena bhedāt
saḥ eva ayam vahniḥ iti pratyabhijñāyāḥ ca sajātīya santāna janya tvena api upapatteḥ aikya asādhaka tvāt pāka sādhanībhūta agneḥ bhūta pūrva
gatyā api mathana vyāpya tva asaṃbhavena vinaṣṭe vināśa yogya tā vat mathite mathana vyāpya tva abhāvāt
yogasya vyabhicāri tvam
prokṣaṇa sādhana tvasya udāsīnāsu yogyatāyāḥ sattvāt vaiṣamyam iti viśeṣa śaṅkyayā adhikaraṇa antara ārambhaḥ
atas eva jāti vāci tva pūrvapakṣa siddhiḥ iti arthaḥ
mathana prayojya tva rūpa yogasya navanīte ti prasaṅgaḥ iti bhavadeva mata anuvādaḥ
tad mata nirāsaḥ ca
atiprasaṅgāt iti
etat ca atiprasaṅga āpādanam bhavadeva uktim āśritya nā iyam

original: tena cātra navanīte 'pi manthanakarmatvākhyayogasyātiprasaṅgena yatra prayogābhāvastatrāvayavārthābhāva
analyzed: tena ca atra navanīte manthana karma tva ākhya yogasya atiprasaṅgena yatra prayoga abhāvaḥ tatra avayava artha abhāva

original: ityasaṃbhavena vyatirekavyabhicārānna yaugikatvasaṃbhava iti viśeṣāśaṅkāṃ pradarśya
analyzed: iti asaṃbhavena vyatireka vyabhicārāt na yaugika tva saṃbhavaḥ iti viśeṣa āśaṅkām pradarśya
yoga rūḍhyā samāhitam

original: vastutastu ---- nirmanthyeneti prakṛtavākye nirmanthyaśabdo na “mantha viloḍana” iti daṇḍādibhrāmaṇāparaparyāyaviloḍanārthakamathadhātorniṣpannaḥ;
analyzed: vastutas tu nirmanthyena iti prakṛta vākye nirmanthya śabdaḥ na viloḍane iti daṇḍa ādi bhrāmaṇa apara paryāya viloḍana artha kamatha dhātoḥ niṣpannaḥ
tasya drava dravya viṣaya tvena agnau asaṃbhavāt
apitu mantha manthanaḥ iti para paryāya manthana arthāt niṣpannaḥ

original: ata eva “mantha viloḍane” “mantha manthane” ityupadeśor'thabheda upapadyata iti nātratyanirmanthaśabdasya navanītādāvatiprasaṃgāpādanaṃ yuktam
analyzed: atas eva mantha viloḍane mantha manthane iti upadeśaḥ ūrtha bhedaḥ upapadyate iti na atratya nirmantha śabdasya navanīta ādau atiprasaṃga āpādanam yuktam
vaidyuta ādi agnau aprasaṅgena yoga artha asaṃbhavaḥ iti nyāyasudhā mata tad dūṣaṇe

original: yā tu nyāyasudhākṛtā vaidyutādyagnivyakteḥ manthanajanyatvaśakterapyabhāvāt pūrvanyāyātulyatvena viśeṣāśaṅkā darśitā,
analyzed: yā tu nyāyasudhākṛtā vaidyuta ādi agni vyakteḥ manthana janya tva śakteḥ api abhāvāt pūrva nyāya atulya tvena viśeṣa āśaṅkā darśitā
sā vaidyuta aśma abhighāta uttha sūryakānta ādi janmanām
nivṛttau caritārtha tvāt nirmanthyaḥ bhinavaḥ katham iti bhāṣya ukta prayojaka tā ākṣepa vārtike
vaidyuta ādīnām nirmanthya śabda anabhidheya tvasya eva ukteḥ tatra nirmanthya śabda aprasaktim ādāya avayava artha tva khaṇḍanena
tad āśaṅkāyāḥ vārtika virodhena ayukta tvāt dūṣitā prakāśa kāraiḥ iti upekṣitā pūjya pādaiḥ
araṇi prayojya agni tva avāntara jāti vāci tvam agni tva sāmānyatva param iti prakāśakāra matasya vārtika virodhena khaṇḍanam ca
dvitīyam pūrvapakṣam upasaṃharati araṇi prayojyā iti

original: vihitamanthanajanye saṃskṛte 'gnau tathāvihitamanthanajanye pākārthāgnau cāgnitvāvāntarajātyanapāyādubhayānuvartinyāstasyā eva nirmanthyaśabdavācyatvānna  #
analyzed: vihita manthana janye saṃskṛte gnau tathā avihita manthana janye pāka artha agnau ca agni tva avāntara jāti anapāyāt ubhaya anuvartinyāḥ tasyāḥ eva nirmanthya śabda vācya tvāt na
kvāpi vyabhicāraḥ
yat tu prakāśakāraiḥ agni tva jāti anuvṛtteḥ vaidyuta ādīnām abhidheya tā siddheḥ tad viṣayaḥ
nirmanthyamānayā iti prayogaḥ vinā eva gauṇyā mukhyayā eva vṛttyā abhyupagamyamānaḥ
na duṣyati iti uktam
tat svayam eva nyāyasudhākṛt darśita viśeṣa āśaṅkā nirāsa artham pūrvam vārtika virodhasya
pradarśita tvāt tatra nirmanthya śabda aprayogāt eva tad sādhāraṇa agni tva sāmānya jātim ādāya
jāti vāci tva pakṣa upapādanasya tatra api prayoga āpatteḥ ayukta tvāt ayuktam iti sūcayitum araṇi avāntara padayoḥ upādānam

original: evañca “nirmanthyamānaya pakṣyāma” iti prayogo mathanamātrajanyatva eva natvagnisāmānyamātre 'pītyāśayaḥ //
analyzed: evam ca nirmanthya mānaya pakṣyāmaḥ iti prayogaḥ mathana mātra janya tve eva na tu agni sāmānya mātre pi iti āśayaḥ

original: (mathanaprayojyatvayogena navanītavācyatvasyāpi saṃmatatvasya vastutastvityādinā tadasaṃmatatvasya ca nirūpaṇapūrvakaṃ siddhāntopakramaḥ)
analyzed: mathana prayojya tva yogena navanīta vācya tvasya api saṃmata tvasya vastutas tu ityādinā tad asaṃmata tvasya ca nirūpaṇa pūrvakam siddhānta upakramaḥ
pūrva ukta doṣa āpatteḥ na ayam karmaṇi tavya pratyayaḥ

original: apitu “arhe kṛtyatṛcaśce“ti sūtrādarhārthakaṃ tamaṅgīkṛtya manthanārhatāyāḥ saṃbandhaviśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ
analyzed: apitu arhe kṛtya tṛcaḥ ca iti sūtrāt arha arthakam tam aṅgīkṛtya manthana arha tāyāḥ saṃbandha viśeṣa apekṣāyām
mathana prayojya tvasya eva tasya mathana prayojya vahni santāne nirmanthya śabda pravṛtti nimitta tvena āśrayaṇāt
sarvatra eva avayava yogena eva vaidyuta ādi agni vyāvṛttyā prayoga upapattau na atirikta śakti kalpanam
yuktam iti abhipretya siddhāntam āha manthana prayojya tvena iti
vācya tvasya api iti
na ca aprayogāt navanīta avācya tvam yuktam

original: yo yadvācakaśśabdaḥ sa tatra sarvairapi prayoktavya iti niyame pramāṇābhāvenāsatyapi
analyzed: yaḥ yad vācakaḥ śabdaḥ sa tatra sarvaiḥ api prayoktavyaḥ iti niyame pramāṇa abhāvena asati api

original: prācīnaprayoge kṛte śroturavayavārthayogena jhaṭityevārthapratyayena tadvācyatvakalpane bādhakābhāvāt /
analyzed: prācīna prayoge kṛte śrotuḥ avayava artha yogena jhaṭiti eva artha pratyayena tad vācya tva kalpane bādhaka abhāvāt

original: vastutastu ----- navanīte viloḍanārthakamanthadhātuniṣpannatvenāpi kvacitprayogopapatteḥ nāgnivācakanirmanthyapadavācyatvaṃ yuktamiti prāgeva  #
analyzed: vastutas tu navanīte viloḍana arthaka mantha dhātu niṣpannatvena api kvacid prayoga upapatteḥ na agni vācaka nirmanthya pada vācyatvam yuktam iti prāk eva
sūcitam
nahi kvacid api ākara grantheṣu agni vācaka nirmanthya pada prayogaḥ navanīte uktaḥ

original: pratyuta bhavadevena tannirāsāyaiva yogarūḍherupāsanaṃ kṛtamiti dhyeyam //
analyzed: pratyuta bhavadevena tad nirāsāya eva yoga rūḍheḥ upāsanam kṛtam iti dhyeyam
nirmanthyena iti vākye nirmanthya śabda sārthakya artham pāka sāmarthya prāpta agni uddeśena manthana vidhiḥ tatas antar prayogam api a manthana karaṇa siddhiḥ ca ityādi nirūpaṇam

original: nanu nirmanthyaśabdasya navanītādāvapi vācyatvakalpane agnimātravācitve vā kathamagniviṣayakasya manthanasya kartavyatāsiddhiḥ?
analyzed: nanu nirmanthya śabdasya navanīta ādau api vācyatva kalpane agni mātra vāci tve vā katham agni viṣayakasya manthanasya kartavyatā siddhiḥ
naca nirmanthya pada vaiyarthya āpatteḥ eva mathana kartavyatā siddhiḥ
tasya vaidyuta ādi vyāvṛtti arthaka tvena sārthakyāt iti āśaṅkā parihārāya āha evañca iti
iṣṭakā uddeśena nirmanthya dravya karaṇa pākasya iha vidheya tvāt vidheya pāka sāmarthyāt eva
vahni rūpa dravya viśeṣa prāpteḥ lohita uṣṇīṣa vat aprāpta mathana mātra aṃśe viśeṣaṇa vidhi kalpanāt
tena eva ca vaidyuta ādi vyāvṛtti siddheḥ na ukta doṣaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: ata evāsmin pakṣe aṅgapradhānayormanthanayāgayoḥ ekadeśakālakartṛtvalābhāt prayogamadhyavārtitvalābhācca
analyzed: atas eva asmin pakṣe aṅga pradhānayoḥ manthana yāgayoḥ eka deśa kāla kartṛ tva lābhāt prayoga madhya vārti tva lābhāt ca
adhimanthana śakala nidhāna ādi dharma rahitam kevalam eva manthanam kṛtvā tad niṣpannena agninā

original: yogaḥ kārya iti “yaugike 'ciramathite na” iti bhāṣyoktaṃ prayojanaṃ labhyata ityāha ------ tasyāpīti //
analyzed: yogaḥ kāryaḥ iti yaugike cira mathite na iti bhāṣya uktam prayojanam labhyate iti āha tasya api iti
siddhānta pada upādānāt saṃskāra vāci tva pūrvapakṣe paśu prakaraṇa vihita yāvat saṃskāra sahita manthanasya prayoga anantaḥpātaḥ

original: jātivācitvapakṣe tu prayogabahirbhūtena yena kenacidagninā pāka iti vyatirekeṇa prayojanabhedaḥ sūcitaḥ /
analyzed: jāti vāci tva pakṣe tu prayoga bahis bhūtena yena kenacid agninā pākaḥ iti vyatirekeṇa prayojana bhedaḥ sūcitaḥ
atas nirmanthya śabdasya prokṣaṇī śabda vat yaugika tvam eva iti siddham
sākṣāt manthana janyasya eva nirmanthya pada yaugika tvena mūlakāra abhimata prayojane vārtika avirodha ādi saṃpādana saṃbhavaḥ iti sva mata nirūpaṇam
atra ca sākṣāt mathana janya agni tad janya agni sādhāraṇyena ekasya anugatasya saṃbandhasya nirvaktum aśakteḥ

original: janyatvasyaiva sambandhatvāṅgīkāreṇa sākṣājjanya eva nirmanthyapadasya yaugikatvena
analyzed: janya tvasya eva sambandha tva aṅgīkāreṇa sākṣāt janyaḥ eva nirmanthya padasya yaugika tvena
vācya tva kalpanam yuktam
tad santateḥ tu prayojya tvena saṃbandhena lakṣaṇayā prayogaḥ

original: prakṛte mukhyārthasaṃbhave lākṣaṇikagrahaṇasyānnyāyyatvāt tadarthasyaiva grahaṇādantaḥprayogaṃ manthanakāraṇasiddhiriti sarvatrāgnau yogikatvena  #
analyzed: prakṛte mukhya artha saṃbhave lākṣaṇika grahaṇasya ān nyāyya tvāt tad arthasya eva grahaṇāt antar prayogam manthana kāraṇa siddhiḥ iti sarvatra agnau yogika tvena
vācya tvam na āśrayaṇīyam
kiñca yadi kaustubha ukta rītyā prāpta pāka vidhānam aṅgīkriyate
tadā nirmanthya agni dravya viśiṣṭa pāka vidhānena viśiṣṭa arthe vidhau vaiyarthya abhāvāt
nirmanthya padasya vaidyuta ādi vyāvṛttyā sārthakyāt kim iti viśeṣaṇa vidhi kalpanā gauravam āśritya
mathana aṃśe vidhānam āśrayaṇīyam
yadi tu pākasya anyatas prāptim āśritya uddeśya tvam

original: tadā tasya prāptatvāt vidheḥ viśeṣaṇāṃśe paryavasāne /
analyzed: tadā tasya prāpta tvāt vidheḥ viśeṣaṇa aṃśe paryavasāne

original: api pākasāmarthyādvahnerviśeṣyasyāpi prāptau lohitoṣṇīṣavadiha dravyaviśeṣaṇībhūtakriyāmātra eva paryavasyatīti prayogamadhye tadanuṣṭhānalābhaḥ
analyzed: api pāka sāmarthyāt vahneḥ viśeṣyasya api prāptau lohita uṣṇīṣa vat iha dravya viśeṣaṇībhūta kriyā mātraḥ eva paryavasyati iti prayoga madhye tad anuṣṭhāna lābhaḥ
pākena agneḥ upātta tvāt viśeṣaṇa parā śruteḥ
tat ca pāka aṅga bhūta tvāt tad deśa ādau kariṣyate
iti acira mathita tva upapādana para vārtikam api evam eva neyam
tatra pāka prāptiḥ katham
prāptau api vā katham na viśiṣṭa uddeśaḥ

original: ityāśaṅkāvāntaraprakaraṇādiṣṭānāṃ lābhāt iṣṭakātvasya pākasamaniyatatvenārthāt pākalābhāt nirākartavyeti mama pratibhāti //
analyzed: iti āśaṅkā avāntara prakaraṇa ādiṣṭānām lābhāt iṣṭakā tvasya pāka samaniyata tvena arthāt pāka lābhāt nirākartavyā iti mama pratibhāti
iti daśamam nirmanthya adhikaraṇam
adhikaraṇam
vaiśvadeve vikalpaḥ iti ced

original: cāturmāsyeṣu vaiśvadeve prathame parvaṇi āgneyādīnaṣṭau yāgān vidhāya “vanaiśvadevate yajete” ti śrutam /
analyzed: cāturmāsyeṣu vaiśvadeve prathame parvaṇi āgneya ādīn aṣṭau yāgān vidhāya vanaiśvadevate yajeta iti śrutam

original: tatra vaiśvadevaśabdau guṇavidhiḥ karmanāmadheyaṃ veti cintāyāṃ nāmatve samastavākyaveyarthyaprasaṅāgādagatyā āgneyādiṣu saptasu devatāvidhiḥ;
analyzed: tatra vaiśvadeva śabdau guṇa vidhiḥ karma nāmadheyam vā iti cintāyām nāma tve samasta vākya veyarthya prasaṅāgāt agatyā āgneya ādiṣu saptasu devatā vidhiḥ
āmikṣā yāge viśvedevatāyāḥ prāpta tvāt
devatā viśiṣṭa karma antara vidhānam vā guṇāt
etasmin eva vā karmaṇi āmikṣā vākyena dravya mātra vidhānam

original: evañcāṣṭau havīṃṣi iti liṅgadarśanasyāpyupapattiriti prāpte ----- nāgneyādiṣu guṇavidhiḥ;
analyzed: evam ca aṣṭau havīṃṣi iti liṅga darśanasya api upapattiḥ iti prāpte na āgneya ādiṣu guṇa vidhiḥ
utpatti śiṣṭa devatā avarodhāt
na api karma antara vidhi
bheda bodhaka pramāṇānām nāma tvena upapattau vidhi gaurava āpādaka bheda bodhaka tva anupapatteḥ
atas eva na āmikṣāvākye pi dravya mātra vidhānam
āgneyam aṣṭākapālam nirvape diti āgneya ādi vākye nirvapet iti asya viśiṣṭa vidhāyakasya āmikṣā vākye nuṣaktasya dravya mātra vidhāyi tve vairūpya āpatteḥ ca
atas āgneya ādīnām aṣṭānām api yāgānām nāmadheyam vaiśvadeva śabdaḥ
pravṛtti nimittam ca viśvadeva devatā janya āmikṣā yāga ghaṭita samudāya āśraya tva rūpam
vākyam ca samudāya siddhi artham samudāyinām anuvādakam

original: tatprayojanañcāṣṭānāmapi yāgānāṃ “vasante vaiśvadevena yajete” ti vasantādisambandhadvārā cāturmāsyasaṃjñakatvalābhena phalasambandhasiddhiḥ
analyzed: tad prayojanam ca aṣṭānām api yāgānām vasante vaiśvadevena yajeta iti vasanta ādi sambandha dvārā cāturmāsya saṃjñaka tva lābhena phala sambandha siddhiḥ
itarathā āmikṣā yāgasya eva viśvadeva devatāka tvāt vasanta ādi saṃbandha dvārā cāturmāsya saṃjñaka tva lābhena phala saṃbandha āpatteḥ itareṣām aṅga tva āpattiḥ iti
kaustubhe spaṣṭam
iti ekādaśam vaiśvadeva adhikaraṇam
pūrva adhikaraṇena āgneya adhikaraṇena ca apavādika saṅgatiḥ vaiśvadeva adhikaraṇasya iti nirūpaṇam
guṇa vidhi nāmadheya vicārāt prakaraṇa saṅgatim tathā āgneya adhikaraṇe tad prakhya nyāya asaṃbhavena

original: guṇavidhitve sādhite prasaṅgena guṇaviśeṣavidhivicāre kṛte yatprasaṅgena yadāgataṃ
analyzed: guṇa vidhi tve sādhite prasaṅgena guṇa viśeṣa vidhi vicāre kṛte yat prasaṅgena yat āgatam

original: tatsamāptau tadeva punarupasthāpyata iti nyāyena āgneyādhikaraṇoktaguṇavidhitve satyatrāpi
analyzed: tad samāptau tat eva punar upasthāpyate iti nyāyena āgneya adhikaraṇa ukta guṇa vidhi tve sati atra api
tad prakhya nyāya ākṣepeṇa guṇa vidhi tva pūrvapakṣa karaṇāt āpavādikīm anantara saṅgatim

original: athavā ----- pūrvatra nirmanthyaśabde dravyapradhāne 'pi viśeṣyasyānyataḥ prāpteḥ
analyzed: athavā pūrvatra nirmanthya śabde dravya pradhāne viśeṣyasya anyatas prāpteḥ
viśeṣaṇa mātra vidhi phalaka tve sthite vaiśvadeva śabdasya api viśeṣaṇa bhūta devatā paratvam astu iti
pūrva adhikaraṇa prayojanam upajīvya pūrvapakṣiṇaḥ pratyavasthānāt āpavādikīm anantara saṅgatim
ca spaṣṭa tvāt an abhidhāya vicāra viṣayam darśayati cāturmāsyeṣu iti
vaiśvadevena yajeta iti viṣaya vākya viśeṣaṇa tayā cāturmāsyeṣu iti
aṣṭau yāgān vidhāya iti ca upādānasya siddhānte

original: āgneyādyaṣṭayāgānāṃ yadi viśvajinnyāyena svargaḥ phalaṃ bhavet,
analyzed: āgneya ādi aṣṭa yāgānām yadi viśvajit nyāyena svargaḥ phalam bhavet

original: tadā ya iṣṭyetivākyavat “vasante vaiśvadevena yajete” tyādivākyavihitakāladeśādyanvayasya
analyzed: tadā yaḥ iṣṭyā iti vākya vat vasante vaiśvadevena yajeta ityādi vākya vihita kāla deśa ādi anvayasya
pratyekam eva anvayāt vaiśvadevena yajeta siddhānte
pratyekam prayoga āpattiḥ āpadyate iti atas cāturmāsya pada upādānam
tatas ca cāturmāsyaiḥ svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti anena eka phala sādhana tvena ekādaśa ādi anyāyena

original: yugapatkartavyeṣu sarveṣu yāgeṣu aṣṭānāṃ vaiśvadevanāmatvenaikakālatvāvagame sati
analyzed: yugapad kartavyeṣu sarveṣu yāgeṣu aṣṭānām vaiśvadeva nāma tvena eka kāla tva avagame sati

original: taddvārāvāntaraprayogaikyaṃ vaiśvadevena yakṣya iti saṃkalpaśca labhyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tad dvārā avāntara prayoga aikyam vaiśvadevena yakṣye iti saṃkalpaḥ ca labhyate iti arthaḥ
cāturmāsya ākhya karmaṇaḥ trīṇi varuṇapraghāsa sākamedha sunāsīrīya ākhyāni anyāni parvāṇi tad apekṣayā prathamaḥ iti uktam

original: tadupanyāsasya ca siddhānte catvāri parvāṇīti vyavahārasya samudāyānuvādaprayojanatājñāpanameva prayojanam /
analyzed: tad upanyāsasya ca siddhānte catvāri parvāṇi iti vyavahārasya samudāya anuvāda prayojana tā jñāpanam eva prayojanam

original: yadyatra vaiśvadeva eva yāgaḥ prakṛtaḥ syāttadā tatra viśvadevadevatāyāḥ prāptatvāt
analyzed: yadi atra vaiśvadevaḥ eva yāgaḥ prakṛtaḥ syāt tadā tatra viśvadeva devatāyāḥ prāpta tvāt
guṇa vidhi pūrvapakṣasya samudāyinām bahūnām abhāvāt samudāya anuvāda prayojana tā siddhāntasya
ca asaṃbhava āpatti vāraṇāya āgneya ādi iti uktam

original: tāṃśca “āgneyamaṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapati saumyaṃ carusāvitraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ sārasvataṃ
analyzed: tān ca āgneyam aṣṭākapālam nirvapati saumyam carusāvitram dvādaśa kapālam sārasvatam

original: caruṃ pauṣṇaṃ caruṃ mārutaṃsaptakapālaṃ vaiśvadevīmāmikṣāṃ dyāvāpṛthivyamekakapālaṃ”
analyzed: carum pauṣṇam carum mārutam sapta kapālam vaiśvadevīm āmikṣām dyāvāpṛthivyam eka kapālam
iti vākye vidhāya iti arthaḥ
yadi āmikṣā yāga mātrasya tad prakhya nyāyena nāmadheyam siddhānte abhimatam
tadā tad abhāve vaiśvadeva devatāka tvena eva vasanta ādi kāla vidhāyaka vākye grahaṇa upapatteḥ vaiyarthyam
yadi tu sapta api

original: tadā tu tatra taddevatāyā aprāpteḥ tatprakhyaśāstrāprāpterna tatsaṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: tadā tu tatra tad devatāyāḥ aprāpteḥ tad prakhya śāstra aprāpteḥ na tad saṃbhavaḥ

original: kiñca sūktahaviṣoreva devatātaddhitaniyamena yāgaparatvānupapatteḥ taddevatākahaviṣkayāgalakṣaṇāpatterapi na yuktaṃ nāmadheyatvam /
analyzed: kiñca sūkta haviṣoḥ eva devatā taddhita niyamena yāga paratva anupapatteḥ tad devatāka haviṣka yāga lakṣaṇa āpatteḥ api na yuktam nāmadheya tvam
atas eva eka deśa pravṛtti nimitta aṅgīkaraṇena api agnihotra padasya sāyam prātar abhyāsa dvaya nāmatve pi lakṣaṇa ādi anāpatteḥ na asya tad tulya tvam
na ca taddhitasya saṃbandha sāmānya artha tvena lakṣaṇā prādanam yuktam
devatā taddhite pi saṃbandha sāmānyam ādāya eva devatā tva rūpa viśeṣa sambandha paryavasānena paryavasāna upapattau sā asya devatā iti anuśāsana vaiyarthya āpatteḥ
tasya eva śakyārtha anuśāsana tva svīkāreṇa anyasya lākṣaṇika anuśāsana tva aṅgīkāreṇa tad anivāraṇāt
atas vidheya antara abhāve nāmnaḥ ca avidheya tvāt samasta vākya ānarthakya prasaṅgāt guṇa vidhiḥ eva ayam iti arthaḥ
devatā vidhiḥ iti
dravya devatā ubhaya parasya api vaiśvadeva śabdasya devatā rūpa viśeṣaṇa aṃśa mātre vidhi vyāpāreṇa a vākya bhedaḥ

original: naca ----- yāgānuvādena devatāyā dravyasya ca vidhau vākyabhedāpattiḥ,
analyzed: naca yāga anuvādena devatāyāḥ dravyasya ca vidhau vākya bheda āpattiḥ

original: yaditu prakṛtyarthasya devatātvena tasya ca dravye 'nvayasya vyutpannatvāt tadanāpattiḥ śaṅkyate,
analyzed: yadi tu prakṛti arthasya devatā tvena tasya ca dravye nvayasya vyutpanna tvāt tad anāpattiḥ śaṅkyate

original: tadā vidvadvākyavihitakarmānuvādenāgneyādivākye āgneyapadena dravyadevatāvidhānenārūpatāparihāre 'pi vākyabhedāpattiḥ siddhānte na sidhyet
analyzed: tadā vidvat vākya vihita karma anuvādena āgneya ādi vākye āgneya padena dravya devatā vidhānena arūpa tā parihāre pi vākya bheda āpattiḥ siddhānte na sidhyet

original: ata etādṛśasthale devatātvasya kārakatvena bhāvanāyāmevānvayasvīkāreṇa dravye 'nvayābhāvena tadāpattyupapādane prakṛte 'pi tadāpattissyādeveti  #
analyzed: atas etādṛśa sthale devatā tvasya kāraka tvena bhāvanāyām eva anvaya svīkāreṇa dravye nvaya abhāvena tad āpatti upapādane prakṛte pi tad āpattiḥ syāt eva iti
vācyam
asya iti sarvanāmnaḥ prakṛta parāmarśi tvena sva vākya upātta dravya viśeṣa alābhe ṣṭākapāla ādi prakṛta dravya para tva upapatteḥ
teṣām ca utpatti vākyataḥ eva prāptau viśeṣaṇībhūta devatā vidhi upapattiḥ iti arthaḥ
vaiśvadeva padasya āgneya ādi vākya vihita yāge guṇa samarpaka tve utpatti śiṣṭa nyāya virodhasya dvedhā parihāraḥ
utpatti śiṣṭa guṇa agni ādi devatā antara avarodhena utpanna śiṣṭa tad devatā niveśaḥ na saṃbhavati iti āśaṅkā nirāsāya pūrva upapādita nyāyatva asaṃbhava abhiprāyeṇa āgatyā iti uktam
evam ca guṇa adhikaraṇa vakṣyamāṇa utpatti śiṣṭa guṇa balīyaḥ tvasya api iha ā kṣepeṇa samādhānam iti sūcitam

original: athavā ----- sarvanāmaśrutyaivāṣṭākapālādidravyeṣu devatāvidhiragatyaivaitaddevatāyā utpannaśiṣṭāyā api vidhirnāyuktaḥ /
analyzed: athavā sarvanāma śrutyā eva aṣṭākapāla ādi dravyeṣu devatā vidhiḥ agatyā eva etat devatāyāḥ utpanna śiṣṭāyāḥ api vidhiḥ na ayuktaḥ
yadihi vaiśvadevī āmikṣā vājibhyaḥ vājinam ca iti aśroṣyata
tadā kathañcid tatra utpatti śiṣṭa prābalyam aṅgīkriyeta

original: ata eva guṇādhikaraṇapūrvapakṣe vājamāmikṣārūpamannaṃ yeṣāṃ viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ te vājino viśvedevāstebhyo vājinamityarthāṅgīkāreṇaivotpattiśiṣṭaguṇaprābalyaśaṅkā  #
analyzed: atas eva guṇa adhikaraṇa pūrvapakṣe vājam āmikṣā rūpam annam yeṣām viśveṣām devānām te vājinaḥ viśvedevāḥ tebhyaḥ vājinam iti artha aṅgīkāreṇa eva utpatti śiṣṭa guṇa prābalya śaṅkā  /
nirastā
prakṛte tu vaiśvadeva śabdasya yaugika tvasya asandigdha tvāt aṣṭākapāla ādi parāmarśa upapatteḥ

original: tatrāpi 'śikye ghaṭosti tamānaye'tyādau sarvanāmnaḥ śuddhadravyaparāmarśitvasya darśanāt
analyzed: tatra api śikye ghaṭaḥ asti tam ānaya ityādau sarvanāmnaḥ śuddha dravya parāmarśi tvasya darśanāt
pūrva devatā saṃbandha parityāgena devatā antara saṃbandhasya pradhāna āvṛtti āpādaka tvena ayogāt ca
samuccaya anupapatteḥ vikalpena eva yuktaḥ niveśaḥ

original: naca ----- yathā savanīyahaviṣṣu “indrāya harivate dhānā nirvapedi” tyādivihitanirvāpe
analyzed: na ca yathā savanīya haviḥṣu indrāya harivate dhānāḥ nirvapet ityādi vihita nirvāpe

original: harivadādīnāṃ devatātve 'pi eteṣāṃ haviṣāṃ “indrameva yajantī” ti vacanāntaravihitendradevatāyā
analyzed: harivat ādīnām devatā tve pi eteṣām haviṣām indram eva yajanti iti vacana antara vihita indra devatāyāḥ

original: yāge saṃbandhāśrayaṇena na vikalpastathehāpyupapatteḥ kimiti tadāśrayaṇam?
analyzed: yāge saṃbandha āśrayaṇena na vikalpaḥ tathā iha api upapatteḥ kim iti tad āśrayaṇam

original: iti ------ vācyam; tatra nirvāpe devatānvayasaṃbhave 'pi iha tathā svīkāre 'ṣṭākapālādipadānāmananvayāpatteragatyā lakṣaṇayā yāgavidheravaśyaṃ  #
analyzed: iti vācyam tatra nirvāpe devatā anvaya saṃbhave pi iha tathā svīkāre ṣṭākapāla ādi padānām ananvaya āpatteḥ agatyā lakṣaṇayā yāga vidheḥ avaśyam
svīkārya tayā vaiṣamyāt

original: tatra tu dhānādīnāṃ nirvāpasaṃbhavena tadanvayopapatteryukto nirvāpānvayaḥ /
analyzed: tatra tu dhānā ādīnām nirvāpa saṃbhavena tad anvaya upapatteḥ yuktaḥ nirvāpa anvayaḥ
aṣṭākapāla ādīnām tu tad anvaya ayogya tvāt viśeṣaḥ
yadi api prastuta dravya parāmarśe bahu tvāt bahuvacana āpattiḥ
tathā api prakṛta haviṣṭva rūpa dharma aikya vivakṣayā api ekavacana upapattiḥ iti arthaḥ
vājina yāgasya pratipatti tvena āmikṣā yāga aṅga tvāt prakaraṇa asaṃbhavena yajina anuvāda asaṃbhava abhiprāyeṇa saptasu iti uktam

original: āmikṣāyāgasya prakaraṇasaṃbhave 'pi “aprāpte śāstramarthavadi“ti nyāyena yajatau vairūpyāprasaṅgāya saptasvityuktam /
analyzed: āmikṣā yāgasya prakaraṇa saṃbhave pi aprāpte śāstram arthavat iti nyāyena yajatau vairūpya a prasaṅgāya saptasu iti uktam
tat eva viśadayati ā bhikṣā iti
tatra triṃśat āhuti saṃpatti liṅga darśana upapattiḥ ca
yadi api ca utpatti śiṣṭa balīyaḥ tvam

original: tathāpi vājinayāgavadeva viśiṣṭakarmāntaravidhitvenaiva pakṣāntareṇa guṇavidhipakṣaṃ draḍhayati ----- devatāviśiṣṭeti //
analyzed: tathā api vājina yāga vat eva viśiṣṭa karma antara vidhi tvena eva pakṣa antareṇa guṇa vidhi pakṣam draḍhayati devatā viśiṣṭa iti
taddhitena ca avagate nirdhārite dravya viśeṣe nirdhāraṇa apekṣāyām aneka devatāka tva sādṛśyena atideśāt puroḍāśa ādi dravya viśeṣa avadhāraṇa siddhiḥ iti arthaḥ
na ca karma antara tve triṃśat āhuti saṃpatti pradarśaka liṅga darśana anupapattiḥ
ekatriṃśat āhuti āpatteḥ iti prakāśakāra ukta dūṣaṇa āpattiḥ
puroḍāśa āmikṣayoḥ eka devatā tvena sānnāyya vat saha yāga avagateḥ trayodaśa amāvāsyāyām iti vat upapatteḥ
aṣṭau havīṃṣi ityādi liṅga darśana avirodha artham prakāra antareṇa pūrvapakṣaḥ viśiṣṭa vidhi pūrvapakṣe prakāśakāra āpādita anupapatti antara parihāraḥ ca
pakṣa antareṇa dravya viśeṣa prāpti pradarśana āpatti dvārā aṣṭau havīṃṣi iti liṅga darśana anupapattim pariharati
apinā prakāśakāra āpādita liṅga anupapatti parihāraḥ mad uktaḥ sūcitaḥ
etena vaiśvadeva padasya dravya para tve pi prakṛtānām bahu tvāt vaiśvadevena iti

original: copādeyaviśeṣaṇasyaikatvasya vivakṣitatvena kiṃ tat dravyamityanadhyavasāyāt paryāyeṇa
analyzed: ca upādeya viśeṣaṇasya eka tvasya vivakṣita tvena kim tat dravyam iti anadhyavasāyāt paryāyeṇa

original: cānyasarvagrahaṇe paryāyavṛttereva doṣatvāt vikalpāpatteśca na viśiṣṭavidhyāśrayaṇena
analyzed: ca anya sarva grahaṇe paryāya vṛtteḥ eva doṣa tvāt vikalpa āpatteḥ ca na viśiṣṭa vidhi āśrayaṇena
karma antara tva pūrvapakṣaḥ yuktaḥ iti prakāśa kāra uktam apāstam
sarvanāmnām prakṛta parāmarśi tva niyama abhāvena tad guṇāḥ tu iti sūtre tad śabdasya iva buddhi stha parāmarśi tayā
iha upapattau pūrva ukta rītyā viśeṣa avadhāraṇa siddheḥ ca aṣṭākapāla ādi sarva parāmarśasya a saṃmata tvāt tad dūṇā prasaṅgāt
a stuvā tad niyamaḥ
evam api prakṛta parāmarśi tvasya iva avyavahita parāmarśi tvasya api tyāge pramāṇa abhāvena eka kapālasya eva parāmarśena viśeṣa avadhāraṇa ādi upapatteḥ ca
mūle anukta pūrva upapādita āpatti antara sūcanāya vā śabdaḥ prayuktaḥ
vārtika kṛt ādṛta guṇa vidhi tvam nāmatvam ubhayam bhavatu iti samuccaya pūrvapakṣasya

original: yattu vārtike ---- nirmanthyaśabdasya yaugikasya nāmadheyatve satyapi guṇavidhitvasyāpi
analyzed: yat tu vārtike nirmanthya śabdasya yaugikasya nāmadheya tve sati api guṇa vidhi tvasya api
darśanāt vaiśvadeva śabdasya api yaugika tvāt sati api nāmadheya tve guṇa vidhi tvam api astu iti

original: samuccayena pūrvapakṣaḥ kevalanāmadheyatvena siddhānta iti pakṣāntareṇa darśitam,
analyzed: samuccayena pūrvapakṣaḥ kevala nāmadheya tvena siddhāntaḥ iti pakṣa antareṇa darśitam
svayam eva matvā artha lakṣaṇā vākya bheda tad prakhya tad vyapadeśānām abhāvena
nāma tā anupapatteḥ ukta tvāt asiddha nāmadheya tva samuccaya ayogāt sarvatra ca guṇa vidhi asaṃbhave
nāmatva anupapatteḥ ca sakṛt uccaritasya vaiśvadeva śabdasya viruddha ubhaya rūpa tā āpatteḥ guṇa vidhi pratiyogika nāmatvasya abhāvena
samuccaya pūrvapakṣa ayogāt prauḍhi vāda mātram iti āveditaḥ nyāyasudhāyām iti upekṣitam pūjya pādaiḥ
vaiśvadeva padasya saṃbandha sāmānya taddhita antasya yāga nāma tve eva vidhi lāghavāt tad nāma tva siddhāntaḥ
siddhāntam āha na āgneya ādiṣu iti

original: yaduktaṃ sarvanāmnā prakṛtadravyaparāmarśāt tatraiva guṇādhikaraṇapūrvapakṣarītyā devatāvidhānam ----- iti,
analyzed: yat uktam sarvanāmnā prakṛta dravya parāmarśāt tatra eva guṇa adhikaraṇa pūrvapakṣa rītyā devatā vidhānam iti
tat na sarvanāmnaḥ sva vākya anupātta dravya para tva asaṃbhave pi sva vākya upātta yāga para tva upapatteḥ

original: na hi sūktahavissamabhivyāhāra eva devatātaddhita iti niyamo 'sti /
analyzed: na hi sūkta haviḥ samabhivyāhāre eva devatā taddhite iti niyamaḥ sti

original: “śirovā etadyajñasya yadāgneyo hṛdayamupāṃśuyāja” ityādau tadabhāve 'pi devatātaddhitadarśanāt,
analyzed: śiraḥ vai etat yajñasya yat āgneyaḥ hṛdayam upāṃśuyājaḥ ityādau tad abhāve pi devatā taddhita darśanāt
pracura prayogāt taddhitasya saṃbandha sāmānye pi śakti avagamāt devatā tva rūpa saṃbandha viśeṣasya
pramāṇa antareṇa bodha upapatteḥ na lakṣaṇa āpattiḥ iti iha api tad upapattau samudāya anuvāda ārtha tvena
sārthakyena ānarthakya abhāvāt iti arthaḥ
vidhi gaurava iti
matu artha lakṣaṇa āpatteḥ api upalakṣaṇam etam
āgneya ādi vākye viśiṣṭa vidhi parasya nirvapet ityasya āmikṣā vākye nuṣaktasya api tathā tva āvaśyaka tayā

original: āmikṣāvākye yajikalpanārthaṃ dravyadevatāsaṃbandhasyāpi vidhānāvaśyakatayā ca vaiśvadevaśabdasya
analyzed: āmikṣā vākye yaji kalpanā artham dravya devatā saṃbandhasya api vidhāna āvaśyaka tayā ca vaiśvadeva śabdasya
vairūpya āpatteḥ ca iti

original: yathaiva hi “saptadaśa mārutīḥ trivatsānupākaroti tāvataścokṣṇa” ityatrokṣṇāṃ paryagnikṛtānāṃ
analyzed: yathā eva hi saptadaśa mārutīḥ trivatsān upākaroti tāvataḥ ca ukṣṇaḥ iti atra ukṣṇām paryagnikṛtānām
utsarge karma bheda āpādakasya eka paśu niṣpanna ekādaśa avadāna gaṇa atideśasya abhāve pi mārutī vākya sthasya
saptadaśa karma vidhāyaka ākhyātasya iha anuṣaktasya iha vairūpya āpatteḥ bhinnāni eva karmāṇi vidhīyante
tathā iha api anuṣakta nirvapati padasya vairūpya āpattyā karma vidhāyaka tvam eva yuktam
kiñca āmikṣā vākye yajya kalpane āmikṣā kim anuvādena vidhīyate
na tāvat viśvadeva anuvādena
tathātve dravyasya devatā aṅga tva āpattyā yāga aṅga tva anāpatteḥ

original: vaiśvadevīpadena taddhitena āmikṣāpadasya tātparyagrāhakatayā'mikṣāyā evopādānāt vaiśvadevīśabdenaiva dravyavidhāne ekaprasaratābhaṅgāpatteḥ
analyzed: vaiśvadevī padena taddhitena āmikṣā padasya tātparya grāhaka tayā āmikṣāyāḥ eva upādānāt vaiśvadevī śabdena eva dravya vidhāne eka prasara tā bhaṅga āpatteḥ

original: ato yāgānuvādena dravyavidhānārthaṃ yajikalpanāvaśyakatve tatraiva dravyadevatāsaṃbandhasya
analyzed: atas yāga anuvādena dravya vidhāna artham yaji kalpanā āvaśyaka tve tatra eva dravya devatā saṃbandhasya
kalpakasya vidhānam āvaśyakam iti tad viśiṣṭa karma antara anvaya nirākāṅkṣa āmikṣāyāḥ na etad vākya vihita karmaṇi prāptiḥ iti arthaḥ

original: yattu ----- nyāyaprakāśe ------ “vaiśvadevena yajete” tyasya yāgavidhāyitve āmikṣāvadvājinasyāpyetadyāgāṅgatvāpattyā vikalpāpattiḥ ------iti  #
analyzed: yat tu nyāyaprakāśe vaiśvadevena yajeta ityasya yāga vidhāyi tve āmikṣā vat vājinasya api etad yāga aṅga tva āpattyā vikalpa āpattiḥ iti
dūṣaṇam dattam
tat na vājina vākye viśvadeva devatāka yāga pratyabhijñā abhāve etad yāgasya dravya viśeṣa ākāṅkṣāyām
jhaṭiti upasthāpaka vaiśvadeva pada upātta etad yāga anuvādena vihita āmikṣāyāḥ vidhānena nairākāṅkṣyāt vājina niveśa anupapatteḥ
atas pūrva uktam eva dūṣaṇam sādhu

original: ataśca prakṛteṣu yāgeṣu guṇavidhyasaṃbhavāt sāmānādhikaraṇyena yajinānūditasarvayāgānāṃnāmadheyaṃ vaiśvadevaśabda ityupasaṃharati--- ata iti
analyzed: atas ca prakṛteṣu yāgeṣu guṇa vidhi asaṃbhavāt sāmānādhikaraṇyena yajinā anūdita sarva yāgānām nāmadheyam vaiśvadeva śabdaḥ iti upasaṃharati atas iti
utpatti śiṣṭa nyāya sahakāreṇa tatprakhya nyāyasya vaiśvadeva nāmatve pramāṇa tvam

original: atra ca na kevalaṃ tatprakhyanyāyena nāmatvam;
analyzed: atra ca na kevalam tad prakhya nyāyena nāma tvam
tasya guṇa vidhi asaṃpādana dvārā pravṛtti nimitta āpādaka tvena iha ā mikṣā yāge guṇa vidhi nirāsa saṃpādaka tve
pi āgneya ādi yāgeṣu tad asaṃbhavasya kartum aśakya tvāt atas utpatti viśiṣṭa guṇa balīyaḥ tvasya api
sahakāri tvam abhipretya āha utpatti iti

original: yattu ----- prācīnaiḥ “yadviśvedevāḥ samayajante” tyarthavādāvagatasya viśvadevakṛtayāgatvasya pravṛttinimittatvaṃ ----- uktaṃ,
analyzed: yat tu prācīnaiḥ yat viśvedevāḥ samayajanta iti arthavāda avagatasya viśvadeva kṛta yāga tvasya pravṛtti nimitta tvam uktam
tat avāstavasya nimitta tva anupapatteḥ ayuktam
yat api viśva śabdasya sarva vācaka tvam abhipretya sarva agni ādi devatāka tvam kaiścid darśitam

original: tadapi rūḍhityāgādayuktamityabhipretya tajjijñāsāyāṃ yadyapica tatprakhyanyāyenāmikṣāyāga eva pravṛttinimittaṃ saṃpādyate;
analyzed: tat api rūḍhi tyāgāt ayuktam iti abhipretya tad jijñāsāyām yadi api ca tatprakhya nyāyena āmikṣā yāgaḥ eva pravṛtti nimittam saṃpādyate
tathā api yajeta iti anena prakṛta tva aviśeṣāt vakṣyamāṇa arthavat tvāya sarveṣām eva yāgānām
samudāyīkaraṇa artham anuvādāt samudāye ca viśvadeva devatāka tvasya sva janya ghaṭita tva saṃbandhena
sattvāt tad dvārā samudāyiṣu aṣṭasu pravṛtti nimitta saṃpādana upapattim abhipretya āha
pravṛtti nimittam ca iti

original: evañca taddhitena samudāyināṃ coktāvapi teṣāṃ saṃbandhasāmānye padaśrutyāvagate saṃbandhaviśeṣāpekṣāyāṃ
analyzed: evam ca taddhitena samudāyinām ca uktau api teṣām saṃbandha sāmānye pada śrutyā avagate saṃbandha viśeṣa apekṣāyām
yogyatayā viśvadeva devatā janya āmikṣā yāga ghaṭita samudāya āśraya tva rūpa saṃbandha viśeṣa avagateḥ vaiśvadeva padena ekena upādānāt
prājāpatyānām iva utpatti vākye eka pada upādāna abhāve pi nānā vākya utpannānām api eka samudāya siddheḥ na
vaiśvadeva śabde chatri nyāyena vaiśvadeva avaiśvadeva samudāye prācīna upapādita lakṣaṇa āśrayaṇa kleśaḥ api iti bhāvaḥ
tad prayojanam ca iti itarathā iti

original: saptasu devatāvidhānapūrvapakṣe teṣāmapi vaiśvadevapadena grahaṇaṃ saṃbhavatyeveti śaṅkanirāsāyāmikṣāyāgasyaivetyevakāraḥ prayuktaḥ /
analyzed: saptasu devatā vidhāna pūrvapakṣe teṣām api vaiśvadeva padena grahaṇam saṃbhavati eva iti śaṅka nirāsāya āmikṣā yāgasya eva iti eva kāraḥ prayuktaḥ
tatra agni ādīnām api vikalpena pūrvapakṣe devatā tvāt vasanta ādi vidhau nitya anitya saṃyoga virodha āpatteḥ na grahaṇam iti arthaḥ

original: vastutastu ------ karmāntarapūrvapakṣe samānaliṅgakatvena vasantādivākye vaiśvadevapadamasyaiva nāmeti niyantumaśakteḥ upalakṣaṇamevāmikṣāyāgasyaivetipadam
analyzed: vastutas tu karmāntara pūrva pakṣe samāna liṅgaka tvena vasanta ādi vākye vaiśvadeva padam asya eva nāma iti niyantum aśakteḥ upalakṣaṇam eva āmikṣā yāgasya eva iti padam
eva kāraḥ ca āgneya ādi saptaka vyāvṛtti arthakaḥ eva iti dhyeyam
vaiśvadeva padasya āmikṣā yāga para tve pi āgneya ādīnām vasanta kāla ādi saṃbandha siddhyā
āgneya ādīnām tad saṃbandha siddhiḥ iti prācīna mata nirāsa pūrvakam phala saṃbandha siddhiḥ āgneya ādīnām
prayojanam iti nirūpaṇam
atra ca prācām grantheṣu vasanta kāla prācīna pravaṇa deśa saṃbandha siddhiḥ āgneya ādīnām iti samudāya anuvāda prayojanam uktam
na tu etat eva prayojanam
tasya anyathā api siddheḥ

original: tathāhi ------ etadabhāve hi vasantādivākye āmikṣāyāgasyaiva sākṣāt kālānvaye 'pi
analyzed: tathā hi etad abhāve hi vasanta ādi vākye āmikṣā yāgasya eva sākṣāt kāla anvaye pi
cāturmāsyaiḥ svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti atra āmikṣā yāgasya eva varuṇapraghāsa ādi parva antara sahacaritasya
phala saṃbandha āpatteḥ āgneya ādinām vaiśvadeva avāntara prakaraṇāt tad aṅga tva āpattiḥ

original: cāturmāsyaśabdo hi “caturthe caturthe māsyekena parvaṇā yajete“ti vākyāntarānurodhenottaraparvatraye
analyzed: cāturmāsya śabdaḥ hi caturthe caturthe māsi ekena parvaṇā yajeta iti vākya antara anurodhena uttara parva traye
māsa catuṣṭaya uttara tvasya śrautasya pūrva avadhi apekṣāyām arthāt ādyasya parvaṇaḥ māsa catuṣṭaya pūrva bhāva avagateḥ māsa catuṣṭaya pūrva uttara bhāva rūpa pravṛtti nimittena
caturṇām parvaṇām nāmadheyam
pūrva uttara bhāvasya ca viśeṣa apekṣāyām vasanta ādi vākyena kāla vidhānāt yeṣām eva pūrva uttara bhāva ghaṭaka vasanta ādi saṃbandhaḥ teṣām
mā iva cāturmāsya nāma avacchinnena yajinā phala saṃbandha avagateḥ āmikṣā yāgasya eva phala saṃbandha avagatau
vājina yāga vat anyeṣām tad aṅga tva āpattau aṅga pradhānānām eka deśa kāla kartṛ tva sidhyā vasanta prācīna pravaṇa deśa siddhiḥ labhyata

original: eveti na tāvanmātrasya prayojanatvamiti sūcayituṃ phalasaṃbandhasiddhiparyantānudhāvanam //
analyzed: eva iti na tāvat mātrasya prayojana tvam iti sūcayitum phala saṃbandha siddhi paryanta anudhāvanam
vaiśvadeva nāma tve eva triṃśat āhuti liṅga darśanasya api upapattyā nāma tva upasaṃhāraḥ
kaustubhe spaṣṭam iti
upapāditam etat
evam nava prayājāḥ nava anūyājāḥ dvau āghārau dvau ājyabhāgau aṣṭau havīṃṣi
triṃśat āhutayaḥ hūyante iti āhavanīya āhutīnām vaiśvadeve parvaṇi nitya vat śravaṇam
triṃśat tva liṅga darśanam upapadyate

original: anyathā saptasu devatāvidhipakṣe āgneyādīnāṃ saptānāṃ saṃpratipannadevatākatvena sānnāyyavatsahānuṣṭhānenaikāhutyāpatteḥ tadvirodha iti siddhaṃ  #
analyzed: anyathā saptasu devatā vidhi pakṣe āgneya ādīnām saptānām saṃpratipanna devatāka tvena sānnāyya vat saha anuṣṭhānena eka āhuti āpatteḥ tad virodhaḥ iti siddham
nāmadheyam vaiśvadeva padam iti

original: prayojanaṃ pūrvottarapakṣopanyāsenaiva sujñeyatvātpūrvapakṣe “vaiśvadeve vikalpa” iti sūtreṇaiva ca kaṇṭhoktarenoktam //
analyzed: prayojanam pūrva uttara pakṣa upanyāsena eva su jñeya tvāt pūrva pakṣe vaiśvadeve vikalpaḥ iti sūtreṇa eva ca kaṇṭha uktarena uktam
iti ekādaśam vaiśvadeva adhikaraṇam
adhikaraṇam
pūrvavantaḥ vidhāna arthāḥ tad sāmarthyam samāmnāye  /
pūrvavantaḥ vidhāna arthāḥ tad sāmarthya samāmnāye

original: “vaiśvānaraṃ dvādaśakapālaṃ nirvapet putre jāte” ityanena yāgaṃ vidhāya “yadaṣṭākapālo
analyzed: vaiśvānaram dvādaśa kapālam nirvapet putre jāte iti anena yāgam vidhāya yat aṣṭākapālaḥ
bhavati gāyatriyā eva enam brahmavarcasena punāti ityādinā aṣṭākapāla nava kapāla daśa kapāla ekādaśa kapāla dvādaśa kapālānām

original: phalānyanūdyānte “yasmin jāte etāmiṣṭiṃ nirvapati pūta eva sa tejasvyannāda indriyāvī
analyzed: phalāni anūdyānte yasmin jāte etām iṣṭim nirvapati pūtaḥ eva sa tejasvī anna ādaḥ indriyāvī
paśumān bhavati iti śrutam

original: tatra dvādaśatve aṣṭatvādeḥ prāptatvādaṣṭākapālādiśabdā vaiśvānarayāganāmadheyamityādyaḥ pakṣaḥ /
analyzed: tatra dvādaśatve aṣṭatva ādeḥ prāptatvāt aṣṭākapāla ādi śabdāḥ vaiśvānara yāga nāmadheyam iti ādyaḥ pakṣaḥ

original: svarūpeṇa prāptāvapi paricchedakatvena prāptyabhāvād guṇavidhaya eva te /
analyzed: sva rūpeṇa prāptau api paricchedaka tvena prāpti abhāvāt guṇa vidhayaḥ eva te
aṣṭatvam aṣṭākapāla dravyam vā pūrva yāge vidhīyate
upakrama upasaṃhāra aikyena ca eka vākya tva pratīteḥ na dvādaśa kapālasya utpatti śiṣṭa tā
athavā astu vākya nānātvam
tathā api yat dvādaśa kapālaḥ bhavati iti anena eva tad vidhiḥ

original: brahmavarcasādirūpaphaloddeśena prakṛtayāgāśritaguṇā evāṣṭākapālādayo vidhīyante iti tṛtīyaḥ /

original: siddhāntastu saṃbhavatyekavākyatve tadbhedasyānyāyyatvāt prakṛtayāgasyaiveyaṃ sarvā stutiḥ /
analyzed: siddhāntaḥ tu saṃbhavati eka vākya tve tad bhedasya anyāyya tvāt prakṛta yāgasya eva iyam sarvā stutiḥ

original: tatra sarvāvayavopetadvādaśakapālasya sarvaphalaprayojakatve kaḥ sandeha iti yāgastutiḥ /
analyzed: tatra sarva avayava upeta dvādaśa kapālasya sarva phala prayojaka tve kaḥ sandehaḥ iti yāga stutiḥ

original: aṣṭākapālapadaṃ cāgneyāṣṭākapāle śaktaṃ gauṇyā vṛttyā aṣṭatvāśrayakapālaśrapitatvasādṛśyena dvādaśakapālāvayave gauṇam /

tena ca avayava dvārā avayavī dvādaśa kapālaḥ lakṣyate
tena lakṣaṇayā yāga stutiḥ iti

original: idaṃ cādhikaraṇaṃ audumbarādhikaraṇanyāyena gatārthamapi śiṣyahitārthamuktamiti dhyeyam // 12 // 28 //
analyzed: idam ca adhikaraṇam audumbara adhikaraṇa nyāyena gata artham api śiṣya hita artham uktam iti dhyeyam
iti dvādaśam vaiśvānara adhikaraṇam
viṣaya vākya saṃgrahaḥ pūrva adhikaraṇena vaiśvānara adhikaraṇasya pratyudāharaṇa saṅgatiḥ ca
ityādinā iti ādi padena yat nava kapālaḥ trivṛtā eva asmin tejaḥ dadhāti yat daśa kapālaḥ

original: yaddvādaśakapālo jagatyaivāsmin paśūn dadhāti” ityantasya saṃgrahaḥ /

yāvat nāmadheya vicāra pratīteḥ sākṣāt eva aṣṭākapāla ādi śabdānām guṇa vidhi tva vat nāmadheya tvam iha āśaṅkya iha apavāda

original: karaṇādāpavādakīṃ prakaraṇasaṃgatiṃ tathā pūrvādhikaraṇe ānarthakyāt guṇavidhitve
analyzed: karaṇāt āpavādakīm prakaraṇa saṃgatim tathā pūrva adhikaraṇe ānarthakyāt guṇa vidhi tve

vivakṣita tve ṣṭākapāla ādi padānām ānarthakya āpatteḥ ca guṇa vidhi tvam iti pūrva nyāya atyayena
pratyavasthānāt pratyudāharaṇa rūpām anantara saṅgatim saṃśayam ca spaṣṭa tvāt an abhidhāya

putre jāte iti antasya āgneya adhikaraṇa ukta nyāyena nirvapateḥ atideśa prāpta nirvāpa anuvādena
yāga lakṣya tvāt dvitīyā anta vaiśvānara dvādaśa kapāla padayoḥ dvitīyāyāḥ karaṇatva lakṣaṇa aṅgīkāreṇa

original: karaṇasamarpakatvamaṅgīkṛtya vaiśvānareṇa dvādaśakapālena yajeta putrajanane nimitte

original: natu yāgaḥ; tathāpi sarveṣāmamīṣāṃ dvādaśakapālapadenaiva prāptatvāt tatprakhyanyāyena lakṣaṇayā samidādipadavannāmadheyānyaṣṭākapālādiśabdāḥ,

original: yathā śataṃ brāhmaṇāḥ somaṃ bhakṣayantītyukte dvādaśaikaikamiti vibhāgavākye śate dvādaśānāṃ antarbhūtatvādvibhāgavidhiḥ,
analyzed: yathā śatam brāhmaṇāḥ somam bhakṣayanti iti ukte dvādaśa ekaikam iti vibhāga vākye śate dvādaśānām antarbhūta tvāt vibhāga vidhiḥ
tathā dvādaśeṣu aṣṭa tva prāptiḥ iti arthaḥ
na ca prathama antānām nirvapet iti anena anvayāt yāga sāmānādhikaraṇya abhāvaḥ

original: tadabhāve 'pyaṣṭākapālapadairyāgasya prakṛtasya vidhānopapattyā aṣṭākapālo yāgo bhavatītyevaṃ nāmatopapatteḥ /
analyzed: tad abhāve pi aṣṭākapāla padaiḥ yāgasya prakṛtasya vidhāna upapattyā aṣṭākapālaḥ yāgaḥ bhavati iti evam nāmatā upapatteḥ
na ca saṃjñayā karma bheda āpattiḥ

original: ekasyaiva prakṛtasya yāgasya pācakalāvakādivadbhedaṃ vināpyupapattau tadaṅgīkāre pramāṇābhāvāt /

na ca nāma tve prayojana abhāvaḥ
gāyatriyā eva enam iti arthavādika phalasya rātri satra nyāyena iha kalpanena nāmadheyānām
vikalpena saṅkalpe sārthakye pi tad tad nāma avacchinna saṅkalpāt tad tad phala siddheḥ

aṣṭākapāla ādi padāt tatra uddhṛtam amatrebhyaḥ iti sūtrāt tatra iti anuvṛttau saṃskṛtam

original: bhakṣā” ityanenāṣṭasu kapāleṣu saṃskṛtamityarthe vihitasya taddhitarūpasyānapatyasya

original: nāmadheyatvasaṃbhava ityādyaṃ pakṣaṃ dūṣayan dvitīyaṃ pakṣamāha pa0------ svarūpeṇeti //

anyathā vihitasya stuti asaṃbhavāt
yadi api āgneya vidhi antena aṣṭa tvam prāptam

original: tathāpi dvādaśatvādinaupadeśikena bādho mābhūdityetadarthaṃ punarvidhiḥ sārthakaḥ /
analyzed: tathā api dvādaśa tva ādinā aupadeśikena bādhaḥ mā abhūt iti etad artham punar vidhiḥ sārthakaḥ

original: yadi tu dvādaśakapāle padaśrutyānvitadvādaśatvāvarodhena nāṣṭatvasya niveśaḥ,
analyzed: yadi tu dvādaśa kapāle pada śrutyā anvita dvādaśa tva avarodhena na aṣṭa tvasya niveśaḥ
tathā kapāla anuvādena aṣṭatva vidhau eka prasara tā bhaṅga āpattiḥ api syāt iti ucyeta
tadā guṇa traya vat eva puroḍāśe vaijātya kalpanayā pūrva yāge eva aṣṭākapāla ādi dravya antara vidhim abhipretya aṣṭākapāla ādi dravyam iti uktam
dvādaśa kapālasya anutpatti śiṣṭa tayā prājāpatya nyāyena tu eka dravyaka yāga bheda nirūpaṇam
utpatti śiṣṭa tā iti

original: tathāca bhavatītyasyānuvādatvaṃ aṅgīkṛtya prathamāyā dvitīyārthalakṣaṇayā nirvapedityanenānvayāṅgīkāreṇa
analyzed: tathāca bhavati iti asya anuvāda tvam aṅgīkṛtya prathamāyāḥ dvitīyā artha lakṣaṇayā nirvapet iti anena anvaya aṅgīkāreṇa
vaiśvānaram dvādaśa kapālam aṣṭākapālam ityādi anvaya svīkāreṇa sarveṣām eva utpatti śiṣṭa tvam
tatra ca aṣṭākapāla ādi dravyāṇām parasparam ananvitānām eva devatā saṃbandhāt prājāpatya nyāyena
dravya devatā saṃbandha bhedena yāga bhedāt na ekasmin yāge eka vākya upātta tvāt aruṇa tva ādi vat samuccaya āpattiḥ iti arthaḥ
yat tu dravya vidhi pakṣe samuccaye kaustubhe iṣṭāpatti abhidhānam
tat etām iti upasaṃhāra gata ekavacana antena iṣṭi padena eka yāga paratva pratīti abhiprāyeṇa kathañcid nā iyam
na tu pāramārthikam
dadhi ādi yāgānām aneka tva pakṣe citrayā iti ekavacanasya iva iha api pañcayāgaiḥ eka iṣṭi abhiprāyeṇa ekavacanasya upapatteḥ pūrva ukta rītyā
yāga ekatve māna abhāvāt
pūrvatra aparitoṣeṇa vākya nānātva pakṣeṇa sarveṣām utpanna śiṣṭa tvena vikalpena guṇa vidhi tva rūpa dvitīya pakṣa anusaraṇam
bhavati ityādau bahūnām anuvāda tva anupapatteḥ prathamāyāḥ dvitīyā artha lakṣaṇāyām bhavati iti anena ananvaya āpatteḥ
āvṛtti aṅgīkāre āvṛtteḥ eva doṣa tvāt a parituṣya vākya nānātvam aṅgīkṛtya ekasmin api yāge
sarveṣām utpanna śiṣṭa tva sādhanena pakṣa antareṇa dravya vidhi pakṣam samarthayati

original: “aṣṭākapālo bhavatī“ti yaddvādaśakapālo bhavatītyantavākyeṣu bhavatītyatrāprāptārthatvena vidhimaṅgīkṛtya dravyamātraviṣayo vidhiḥ /
analyzed: aṣṭākapālaḥ bhavati iti yat dvādaśa kapālaḥ bhavati iti anta vākyeṣu bhavati iti atra aprāpta artha tvena vidhim aṅgīkṛtya dravya mātra viṣayaḥ vidhiḥ

original: tadapekṣitā ca bhāvanāpi yāgakarmikā vaiśvānaravākyaprāptā bhavatinā lakṣaṇayānūdyate /
analyzed: tad apekṣitā ca bhāvanā api yāga karmikā vaiśvānara vākya prāptā bhavatinā lakṣaṇayā anūdyate
vaiśvānara vākye tu pramāṇa antara siddha dravya anuvādaka tvāt dvādaśa kapāla padam sarveṣām upalakṣaṇam aṅgīkṛtya kevala vaiśvānara devatā viśiṣṭa yāgasya eva
lāghavāt vidhānam
gāyatriyā eva enam ityādinā tu vidheyā aṣṭākapāla ādi dravya stutiḥ

original: “etāmiṣṭimi“tyasya ca pratyekamanuṣaṅgeṇaitāmaṣṭākapālaguṇakāmiṣṭiṃ yasmin jāte nirvapati sa pūta eva bhavati /
analyzed: etām iṣṭim iti asya ca pratyekam anuṣaṅgeṇa etām aṣṭākapāla guṇakām iṣṭim yasmin jāte nirvapati sa pūtaḥ eva bhavati

original: etāṃ navakapālaguṇakāmiṣṭiṃ nirvapati sa tejasvyeva bhavatītyevaṃ pratyekaṃ saṃbandhādārthavādikapūtatvādiphalamiṣṭereva kalpyate,
analyzed: etām nava kapāla guṇakām iṣṭim nirvapati sa tejasvī eva bhavati iti evam pratyekam saṃbandhāt ārthavādika pūta tva ādi phalam iṣṭeḥ eva kalpyate
na tu aṣṭākapāla ādi dravyasya iti dvādaśa kapāla ādīnām sarveṣām eva utpanna śiṣṭa tvāt sarveṣām prakṛta yāga niveśa upapatteḥ nirapekṣa sādhana tvāt vrīhi yava vat dravyāṇām
vikalpaḥ iti arthaḥ
dvādaśa kapālasya utpatti śiṣṭa tva aṅgīkāreṇa aṣṭākapāla ādi vākyasya guṇa phala vidhi tva aṅgīkāreṇa tṛtīya pakṣa upapādanam
tatra vārtika virodha parihāraḥ ca

original: vikalpāpattidoṣāpattervā svarasena nānāvākyatāmaṅgīkṛtyāpi tṛtīyaṃ pūrvapakṣamāha ----- brahmavarcaseti //
analyzed: vikalpa āpatti doṣa āpatteḥ vā svarasena nānā vākyatām aṅgīkṛtya api tṛtīyam pūrvapakṣam āha brahmavarcasā iti

original: yadaṣṭākapālo bhavatītyādāvaprāptatvāt vidhiṃ prakalpya vihitānāṃ aṣṭākapālādīnāṃ
analyzed: yat aṣṭākapālaḥ bhavati ityādau aprāpta tvāt vidhim prakalpya vihitānām aṣṭākapāla ādīnām
gāyatriyā eva enam brahmavarcasena punāti iti ārthavādika brahmavarcasa hetuka pūta tva phala katpanena
tatra eva āśraya apekṣāyām prakṛta vaiśvānara yāgasya āśraya tva upapatteḥ kāmya tvāt eva utpatti śiṣṭasya api
nityasya dvādaśa kapālasya bādhā upapatteḥ dvādaśa kapālasya sva śabda upādānena jagatyā eva asmin
paśūni tya ātmīya stutyā eva nairākāṅkṣyāt na aṣṭākapāla ādi śabdānām gauṇī pūrvaka lakṣaṇayā
dvādaśa kapālaḥ tāvaka tvam aṅgīkartum yuktam iti arthaḥ
yat tu vārtike nanu ca brahmavarcasa yoga ādi phalatvena yadi iṣyate
stuti abhāvāt vidhiḥ kena vartamāna apadeśinām
iti brahmavarcasa phala arthatvam ākṣipya gāyatriyā eva enam ityādinā stutiḥ eva kriyate
na phala saṃbandhaḥ

original: tayātu aprāptyātmakavidhyunmīlanādyadaṣṭākapāla ityādibhiḥ sārthavādakaiḥ pratyekaṃ vihitānāṃ yathāsaṃkhyaṃ “pūta eve“tyādibhiḥ phalasaṃbandhaḥ  #
analyzed: tayā tu aprāpti ātmaka vidhi unmīlana ādya daṣṭākapālaḥ ityādibhiḥ sārthavādakaiḥ pratyekam vihitānām yathāsaṃkhyam pūtaḥ eva ityādibhiḥ phala saṃbandhaḥ
kriyate iti uktam
tad arthavādāt vidhi tvam
tena ca arthavāda tā iti evam arthavādataḥ vidhi kalpanasya anyonya āśraya grasta tvāt yasmin

original: jāta” ityaneneṣṭereva pūtatvādiphalaiḥ saṃbandhena guṇānāṃ tadanvayānupapatteḥ prauḍhivādamātramiti
analyzed: jātaḥ iti anena iṣṭeḥ eva pūta tva ādi phalaiḥ saṃbandhena guṇānām tad anvaya anupapatteḥ prauḍhi vāda mātram iti
sūcayitum brahmavarcasa ādi iti uktam

original: ataścāprāptārthasyaiva sarvavyāpakasya leṭtvaniścāyakatayā vidhikalpakatvādrātrisatre ivārthavādikaṃ brahmavarcasahetukapūtatvādikaṃ phalaṃ  #
analyzed: atas ca aprāpta arthasya eva sarva vyāpakasya leṭ tva niścāyaka tayā vidhi kalpaka tvāt rātri satre iva arthavādikam brahmavarcasa hetuka pūta tva ādikam phalam
yuktam

original: evañca “yasmin jāte” ityasya siddhavannirddeśānupapattyā viniyogavidhikalpanayā''śrayatvābhimateṣṭeḥ phalasaṃbandho 'pi siddho bhavatīti pūtatvādīṣṭereva  #
analyzed: evam ca yasmin jāte ityasya siddha vat nirddeśa anupapattyā viniyoga vidhi kalpanayā āśraya tva abhimata iṣṭeḥ phala saṃbandhaḥ siddhaḥ bhavati iti pūta tva ādi iṣṭeḥ eva
phalam iti bhāvaḥ
mūle brahmavarcasa ādi rūpa phala iti padena brahmavarcasa pada ghaṭita arthavāda upāttam phalam iti arthaḥ jñeyaḥ
yat tu kaustubhe pūta tva ādīnām phala tvam uktam
tad vārtika uktim āśritya athavā amūla ukti virodha parihārāya brahmavarcasa hetuka pūta tva abhiprāyeṇa kathañcid nā iyam iti diś
ākhyāta bhedena nimitta phala rūpa uddeśya bhedena pratyavāya dhvaṃsa rūpa phala antara uddeśena
pūta tva ādi aneka phala saṃbandhena ca prasakta vākya bheda parihāreṇa upakrama upasaṃhārāḥ avagata eka vākya tayā
dvādaśa kapāla stutau eva aṣṭākapāla ādi vākyānām tātparya upapādanam
vākya bheda aṅgīkāreṇa dṛḍha tayā upapāditayoḥ dvitīya pakṣa tṛtīya pakṣayoḥ eka hetunā eva dūṣaṇam sūcayan siddhāntam āha siddhāntaḥ tu iti
saṃbhavati eka vākya tve iti anena athavā astu iti pakṣaḥ nirastaḥ
phala artha guṇa vidhi pakṣaḥ pi evam nirasanīyaḥ

original: yadi hyāśrayavidhāyakaṃ paripūrṇatayāśrayaṃ vidhāya nirākāṅkṣaṃ bhavettadā tena vihitāśrayalābhena phalārthaguṇavidhānaṃ bhavet /
analyzed: yadi hi āśraya vidhāyakam paripūrṇa tayā āśrayam vidhāya nirākāṅkṣam bhavet tadā tena vihita āśraya lābhena phala artha guṇa vidhānam bhavet
nahi upakrama upasaṃhāra paryālocanayā pratīyamānam ekam vākyam etām iṣṭim nirvati iti anena anvaya nirākāṅśram
itarathā eka vākya tāyāḥ eva bhaṅga āpatteḥ
atas ca vaiśvānara vākyasya aparyavasāyi tvena yāga vidhi abhāve vihita āśraya alābhāt tad madhya patita aṣṭākapāla ādi vākyānām
svātantryeṇa vidhāyaka tvā ṛtha bhedāt vākya bheda āpatteḥ ca na atra guṇa vidhiḥ
etena ākhyāta bhedena vākya bhedasya adoṣa tvam iti api nirastam
ākhyāta bhede pi yasya ubhayam ityādau yad śabda balāt evā ekavākyatva vat iha api yasmin
jāte iti upasaṃhārasya yat tad śabda upabaddha tvena upakramasya jāta iṣṭi viṣaya tve avagamena eka vākya tā pratīteḥ
kāma pada abhāvena brahmavarcasa ādeḥ phala tva apratīteḥ satyām api vā tad pratītau etām iṣṭim ityādinā iṣṭi gata phalasya eva
pratīteḥ na guṇa phala saṃbandhaḥ
na ca siddhānte nimitta phalayoḥ uddeśyayoḥ upādānāt vākya bhedaḥ āvaśyakaḥ
nimittasya avaśya anuṣṭhāpaka tva rūpa uddeśya tve pi ripsitatama tva rūpa uddeśya tva abhāvena
phalasya eva tattvena anvayāt vijātīyayoḥ ekena anvaye pītara viṣaya ākāṅkṣā nivṛtti abhāvena
tasya api anvaya upapatteḥ vākya bheda aprasakteḥ

original: naca ----- nimittānvayenoddeśyānekatvābhāve 'pi tadanvayānupapattyā kalpitapāpakṣayasya bhāvanāyāṃ pūtatvāderivoddeśyatvenaivānvayāt vākyabhedatādavasthyamiti  #
analyzed: naca nimitta anvayena uddeśya anekatva abhāve pi tad anvaya anupapattyā kalpita pāpa kṣayasya bhāvanāyām pūta tva ādeḥ iva uddeśya tvena eva anvayāt vākya bheda tādavasthyam iti
vācyam

original: anyatra pāpakṣayasya bhāvyatvakalpane 'pīha pratiyogyupasthitisāpekṣatayā śīghropasthitapūtatvādīnāmeva tatkalpanāt /
analyzed: anyatra pāpa kṣayasya bhāvya tva kalpane pi iha pratiyogi upasthiti sāpekṣa tayā śīghra upasthita pūta tva ādīnām eva tad kalpanāt
ataeva nimitta balāt avagata pratyavāya dhvaṃsasya eva phala tva upapatteḥ na ārthavādika phala kalpanā iti api parāstam

original: naca tathāpi pūtatvādyanekaphalānāṃ kalpyatve 'pi bhāvanāyāmanvaye vākyabhedaḥ;
analyzed: na ca tathā api pūta tva ādi aneka phalānām kalpya tve pi bhāvanāyām anvaye vākya bhedaḥ
arthavāda upātta phala kāmaḥ nirvapet iti evam pūta tva ādīnām vyāsajya vṛtti phalatva kalpanena pratyekam uddeśya tva akalpanāt
ataeva ca eka vākya tā āpattyā saṃvalita adhikāra siddhiḥ iti na agnihotra ādi vidhi vat prayoga antara ākṣepaka tvam
evam ca nimitta tva anupapattyā akaraṇe pratyavāya mātra kalpane pi tad hghaṃsasya phala tva akalpanāt
putra vipattau vidyamānam api janana nimittam na iṣṭeḥ prayojakam
saṃvalita adhikāra tvāt

original: ataḥ putrajanane nimitte putragatapūtatvādyarthaṃ jāteṣṭiḥ kāryā,
analyzed: atas putra janane nimitte putra gata pūta tva ādi artham jātā iṣṭiḥ kāryā

original: anyathā pratyavaitītyarthāvagamāt na tadakaraṇe pituḥ kaścana pratyavāya ityapi jñeyam /
analyzed: anyathā pratyavaiti iti artha avagamāt na tad akaraṇe pituḥ kaścana pratyavāyaḥ iti api jñeyam
ye tu upakrama prābalya pakṣe putre jāte iti upakrame saṃvalita naimittika adhikāri tayā
jāta iṣṭeḥ vākyaśeṣa rūpa upasaṃhāra anusāreṇa putra gata pūta tva ādi phala saṃvalita adhikāra anāpatteḥ vākyaśeṣasya arthavāda tā mātreṇa
pi upapattiḥ āpadyate iti upasaṃhāra prābalyena saṃvalita adhikāram āhuḥ
teṣām nirāsaḥ upi atas eva jñeyaḥ
nahi upasaṃhāra anusāreṇa atra upakrame kasya api upamardaḥ kṛtaḥ
upakrama avagata putra janana nimitta tva aparityāgena eva vidheḥ pravartaka tva paryavasānāt rātri satra nyāyena vidhi ākāṅkṣayā eva pūta tva ādi phala kalpanāt
atas eva yatra anya aṅgatvena eva vidheḥ pravartaka tva paryavasānena anākāṅkṣā
tatra apāpa śloka śravaṇa ādīnām nā eva vākyaśeṣeṇa phala tva kalpanā
kintu arthavāda tvena stuti paratvam eva yuktam iti āha prakṛta yāgasya eva iti
jagatyā eva asmin iti vākyena eva dvādaśa kapāla stuti nairākāṅkṣya śaṅkā nirāsaḥ

original: yaduktaṃ dvādaśakapālasya “jagatyaivāsminniti stutyaiva nairākāṅkṣyānnāṣṭākapālatvena stuteḥ prayojanamiti,
analyzed: yat uktam dvādaśa kapālasya jagatyā eva asmin iti stutyā eva nairākāṅkṣyāt na aṣṭākapāla tvena stuteḥ prayojanam iti
tad nirāsāya sarvāḥ iti uktam

original: ata evoktam vārtike ----- stuteraparimāṇatvādyāvatī hi pratīyate /
analyzed: atas eva uktam vārtike stuteḥ aparimāṇa tvāt yāvatī hi pratīyate
tām sarvām aikarūpyeṇa vidhi uddeśaḥ pratīcchati

original: sarvatra hi alpaiḥ bahubhirvākṣaraiḥ stutayo dṛśyante,
analyzed: sarvatra hi alpaiḥ bahubhiḥ vā akṣaraiḥ stutayaḥ dṛśyante
śrotṛ prakāra aneka tvāt ca kvacid kāścid arthavatyaḥ bhavanti
yathā eva keṣāñcid vidhi uddeśa mātreṇa pravṛttau sidhyanti anya arthā stutiḥ āśriyate
tathā eva alpa stuti upapanne pi kārye mahā stuti āśrayaṇam iti

original: ataśca “yasmin jāte etāmiṣṭiṃ nirvapati pūta eve” tyādiprāśastyapratipādanopapādakatayā
analyzed: atas ca yasmin jāte etām iṣṭim nirvapati pūtaḥ eva ityādi prāśastya pratipādana upapādaka tayā

original: pūrvāsāṃ stutīnāṃ yugapadgrahaṇādekayā nairākāṅkṣyābhāvāt mahatyā api stuterapekṣaṇāt
analyzed: pūrvāsām stutīnām yugapad grahaṇāt ekayā nairākāṅkṣya abhāvāt mahatyāḥ api stuteḥ apekṣaṇāt
vaiyarthya abhāvena sarvā api stutiḥ iti arthaḥ

original: yattu ----- ekavākyatāmaṅgīkṛtya aṣṭatvasyāṣṭākapāladravyasya vā vidhānaṃ pūrvapakṣitaṃ,
analyzed: yat tu ekavākyatām aṅgīkṛtya aṣṭatvasya aṣṭākapāla dravyasya vā vidhānam pūrvapakṣitam
tat tu eka prasara tā bhaṅga āpatteḥ ukta tvāt madhye bhinna bhinna aneka artha vidhāne ekavākya tā bhaṅga āpatteḥ ayuktam iti prāk eva sūcitam
aṣṭākapāla padasya dvādaśa kapāla avayava paratva upapādana pūrvakam aṣṭākapāla ādi vākyaiḥ dvādaśa kapāla stuti prakāraḥ

original: nanu aṣṭākapālādīnāṃ avihitānāṃ vihitasya dvādaśakapālasya cāṣṭākapālādipadaiḥ kathaṃ stutirityataḥ stutiprakāramāha ----- yadaṅgeti //
analyzed: nanu aṣṭākapāla ādīnām avihitānām vihitasya dvādaśa kapālasya ca aṣṭākapāla ādi padaiḥ katham stutiḥ iti atas stuti prakāram āha yat aṅga iti
yadi api aṣṭākapāla ādīnām avidhānam
tathā api brahmavarcasa hetuka pūta tva ādi hetu bhūtā gāyatrī ādi akṣara tā aṣṭa tva ādi saṅkhyā sāmyena
kapāla gata aṣṭa tva ādeḥ brahmavarcasa ādi janaka tvena pratīyamānā stutiḥ gauṇyā ukta aṣṭākapāla vayave saṃcāryate
atas tasya api avihita tvāt avayava avayavi bhāvena lakṣita vihita dvādaśa kapāla avayavi stutiḥ tu yāga stutiḥ iti arthaḥ

original: nanu ----- aṣṭākapālapadasyāṣṭatvāvacchinnakapāla- saṃskṛtaparatvena dvādaśakapālāvayavasya tena nopādānamityata āha ------ aṣṭākapālapadañceti
analyzed: nanu aṣṭākapāla padasya aṣṭa tva avacchinna kapāla saṃskṛta paratvena dvādaśa kapāla avayavasya tena na upādānam iti atas āha aṣṭākapāla padam ca iti
gauṇyā iti

original: vaidhasyaiva śrapaṇasya saṃskārapadavācyatvāt iha tadabhāve 'pyaṣṭākapālajanyaśrapaṇajātiguṇayogāt gauṇyetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: vaidhasya eva śrapaṇasya saṃskāra pada vācya tvāt iha tad abhāve pi aṣṭākapāla janya śrapaṇa jāti guṇa yogāt gauṇyā iti arthaḥ

yajamānaḥ dhikaraṇa tvena vidhīyate iti prāpte pratyakṣa vidhi aśravaṇāt prastaram uttaram

original: barhiṣaḥ sādayatī” ti vidhyantaraikavākyatvācca tadarthavādatvamaudumbarādhikaraṇanyāyena siddhameva /
analyzed: barhiṣaḥ sādayati iti vidhi antara eka vākya tvāt ca tad arthavāda tvam audumbara adhikaraṇa nyāyena siddham eva
yajamāna padam tu gauṇyā vṛttyā prastaraḥ tāvakam
nanu adhyāropita artha vṛtti tve gauṇa tvam loke prasiddham
siṃha tvasya
devadatte āhāryya āropāt

original: naca tat vede sambhavati āropakapuruṣābhāvāditi ------ cet vināpyāropaṃ siṃhaśabdasya
analyzed: na ca tat vede sambhavati āropaka puruṣa abhāvāt iti ced vinā api āropam siṃha śabdasya
sādṛśya mātra vivakṣayā devadatte kāvya lokayoḥ prayoga darśanāt sva śakya guṇa samāna jātīya guṇa yoga nimitta tvam gauṇa tvam

original: siṃhaniṣṭhakrūratvasamānajātīyakrūratvayogācca siṃhapadasya devadatte pravṛtteḥ siṃho devadatta ityatra lakṣaṇasamanvayaḥ /
analyzed: siṃha niṣṭha krūra tva samāna jātīya krūra tva yogāt ca siṃha padasya devadatte pravṛtteḥ siṃhaḥ devadattaḥ iti atra lakṣaṇa samanvayaḥ

original: puṣpādau svasambandhitvādhyāropeṇa cāropitaṃ khapuṣpaśabdārthamaṅgīkṛtyatadvṛttiguṇānāmasattvādīnāṃ siddhānte sattvācca na khapuṣpaṃ bhavatsiddhānta  #
analyzed: puṣpa ādau sva sambandhi tva adhyāropeṇa ca āropitam khapuṣpa śabda artham aṅgīkṛtya tad vṛtti guṇānām asattva ādīnām siddhānte sattvāt ca na khapuṣpam bhavat siddhānta
ityādau avyāptiḥ
atas ca etādṛśa gauṇa tvasya vede pi asti eva saṃbhavaḥ

original: yadyapi ca rūpakādisthale “saundaryasya taraṅgiṇītyādau” āropeṇāpi gauṇī vṛttirdṛṣṭā;
analyzed: yadi api ca rūpaka ādi sthale saundaryasya taraṅgiṇī ityādau āropeṇa api gauṇī vṛttiḥ dṛṣṭā

original: tathāpi sādṛśyamātreṇāpi upamālaṅkārasthale sānubhūyamānā nāpahnotuṃ śakyā /
analyzed: tathā api sādṛśya mātreṇa api upamā alaṅkāra sthale sā anubhūyamānā nā apahnotum śakyā
atas ca ubhaya sādhāraṇyena sva śakya samavetavat tā gauṇī vṛttiḥ
samaveta vatvam ca kvacid āropita tva saṃbandhena kvacid ca sva samāna jātīya guṇavat tā saṃbandhena iti bhedaḥ

original: atra ca siṃhapadena śaktyā siṃhopasthityanantaraṃ lakṣaṇayā krūratvopasthitiriti prāñcaḥ /
analyzed: atra ca siṃha padena śaktyā siṃha upasthiti anantaram lakṣaṇayā krūra tva upasthitiḥ iti prāñcaḥ
vastutas tu eka saṃbandhi darśanena apara saṃbandhi smaraṇam iti smāraka vidhayā eva tad upasthitiḥ
gauṇī jñāna kārya tā avacchedakam vā nirukta ubhayavidha saṃbandha anyatara saṃbandhena sva śakya samaveta dharma prakāraka devadatta viśeṣyaka śābda tvam iti
na krūra tva ādīnām aśābda tva prasaṅgaḥ
na ca gauṇyā a lakṣaṇātaḥ na bhedaḥ

original: svaśakyavṛttiguṇānāmeva yatra saṃbandhitvena rūpeṇa bodhastatra lakṣaṇā,
analyzed: sva śakya vṛtti guṇānām eva yatra saṃbandhi tvena rūpeṇa bodhaḥ tatra lakṣaṇā

original: naca sarvatra tadeva nimittam ko 'tra viśeṣaḥ?
analyzed: na ca sarvatra tat eva nimittam kaḥ tra viśeṣaḥ
cakṣuḥ grāhyam tejasvi tvāt yatra nimittam iti prāñcaḥ

na tu sārūpyasya
tasya saṃsarga tvāt

original: iha tu śakyaniṣṭhaguṇasajātīyaguṇavattvarūpasya sārūpyasyaiva samavāyādisaṃsargeṇa prakāratvāttadeva nimittamiti viśeṣaḥ // 13 // 29 //
analyzed: iha tu śakya niṣṭha guṇa sajātīya guṇavat tva rūpasya sārūpyasya eva samavāya ādi saṃsargeṇa prakāra tvāt tat eva nimittam iti viśeṣaḥ
praśaṃsā

original: “apaśavo vā anye goaśvebhyaḥ paśavo goaśvā” ityatrājādīnāṃ tatra tatra vihitatvātpaśukārye pratiṣedhasya paryudāsasya vānupapatterarthavādatvam
analyzed: a paśavaḥ vai anye go aśvebhyaḥ paśavaḥ go aśvāḥ iti atra aja ādīnām tatra tatra vihita tvāt paśu kārye pratiṣedhasya paryudāsasya vā anupapatteḥ arthavāda tvam

original: apaśuśabdo hi ghaṭādau mukhyo gavāśvagataprāśastyābhāvarūpaguṇayogādajādau gauṇaḥ san lakṣaṇayā gavāśvastutyarthaḥ /
analyzed: a paśu śabdaḥ hi ghaṭa ādau mukhyaḥ gavāśva gata prāśastya abhāva rūpa guṇa yogāt aja ādau gauṇaḥ san lakṣaṇayā gavāśva stuti arthaḥ

original: prācāṃ mate tu nañsamāsāntargatapaśupadena gavāśvagataṃ prāśastyaṃ lakṣayitvā nañā tadabhāvarūpo guṇa upasthāpyata iti viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: prācām mate tu nañ samāsa antargata paśu padena gavāśva gatam prāśastyam lakṣayitvā nañā tad abhāva rūpaḥ guṇaḥ upasthāpyate iti viśeṣaḥ
sarvathā praśaṃsā gauṇī nimitta ghaṭikā iti siddham
bhūmā
sṛṣṭīḥ upadadhāti tyatra vidhi antara eka vākya tva abhāvāt pratyakṣa vidhi śravaṇāt ca vidhi tvam
tatra ca upadhānam eva iṣṭakā saṃskāra artha tvena vidhīyate
yadi api ca iṣṭakānām cayana aṅga tva anyathā anupapattyā eva upadhānam prāpyeta
tathā api tatas pūrvam eva pratyakṣa vidhinā vidhīyate
tad phalam ca pratyeka upadhāna siddhiḥ cayana samāna kartṛka tva siddhiḥ ca
anyathā samudita upadhānam api kadācid prāpnuyāt
ārthika tvāt ca cayana bhinna kartṛka tvam api
sati tu asmin iṣṭakā saṃskāra dvārā cayana aṅga tā bodhaka vidhau prati pradhāna āvṛtti nyāyāt aṅga pradhānayoḥ eka kartṛka tvāt ca phala dvaya siddhiḥ
sṛṣṭi padam tu liṅga prakaraṇa prāpta sṛṣṭi asṛṣṭi mantra mātrasya gauṇya anuvādaḥ iti bhāṣyakāraḥ
vārtikakāraḥ tu na upadhāna mātra vidhiḥ
tathā asati prāṇabhṛtaḥ upadadhāti ityādi aneka upadhāna vidhi vaiyarthya āpatteḥ
atas mantra mātram upadhāna anuvādena mantra viśiṣṭam vā upadhānam iṣṭakā saṃskāra artha tvena vidhīyate
tatra upadhāna vidhi phalantu pūrvavat
mantra vidhi phalan tu upadhāne tad niyamaḥ

original: mantrā hi iṣṭakāmātraprakāśakāstadgrahaṇādiṣvapi prāptisaṃbhavānnopadhāne niyamena prāpnuvanti /
analyzed: mantrāḥ hi iṣṭakā mātra prakāśakāḥ tad grahaṇa ādiṣu api prāpti saṃbhavāt na upadhāne niyamena prāpnuvanti
atas tad niyamaḥ grahaṇa ādi parisaṅkhyā eva vā phalam
madhyamaciti saṃbandhaḥ ca

original: “yāṃ vai kāñcana brāhmaṇavatī miṣṭakāmabhijānīyāttāṃ madhyamāyāṃ citāvupadadhyādi” ti vacanena pratyakṣabrāhmaṇavatīnāmiṣṭakānāṃ madhyamacitisaṃbandhasya
analyzed: yām vai kāñcana brāhmaṇavatī miṣṭakām abhijānīyāt tām madhyamāyām citau upadadhyāt iti vacanena pratyakṣa brāhmaṇavatīnām iṣṭakānām madhyama citi saṃbandhasya

original: anyathā tattaccityavāntaraprakaraṇapāṭharahitānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ cayanamahāprakaraṇena sarvacitiṣu antimāyāmeva vāniveśāpatteḥ /
analyzed: anyathā tad tad citi avāntara prakaraṇa pāṭha rahitānām mantrāṇām cayana mahāprakaraṇena sarva citiṣu antimāyām eva vā a niveśa āpatteḥ
atas madhyamaciti saṃbandha artham mantra vidhiḥ
iṣṭakānām pratyakṣa brāhmaṇavat tvam ca iṣṭakā vāci pratyakṣa brāhmaṇa paṭhita pada vidheya mantraka tvam
sṛṣṭi padam hi sṛṣṭi prakāśaka mantra upadheya iṣṭakā param

original: tatra ca viśeṣaṇāṃśasya mantrasya vidheyatvāttadiṣṭakānāṃ pratyakṣabrāhmaṇavattvasiddhiḥ /
analyzed: tatra ca viśeṣaṇa aṃśasya mantrasya vidheya tvāt tad iṣṭakānām pratyakṣa brāhmaṇavat tva siddhiḥ
iti karaṇa viniyukta lokam pṛṇa mantrasya api madhyamaciti mātra saṃbandha āpatteḥ iṣṭakā vāci iti pada viśeṣaṇam
atas ca mantra viśiṣṭa upādhānam atra vidhīyate
sṛṣṭi padam param gauṇyā vṛttyā saptadaśa saṅkhyāka sṛṣṭi asṛṣṭi mantra param
yat saptadaśa iṣṭakāḥ upadadhāti iti arthavāda anusārāt

original: tatra caturdaśa sṛṣṭimantrāstrayo 'sṛṣṭimantrā iti sṛṣṭibāhulyam guṇo gauṇīvṛttinimittam // 17 // 33 //
analyzed: tatra caturdaśa sṛṣṭi mantrāḥ trayaḥ sṛṣṭi mantrāḥ iti sṛṣṭi bāhulyam guṇaḥ gauṇī vṛtti nimittam
iti tad siddhipeṭikāyām bhūma udāharaṇa vicāraḥ
liṅga samavāyāt

śeṣam pūrvavat
evam ṣaṭ gauṇī vṛtti prakārāḥ
iti trayodaśam tat siddhipeṭikā adhikaraṇam
adhikaraṇam
sandhigdheṣu vākya roṣāt
aktāḥ śarkarāḥ upadadhāti iti atra aktāḥ iti anena aviśeṣāt yat kiñcid añjana sādhana dravyasya

original: vidhinā nirṇītatvādupasaṃhārasthena “tejo vai ghṛta” mityarthavādena saṅkocānupapatteḥ
analyzed: vidhinā nirṇīta tvāt upasaṃhāra sthena tejaḥ vai ghṛtam iti arthavādena saṅkoca anupapatteḥ
na arthavādasya sandigdha artha nirṇaye prāmāṇyam iti prāpte vidheḥ aviśeṣa pravṛtta tvena eva
ghṛta mātra grahaṇena api upapatteḥ itara ākṣepaka tve pramāṇa abhāvāt upakramasya avirodhena upapattau
ca upasaṃhāra sthasya arthavādasya upalakṣaṇa tve pramāṇa abhāvāt vidhi arthavādayoḥ eka vākya tvena eka viṣayaka tvasya āvaśyaka tvāt ca
yuktam vākyaśeṣasya sandigdha artha nirṇaye prāmāṇyam iti ghṛtena eva añjanam
iti caturdaśam akṛ adhikaraṇam
adhikaraṇam
arthāt vā kalpanā eka deśa tvāt
struveṇa avadyati
svadhitinā avadyati

original: hastenā vadyati” ityādau vidheravadeyadravyaviṣaye sandigdhasya sāmarthyānnirṇayaḥ /
analyzed: hastena ā vadyati ityādau vidheḥ avadeya dravya viṣaye sandigdhasya sāmarthyāt nirṇayaḥ

original: struveṇa dravadravyamevājyādi svadhitināmāṃsādi hastena saṃhataṃ puroḍāśādīti /
analyzed: struveṇa drava dravyam eva ājya ādi svadhitinā a māṃsa ādi hastena saṃhatam puroḍāśa ādi iti

original: ataśca sāmarthyasahakṛtāvadyatipadenaiva lakṣaṇayā dravadravyādyavadānasya uddeśyatvāttadanuvādena struvādividhau na kiñcidbādhakam /
analyzed: atas ca sāmarthya sahakṛta avadyati padena eva lakṣaṇayā drava dravya ādi avadānasya uddeśya tvāt tad anuvādena struva ādi vidhau na kiñcid bādhakam

original: evaṃ “añjalinā saktūn juhotī” tyādāvapi na saṃpuṭākāro 'ñjaliḥ,
analyzed: evam añjalinā saktūn juhoti ityādau api na saṃpuṭa ākāraḥ ñjaliḥ
api tu vyākośa ātmakaḥ eva sāmarthyāt
tat evam vidhi arthavāda mantra smṛti ācāra nāmadheya vākya śeṣa sāmarthya rūpāṇi aṣṭau pramāṇāni dharma adharmayoḥ nirūpitāni
atas param bheda ādinā tad svarūpam nirūpayiṣyate
iti pañcadaśam artha sāmarthya adhikaraṇam

original: iti śrīkhaṇḍadevaviracitāyāṃ bhāṭṭadīpikāyāṃ prathamādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ // 0 //
analyzed: iti śrī khaṇḍadeva viracitāyām bhāṭṭa dīpikāyām prathama adhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ
iti prathamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
atra ca tad siddhi jāti sārūpya praśaṃsā bhūma liṅga samavāyāḥ iti guṇa āśrayāḥ iti eka pāṭhena

original: vidyamānamapi sūtraṃ mantrādhikaraṇapūrvapakṣasūtrasyeva vyākhyāsaukaryāya khaṇḍaśaḥ kṛtvā paṭhitam /
analyzed: vidyamānam api sūtram mantra adhikaraṇa pūrvapakṣa sūtrasya iva vyākhyā saukaryāya khaṇḍaśas kṛtvā paṭhitam
guṇa vidhi nāmadheya vicārāt prakaraṇa saṃgatim aṣṭākapāla ādi padānām dvādaśa kapāla avayave

original: gauṇyā vṛttyā pravṛttiriti pūrvādhikaraṇe uktāyā gauṇyā nimittāsaṃbhavādākṣepasamādhānenākṣepikīmanantarasaṅgatiṃ
analyzed: gauṇyā vṛttyā pravṛttiḥ iti pūrva adhikaraṇe uktāyāḥ gauṇyāḥ nimitta asaṃbhavāt ākṣepa samādhānena ākṣepikīm anantara saṅgatim
saṃśayam ca spaṣṭha tvāt an abhidhāya guṇa vṛtti ākṣepa samādhāna artha tve pi asya sūtrasya
sārvatrika gauṇī vṛtti samādhāna artha tvam sūcayitum yat bhāṣyakāreṇa viśeṣataḥ udāhṛtam
tad udāharaṇa pradarśanena pūrvapakṣam āha yajamānaḥ iti
audumbara adhikaraṇena gatārtha tva śaṅkā nirāsaḥ
ataeva audumbara adhikaraṇa siddham stuti paratvam api artha antara vācinā aṣṭākapāla padena iva yajamāna padena api prastara stuti asaṃbhavena asaṃbhavāt
gauṇī vṛttyā tadvat eva nirvahaṇīyam
na ca sā saṃbhavati
atas prāmāṇya nirvāhāya kartavya pada adhyāhāreṇa guṇa vidhi tvam eva aṅgīkaraṇīyam iti ākṣipya samādhānāt na arthavāda tva siddhānta karaṇāt audumbara adhikaraṇena
gatārtha tvam iti api dhyeyam
pravṛtti nimitta prayojanayoḥ asaṃbhavena sāmānādhikaraṇya upapatti artham yajamāna padasya prastara nāma tvena pūrvapakṣa upapādanam
ādi padena yajamānaḥ eka kapālaḥ ityādi saṃgrahaḥ

original: bhāṣye vidhyarthavādatvābhyāṃ koṭidvayopanyāse 'pi vārtike saṃgatisūcanāt nāmatāpūrvapakṣamāha --- sāmānādhikaraṇyāditi //
analyzed: bhāṣye vidhi artha vāda tvābhyām koṭi dvaya upanyāse vārtike saṃgati sūcanāt nāmatā pūrvapakṣam āha sāmānādhikaraṇyāt iti

original: nahi ekārthapratipādakatvarūpaṃ padānāṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ekārthatvaṃ binopapadyate /
analyzed: nahi ekārtha pratipādaka tva rūpam padānām sāmānādhikaraṇyam ekārtha tvam binā upapadyate
atas nāmadheyam iti arthaḥ
naca nāmnaḥ vidheya tva abhāvāt tad avacchedya vidheya antarasya api abhāve vākya ānarthakyam
ridṛś nāmavat tvāt praśastaḥ yam iti stuti paratve tena arthavāda tva pakṣāt aviśeṣaḥ iti vācyam

original: “prajā vai barhiryajamānaḥ prastara” iti sāmānādhikaraṇyāt prajāśabdasya barhirnāmatve
analyzed: prajāḥ vai barhiḥ yajamānaḥ prastaraḥ iti sāmānādhikaraṇyāt prajā śabdasya barhiḥ nāmatve

original: yajamānaśabdasya prastaranāmatve ca sati yajamānanāmakaprastarasya prajānāmakabarheruparibhāvakaraṇena
analyzed: yajamāna śabdasya prastara nāma tve ca sati yajamāna nāmaka prastarasya prajā nāmaka barheḥ upari bhāva karaṇena
prasiddha yajamānasya a yajamānāt uttara tva vat bhavati iti evaṃrūpāyāḥ prastaram uttaram
barhiṣaḥ sādayati iti vidheya prastara upari bhāva stuteḥ tena lābhāt ānarthakya abhāvāt
sākṣāt eva stuti artha tvam
nāmadheya tve tu paraṃparayā iti etāvān eva bhedaḥ
na ca nāmadheya tve pravṛtti nimitta abhāvaḥ
yajamāna śabdasya yāga kartṛ tā vācitayā prastara eka kapālayoḥ acetana tvena yāga kartṛ tva asaṃbhave
pi tad prayoga antargata sva vyāpāram prati sthālī ādi vat kartṛ tva upapatteḥ tasya eva pravṛtti nimitta tva upapatteḥ

original: ata eva etādṛśayogasya yajamāne prastarapadasyāsaṃbhavādekamitasya nāmadheyamiti mūle saṃmugdhādhikāreṇoktāvapi yajamānapadameva prastaranāmadheyamityatraiva  #
analyzed: atas eva etādṛśa yogasya yajamāne prastara padasya asaṃbhavāt eka mitasya nāmadheyam iti mūle saṃmugdha adhikāreṇa uktau api yajamāna padam eva prastara nāmadheyam iti atra eva
tātparyam draṣṭavyam
pratipāditam ca tathā eva kaustubhe
yajamāna padasya yoga rūḍha tvāt soma ādi vat nāma tva asaṃbhavāt prastara kārye yajamāna rūpa kartṛ guṇa vidhi tva rūpa pūrvapakṣa prakāra antara nirūpaṇam
atas eva yajamāna nāmaka tvāt
yajamāna śabdaḥ na yāga kartṛ mātra vācī
apitu kartṛ niṣṭha kriyā janya phala āśraya abhidhāyaka ātmanepada ādeśa śāna janta tayā kriyā janya phala āśraya vācaka tvena

original: yajamāne yogarūḍha eveti tadarthasya prastare 'saṃbhavāt somādipadavatsāmānādhikaraṇyamātreṇa
analyzed: yajamāne yoga rūḍhaḥ eva iti tad arthasya prastare saṃbhavāt soma ādi pada vat sāmānādhikaraṇya mātreṇa
nāma tva anupapattyā guṇa vidhi tva pūrvapakṣam āha rūḍha tvena iti

original: nanu ----- tathāpi kutra ko vā guṇo vidhīyate ityapekṣāyāmāha ---- jaghanyaprastarapadeti //
analyzed: nanu tathā api kutra kaḥ vā guṇaḥ vidhīyate iti apekṣāyām āha jaghanya prastara pada iti

original: “yo hotā so 'dhvaryuri” ti kauṇḍapāyināmayane samāmnāte sāmānādhikaraṇyānupapattyā
analyzed: yaḥ hotā saḥ dhvaryuḥ iti kauṇḍapāyinām ayane samāmnāte sāmānādhikaraṇya anupapattyā
hotṛ ādi padānām mukhya artha tvam aṅgīkṛtya ādhvaryava ādi śabdānām lakṣaṇa artha tvam vipratiṣedhe
karaṇam samavāya viśeṣāt iti adhikaraṇe tṛtīye uktam

original: evamihāpi prastarapadasya kāryalakṣaṇārthatvamaṅgīkṛtya yajamānarūpaguṇasya kartṛtvena vidhānamityarthaḥ /
analyzed: evam iha api prastara padasya kārya lakṣaṇa artha tvam aṅgīkṛtya yajamāna rūpa guṇasya kartṛ tvena vidhānam iti arthaḥ
yajamāna uddeśena prastarasya prastara uddeśena yajamānasya vā vidhānam

original: ) tatra yadi kaścit acetanasyāpi prastarasya yajamānakārye kvacidyogyatayā vidhānaṃ vinigamakābhāvāt “uddeśyayogaḥ prāthamya” mityuktoddeśyatāniyāmakaprāthamyasattvādvā
analyzed: tatra yadi kaścid acetanasya api prastarasya yajamāna kārye kvacid yogyatayā vidhānam vinigamaka abhāvāt uddeśya yogaḥ prāthamyam miti ukta uddeśya tā niyāmaka prāthamya sattvāt vā

original: tannirāsāya “mukhyaṃ vā pūrvacodanāllokavadi“ti dvādaśādhikaraṇoktenānupasaṃjātavirodhitvena mukhe ādau bhavasyaiva svadharmatvānugraho yukto,
analyzed: tad nirāsāya mukhyam vā pūrva codanāt loka vat iti dvādaśa adhikaraṇa uktena anupasaṃjāta virodhi tvena mukhe ādau bhavasya eva svadharma tva anugrahaḥ

original: natu jaghanyasyeti mukhyānugrahanyāyena vinigamanāṃ sūcayituṃ jaghanyetyuktam /
analyzed: na tu jaghanyasya iti mukhya anugraha nyāyena vinigamanām sūcayitum jaghanyā iti uktam

original: tataśca yajamānapadasya mukhyārthavṛttitvarūpasvadharmatvānurodhena tatra kāryalakṣaṇāyā ayuktatvānna yajamānakārye prastaravidhānādyāpattirityarthaḥ
analyzed: tatas ca yajamāna padasya mukhya artha vṛtti tva rūpa svadharma tva anurodhena tatra kārya lakṣaṇāyāḥ ayukta tvāt na yajamāna kārye prastara vidhāna ādi āpattiḥ iti arthaḥ

original: prastaraikakapālayoḥ kārye yajamānavidhāne prastaraikakapālayoriva praharaṇasarvahomayorāpattyā yajamānanāśena sarvatantralopāpattiśaṅkānirāsāya  #
analyzed: prastara eka kapālayoḥ kārye yajamāna vidhāne prastara eka kapālayoḥ iva praharaṇa sarva homayoḥ āpattyā yajamāna nāśena sarva tantra lopa āpatti śaṅkā nirāsāya
kārya pada upādānam
struc dhāraṇa yāga rūpayoḥ kāryayoḥ viniyukta prastara eka kapālayoḥ praharaṇa homa ākhya pratipatti āpādya tvāt
tad pratipattyoḥ tad kārya tva abhāvāt yajamānasya anya arthasya eka kapāla kartṛka puroḍāśa dhāraṇa ādau
viniyoge pi tantra aniṣpattyā kṛtārtha tva abhāvena pratipatti anarha tvāt ca pratipatti anāpatteḥ na
sarva tantra lopa āpattiḥ
na eva vikalpa aṅgīkārāt prastara vidhi vaiyarthya āpattiḥ ca iti arthaḥ

original: prastarakārye yajamānasya vidhāne “dakṣiṇato 'vasthānaṃ ca karmaṇaḥ kriyamāṇasye“ti
analyzed: prastara kārye yajamānasya vidhāne dakṣiṇatas vasthānam ca karmaṇaḥ kriyamāṇasya iti
sāmānya vihitasya yajamāna kartṛka dakṣiṇatas vasthānasya anupapatti parihārāya kārya viśeṣa jñāpanāya
struc dhāraṇa pada upādānam
tatas ca tasya struc dhāraṇa pūrva uttara kālayoḥ upapanna tvāt na virodhaḥ iti arthaḥ
aṣṭākapāla pada vat gauṇī anupapattyā yajamāna pada guṇa vidhi tva samarthanam

original: naca ---- atrārthavādatvenopapattau nāṣṭākapālādīnāmiva vidhyantarakalpanayā guṇavidhitvaṃ yuktamiti ------ vācyam;
