analyzed: na ca atra arthavāda tvena upapattau na aṣṭākapāla ādīnām iva vidhi antara kalpanayā guṇa vidhi tvam yuktam iti vācyam
tatra gāyatriyā eva enam ityādi upādānena avayava bhūta aṣṭākapāla ādi stut i pratīteḥ avayava avayavi bhāvena
dvādaśa kapālaḥ stuti upapanna tve pi iha vāyuḥ vaikṣepiṣṭhā iti atra utkarṣa ādhāyaka guṇasya iva
tad abhāve eka yajamāna padāt stutya pratīteḥ avayava avayavi bhāvena dvādaśa kapāla stuti upapattau api iha avayava ayogena avayavi

original: tvābhāvāt lakṣaṇayāpi prastare stutyanupapatteśca pūrvavaiṣamyeṇa arthavādatvāsaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: tva abhāvāt lakṣaṇayā api prastare stuti anupapatteḥ ca pūrva vaiṣamyeṇa arthavāda tva asaṃbhavāt
na ca gauṇyā tad upapattiḥ
gauṇyāḥ lakṣaṇa svarūpāṇām durnirūpaṇīya tvāt

original: (prasiddhārthahānenāprasiddhārthavācitvaṃ samudāyavācina ekadeśavācitvaṃ svotprekṣāprabhāvāropaviṣayārthaparatvaṃ vā na gauṇīvṛttiriti nirūpaṇam)
analyzed: prasiddha artha hānena aprasiddha artha vāci tvam samudāya vācinaḥ eka deśa vāci tvam sva utprekṣā prabhāva āropa viṣaya artha paratvam vā na gauṇī vṛttiḥ iti nirūpaṇam

original: tathāhi --- yadi tāvat prasiddhārthatyāgena aprasiddhaguṇavācitvaṃ tallakṣaṇam /
analyzed: tathā hi yadi tāvat prasiddha artha tyāgena aprasiddha guṇa vāci tvam tat lakṣaṇam
prasiddham artham parityajya devadatta pada sāmānādhikaraṇyāt devadatta niṣṭha prasahyakāri tva ādi guṇeṣu
śakti antara kalpanayā tad samanvayāt matu artha lakṣaṇayā sāmānādhikaraṇya upapattiḥ iti ucyeta

original: tadedṛśasya lakṣaṇasya loke vakrābhiprāyānurodhena saṃbhave 'pi vede tadabhāvāt prasiddhārthatyāge 'prāmāṇyāpatternedṛśena gauṇatvena stutyupapattiḥ
analyzed: tadā īdṛśasya lakṣaṇasya loke vakra abhiprāya anurodhena saṃbhave pi vede tad abhāvāt prasiddha artha tyāge prāmāṇya āpatteḥ nā īdṛśena gauṇa tvena stuti upapattiḥ
yat tu samudāya vācinaḥ lakṣaṇayā eka deśe vṛttiḥ gauṇī iti lakṣaṇam
sarve hi siṃha ādi śabdāḥ na jāti mātra vācakāḥ
tathātve guṇa ādi vacanaiḥ śukla ādi śabdaiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇya anupapatteḥ
apitu jāti dravya guṇa kriyā ādi samudāya vacanāḥ iti tādṛśa samudāyasya devadatte saṃbhavāt devadatta ādi pada sāmānādhikaraṇyam

original: karaṇyānupapattyā samudāyaikadeśe pratyekakāritve lakṣaṇayā siṃhaśabdavṛtteḥ matvarthalakṣaṇayā
analyzed: karaṇya anupapattyā samudāya eka deśe pratyeka kāri tve lakṣaṇayā siṃha śabda vṛtteḥ matvartha lakṣaṇayā
sāmānādhikaraṇya upapatteḥ tad samanvayaḥ iti keṣāñcid kalpanam

original: tadapi samudāyasyānityatvenānityārthasaṃyogāt vede 'prāmāṇyāpatteḥ jātiṃ vinā vyaktiguṇakriyāṇāṃ
analyzed: tat api samudāyasya anitya tvena anitya artha saṃyogāt vede prāmāṇya āpatteḥ jātim vinā vyakti guṇa kriyāṇām
pariccheda asaṃbhavāt āvaśyaka jāti vāci tvena eva vyakti guṇa kriyāṇām pariccheda asaṃbhavāt āvaśyaka jāti vāci tvena eva
vyakti pratīti upapatteḥ atirikta gauṇī svīkāre māna abhāvāt ca ayuktam
yat api sva utprekṣā prabhāva āropa viṣayībhūta artha vṛtti tvam gauṇī lakṣaṇam

original: asti ca siṃhaśabdasya devadatte vaktrā prayujyamānatvānyathānupapattyā siṃhatvāropeṇa sa prayukta iti śrotrā kalpanāt tatsamanvaya iti,
analyzed: asti ca siṃha śabdasya devadatte vaktrā prayujyamāna tva anyathā anupapattyā siṃha tva āropeṇa sa prayuktaḥ iti śrotrā kalpanāt tad samanvayaḥ iti

original: tadapi vede āropakapuruṣasyābhāvādayuktamiti nedṛśenāpi gauṇīlakṣaṇeneha gauṇyopapattyā
analyzed: tat api vede āropaka puruṣasya abhāvāt ayuktam iti na īdṛśena api gauṇī lakṣaṇena iha gauṇya upapattyā

original: stutyupapattiriti sarvathā nārthavādatvam stutyāpādakamāśrayituṃ śakyate ityagatyā
analyzed: stuti upapattiḥ iti sarvathā na arthavāda tvam stuti āpādakam āśrayitum śakyate iti agatyā
guṇa vidhiḥ eva ayam iti bhāvaḥ
pratyakṣa vidhi abhāvena praharaṇa ādi āpattyā uttara tantra lopa āpattyā ca guṇa vidhi tva nirākaraṇena audumbara adhikaraṇa nyāyena siddhānta upapādanam
yadi atra pratyakṣaḥ vidhiḥ syāt

original: tadā pratyakṣavidhivihitaitadanurodhena dakṣiṇadeśāvasthānasaṅkocaḥ prastaravidheḥ pākṣikatvamekavākyatābhaṅgaśca kalpyeta,
analyzed: tadā pratyakṣa vidhi vihita etad anurodhena dakṣiṇa deśa avasthāna saṅkocaḥ prastara vidheḥ pākṣika tvam ekavākya tā bhaṅgaḥ ca kalpyeta
na tu iha pratyakṣaḥ vidhiḥ asti

original: ataḥ kalpyena vidhinā tadaṅgīkārasyāyuktatvānna guṇavidhirityabhipretya siddhāntamāha----- pratyakṣeti //
analyzed: atas kalpyena vidhinā tad aṅgīkārasya ayukta tvāt na guṇa vidhiḥ iti abhipretya siddhāntam āha pratyakṣa iti
api ca prastara sthāna āpattyā yajamānasya praharaṇa sarva homayoḥ āpattiḥ
yadi api tayoḥ na prastara eka kapāla kārya tvam
tathā api pratipatti bhūta praharaṇa homau prati sva kārya struc dhāraṇa yāga rūpa sādhanatvena
rūpeṇa prastara eka kapālayoḥ saṃskārya tvena prayojaka tvāt tādrūpyasya yajamāne pi
sattvena sthāpana āpatti upapatteḥ
na ca akṛtārtha tvam
pradhāna anurodhena kramam bādhitvā api sarva yājamāna karaṇa uttaram tad āpatteḥ anivārya tvāt
iṣṭa āpattau krama baddha soma yāga ādi uttara tantra lopa āpattiḥ iti bhāvaḥ
audumbara adhikaraṇa ākṣepa samādhānena tat siddham arthavāda tvam eva yuktam iti āha tad arthavāda tvam iti
pūrva ukta stutya saṃbhavam pariharati yajamāna padantu iti
tasya khapuṣpam bhavat siddhāntaḥ iti etat sādhāraṇya upapādanam ca
ādya lakṣaṇa dvayasya asiddha tvāt tat upekṣya pūrvokta prasiddha antima gauṇī vṛtti lakṣaṇa asaṃbhavam śaṅkate nanu iti
atas iti
a taḥ iti lyap lope pañcami

original: tena prayogadarśanādidaṃ pūrvoktaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vihāya svaśakyetyādivakṣyamāṇaṃ lakṣaṇamityarthāt na prayogadarśanādaiti pañcamyantānvayānupapattiḥ
analyzed: tena prayoga darśanāt idam pūrva uktam lakṣaṇam vihāya sva śakya ityādi vakṣyamāṇam lakṣaṇam iti arthāt na prayoga darśanāt ā eti pañcamī anta anvaya anupapattiḥ
nanu yathā kim cit rūpam ādāya tad rūpe tad rūpa kalpana lakṣaṇa kāra upaghaṭita tad lakṣaṇasya
khapuṣpam bhavat siddhānte ityādau khapuṣpa ādīnām ananubhūta tvena ṛ idṛśam iti nirūpaṇa aśakteḥ āropa asaṃbhavāt

original: tathaiva tatra śakyārthasyaivāprasidhyā tanniṣṭhaguṇayogābhāvāt siddhānte khapuṣpaśabdasya gauṇatvāsaṃbhavāt bhavaduktalakṣaṇasyāpyavyāptiḥ,
analyzed: tathā eva tatra śakyārthasya eva aprasidhyā tad niṣṭha guṇa yoga abhāvāt siddhānte khapuṣpa śabdasya gauṇa tva asaṃbhavāt bhavat ukta lakṣaṇasya api avyāptiḥ
iti āśaṅkā nirāsāya āha puṣpa ādau iti
āropita artha vṛtti tva rūpa tad lakṣaṇasya asmat ukta rīti āropita khapuṣpam ādāya avastu svarūpa nirūpaṇe
na āropa upapādane vyāpti abhāve piśa puṣpa śabdaḥ eva latā puṣpe āropita artha vṛtti tva sattvena
nahi loke khapuṣpa śabdasya gauṇa tvam kenacid ucyate
yatas iṣṭa āpattiḥ ucyate

original: etena āropyasya siṃhatvādergauṇatvāprasiddherāropitāśraye devadattādāveva tatprasiddherāropitārthāśrayatvameva gauṇatvam iti ---- parāharam;
analyzed: etena āropyasya siṃha tva ādeḥ gauṇa tva aprasiddheḥ āropita āśraye devadatta ādau eva tad prasiddheḥ āropita artha āśraya tvam eva gauṇa tvam iti

original: khapuṣpasya svayamevāprasiddhasyāropitatvāsaṃbhavāt prasiddhe khe latādau prasiddhasya
analyzed: khapuṣpasya svayam eva aprasiddhasya āropita tva asaṃbhavāt prasiddhe khe latā ādau prasiddhasya
puṣpasya eva āropitasya aṅgīkāreṇa prasiddhi upapādane āropita artha āśraya tvasya khe sattvāt
khapuṣpe khapuṣpa śabdasya gauṇa tva anivāraṇāt ativyāpteḥ amukteḥ
atas tvad mate tivyāpti doṣaḥ

original: mamatu śakyaśabdena mukhyārthamātravivakṣaṇādāropitasya mukhyārthatānapāyāt na kopi doṣaḥ /
analyzed: mama tu śakya śabdena mukhya artha mātra vivakṣaṇāt āropitasya mukhya artha tā anapāyāt na kaḥ api doṣaḥ
nahi mukhya tvam anāropita tva kṛtam
kintu vṛtti antaram an apekṣya śabda prayoga kṛtam iti bhāvaḥ

original: naca ---- tathāpi “khapuṣpaṃ bhavatsiddhānta” iti vadatā bauddhenopameyabhūtasya siddhāntasyānabhyupagamāt vastuto 'satye tasmin kathaṃ guṇayogābhāve
analyzed: na ca tathā api khapuṣpam bhavat siddhāntaḥ iti vadatā bauddhena upameya bhūtasya siddhāntasya anabhyupagamāt vastutas satye tasmin katham guṇa yoga abhāve

original: iti ----- vācyam; siddhāntapadābhidheyasya niścayasya sadrūpābhāvena bhramatve 'pi svarūpeṇa vidyamānatayopameyatvopapatteḥ /
analyzed: iti vācyam siddhānta pada abhidheyasya niścayasya sat rūpa abhāvena bhrama tve pi sva rūpeṇa vidyamāna tayā upameya tva upapatteḥ

original: evamevapuṣpavikārātmanā khasyāsatyatve 'pi svātmano rūpeṇa satyatvāt sādṛśyapratiyogitvamākāśasyaiveti nopamānānupapattiḥ /
analyzed: evam eva puṣpa vikāra ātmanā khasya asatya tve pi sva ātmanaḥ rūpeṇa satya tvāt sādṛśya pratiyogi tvam ākāśasya eva iti nā upamāna anupapattiḥ
etat ca khelatā puṣpasya eva āropeṇa pārthasārathi ādi abhimatena uktam

original: yadā tu latāpuṣpe khādhikaraṇatāropa iti pūjyapādānāmabhipretam,
analyzed: yadā tu latā puṣpe kha adhikaraṇa tā āropaḥ iti pūjya pādānām abhipretam

original: tadā latāpuṣpasyaivopamānatvena khādhikaraṇatākatvenāsatyatve 'pi latāpuṣpātmanā satyatvena sādṛśyapratiyogitayopamānatvopapattiḥ sulabhaiva
analyzed: tadā latā puṣpasya eva upamāna tvena kha adhikaraṇa tāka tvena asatya tve pi latā puṣpa ātmanā satya tvena sādṛśya pratiyogitayā upamāna tva upapattiḥ sulabhā eva

original: ata evaitanmate khapuṣpasyaivopamānatvapratītirnaiva bādhitā bhavatītyapi jñeyam /
analyzed: atas eva etad mate khapuṣpasya eva upamāna tva pratītiḥ na eva bādhitā bhavati iti api jñeyam

original: yattu vārtike ----- āropitapuṣpaṃ vinaiva khādhārapuṣpāvacchinnābhāvavācitvam khapuṣpaśabdasya varṇitam,
analyzed: yat tu vārtike āropita puṣpam vinā eva kha ādhāra puṣpa avacchinna abhāva vāci tvam khapuṣpa śabdasya varṇitam
tat kaustubhe eva upapādya nirastam draṣṭavyam
atas sva ukta lakṣaṇasya veda aprāmāṇya anāpādaka tvāt yuktatva āśayena upasaṃharati atas ca etādṛśa iti
guṇa nimittaka vṛtti saṃbandhāt śabda artha vṛtti gauṇa pada abhilapya tva upapādakam sādṛśya vivakṣayā kṛtam etādṛśa śabda arthaḥ
yadi api ca puruṣaḥ vāva gautama agniḥ ityādau vede pi āropaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
tathā api tatra adṛṣṭa phala artham upāsakasya upāsanā rūpa āropa vidhi saṃbhave pi iha tad abhāve
vede vaktuḥ abhāve ca tad kṛta āropa anupapatteḥ dṛṣṭa vyavahārasya anyathā api upapatteḥ na āropa kalpanam
yuktam iti sva lakṣaṇasya vede saṃbhava uktyā sūcitam
sva śakya samaveta ityādi gauṇa lakṣaṇa samanvayaḥ

original: devadatte krūratvādivat siṃhatvasyāpyāropeṇa gauṇīdarśanādubhayasādhāraṇyāya lakṣaṇe guṇapadaṃ samavetaparamityupetya lakṣaṇamāha ------ svaśakyeti
analyzed: devadatte krūra tva ādi vat siṃha tvasya api āropeṇa gauṇī darśanāt ubhaya sādhāraṇyāya lakṣaṇe guṇa padam samaveta param iti upetya lakṣaṇam āha sva śakya iti
kvacid āropeṇa iti

original: yatra rūpakādau satyapi bhedadarśane sādṛśyamātreṇa siṃhatvakrūratvādi devadatte vaktāropya siṃhaśabdaḥ prayujyate,
analyzed: yatra rūpaka ādau sati api bheda darśane sādṛśya mātreṇa siṃha tva krūra tva ādi devadatte vaktā āropya siṃha śabdaḥ prayujyate
śrotrā ca tathā eva pratipadyate

original: tatrānubhavasiddhāropāpahnave pramāṇābhāvāt siṃhatvādīnāmāropeṇa sākṣādeva devadatte svaśaktyā siṃhasamavetasiṃhatvādisadbhāvāllakṣaṇasamanvaya  #
analyzed: tatra anubhava siddha āropa apahnave pramāṇa abhāvāt siṃha tva ādīnām āropeṇa sākṣāt eva devadatte sva śaktyā siṃha samaveta siṃha tva ādi sadbhāvāt lakṣaṇa samanvaya
iti arthaḥ
kvacid eva iti

original: svaśakye siṃhe vidyamānaiḥ prasahyakāritvādiguṇaiḥ samānajātīyaguṇānāṃ devadatte sattvena sādṛśyamātravivakṣayāpi devadatte siṃhaśabdaprayoge  #
analyzed: sva śakye siṃhe vidyamānaiḥ prasahyakāri tva ādi guṇaiḥ samāna jātīya guṇānām devadatte sattvena sādṛśya mātra vivakṣayā api devadatte siṃha śabda prayoge

original: (svaśakyasamavetetyādilakṣaṇasya lakṣyamāṇaguṇairyogāditi vārtikāvirodhasamarthanena prācāṃ matena guṇānāṃ lakṣaṇayā bodhopapattiḥ)
analyzed: sva śakya samaveta ityādi lakṣaṇasya lakṣyamāṇa guṇaiḥ yogāt iti vārtikā virodha samarthanena prācām matena guṇānām lakṣaṇayā bodha upapattiḥ
atra ca abhidheya avinābhūte pravṛttiḥ lakṣaṇā iṣyate
lakṣyamāṇa guṇaiḥ yogāt vṛtteḥ iṣṭā tu gauṇa tā

original: iti lakṣaṇābhedanirūpaṇaparavārtike uktaṃ lakṣyamāṇaguṇayoganimittatvalakṣaṇaṃ gauṇyā na yuktam;
analyzed: iti lakṣaṇa abheda nirūpaṇa para vārtike uktam lakṣyamāṇa guṇa yoga nimitta tva lakṣaṇam gauṇyā na yuktam
tathātve jahat svārtha tā āpatteḥ
tad vāraṇāya svārtha mātra paratve guṇānām aśābdatva āpattiḥ

original: ataḥ siṃhaśabdena śakyārthaṃ pūrvaṃ śaktyanusāreṇābhidhāya guṇā api lakṣaṇayocyante /
analyzed: atas siṃha śabdena śakya artham pūrvam śakti anusāreṇa abhidhāya guṇāḥ api lakṣaṇayā ucyante
atas lakṣyamāṇa guṇaiḥ ityantam samāna adhikaraṇa samāsa aṅgīkāreṇa svārtha abhidhāna pūrvikā

original: guṇeṣu lakṣaṇeti vārtike ukte” ti nyāyasudhāyāṃ vyākhyānena guṇalakṣaṇaṃ prācāmabhimatāmabhipretya
analyzed: guṇeṣu lakṣaṇā iti vārtike uktā nyāyasudhāyām vyākhyānena guṇa lakṣaṇam prācām abhimatām abhipretya
tad matam upapādayati atra iti
gauṇyā aṅguṇānām upasthitau sva matasya sva śakya ityādi lakṣaṇa lakṣyamāṇa guṇa vārtikayoḥ avirodha upapādana pūrvakam tatra nyāyasudhā ādi khaṇḍana pūrvakam
yugapad vṛtti dvaya virodha āpatteḥ mukhya artha guṇavat upasthiti artham āśritayā gauṇyā eva avacchedakībhūta guṇa śābda bodha upapatteḥ a
śābda tva aprasaṅgāt niṣprayojanam guṇeṣu lakṣaṇa aṅgīkaraṇam iti asvarasāt āha vastutas tu iti

original: lakṣaṇāyā apyupasthitārthasyaiva śābdatvasidhyarthamaṅgīkārāt gauṇyāmapyāvaśyakīṃ guṇopasthitiṃ sādhayati ------ ekasaṃbandhīti //
analyzed: lakṣaṇāyāḥ api upasthita arthasya eva śābdatva sidhi artham aṅgīkārāt gauṇyām api āvaśyakīm guṇa upasthitim sādhayati eka saṃbandhi iti
evam ca lakṣyamāṇa guṇaiḥ iti vārtike na karmadhāraya saṃbandhaḥ
kintu siṃha tva agni tva jāti vācaka padena yā lakṣyamāṇā vyaktiḥ
tad niṣṭha guṇaiḥ iti ṣaṣṭhī tatpuruṣaḥ eva

original: ata eva vārtike ----- yathā pūrvārdhe lakṣaṇayā abhidheyāvinābhūtasaṃbandhādaraḥ pradarśyate evamuttarārdhe mukhyārthasādṛśyarūpādaramātraṃ,
analyzed: atas eva vārtike yathā pūrva ardhe lakṣaṇayā abhidheya avinābhūta saṃbandha ādaraḥ pradarśyate evam uttara ardhe mukhya artha sādṛśya rūpa ādara mātram
na tu lakṣaṇā guṇeṣu
ataeva vahni tva lakṣitāt arthāt yat paiṅgalya ādi gamyate
tena māṇavake buddhiḥ sādṛśyāt upajāyate
iti uttara vākye gamyate iti evam uktam
tathā saṃbhavati ca atra siṃha tva avagata vyakti upasthāpita prasahyakāri tva ādi aneka dharma pratyayāt

original: devadattapratyaya iti pūrvaiva śaktirnimittaṃ iti vārtike pūrvaśaktereva nimittatvaṃ gauṇyāmuktam /
analyzed: devadatta pratyayaḥ iti pūrvā eva śaktiḥ nimittam iti vārtike pūrva śakteḥ eva nimitta tvam gauṇyām uktam

original: natu guṇalakṣaṇāyā” iti nyāyasudhākṛto guṇalakṣaṇāparatayā vyākhyānamanyāyyameveti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na tu guṇa lakṣaṇāyāḥ iti nyāyasudhā kṛtaḥ guṇa lakṣaṇā para tayā vyākhyānam anyāyyam eva iti bhāvaḥ
nanu siṃha ādi padānām siṃha saṃbandhi lakṣaṇayā eva devadatta pada sāmānādhikaraṇya upapatteḥ
kim iti atirikta gauṇī vṛtti samaṅgīkāraḥ iti āśaṅkām abheda āśaṅkā nirāsa dvārā bheda āpādanena
nirasyati na ca iti
abhidheya avinābhūte iti pūrva likhita vārtike na lakṣaṇā hetu tvena avinābhāva upapādanam
tasyāḥ saṃbandha mātreṇa śabda tātparya vaśāt upapatteḥ
nava atra lakṣaṇasya abhidheyasya lakṣyena avinābhāvaḥ gninā iva dhūmasya uktaḥ
lakṣyasya eva lakṣaka abhidheya avinābhāva kathanāt
kintu abhidheya saṃbandhi tva rūpa ādara pradarśana mātra artham tat upādānam

original: ata eva “yaṣṭīḥ praveśaye” tyādau yaṣṭyādeḥ puruṣāvinābhāve 'pi yaṣṭyādiśabdānāṃ
analyzed: atas eva yaṣṭīḥ praveśaye tyādau yaṣṭi ādeḥ puruṣa avinābhāve yaṣṭi ādi śabdānām
abhidheya yaṣṭi ādi saṃbandha anādareṇa puruṣa svarūpe vṛtti abhāvena abhidheya avinābhāva

original: pravṛttitvābhidhānāt saṃbandhamātrasya ca lakṣaṇāhetorbhāvādyuktaiva lakṣaṇayā pravṛttirityabhidheyasaṃbandhitvādareṇa lakṣaṇoktā /
analyzed: pravṛtti tva abhidhānāt saṃbandha mātrasya ca lakṣaṇā hetoḥ bhāvāt yuktā eva lakṣaṇayā pravṛttiḥ iti abhidheya saṃbandhi tva ādareṇa lakṣaṇā uktā
gauṇyām tu lakṣaṇā hetu saṃbandha sattve pi abhidheya saṃbandhi tva rūpa abhāvāt krūra tva ādi dharma saṃ sādṛśya ādarāt na
lakṣita lakṣaṇā tva prasiddhiḥ iti vaiṣamyam abhipretya samādhatte sva śakya iti
atas eva lakṣaṇā gauṇyoḥ bhedāt eva sahacaraṇa sthāna tādarthya vṛtta māna dhāraṇa sāmīpya yoga sādhana ādhipatyebhyaḥ brāhmaṇa mañca kaṭa rāja saktu candana gaṅgā śāṭaka anna
puruṣeṣu atadbhāve pi tadvat upacāraḥ iti sūtreṇa akṣapāda prabhṛtibhiḥ lakṣaṇā nimittānām ukta tvāt jaimininā
gauṇī vṛtti nimitta guṇāḥ pārthakyena tad siddhi ityādinā uktāḥ iti āha te ca iti

original: “prāpnoti paramāṃ siddhiṃ“e ityādau siddhipadena kāryābhidhānāt tasya mukhyasya siddhiḥ
analyzed: prāpnoti paramām ityādau siddhi padena kārya abhidhānāt tasya mukhyasya siddhiḥ
kāryam asmin iti tad siddhi śabdena sūtra gatena mukhya artha kārya kara tvam ucyate
iti abhipretya āha tad siddhiḥ iti
prastara eka kapālayoḥ api yajamāna vat kartṛ tva aviśeṣeṇa yāga ākhya kārya nirūpita tva eka dharma yogena
prastara yajamāna niṣṭha karaṇa tvayoḥ sājātyāt yajamāna niṣṭha kārya kartṛ tva samāna jātīya kārya kartṛ tva ākhya guṇa yogena
gauṇī lakṣaṇayā prastara eka kapāla pada sāmānādhikaraṇya upapattyā avāntaravākya artha saṃbhavāt
paścāt stuti lakṣaṇā iti āha yajamānaḥ yathā iti
prayojanam spaṣṭa tvāt na uktam
iti tad siddhi peṭikā adhikaraṇe tad siddhi udāharaṇa vicāraḥ

original: ------------ (bhāṣyakṛdudāhṛtasyāgneyo brāhmaṇa ityasya parityāgena agnirvai brāhmaṇa ityasyodāharaṇatvena nirdeśe kāraṇanirūpaṇam)
analyzed: bhāṣyakṛt udāhṛtasya āgneyaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ iti asya parityāgena agniḥ vai brāhmaṇaḥ iti asya udāharaṇa tvena nirdeśe kāraṇa nirūpaṇam
atra bhāṣyakāreṇa āgneyam aṣṭākapālam nirvapet brāhmaṇaḥ brahmavarcasa kāma

original: ” ityasya vidheḥ śeṣe śrutaṃ “āgneyo vai brāhmaṇa aindro rājanyo vaiśyo vaiśvadeva”
analyzed: iti asya vidheḥ śeṣe śrutam āgneyaḥ vai brāhmaṇaḥ aindraḥ rājanyaḥ vaiśyaḥ vaiśvadeva

original: ityudāhṛtya āgneyādipadānāṃ “prajāpatirakāmayata prajāḥ sṛjeyeti sa mukhatastrivṛtaṃ
analyzed: iti udāhṛtya āgneya ādi padānām prajāpatiḥ akāmayata prajāḥ sṛjeya iti sa mukhataḥ trivṛtam

original: niramimīta tamagnirdevatānvavasṛjyata gāyatrī chando rathantaraṃ sāma brāhmaṇo manuṣyāṇāmajaḥ
analyzed: niramimīta tam agniḥ devatā anvavasṛjyata gāyatrī chandaḥ rathantaram sāma brāhmaṇaḥ manuṣyāṇām ajaḥ

original: paśūnāṃ uraso bāhubhyāṃ pañcadaśaṃ niramimīta tamindro devatānvavasṛjyata tantriṣṭup
analyzed: paśūnām urasaḥ bāhubhyām pañcadaśam niramimīta tam indraḥ devatā anvavasṛjyata tat triṣṭubh

original: chando bṛhatsāmarājanyo manuṣyāṇāmaviḥ paśūnāṃ tasmātte vīryāvanto vīryāddhyasṛjyanta
analyzed: chandaḥ bṛhat sāma rājanyaḥ manuṣyāṇām aviḥ paśūnām tasmāt te vīryāvantaḥ vīryāt hi asṛjyanta

original: ūrubhyāṃ madhyataḥ saptadaśaṃ niramimīta taṃ viśve devā anvasṛjyanta jagatīchando
analyzed: ūrubhyām madhyataḥ saptadaśam niramimīta tam viśve devāḥ anvasṛjyanta jagatī chandaḥ

original: vairūpaṃ sāma vaiśyo manuṣyāṇāṃ gāvaḥ paśūnāṃ” ityetadvidhyarthavādasaṃkīrtitaprajāpatimukhā-
analyzed: vairūpam sāma vaiśyaḥ manuṣyāṇām gāvaḥ paśūnām iti etad vidhi arthavāda saṃkīrtita prajāpati mukhā
di eka prabhava tva sādṛśyena gauṇa tām upapādya artha vāda tvam siddhāntitam
tad āgneya śabdasya sūkta haviḥ samabhivyāhāra abhāve devatā taddhita anta tva anupapattau api
tasya idam iti adhikāre nityam agni kalibhyām ḍhak vaktavyaḥ iti smṛtyā saṃbandha sāmānya arthaka taddhita anta tva upapatteḥ
bhrātṛvya vat ukta arthavāda saṃkīrtita prajāpati mukha eka prabhava tva rūpa saṃbandha viśeṣeṇa
mukhya tayā eva upapatteḥ devatā tva rūpa saṃbandha apekṣaṇe ca brāhmaṇasya yaṣṭuḥ haviṣa

original: ivāgnerdevatātvenāpi saṃbandhasya “āgneyo vai brāhmaṇo devataye“tyādau dṛṣṭasyehāpyupapatteḥ
analyzed: iva agneḥ devatā tvena api saṃbandhasya āgneyaḥ vai brāhmaṇaḥ devatayā ityādau dṛṣṭasya iha api upapatteḥ

original: gauṇatve pramāṇābhāvāditi vārtikakṛtā pradūṣya yadanyadudāhṛtaṃ tadeva svayamudāharati
analyzed: gauṇa tve pramāṇa abhāvāt iti vārtikakṛtā pradūṣya yat anyat udāhṛtam tat eva svayam udāharati
agniḥ vai iti
agniḥ vai iti atra agni śabdasya guṇa vidhi tva ādi nirāsa pūrvakam eka mukha prabhava tva guṇena gauṇa tva nirūpaṇam

original: atrāpi pūrvavadeva nāmatvaguṇavidhitve āśaṅkya vidhyantaraikavākyatvena brāhmaṇakārye
analyzed: atra api pūrvavat eva nāma tva guṇa vidhi tve āśaṅkya vidhi antara eka vākya tvena brāhmaṇa kārye
tyāga ādau acetanasya agneḥ vidhāna asaṃbhavena ca nirasya arthavāda tva nissandigdha tve gauṇa tvam api agni śabdasya
niścitam iti pūrvavat iti uktyā sūcitam

original: kimarthaṃ tarhi sūtraikadeśakṛtaṃ adhikaraṇāntaramityāśaṅkānirāsāya nimittāntarapratipādakatvena tatsārthakyaṃ sūcayan nimittāntaramāha ------dvayorapīti
analyzed: kimartham tarhi sūtra eka deśa kṛtam adhikaraṇa antaram iti āśaṅkā nirāsāya nimitta antara pratipādaka tvena tad sārthakyam sūcayan nimitta antaram āha dvayoḥ api iti

original: pūrvasūtragatatacchabdānuṣaṅgeṇa jāyate yasmāditi vyutpattyā janmopādānaṃ jātiśabdena
analyzed: pūrva sūtra gata tad śabda anuṣaṅgeṇa jāyate yasmāt iti vyutpattyā janma upādānam jāti śabdena

original: vivakṣitamabhipretya tasya mukhyārthasyāgneryā jātirupādānaṃ saiva yasya brāhmaṇasya
analyzed: vivakṣitam abhipretya tasya mukhya arthasya agneḥ yā jātiḥ upādānam sā eva yasya brāhmaṇasya

original: jātiriti vyadhikaraṇabahuvrīhiṇā jātiśabdena sūtre ekajātīyatā gauṇīnimittatvenoktetyabhipretyāha ----- eketi //
analyzed: jātiḥ iti vyadhikaraṇa bahuvrīhiṇā jāti śabdena sūtre eka jātīya tā gauṇī nimitta tvena uktā iti abhipretya āha ekā iti
sāmānya vāci tva abhāvam jāti śabdasya sūcayitum janana pada prayogaḥ

original: yadyapi śrāddhādau pāṇihome brāhmaṇasyāgnikāryakartṛtvādagniniṣṭhakāryakartṛtva- samānajātīyakāryakartṛtvena tatsiddherapi nimittatvamupapadyate;
analyzed: yadi api śrāddha ādau pāṇi home brāhmaṇasya agni kārya kartṛ tvāt agni niṣṭha kārya kartṛ tva samāna jātīya kārya kartṛ tvena tad siddheḥ api nimitta tvam upapadyate

original: tathāpi tadavivakṣayā yadaikamukhajanyatvavivakṣayā prayogastatra nimittāntarajñāpanārthatayaiva tatpravṛttiḥ /
analyzed: tathā api tad avivakṣayā yadā eka mukha janya tva vivakṣayā prayogaḥ tatra nimitta antara jñāpana artha tayā eva tad pravṛttiḥ
yadi api ca eka mukha bhava tvam pramāṇa abhāvāt arthavādasya anya para tvena ca avāstavam
tathā api avāstavasya api arthavāda antara ukta tvāt iha tad śabda nimitta tām pratipatsyate iti
iti tad siddhipeṭikāyām jāti udāharaṇa vicāraḥ
ādityaḥ yūpaḥ iti atra sārūpyasya gauṇī vṛtti nimitta tva upapādanam

original: “ādityo yūpa” ityādāvapi nāmatvaguṇavidhitvāśaṅkāyā nirāsaḥ pūrvavadeva spaṣṭatvāt
analyzed: ādityaḥ yūpaḥ ityādau api nāmatva guṇavidhitva āśaṅkāyāḥ nirāsaḥ pūrvavat eva spaṣṭa tvāt
jñātum śakyate evā iti upekṣya arthavāda tva upapādakam gauṇī vṛtti nimitta antara mātram iha
kathyate iti abhipretya āha ādityaḥ yūpaḥ iti
ādi padena yajamānaḥ yūpaḥ ityādeḥ saṅgrahaḥ
yajamānaḥ prastaraḥ ityādīnām sārūpya udāharaṇa tva asaṃbhavasya prācām matena upapādanam
iti prāñcaḥ iti
atha cakṣuḥ grāhya tejaḥ tva ādinā dharmeṇa yadi sādṛśya bodhaḥ

original: tadā “yajamānaḥ prastara” ityādāvapi tatkāryakaratvādināpi tadbodhaḥ samāna eveti
analyzed: tadā yajamānaḥ prastaraḥ ityādau api tad kārya kara tva ādinā api tad bodhaḥ samānaḥ eva iti

original: na cakṣurgrāhyatejastvādinā kaścana viśeṣa iti yathāśrutaṃ prācāmuktaṃ viśeṣakaraṃ
analyzed: na cakṣuḥ grāhya tejaḥ tva ādinā kaścana viśeṣaḥ iti yathāśrutam prācām uktam viśeṣa karam
na bhavati iti abhipretya tad āśayam vivṛṇoti vastutas tu iti

original: ayamarthaḥ ----- yadyapi prastarādeḥ sārūpyaṃ tatkāryakaratvādidharmasāmānyāt saṃbhavati;
analyzed: ayam arthaḥ yadi api prastara ādeḥ sārūpyam tad kārya kara tva ādi dharma sāmānyāt saṃbhavati

original: tathāpi śabdasya tatkāryakaratvādimātre tātparyāvasānena tasya śābdabuddhiviṣayatvābhāvāt aviṣayasya ca pratipādanātmakaśabdavṛttinimittatvāyogānna  #
analyzed: tathā api śabdasya tad kārya kara tva ādi mātre tātparya avasānena tasya śābda buddhi viṣaya tva abhāvāt aviṣayasya ca pratipādana ātmaka śabda vṛtti nimitta tva ayogāt na
atas tatra tad kārya kara tvam eva śabdāt pratītam prakārībhavati

original: iha tu pratyakṣatvena sārūpyasya prathamaṃ pratītasya tatraiva śabdasya tātparyāvadhāraṇācchābdabuddhiviṣayatvena
analyzed: iha tu pratyakṣa tvena sārūpyasya prathamam pratītasya tatra eva śabdasya tātparya avadhāraṇāt śābda buddhi viṣaya tvena
sādṛśye jhaṭiti pratīta tvena tātparya ākhya vivakṣā avadhāraṇāt ca buddhi viṣaya tva rūpa śabda vṛtti nimitta viśeṣa abhidhāna artham
tad kārya kara tva ādi hetukebhyaḥ sadbhāva mātreṇa gauṇī nimittebhyaḥ pṛthak asādhāraṇyena iha upādānam iti
atas eva na atra cakṣuḥ grāhya tvam eva pṛthak upādāna prayojakam
chatriṇaḥ gacchantī tyādau bahu tva ādīnām api cakṣuḥ grāhya tvena pṛthak upādāna anupapatteḥ iti
cakṣuḥ grāhya ūrdhva tva tejaḥ tva rūpa sādṛśya prakāra tvam eva bhinnam nimittam iti jñāpayitum adhyāhṛta pañcamī anta tayā
bhāṣya ādau sārūpyāt iti sūtra avayavaḥ upāttaḥ
cakṣuḥ grāhya tva dharma prakāraka bodha janaka tva abhāvena yajamānaḥ prastaraḥ iti asya sārūpya anudāharaṇa tvam iti mūlakāra mata nirūpaṇam

original: pūjyapādaistu liṅgasamavāyā iti dvandvasamāsānte prathamābahuvacanadarśanāt tatsiddhiśca jātiśca sārūpyaṃ cetyevaṃ vigrahābhiprāyeṇa prathamāntatayā  #
analyzed: pūjya pādaiḥ tu liṅga samavāyāḥ iti dvandva samāsa ante prathamā bahuvacana darśanāt tad siddhiḥ ca jātiḥ ca sārūpyam ca iti evam vigraha abhiprāyeṇa prathamā anta tayā
sārūpya padam dhṛtam

original: ataeva ----- sūtre sārūpyapadena na samānadharmavattvamātraṃ vivakṣitam,
analyzed: ataeva sūtre sārūpya padena na samāna dharmavattva mātram vivakṣitam
apitu yathā avasthita cakṣuḥ grāhya rūpa śabda artha vivakṣayā cakṣuḥ grāhya tva lābhena tādṛśa dharma mātram eva iti dhyeyam
iti tad siddhipeṭikāyām sārūpya udāharaṇa vicāraḥ
a paśu śabda nāma tva asaṃbhave pi niṣedhya guṇa samarpaka tayā pūrvapakṣaḥ

original: agnicayane pañcadaśaśīrṣopadhāne śrutaṃ ---- “purastāt pratīcīnamaśvasyopadadhāti paścāt prācīnamṛṣabhasye“ti gavāśvaśīrṣopadhānavidhivākyaśeṣamudāharati  #
analyzed: agnicayane pañcadaśa śīrṣa upadhāne śrutam purastāt pratīcīnam aśvasya upadadhāti paścāt prācīnam ṛṣabhasya iti gavāśva śīrṣa upadhāna vidhi vākya śeṣam udāharati
a paśavaḥ iti

original: etacca. “ayajño vā eṣa yo 'sāmā” “asatraṃ vā etadyadacchandomaṃ” iti vidhyantaraśeṣāṇāmapyupalakṣaṇam /
analyzed: etat ca ayajñaḥ vai eṣa yaḥ sāmā asatram vai etat yat acchandomam iti vidhi antara śeṣāṇām api upalakṣaṇam
tatra gava aśva vyatiriktānām aja ādīnām paśu pada vācya tvāt apaśu saṃjñā tva anupapatteḥ taittirīye

original: “apaśavo vā anye goaśvebhyaḥ paśava” iti paśuśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyena śrutasyāpaśuśabdasya
analyzed: a paśavaḥ vai anye go aśvebhyaḥ paśavaḥ iti paśu śabda sāmānādhikaraṇyena śrutasya a paśu śabdasya
ghaṭa ādi nāmatvasya api anupapatteḥ pramāṇa antareṇa eva siddhatvāt saṃjñā karaṇa vaiyarthayā āpatteḥ ca
nāma tva āśaṅkāyāḥ asaṃbhavena tām upekṣya anyathā anupapatteḥ paśu pade paśu kārya lakṣaṇām aṅgīkṛtya

original: gavāśvavyatiriktājādīnāṃ paryudāsaḥ pratiṣedho vā saṃbhāvanayā śaṅkyeta,
analyzed: gavā aśva vyatirikta aja ādīnām paryudāsaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ vā saṃbhāvanayā śaṅkyeta
tām api nirasyan arthavāda tvam smārayati aja ādīnām iti
etena nāma tva asaṃbhave pi guṇa vidhi tva saṃbhava asaṃbhava vicāreṇa saṃgatiḥ sūcitā

original: nahi vidheya eva guṇo vicāraviṣaya iti rājājñā;
analyzed: nahi vidheyaḥ eva guṇaḥ vicāra viṣaye iti rājā ājñā
vidhi śabdasya niṣedha upalakṣaṇa tayā niṣedhya guṇa samarpaka tayā api tad upapatteḥ iti bhāvaḥ
tatra tatra iti
ajaḥ gnīṣomīyaḥ sārasvatīm meṣīm ityādau vihita tvāt eva niṣedha anupapatteḥ avihite

original: ca prāptyabhāvādeva tadasaṃbhavāt kalpyaniṣedhānurodhena kḷptavidhīnāṃ pākṣikatvakalpanena
analyzed: ca prāpti abhāvāt eva tad asaṃbhavāt kalpya niṣedha anurodhena kḷpta vidhīnām pākṣika tva kalpanena

original: vikalpasyāpi satyāṃ gatāvannyāyyatvāt arthavādatvameva gavāśvapraśaṃsārthaṃ yuktamityarthaḥ //
analyzed: vikalpasya api satyām gatau at nyāyya tvāt arthavāda tvam eva gavāśva praśaṃsā artham yuktam iti arthaḥ

original: gavāśvavyatiriktānāmapaśukārye paśukārye tanniṣedhasya vā saṃbhave kā gatirityapekṣāyāmāha ------ apaśuśabdo hīti //
analyzed: gavāśva vyatiriktānām apaśu kārye paśu kārye tad niṣedhasya vā saṃbhave kā gatiḥ iti apekṣāyām āha apaśu śabdaḥ hi iti
pi ca paśavaḥ go aśvāḥ iti sāmānādhikaraṇyāt eka saṃbandhi jñānena apara saṃbandhi smaraṇa vidhayā
gavāśva gata prāśastya abhāvasya śakya artha niṣṭhasya upasthāpakam

original: ataśca gavāśvagataprāśastyābhāvarūpaguṇayogenājādiṣu gauṇyā vṛttyopapanna iti arthāt nahinindānyāyena vidheyagatāśvagataprāśastyāvagatiḥ sulabhā
analyzed: atas ca gavāśva gata prāśastya abhāva rūpa guṇa yogena aja ādiṣu gauṇyā vṛttyā upapannaḥ iti arthāt nahi nindā nyāyena vidheya gata aśva gata prāśastya avagatiḥ sulabhā
yadi api arthavādasya gavāśva gata prāśastya lakṣaṇayā api upapatteḥ na tad gata prāśastya abhāva kathanasya upayogaḥ

original: tathāpi itaranindayā vidheyotkarṣāpādakatvena phalībhūtastuteratiśaye upayogo nānupapannaḥ /
analyzed: tathā api itara nindayā vidheya utkarṣa āpādaka tvena phalībhūta stuteḥ atiśaye upayogaḥ na anupapannaḥ

original: ataeva paśuśabdasya nimittāntarāsaṃbhavena nimittatvenāśritāyā api gavāśvagatapraśaṃsāyā vidhyekavākyatayeva phalatvenāpyāśrayaṇānna vaiyarthyaśaṅkāpi
analyzed: ataeva paśu śabdasya nimitta antara asaṃbhavena nimitta tvena āśritāyāḥ api gavāśva gata praśaṃsāyāḥ vidhi ekavākyatayā iva phala tvena api āśrayaṇāt na vaiyarthya śaṅkā api

original: yajamānaśabdetu kāryakaratvasyaiva guṇasya nimittatvāt tasyāḥ phalatvameveti viśeṣaḥ //
analyzed: yajamāna śabde tu kārya kara tvasya eva guṇasya nimitta tvāt tasyāḥ phala tvam eva iti viśeṣaḥ

original: evañca praśaṃsābhāvarūpe guṇe vyāvartyamānatayā praśaṃsāyāḥ praviṣṭatvamādāyaiva sūtre praśaṃsāyā nimittāntaratvenopādānaṃ draṣṭavyam /
analyzed: evam ca praśaṃsā bhāva rūpe guṇe vyāvartyamāna tayā praśaṃsāyāḥ praviṣṭa tvam ādāya eva sūtre praśaṃsāyāḥ nimitta antara tvena upādānam draṣṭavyam
yathāśrute gavāśva gata praśaṃsāyāḥ śakyārtha ghaṭa ādi guṇa tvasya aja ādi guṇa tvasya vā asaṃbhavāt
pratyuta vidheya gavāśva ādi praśaṃsā artham anyeṣām aja ādīnām aprāśastyasya eva apekṣaṇāt ca guṇatā anupapatteḥ
atas ca a paśu śabdaḥ viśiṣṭaḥ eva atra gauṇaḥ
yat tu gavāśva ādi gatām pūrvam upādāya praśasta tām

original: tadabhāvo 'nyapaśvādau nañsamāsena kathyate” iti vārtikasvārasyena nyāyasudhākārādibhiḥ
analyzed: tad abhāvaḥ nya paśu ādau nañ samāsena kathyate iti vārtika svārasyena nyāyasudhākāra ādibhiḥ

original: nañsamāsāvayavabhūtena paśuśabdena praśastatāṃ lakṣayitvā nañsamāsenānyapaśuṣu tadabhāvaḥ
analyzed: nañ samāsa avayava bhūtena paśu śabdena praśasta tām lakṣayitvā nañ samāsena anya paśuṣu tad abhāvaḥ
kathyate iti

original: tallakṣaṇayaiva tarhi apaśuśabdasya ghaṭādiṣvivājādiṣu pravṛttyupapatteḥ gauṇīvṛttyupapādanānupapatterayuktamiti darśitaṃ kaustubhe /
analyzed: tad lakṣaṇayā eva tarhi apaśu śabdasya ghaṭa ādiṣu iva aja ādiṣu pravṛtti upapatteḥ gauṇī vṛtti upapādana anupapatteḥ ayuktam iti darśitam kaustubhe

original: yadyapi “paśavo go aśvā” iti paśutvakathanasya paśutve satyevānupayogātpraśastatvalakṣaṇayā prayuktapaśupadārthavyatirekapraśastatvābhāvarūpa  #
analyzed: yadi api paśavaḥ go aśvāḥ iti paśu tva kathanasya paśu tve sati eva anupayogāt praśasta tva lakṣaṇayā prayukta paśu padārtha vyatireka praśasta tva abhāva rūpa
eva a paśu śabdāt pratīyeta
tathā api gauṇī vṛtti upapādanāya eva eka saṃbandhi smaraṇa nyāyena eva tad pratītiḥ
na tu lakṣaṇayā

original: tathāca prathamato 'paśuśabdena nañsamāsāntena śaktyaiva paśubhinnamarthamabhidhāya tanniṣṭhaguṇayogena paścāt gauṇatvamupapādanīyam /
analyzed: tathā ca prathamatas paśu śabdena nañ samāsa antena śaktyā eva paśu bhinnam artham abhidhāya tad niṣṭha guṇa yogena paścāt gauṇa tvam upapādanīyam
ataeva apaśu śabdasya ghaṭa ādi vāci tvam śāstradīpikā uktam saṃgacchate

original: imamevāsvarasaṃ tuśabdena sūcayannyāyasudhākārādidarśitamarthaṃ prācāṃ matatvena darśayati ------- prācāṃ mate tviti //
analyzed: imam eva a svarasam tuśabdena sūcayan nyāyasudhākāra ādi darśitam artham prācām mata tvena darśayati prācām mate tu iti

original: evaṃ “ayajño vā eṣa yo 'sāme” tyādau darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇapaṭhite yadyapi na sāmavatkratusāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ,
analyzed: evam ayajñaḥ vai eṣa yaḥ sāma ityādau darśa pūrṇamāsa prakaraṇa paṭhite yadi api na sāmavat kratu sāmānādhikaraṇyam
yena tad gata prāśastyam upasthitam bhavet
tathā api asāma tā parihārāya sāma sthānīya tayā vihita agneāya ahi ityādi vidhi artha vāde sāmanvantam
karoti iti uktyā upasthita sāmavat kratu gata prāśastya abhāva rūpa guṇasya a yajña ādi pada śakya ghaṭa ādi niṣṭhasya

original: yogāt svato yajñarūpeṣvapi darśapūrṇamāsādiṣu gauṇamayajñapadaṃ jñeyam /
analyzed: yogāt svatas yajña rūpeṣu api darśa pūrṇamāsa ādiṣu gauṇam ayajña padam jñeyam
yat tu sāmavat kratu vidhi eka vākya tayā tad upasthitiḥ iti uktam kaustubhe

original: tat darśapūrṇamāsaprakaraṇe paṭhitasyāsya kratvantaraikavākyatvābhāvāt udāharaṇāntaraviṣayaṃ jñeyam /
analyzed: tat darśa pūrṇamāsa prakaraṇe paṭhitasya asya kratu antara eka vākya tva abhāvāt udāharaṇa antara viṣayam jñeyam
a satram vai etat yat a chandomam iti asya ayam arthaḥ

original: caturviṃśobhavatītyanena vihitaḥ caturviṃśatistomako rathantarasāmā ukthya ādyachandomaḥ /
analyzed: caturviṃśaḥ bhavati iti anena vihitaḥ caturviṃśati stomakaḥ rathantara sāmā ukthyaḥ ādya chandomaḥ

original: catuścatvāriṃśo bhavatī” tyanena vihitaścatuścatvāriṃśatstomako bṛhadrathantarasāmā ukthyo dvitīyachandomaḥ /
analyzed: catuścatvāriṃśaḥ bhavati iti anena vihitaḥ catuścatvāriṃśat stomakaḥ bṛhat rathantara sāmā ukthyaḥ dvitīya chandomaḥ
aṣṭācatvāriṃśaḥ bhavati ti anena vihitaḥ uṣṭācatvāriṃśat stomakaḥ bṛhat sāmā ukthyaḥ tṛtīya chandomaḥ
tatas stoma gata saṃkhyā sāmyena gāyatrī triṣṭubh jagatī chandobhiḥ mīyante paricchidyante

original: stomā yatreti vyutpattyā chandomatvaṃ trayāṇāṃ yāgānāmiti te trayaśchandomā yatra
analyzed: stomāḥ yatra iti vyutpattyā chandoma tvam trayāṇām yāgānām iti te trayaḥ chandomāḥ yatra
santi tat satram pañcadaśa rātra ādi praśastam

original: yatratu caturdaśarātre ādye prāyaṇīyaṃ aharmadhye pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍahīyānyānulomavilomatayā
analyzed: yatra tu caturdaśa rātre ādye prāyaṇīyam ahar madhye pṛṣṭhyaḥ ṣaḍahīyānya anuloma viloma tayā

original: dvādaśadinānyete udayanīya ityevaṃ ahaḥ kḷptau madhye chandomānāmabhāvāt satrabhūto
analyzed: dvādaśa dināni ete udayanīye iti evam ahar kḷptau madhye chandomānām abhāvāt satra bhūtaḥ
caturdaśa rātraḥ satra gata chandoma kṛta prāśastya abhāvāt asatram gauṇyā vṛttyā satra padena ucyate

original: tena chandomarahitanindayā chandomarūpāvayavastutyā “ya evaṃ vidvāṃsaḥ pañcadaśarātramāsate” iti vihitapañcadaśarātrarūpāvayavistutiriti draṣṭavyam
analyzed: tena chandoma rahita nindayā chandoma rūpa avayava stutyā ye evam vidvāṃsaḥ pañcadaśa rātram āsate iti vihita pañcadaśa rātra rūpa avayavi stutiḥ iti draṣṭavyam

original: evaṃ svamate prācāṃ mate vā gavāśvagataprāśastyabodhanaprakārabhede 'pi pratiyogividhayā
analyzed: evam sva mate prācām mate vā gavāśva gata prāśastya bodhana prakāra bhede pi pratiyogi vidhayā

original: praviṣṭāyāḥ praśaṃsāyā gauṇīnimittatve naiva vivāda ityabhipretyopasaṃharati -------- sarvatheti //
analyzed: praviṣṭāyāḥ praśaṃsāyāḥ gauṇī nimitta tve na eva vivādaḥ iti abhipretya upasaṃharati sarvathā iti
iti tad siddhi peṭikāyām praśaṃsā udāharaṇa vicāraḥ
pūrva udāharaṇena saṃgati nirūpaṇa pūrvakam sṛṣṭi padārtha nirūpaṇa pūrvakam ca sṛṣṭi viśiṣṭa upadhāna vidhānam iti bhāṣyakāra mata upapādanam

original: pūrvatra vidhyantaraikavākyatvādinār'thavādatve siddhe yatra na tattatra vidhitvasyaivānarthakyaparihārāya
analyzed: pūrvatra vidhi antara eka vākya tva ādinā arthavāda tve siddhe yatra na tat tatra vidhi tvasya eva ānarthakya parihārāya

original: svīkāra iti pratyudāharaṇadarśanena saṃgatiṃ pratyudāharaṇarūpāṃ sūcayan vidhāvapi
analyzed: svīkāraḥ iti pratyudāharaṇa darśanena saṃgatim pratyudāharaṇa rūpām sūcayan vidhau api
gauṇī vṛtti nimitta antara kathana ārthatvam adhikaraṇa antarasya iti darśayitum udāharati sṛṣṭīḥ iti
yadi api atra arthavāda tva asaṃbhavena vidhāyaka tve āvaśyake sati anupadhīyamānābhiḥ iṣṭakābhiḥ cayanasya
kartum aśakya tvena iṣṭakābhiḥ agnim cinute iti vidhi anyathā anupapattyā eva sva rūpeṇa iṣṭakā saṃbandhi tvena

original: copadhānasya prāptau guṇasaṃkrāntavidhiśaktikatayopadhānānuvādena sṛṣṭipadārtha eva vidhātuṃ yuktaḥ,
analyzed: ca upadhānasya prāptau guṇa saṃkrānta vidhi śaktika tayā upadhāna anuvādena sṛṣṭi padārthaḥ eva vidhātum yuktaḥ
saḥ pi ca na iṣṭakā rūpaḥ
iṣṭakānām sṛṣṭi rūpa tva an avagamāt
apitu sṛṣṭi tanmātra upadheya iṣṭakāsu sṛṣṭi padasya sṛṣṭi mantra parasya lakṣaṇām aṅgīkṛtya iṣṭakānām
sṛṣṭi pada abhidheya tve pi kāsām iṣṭakānām sṛṣṭi mantraiḥ upadhānam iti viśeṣa anavagamāt
iṣṭakā sāmānyasya ca iṣṭakā vidhinā eva upadhāna saṃbandhe prāpte tad viśeṣasya sutarām upadhāna saṃbandha prāpteḥ
vidhāna ayogāt pāriśeṣyāt tisṛbhiḥ astughata brahmā asṛjyate eva

original: yattu prācīnaiḥ ------ “tadvānāsāmupadhāno mantra” iti “iṣṭakāsu luk ca mato” riti smṛtermatuplopena sṛṣṭyabhidhāyimantrairupadheyānāmiṣṭakānāṃ
analyzed: yat tu prācīnaiḥ tadvān āsām upadhānaḥ mantraḥ iti iṣṭakāsu luk ca smṛteḥ matup lopena sṛṣṭi abhidhāyi mantraiḥ upadheyānām iṣṭakānām
tat ayuktam

original: tathātve sanniyogaśiṣṭasya pratyayasya “ṛtavyā upadadhātī” tivanmatuplopena saha prāptyāpatteḥ /
analyzed: tathātve sanniyoga śiṣṭasya pratyayasya ṛtavyāḥ upadadhāti tivat matup lopena saha prāpti āpatteḥ

original: naca ------ eeevaṃ bhavanmate 'pi mantratvavivakṣāyāṃ matup durnivāra iti ------ vācyam;
analyzed: naca bhavat mate mantra tva vivakṣāyām matup durnivāraḥ iti vācyam
matup prakaraṇena tasya lopa āśrayaṇe yat pratyaya lopasya api chāndasa tvena eva upapādanīya tve
lāghavāt matup vidheḥ eva dṛṣṭa anuvidhiḥ chandasi iti sṛji vacanena anitya tā kalpanā aucityāt atas

original: lakṣaṇayaiva strīliṅgānurodhāt sṛṣṭimantropadheyeṣṭakāparaḥ sṛṣṭiśabda ityevoktaṃ kaustubhe /
analyzed: lakṣaṇayā eva strī liṅga anurodhāt sṛṣṭi mantra upadheya iṣṭakā paraḥ sṛṣṭi śabdaḥ iti eva uktam kaustubhe

original: yattu atra liṅgaprakaraṇābhyāmevānyamantravadeṣo 'pi prāpta iti prāptānyaparisaṅkhyāyāṃ traidoṣyāpattiritaramantrāmnānavaiyarthyāpattiśceti
analyzed: yat tu atra liṅga prakaraṇābhyām eva anya mantra vat eṣaḥ pi prāptaḥ iti prāpta anya parisaṅkhyāyām traidoṣya āpattiḥ itara mantra āmnāna vaiyarthya āpattiḥ ca iti
tat na liṅga prakaraṇa kalpya śruteḥ pūrvam eva etad vidhi pravṛttyā phalataḥ parisaṅkhyāyām
traidoṣya aprasakteḥ grahaṇa ādi śeṣi parisaṅkhyā artha tvena api punar vidhi upapatteḥ ca itara mantrāṇām aikāntika upadhāna liṅga abhāvena iṣṭakā grahaṇa ādi viṣaya tvena
sārthakya saṃbhavāt ca
atas sṛṣṭi mantra vidhāyaka tvena vidhi upapatteḥ na vidhau gauṇī lakṣaṇa āpādakam asṛṣṭi mantra paratvam āśrayaṇīyam
tathā api ubhayoḥ dhātvartha upapadārthayoḥ saṃbhavat prāptika tve bhāva artha adhikaraṇa nyāyena ākṣepataḥ

original: pūrvaṃ prayojanāntarārthaṃ yuktaṃ dhātvarthasyaiva vidhānaṃ ityabhipretya bhāṣyakārīyaṃ
analyzed: pūrvam prayojana antara artham yuktam dhātvarthasya eva vidhānam iti abhipretya bhāṣyakārīyam
siddhāntam eva āha tatra ca iti
upadhāna vidhāna prayojana nirūpaṇam
artha prāptasya api upadhānasya iṣṭakā sādhya tvena tad saṃskāra tva asaṃbhavāt tad artham punar vidhānam iti āha iṣṭakā saṃskāra artha tvena iti
nanu pradhāna bhede pi prayoga vidhi avagata sāhitya nirvāha artham yathāśakti pātra abhimarśana vat samudita upadhānam eva
yuktam iti āśaṅkya tad nirāsāya aniṣṭa āpādanena prayojana antaram āha ārthika tvāt ca iti
tat eva āha sati tu iti
vyūha viśeṣeṇa upasthāna rūpa upadhānasya ārthika tve vihita tva rūpa aṅga tvasya kṛṣi ādi vat abhāvāt cayane
adhvaryu kartṛ tvena samāna kartṛka tvasya ca anya kṛtena api sandhukṣaṇa ādinā devadatte pāka kartṛ tvasya iva iha api avāntaravyāpāra rūpa upadhānasya anya
kṛta tve pi cayane adhvaryu kartṛka tva upapatteḥ niyamena adhvaryu kartṛ tva aprāpteḥ aṅga tvena vidhānam āvaśyakam
tatas ca aṅga pradhānayoḥ eka kartṛ tvāt tad siddhiḥ
ataeva prathana ādi vidheḥ iva ādhvaryava samākhyā viṣaya tā siddhi dvārā adhvaryu kartṛ tva siddhiḥ api nā eva prayojanam
cayana samāna kartṛ tvāt eva tad lābhāt
atas cayana samāna kartṛ tva siddhiḥ eva prayojanam iti arthaḥ
sṛṣṭi padam ca yadi api viśeṣya aṃśena uddeśya samarpakam sṛṣṭi mantra aṃśena anuvādakam

original: te ca mantrāḥ “sṛṣṭīrupadadhātī“tyupakramyai “kayāstuvata prajā adhīyante” tyādinā saptadaśa paṭhitāḥ /
analyzed: te ca mantrāḥ sṛṣṭīḥ upadadhāti iti upakramyai kayā astuvata prajāḥ adhīyante tyādinā saptadaśa paṭhitāḥ
tatra tisṛbhiḥ astuvata brahmā asṛjyata ityādinā sṛji dhātu yogena āmnātānām caturdaśa mantrāṇām

original: sṛṣṭiliṅgatvena yathā sannidhānasahakṛtāt liṅgādavagatāṅgabhāvānāṃ prāptatvāt anuvādastathaiva
analyzed: sṛṣṭi liṅga tvena yathā sannidhāna sahakṛtāt liṅgāt avagata aṅga bhāvānām prāpta tvāt anuvādaḥ tathā eva
sa prajāpatiḥ adhipatiḥ āsīt saptaviṃśatyā astuvata dyāvāpṛthivyau aitām vasavaḥ rudrāḥ ādityā
anuvyāyan teṣām ādhipatyam āsīt trayastriṃśatā astuvata bhūtāni aśāmyan prajāpatiḥ parameṣṭhī adhipatiḥ āsīt
iti trayāṇām ādya saptadaśa mantrāṇām yat saptadaśa iṣṭakāḥ upadadhāti iti upasaṃhārāt saptadaśa mantra antargatānām
a sṛṣṭi liṅgānām api sannidhāna ādinā aṅgatayā prāptatva anuvādaḥ iti āha sṛṣṭi padam tu iti
mātra padena viśeṣya bhūta iṣṭakā vyāvṛttiḥ
athavā mantra gata kārtsnyasya vā grahaṇam
katham a sṛṣṭi liṅge tad pada pravṛttiḥ iti apekṣayā gauṇyā iti uktam
tad prakāraḥ tu adhikaraṇa antara pratīka grahaṇe upapādayiṣyate
sṛṣṭi padena a sṛṣṭi mantra grahaṇa prayojanam
ayam ca anuvādaḥ

original: itthamidamupadhānaṃ praśastaṃ yatsṛṣṭivanmantraiḥ kriyate ityevaṃ stutyartho yathāsṛṣṭaṃ
analyzed: ittham idam upadhānam praśastam yat sṛṣṭi vat mantraiḥ kriyate iti evam stuti arthaḥ yathāsṛṣṭam

original: brahmaṇā yāni sṛṣṭānyanuvāke kīrtitāni phalāni tānyanatikramyātikramanimittaṃ vighnaṃ
analyzed: brahmaṇā yāni sṛṣṭāni anuvāke kīrtitāni phalāni tāni an atikramya atikrama nimittam vighnam
nirasya sarvāṇi yajamānaḥ prāpnoti iti arthakasya yathāsṛṣṭam eva avarundhe iti arthavādasya ālambana arthaḥ
prathana mantre uru prathā iti mantra pratīka vat na anupapannaḥ
bhāṣyakāra mate svārasya nirūpaṇa pūrvakam mantra mātra vidhānam iti vārtikakāra mata nirūpaṇam
evam bhāṣyakāra matam upapādya etad mate sarva vākyeṣu upadhāna mātra vidhānāt abhyāsāt bheda āpatteḥ
sakṛt vihitasya api ca iṣṭakāḥ pratyaṅga tvena prati iṣṭakam āvṛtti siddhau asakṛt vidhānasya
niṣprayojana tva āpatteḥ a parituṣya pūrva upapādita mantra vidhi pūrvapakṣam eva nyāyyam abhipretya
vārtikakāra uktam pakṣa antaram āha vārtikakāraḥ tu iti

original: atra nyāyasudhākṛtā -------- arthākṣiptopadhānānuvādena mantramātravidhāveva yathāpūrvapakṣaṃ vārtikatātparyamupavarṇitam,
analyzed: atra nyāyasudhākṛtā artha ākṣipta upadhāna anuvādena mantra mātra vidhau eva yathāpūrva pakṣam vārtika tātparyam upavarṇitam
tat ayuktam

original: iṣṭakānāmeva dvitīyayoddeśyatvāvagamenopadhānasyaiva karaṇatayā vidheyatvāvagateḥ tadvidhānaphalasyāpi pūrvavallābhena tadatikrame pramāṇābhāvāt
analyzed: iṣṭakānām eva dvitīyayā uddeśya tva avagamena upadhānasya eva karaṇatayā vidheya tva avagateḥ tad vidhāna phalasya api pūrvavat lābhena tad atikrame pramāṇa abhāvāt
nahi mantrasya ādhvaryava tvāt tad karaṇaka tvena artha ākṣipta upadhānasya adhvaryu kartṛka tvam sidhyati
yājyā vat bhinna kartṛka tve pi upapatteḥ

original: ato mantraviśiṣṭopadhānavidhāveva vārtikatātparyaṃ yuktamityabhipretya pakṣāntaramāha ------- mantraviśiṣṭeti //
analyzed: atas mantra viśiṣṭa upadhāna vidhau eva vārtika tātparyam yuktam iti abhipretya pakṣa antaram āha mantra viśiṣṭa iti
vidhi antara avaiyarthyena eka prasara tā bhaṅga aprasaktyā ca mantra viśiṣṭa upadhāna vidhi pakṣa upapādanam
atas tad niyamaḥ iti
niyama padena śeṣa śeṣi ubhaya parisaṅkhyā vivakṣitā
an ārabhya adhīta citriṇī vajriṇī ādi vidhau dūra stha cayana vidhi ākṣipta upadhāna anuvādena mantra mātra vidhānasya
saṃskārya iṣṭakā rūpa guṇa yogāt karma antara tva upapatteḥ prākaraṇika mantra avarodhāt ca anupapatteḥ agatyā
mantra viśiṣṭa upadhāna vidheḥ āvaśyaka tvāt tadvat iha api viśiṣṭa vidhānam eva yuktam
na ca evam api eka upadhāna vidhinā eva tad siddheḥ itara vidhi vaiyarthyam tad avastham iti vācyam
kevala upadhāna mātra vidhau tad āpattau api mantra viśiṣṭa tad vidhāne upadhānānām guṇāt bheda siddheḥ tad tad mantra viśeṣṭa upadhāna antara vidhānena vaiyarthya aprasakteḥ

original: nahyekena vākyena katipayamantropadheyeṣṭakānāṃ upadhāne vihite itaramantropadheyeṣṭakānāmupadhānavidhivaiyarthyaṃ śaṅkituṃ śakyam;
analyzed: nahi ekena vākyena katipaya mantra upadheya iṣṭakānām upadhāne vihite itara mantra upadheya iṣṭakānām upadhāna vidhi vaiyarthyam śaṅkitum śakyam
upadhāna antare dhvaryu kartṛka tva siddhyai tad āvaśyaka tvāt
ataeva idṛś asvarasa paryālocanayā sarva iṣṭakānām ekaika vākya saṃskārya tva avagatau api vidheya tad tad mantra viśiṣṭa upadhāna sāmarthyāt tad tad vākye viśeṣa avadhāraṇam api
na anupapannam
bhāṣyakāra mate tu vidheyasya upadhānasya iṣṭakā viśeṣa pratyāyaka tva anupapatteḥ sarva iṣṭakā viṣaya tva āpatteḥ
vidhi antara vaiyarthyam duṣpariharam atas tad tad mantra viśiṣṭa upadhāna vidhānam eva yuktam
na ca iṣṭakā uddeśena mantravat upadhāna vidhau eka prasara tā bhaṅga āpattiḥ
iṣṭakānām upadhāna nirūpita tvena uddeśya tve pi mantra nirūpita uddeśya tva abhāvena tad aprasakteḥ iti bhāvaḥ
etat ca upadhāna mātra vidhau bhāṣyakāra mate vidhi antara vaiyarthya āpādanam nyāyasudhākāra uktam āśritya uktam
mantra upadheya iṣṭakā uddeśena upadhāna saṃskāra vidhānam iti prakāśakāra matasya bhāṣya vārtika ādi avirodhena vidhi antara avaiyarthyena ca udapādanam

original: vastutaḥ ------- iṣṭakānāmuddeśyatvasya sṛṣṭipadopādānenaiva vaktavyatve iṣṭakāviśeṣaṇatvenaikapada- śrutyānvitānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ upadhānabhāvanāyāmanvayo  #
analyzed: vastutas iṣṭakānām uddeśya tvasya sṛṣṭi pada upādānena eva vaktavya tve iṣṭakā viśeṣaṇa tvena eka pada śrutyā anvitānām mantrāṇām upadhāna bhāvanāyām anvayaḥ
durupapādaḥ eva
atas ca eka pada upādānena uddeśya bhūta iṣṭakāḥ viśeṣaṇa tve pi mantrāṇām vākya bheda aprasakteḥ
sṛṣṭi mantra upadheya iṣṭakā saṃskāra artha tvena upadhāna mātrau idhāne pi anya mantra upa dheya aṣṭakā vyavṛtti siddheḥ tad saṃskāraka tvena itara vidhi sāthrakyam
saṃbhavati eva

original: ataeva iṣṭakoddeśena mantravidhānapūrvapakṣa eveṣṭakāviśeṣāpratīteḥ sarvāsvatiprasaṃgāpādanaṃ bhāṣyavārtikakārādīnāṃ dṛṣṭam,
analyzed: ataeva iṣṭakā uddeśena mantra vidhāna pūrvapakṣe eva iṣṭakā viśeṣa apratīteḥ sarvāsu atiprasaṃga āpādanam bhāṣya vārtikakāra ādīnām dṛṣṭam
na tu upadhāna vidhau api

original: naca ------- sṛṣṭimantropadheyā eveṣṭakāḥ sarvā eva kuto na syuḥ?
analyzed: na ca sṛṣṭi mantra upadheyāḥ eva iṣṭakāḥ sarvāḥ eva kutas na syuḥ
iti vācyam sṛṣṭīḥ upadadhāti iti upakramya yat saptadaśa iṣṭakāḥ upadadhāti iti upasaṃhāra artha vādena
sandigdheṣu vākyaśeṣāt
iti nyāyena saptadaśa mantra upadheya saptadaśa iṣṭakā viṣaya tva upapatteḥ

original: ayaṃ cārthavādaḥ pūrvapakṣiṇā mukhyānāmeva sṛṣṭiliṅgānāṃ vidhyabhyupagamādanādṛto 'pi mantramātravidhivādinā siddhāntināvaśyamādartavyaḥ /
analyzed: ayam ca artha vādaḥ pūrvapakṣiṇā mukhyānām eva sṛṣṭi liṅgānām vidhi abhyupagamāt an ādṛtaḥ pi mantra mātra vidhi vādinā siddhāntinā avaśyam ādartavyaḥ
anyathā guṇa vṛtteḥ atiprasaṅgena saptadaśānām eva upādāna anupapatteḥ

original: tathā mantraviśiṣṭopadhānavidhāvapi sarveṣṭakopadhānaprasaṃge saptadaśaivaitarairmantrairupadheyā iti vyavasthāsidhyarthamavaśyamayamarthavāda  #
analyzed: tathā mantra viśiṣṭa upadhāna vidhau api sarva iṣṭakā upadhāna prasaṃge saptadaśa eva aitaraiḥ mantraiḥ upadheyāḥ iti vyavasthā sidhi artham avaśyam ayam arthavāda
upāsyaḥ
evam ca saptadaśānām eva aṣṭakānām sṛṣṭi mantra saṃbandhāt tadvatīnām saptadaśānām eva aṣṭakānām uddeśena ekena
vidhinā vihitasya api upadhānasya anya saṃskāraka tayā punar vidhi āmnāna upapatteḥ na vaiyarthya prasaktiḥ iti
prakāśa kāra uktam eva sādhu
bhāṣyakāra mate vidhi antara vaiyarthya āpādana padasya vārtikakāra mate mantra vidhāna upapādanasya ca bhāṭṭa dīpikā ādṛtasya āśaya nirūpaṇam

original: pūjyapādaistu --------- bhāṣyakāramate etadupadhānavidhitaḥ prāk sṛṣṭimantropadheyatvasyeṣṭakāsvasiddhestena rūpeṇoddeśyatvāyogāt na sṛṣṭipadamiṣṭakāvācitvenoddeśyasamarpakam
analyzed: pūjya pādaiḥ tu bhāṣyakāra mate etat upadhāna vidhitaḥ prāk sṛṣṭi mantra upadheya tvasya iṣṭakāsu asiddheḥ tena rūpeṇa uddeśya tva ayogāt na sṛṣṭi padam iṣṭakā vāci tvena uddeśya samarpakam
katham anyathā sṛṣṭi padasya uddeśya samarpaka tve bhāṣyakāraḥ sṛṣṭi padasya anuvāda tvam arthavāda prayojanakam vadet
apitu yasya eva iṣṭakā karaṇaka cayana vidhi artha ākṣiptasya upadhānasya pūrva pravṛttyā vidheya tvam
tasya eva iṣṭakā saṃbandhi tvena avagatasya upasthita iṣṭakā saṃskāraka tayā vidhi āśrayaṇāt uddeśya tvam
tat ca rūpam sarva iṣṭakāsu api anuvṛttam iti sarvāsām upadhāna siddheḥ itara vaiyarthyam
ataeva arthavādaḥ pi tadā iṣṭakā samudāya avayavībhūta saptadaśa iṣṭakā praśaṃsā arthaḥ eva saṃpadyate
vidheḥ sandigdha tva abhāvena tatra apravṛtteḥ
ataeva sṛṣṭi padam api mantra mātra param lohita uṣṇīṣa pada vat

original: kiyantaḥ sṛṣṭimantrā iti sandehe evopasaṃhāro nirṇāyako natvasaṃdigdheṣṭakānirṇāyakaḥ;
analyzed: kiyantaḥ sṛṣṭi mantrāḥ iti sandehe eva upasaṃhāraḥ nirṇāyakaḥ na tu asaṃdigdha iṣṭakā nirṇāyakaḥ
vidhi arthavādayoḥ eka vākya tayā stuti anurodhena vidheya nirṇāyaka tve pi uddeśya nirṇāyaka tvasya kvāpi adṛṣṭa tvāt
yadi api dvayoḥ praṇayantī dvābhyām eva iti
ūrū etat yajñasya yat varuṇapraghāsaḥ sākamedhāḥ ca iti arthavāde ūru tvena saṃstutayoḥ gamana sādhanatva pratīteḥ madhyama parvaṇoḥ dvayoḥ uddeśyayoḥ nirṇayaḥ
pi arthavāde dṛṣṭaḥ

original: tathāpi caturṇāṃ madhye katarayordvayoriti nirdhāraṇābhāvādyuktaṃ nirṇāyakatvam /
analyzed: tathā api caturṇām madhye katarayoḥ dvayoḥ iti nirdhāraṇa abhāvāt yuktam nirṇāyaka tvam
prakṛte sandeha abhāvāt anirṇāyaka tvam eva
atas eva vidheya sa mantraka upadhāna sāmarthyāt iva siddhānte saptadaśa iṣṭakā viṣaya tvam asmad mate
sidhyati iti na tatra arthavāda upāsanam āvaśyakam iti abhipretya bhāṣyakāra mate vidhi antara vaiyarthya āpādanam
mantrāṇām upadhāna bhāvanāyām anvayaḥ ca vārtika saṃmata tvena darśitaḥ
tat idam uktam kaustubhe bhāṣyakṛt mate tu vidheya upadhānasya iṣṭakā viśeṣa pratyāyaka tva abhāvāt mantrāṇām
ca iṣṭakā viśeṣaka tva anupapatteḥ yat saptadaśa iṣṭakāḥ upadadhāti iti arthavādasya ca vidhau
sarva iṣṭakā viṣaya tvena niścite sandeha abhāvena anirṇāyaka tvāt vākya antara ānarthakyam iti viśeṣaḥ iti

original: pañcame “madhyamāyāntu vacanāt brāhmaṇavatī” tyadhikaraṇe “yāṃ kāñcana brāhmaṇavatīmiṣṭakāmabhijānīyāttāṃ
analyzed: pañcame madhyamāyāntu vacanāt brāhmaṇavatī ti adhikaraṇe yām kāñcana brāhmaṇavatīm iṣṭakām abhijānīyāt tām
madhyamāyām citau upadadhyāt iti vacanena abhipūrvasya jānāteḥ pratyakṣa jñāna vāci tvāt
pratyakṣa brāhmaṇa vihitānām iṣṭakānām madhyamaciti āśraya tvasya vakṣyamāṇa tvāt tat api atra
prayojana antaram bhavitum arhati iti āha madhyamā iti
āgantūnām ante niveśasya api pañcame vakṣyamāṇa tvāt antimāyām eva iti uktam
iṣṭakānām brāhmaṇena vidhāna abhāve katham brāhmaṇavat tvam
iti śaṅkām brāhmaṇavattva nirvacanena upapādayan nirasyati pratyakṣa iti
tatra ca iti granthaḥ pūrvam eva vyākhyātaḥ
mantra vidhāna pakṣa prayojane madhyamaciti saṃbandhe yājñika saṃpradāya virodha upapādanam

original: parantu vārtikakāramate caturthacitau yājñikaiḥ sṛṣṭīnāmanuṣṭhānena kriyamāṇena virodho duṣparihara eva /
analyzed: parantu vārtikakāra mate caturtha citau yājñikaiḥ sṛṣṭīnām anuṣṭhānena kriyamāṇena virodhaḥ duṣpariharaḥ eva
sarvāsām api prāṇabhṛtām anena madhyamaciti saṃbandhasya eva āpattau prathama ādi citi anuṣṭhāna virodhaḥ pi

original: yadi tatrāvāntaraprakaraṇena “yāṃ kāñcane” ti sāmānyavākyasya bādha ucyeta,
analyzed: yadi tatra avāntara prakaraṇena yām kāñcane ti sāmānya vākyasya bādhaḥ ucyeta
tadā sṛṣṭīnām api etat samānam iti api dhyeyam
vārtika matam upasaṃharati atas ca iti

original: yato mantrāṃśe upadhāne vā vidhānaphalasya lābhaḥ,
analyzed: yatas mantra aṃśe upadhāne vā vidhāna phalasya lābhaḥ
atas tad rūpaḥ hetuḥ atas śabda arthaḥ
bahu tva āśraya samudāyaḥ eva gauṇa ūrthaḥ iti śāstradīpikā anusāri prakāśakāra mata khaṇḍanena sṛṣṭi bahu tva samāna adhikaraṇa samudāya āśrita tva guṇa yogena
samudāyinaḥ eva gauṇaḥ ūrthaḥ iti nirūpaṇam
atra ca kaḥ punar atra guṇaḥ
bhūmā sṛṣṭi samudāye hi sṛṣṭi bhūmā asti
sṛṣṭi asṛṣṭi samudāye api ekayā stuvata iti anuvāke sṛṣṭi bhūmā asti

original: ityanena sādṛśyena sṛṣṭiśabda” iti śāstradīpikāgranthagatasamudāya- śabdasvārasyamanurudhya bāhulyasya guṇatvamāśritya yathā bāhulyaṃ sṛṣṭiṣvasti,
analyzed: iti anena sādṛśyena sṛṣṭi śabdaḥ iti śāstradīpikā grantha gata samudāya śabda svārasyam anurudhya bāhulyasya guṇa tvam āśritya yathā bāhulyam sṛṣṭiṣu asti

original: tathā sṛṣṭyasṛṣṭisamudāye 'pi kathañcitsambaddhamastītyevaṃ sṛṣṭyasṛṣṭisamudāya evārthe gauṇīti prakāśakāraiḥ samudāya eva gauṇor'tha ityuktaṃ,
analyzed: tathā sṛṣṭi asṛṣṭi samudāye pi kathañcid sambaddham asti iti evam sṛṣṭi asṛṣṭi samudāyaḥ eva arthe gauṇī iti prakāśakāraiḥ samudāyaḥ eva gauṇā ūrthaḥ iti uktam
tat ayuktam
tadātve samudāyasya artha aikya abhāvena prakāśaka tva anupapatteḥ kathañcid samudāyi dvārā

original: tadupapattāvapi samudāyasyaiva śābdatvena karaṇatayā vidhāne sati sarvamantrapāṭhottarameva
analyzed: tad upapattau api samudāyasya eva śābdatvena karaṇatayā vidhāne sati sarva mantra pāṭha uttaram eva
sakṛt upadhāna āpatteḥ
kiñca sṛṣṭi samudāya gata bāhulyasya guṇa tvam uta sṛṣṭi samudāya āśraya gata bāhulyasya tat
ādye samudāye bāhulya asaṃbhavaḥ

original: dvitīye samudāyagatabāhulyasya samudāyiṣveva sattvena sṛṣṭyasṛṣṭisamudāye 'bhāvānna samudāyārthasya gauṇatāsiddhiḥ /
analyzed: dvitīye samudāya gata bāhulyasya samudāyiṣu eva sattvena sṛṣṭi asṛṣṭi samudāye bhāvāt na samudāya arthasya gauṇa tā siddhiḥ
atha sṛṣṭi gata bāhulyam eva tatra kathañcid saṃbandhaḥ iti ucyate
tadā sṛṣṭi samudāye hi asti bhūmā iti samudāya gata bhūma tva pratipādana para mūla grantha virodhaḥ
atas samudāyi gata tad karaṇatā nirvāha artham sṛṣṭi niṣṭha bāhulya samāna adhikaraṇa samudāya āśrita tva guṇa yogena
sṛṣṭi asṛṣṭhi samudāyinām eva gauṇyā artha tvam nyāyasudhākṛt uktam yuktam āśrayitum

original: naca --------- sṛṣṭivatbāhulyavadasṛṣṭimantratraye 'pi bāhulyasya sattvāt tasyaivāstu guṇatvaṃ,
analyzed: naca bāhulyasya sattvāt tasya eva astu guṇa tvam
kim atas punar samudāyasya praveśena

original: iti --------- vācyam; yatra bahūnāṃ madhye dvayorekasya vā'mnānaṃ,
analyzed: iti vācyam yatra bahūnām madhye dvayoḥ ekasya vā āmnānam
tatra tad asaṃbhavena bhūmnaḥ guṇa tva nirvāhāya tad praveśasya āvaśyaka tvāt
na ca ekaḥ samudāyaḥ niṣpramāṇakaḥ
yat saptadaśa iṣṭakāḥ iti arthavāde eka pada upādāna eka anuvāka gata tvena tad pratīteḥ
naca sṛṣṭi ghaṭita samudāya āśraya tvam eva guṇaḥ stu
kim bāhulya praveśena
iti vācyam sṛṣṭi śabdāt pratīyamāna bāhulyasya eva guṇa tveṇa tasya āvaśyaka tvāt

original: uktañca nyāyasudhāyām --------- “anyatra tatkāryakaratvasārūpyādiriveha sṛṣṭiśabdāt sṛṣṭibāhulyabuddheḥ tasyaiva pravṛttinimittatvam” iti //
analyzed: uktam ca nyāyasudhāyām anyatra tad kārya karatva sārūpya ādiḥ iva iha sṛṣṭi śabdāt sṛṣṭi bāhulya buddheḥ tasya eva pravṛtti nimitta tvam iti
atas mantra gaṇam lakṣayet sṛṣṭi śabdaḥ iti uttara adhikaraṇa gata bhāṣyakāra ukta gaṇa śabdasya
samūha mātra para tayā aviruddha tvāt śāstra dīpikā gata samudāya padam pratyekam ekatvena
bahu tva anvaya ayogya tvāt tad anvaya yogya mātra pradarśana mātra para tayā virodhena upapatteḥ
samudāyi sṛṣṭi asṛṣṭi mantreṣu eva yuktā gauṇī iti abhipretya āha sṛṣṭi padam param iti
arthavāde iva vidhau api gauṇī vṛtti nirūpaṇam
pūrvatra arthavādānām eva udāharaṇa tvāt tatra eva gauṇī vṛtti nimitta kathanasya prastuta tvāt vidheya arthaka sṛṣṭi śabde tad kathanam asaṃgatim iti āśaṅkā nirāsa artham
para śabda upādanam

original: ihārthavādatvānapekṣeṇaiva sūtrasya gauṇīvṛttinimittamātrakathane tātparyāttasya ceha vidheye 'pi saṃbhavenātyāgānnāsaṃgatirityarthaḥ //
analyzed: iha arthavāda tva anapekṣeṇa eva sūtrasya gauṇī vṛtti nimitta mātra kathane tātparyāt tasya ca iha vidheye saṃbhavena a tyāgāt na asaṃgatiḥ iti arthaḥ
tad siddhi ādau jahat svārthā gauṇī
bhūmni tu a jahat sva arthā iti upasaṃhāra prābalya nirāsena upapādanam
tad siddhi ādau tad kārya kara tva ādi buddheḥ mukhya artha tyāge pi akṣateḥ gauṇyāḥ upāya mātra tayā avasthiteḥ mukhye na tātparyam

original: ihatu vācyāvācyasamudāyasyaiva guṇatvāt tasya ca vyāsajyavṛttitvenaikasamudāyityāge
analyzed: iha tu vācya avācya samudāyasya eva guṇa tvāt tasya ca vyāsajya vṛtti tvena eka samudāyi tyāge
ātma lābha ayogāt samudāya ghaṭaka tayā tad antarbhūta āsva sṛṣṭiṣu iva sṛṣṭiṣu api tātparyeṇa

original: vaiṣamyādajahatsvārthaṃ gauṇīṃ darśayituṃ sṛṣṭyasṛṣṭimantraparamiti sṛṣṭipadaṃ prayuktam /
analyzed: vaiṣamyāt ajahat sva artham gauṇīm darśayitum sṛṣṭi asṛṣṭi mantra param iti sṛṣṭi padam prayuktam
na ca etāvatā upasaṃhāra prābalya vādinaḥ pratyavasthānam
sṛṣṭi padasya ekasya mukhya artha tve asṛṣṭiḥ tāvaka padānām vaiyarthya āpatteḥ ānarthakya pratihata nyāyena ca iha lakṣaṇa aṅgīkāreṇa upasaṃhāra kṛta upamarda abhāvāt
gauṇī vṛtti nimittam iti
prayojanam spaṣṭa tvāt na uktam
iti tad siddhipeṭikāyām bhūma udāharaṇa vicāraḥ

original: gauṇīvṛttinimittāntaraparatayā adhikaraṇabhedaṃ tuśabdena sūcayan viṣayavākyaṃ darśayati --------- prāṇabhṛta iti //
analyzed: gauṇī vṛtti nimitta antara para tayā adhikaraṇa bhedam tuśabdena sūcayan viṣaya vākyam darśayati prāṇabhṛtaḥ iti
prathama dvitīya tṛtīya prastāra gata vākya trayasya api iha tantreṇa upādānam
tatra prathame prastāre

original: “ayaṃ puro bhuvastasya prāṇo bhauvāyano” “vasantaḥ prāṇāyanaḥ” “prāṇaṃ gṛhṇāmi prajābhya”
analyzed: ayam puras bhuvaḥ tasya prāṇaḥ bhauvāyanaḥ vasantaḥ prāṇāyanaḥ prāṇam gṛhṇāmi prajābhyaḥ
ityādīn trīn prāṇa śabda ghaṭitān anukramya āmnātānām saptacatvāriṃśat a prāṇabhṛtām anyeṣām

original: mantrāṇāṃ daśadikkrameṇopadhāne “ayaṃ puro bhuva iti purastādupadadhāti prāṇamevaitābhirdādhāre”
analyzed: mantrāṇām daśa diś krameṇa upadhāne ayam puras bhuvaḥ iti purastāt upadadhāti prāṇam eva etābhiḥ dādhāre
tyādi vidhibhiḥ paryāya pañcakena viniyogāt ante daśa daśa upadadhāti iti upasaṃhārāt
pañcāśat mantra upadheya iṣṭakānām prāṇabhṛtaḥ upadadhāti iti ayam upadhāna vidhiḥ

original: dvitīyatṛtīyayoḥ prastārayormadhye dvitīye “prāṇaṃ me pāhī“ti prāṇapadaghaṭitastāvadekamantraḥ,
analyzed: dvitīya tṛtīyayoḥ prastārayoḥ madhye dvitīye prāṇam me pāhi iti prāṇa pada ghaṭitaḥ tāvat eka mantraḥ

original: tena saha prāṇabhṛtāṃ caturṇāmanyeṣāṃ āmnātānāṃ viniyogā “ccaturṣveva prāṇān dadhātī“tyarthavāde
analyzed: tena saha prāṇabhṛtām caturṇām anyeṣām āmnātānām viniyogāt caturṣu eva prāṇān dadhāti iti arthavāde
pañca ṛtavaḥ iti arthavāda antara gata ṛtu gata pañca saṅkhyā sāmyena śravaṇāt pañca mantra upadheya iṣṭakānām
prāṇabhṛtaḥ upadadhāti iti upadhāna vidhiḥ

original: tṛtīye “prāṇaṃ me pāhi” iti prāṇapadaghaṭitaikena mantreṇa saha navānāmanyeṣāmaprāṇabhṛnmantrāṇāmāmnātānāṃ
analyzed: tṛtīye prāṇam me pāhi iti prāṇa pada ghaṭita ekena mantreṇa saha navānām anyeṣām a prāṇabhṛt mantrāṇām āmnātānām
daśa prāṇabhṛtaḥ purastāt upadadhāti iti vākye ca viniyogāt daśa mantra upadheya daśa iṣṭakānām
prāṇabhṛtaḥ upadadhāti iti upadhāna vidhiḥ iti vivekaḥ
ādi padena ye catvāraḥ pathayaḥ iti etat ajyāni pada ghaṭita eka mantra sahita itara catur mantra upadheya iṣṭakā upadhāna vidheḥ ajyānīḥ upadadhāti iti asya saṃgrahaḥ

original: ataeva --------- yadyapi prāṇabhṛcchabdasya mantreṣvabhāvānna sṛṣṭiśabdavat “tadvānāsāmi“ti sūtravihitamatuplopena matubantatayā prāṇabhṛcchabdaprayogasaṃbhavaḥ;
analyzed: ataeva yadi api prāṇabhṛt śabdasya mantreṣu abhāvāt na sṛṣṭi śabda vat tadvān āsām iti sūtra vihita matup lopena matup anta tayā prāṇabhṛt śabda prayoga saṃbhavaḥ

original: tathāpi prāṇaṃ prāṇaśabdaṃ bibhratīti yogena mantreṣu tadupadheyeṣṭakāsu ca mantradvārā prāṇaśabdabharaṇāttacchabdapravṛttirdraṣṭavyā /
analyzed: tathā api prāṇam prāṇa śabdam bibhrati iti yogena mantreṣu tad upadheya iṣṭakāsu ca mantra dvārā prāṇa śabda bharaṇāt tad śabda pravṛttiḥ draṣṭavyā
bhūmi vyāvṛttam nimitta antaram darśayati alpatvam iti
tathātve prāṇabhṛt alpatva samāna adhikaraṇa samudāya āśraya tva guṇa yogena prāṇabhṛt a prāṇabhṛt samudāya āśrayībhūta sakala mantreṣu gauṇī
tasyām guṇa antarbhūta tvāt nimittam alpatvam iti arthaḥ

original: etacca liṅgasamudāyapadasya gauṇārthāpekṣayā vācyālpatvaparatvamaṅgīkṛtamapi yatra dvayorapi sāmyaṃ,
analyzed: etat ca liṅga samudāya padasya gauṇa artha apekṣayā vācya alpatva paratvam aṅgīkṛtam api yatra dvayoḥ api sāmyam
ekaḥ eva chatrī

original: tatra gauṇārthopalakṣaṇālpatvābhāvena liṅgasamavāyopapādanāya sāmyasyāpi bhūmavyāvṛttasyopalakṣaṇatayā vyākhyeyam //
analyzed: tatra gauṇa artha upalakṣaṇa alpatva abhāvena liṅga samavāya upapādanāya sāmyasya api bhūma vyāvṛttasya upalakṣaṇatayā vyākhyeyam
vastutas tu sautra liṅga padasya cihnita arthaka tvāt tad saṃbandha mātrasya eva nimitta tva ukteḥ na alpatvasya nimitta tvam

original: ata eva pūrvatra bhūmna iva nimittatvaṃ nahyatrālpatvaṃ sūtrakāroktaṃ navātadbuddhiviṣayam /
analyzed: atas eva pūrvatra bhūmnaḥ iva nimitta tvam na hi atra alpatvam sūtrakāra uktam
ataeva nyāyasudhāyām liṅga padam cihna param vyākhyāya prāṇabhṛt śabdāt tu
prāṇabhṛt liṅga samavāya mātra buddheḥ tasya eva pravṛtti nimitta tvāt bhedena upādānam iti uktvā
bhūyastvam an apekṣya pratīti pradarśana arthaḥ lpa śabdaḥ iti vārtika gata ulpa śabdaḥ vyākhyātaḥ
na tu nimitta para tayā
atas cihna saṃbandhasya eva pratīti viṣaya tvāt prāṇa śabda vat cihna saṃbandha vat samudāya āśraya tvam eva guṇaḥ iti eva yuktam iti
pūrvavat iti

original: sṛṣṭivākye uktasya matabhedasya samudāyināmajahatsvārthagauṇārthopapādanasya ca saṃcāra ihāpi jñātavya ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: sṛṣṭi vākye uktasya mata bhedasya samudāyinām ajahat sva artha gauṇa artha upapādanasya ca saṃcāraḥ iha api jñātavyaḥ iti arthaḥ
lakṣaṇayā eva sṛṣṭi asṛṣṭi mantra grahaṇa upapatteḥ gauṇī vaiyarthya śaṅkā tad parihārau

original: naca --------- sṛṣṭiprāṇabhṛdvākyeṣu chatriṇo yāntīti laukikavākye iva svaghaṭitasamudāyāśrayatvasaṃbandhena lakṣaṇāyā evopapatteḥ kimiti gauṇī?
analyzed: naca sṛṣṭi prāṇabhṛt vākyeṣu chatriṇaḥ yānti iti laukika vākye iva sva ghaṭita samudāya āśraya tva saṃbandhena lakṣaṇāyāḥ eva upapatteḥ kim iti gauṇī

original: iti --------- vācyam; abhidheyasaṃbandhitvānādareṇa guṇayogasādṛśyanimittaṃ tattadguṇaprakārakatāpratītyarthaṃ tadāvaśyakatvasya prāgeva darśitatvāt
analyzed: iti vācyam abhidheya saṃbandhi tva anādareṇa guṇa yoga sādṛśya nimittam tad tad guṇa prakārakatā pratīti artham tad āvaśyaka tvasya prāk eva darśita tvāt
tad siddhi ādīnām tasya api upalakṣaṇa tvasya ca nirūpaṇam
stenam manaḥ ityādau pracchanna tva ādinā gauṇa tvasya ākare ṅgīkārāt tasya pratyakṣa grāhya tvena
kathañcid sārūpya antarbhāvam abhipretya gauṇī vṛtti prakāram upasaṃharati evam iti
tad siddhi peṭikāyāḥ nāmadheya guṇa vidhi arthavāda ātmaka tvena arthavāda tva siddhi athraṅga auṇīvṛtti prakāra mātra kathana paratve
pi gauṇī nimitta prakāra avadhā raṇa artha tva abhāvāt pracchanna tva ādeḥ atra anantarbhāve pi
kṣati abhāva abhiprāyeṇa ṣaṣ pada uttaram eva kāra a prayogaḥ
iti tat siddhipeṭikāyām liṅga samavāya udāharaṇam
iti tad siddhipeṭikā adhikaraṇam
vidhi antargatānām api udbhida ādi padānām vidhāna atirekeṇa dhātvartha avaccheda kṛta nāmadheya tva rūpeṇa
prāmāṇye pratipādite vasara lābhāt arthavāda antargata padānām stāvaka tayā pratipādita prāmāṇyānām
vidhim antareṇa api prāmāṇya sat asat bhāva vicārāt pāda adhyāya saṅgatī prakaraṇa antara tvāt anantara saṃgati abhāve
pi akṣatim saṃśayam ca spaṣṭa tvāt an abhidhāya kāṭhaka cayana prakaraṇa gatam vākyam udāhṛtya
pūrvapakṣam eva āha aktāḥ iti
mṛttikā miśrāḥ kṣudra pāṣāṇāḥ śarkarā śabda arthaḥ
vidhinā eva paryavasita bodha siddheḥ na arthavāda apekṣā iti nirūpaṇam
sandigdha artha nirṇaya prāmāṇya viṣaya tvena arthavāda mātrasya eva upanyāse yukte tad viṣaya tva jñāpanāya vidheḥ api upanyāsaḥ kṛtaḥ
aktāḥ iti etāvat mātreṇa eva vidhi uddeśasya sāmānya ākṣipta sarva viṣaya nirṇayāt virodha irthavādānām
anyatara ākāṅkṣayā eva vaikṛta aṅga vat anvaye vidhi anurodhena eva tat kalpanam yuktam iti abhipretya āha
aktāḥ iti anena iti
arthavādam vinā vidhi aparyavasanam na arthavāda adhikaraṇe bodhyate
kintu atra eva iti ghṛta ādi anyatamena añjanam iti pūrvapakṣa nirūpaṇam

original: yadyapyarthavādādhikaraṇe pūrvapakṣiṇopanyastārthavādaṃ vinā vidhiparyavasānasya nirastatvānnātra vidhiparyavasānena pūrvapakṣa udeti,
analyzed: yadi api arthavādādhikaraṇe pūrvapakṣiṇā upanyasta arthavādam vinā vidhi paryavasānasya nirasta tvāt na atra vidhi paryavasānena pūrvapakṣaḥ udeti
tathā api vidhim vinā tatra arthavāda paryavasāna mātrasya nirāsena anyatara ākāṅkṣayā anvaye
tatratya siddhānta siddheḥ na vidhi paryavasāna nirāse prayojanam iti iha eva tad paryavasāna mūlaka pūrvapakṣa nirāsena
tad aparyavasāna siddhānta sādhanāt na doṣaḥ
atra śarkarā uddeśena upadhāna vidhi mātra pratīteḥ añjana sādhana dravya vidhi abhāva śaṅkām
nirasitum aktāḥ iti anena iti ukta sāmānyasya ananuṣṭheya tvena viśeṣa apekṣiṇaḥ vidheḥ avaśya apekṣita prarocanā samarpaka arthavāda apekṣaṇena
vinā paryavasāna abhāve tad anvayasya āvaśyaka tvāt tena eva viśeṣa samarpaṇa upapatteḥ na sāmānyasya
viśeṣa ākṣepaka tva saṃbhavaḥ iti na ghṛta ādi anyatamena añjana pūrvapakṣaḥ sidhyati iti śaṅka nirāsāya
nirṇīta tvāt iti uktam

original: vidhereva prarocanākṣepakatvena sāmānyenaiva viśeṣākṣepopapatterarthavādānapekṣaṇena paryavasānopapattyā nirṇītatvamityarthaḥ //
analyzed: vidheḥ eva prarocana ākṣepaka tvena sāmānyena eva viśeṣa ākṣepa upapatteḥ arthavāda anapekṣaṇena paryavasāna upapattyā nirṇīta tvam iti arthaḥ
nirṇītasya api vidheḥ upakrama adhikaraṇa nyāyena arthavāda apekṣā nirāsaḥ
nanu nirṇīta vidheḥ api veda upakrama adhikaraṇa nyāyena arthavāda anusāreṇa anyathā nayanam saṃbhavati iti āśaṅkya āha upasaṃhāra sthena iti
tatra upakrama gata arthavāda anurodhena upasaṃhāra gata vidheḥ anyathā nayane pi iha vaiparītyāt vaiṣamyam iti arthaḥ
arthavādasya upasaṃhāra stha tva ukteḥ upalakṣaṇa tayā vyatirekeṇa vidheḥ prābalye svārtha vṛtti tayā
mukhya tvam prathama śruta tvāt asaṃjāta virodhi tvam anadhigata artha bodhaka tvāt aprāpta arthaka tvam
ca iti hetu trayam sūcayitvā arthavādasya stāvaka tvāt amukhya tvam carama śruta tvāt upasaṃjāta virodhi tvam

original: jātārthatvāt prāptārthānuvāditvaṃ ceti daurbalye hetutrayaṃ darśitam /
analyzed: jātārtha tvāt prāpta artha anuvādi tvam ca iti daurbalye hetu trayam darśitam

original: “paśumālabhete“ti vidheḥ paśusāmānyavidhāyakasya “chāgasya vapāyā medaso 'nubrūhi” iti mantravarṇānurodhena saṃkoce 'pi nātra tasyodāharaṇatvam
analyzed: paśum ālabheta iti vidheḥ paśu sāmānya vidhāyakasya chāgasya vapāyāḥ medasaḥ nubrūhi iti mantra varṇa anurodhena saṃkoce pi nā atra tasya udāharaṇa tvam

original: tatra vākyaikavākyatayā vidhimantrayorekaviṣayatvasyaṣaṣṭhāntye pratipādanena paunaruktyāpatteriti sūcanāyārthavādenetyuktam /
analyzed: tatra vākya ekavākyatayā vidhi mantrayoḥ eka viṣaya tvasya ṣaṣṭha antye pratipādanena paunaruktya āpatteḥ iti sūcanāya arthavādena iti uktam

original: tathācātra padaikavākyatāpannārthavādavaśeneṣyamāṇasya vidhisaṃkocasya abhyupagamo na yukta ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: tathā ca atra pada ekavākya tā āpanna arthavāda vaśena iṣyamāṇasya vidhi saṃkocasya abhyupagamaḥ na yuktaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: nanu kāṃsyabhojinyāyena aṅgabhūtārthavādānurodhitvameva vidherastvityāśaṅkāparihārāya saṅkocapadaṃ prayuktam /
analyzed: nanu kāṃsyabhoji nyāyena aṅga bhūta arthavāda anurodhi tvam eva vidheḥ astu iti āśaṅkā parihārāya saṅkoca padam prayuktam

original: yatra guṇavidhinā pradhānasya na kiñcit bādhyate,
analyzed: yatra guṇavidhinā pradhānasya na kiñcid bādhyate
tatra eva kāṃsya bhoji nyāyaḥ
prakṛte tu pradhānasya saṅkoca rūpa bādhā āpatteḥ na tad nyāya pravṛttiḥ
agnihotra ādeḥ agni vidyā ādi sādhya tvāt tad anurodhena traivarṇika viṣaya tva vat vidhānasya arthavāda sādhya tvāt tad anusāreṇa vidhāna anyathā nayana nirāsaḥ
etena agni vidyā sādhyasya agnihotra ādeḥ tad anurodhena traivarṇika viṣaya tayā saṅkoca vat iha api vidhānasya arthavāda sādhya tvāt tad anurodhena
viṣaya saṅkocaḥ pi parāstaḥ

original: yenāṅgena vinā pradhānaṃ na sidhyati svayaṃ ca yatrākṣipyate tadanurodhena pradhānasyāpi
analyzed: yena aṅgena vinā pradhānam na sidhyati svayam ca yatra ākṣipyate tad anurodhena pradhānasya api
saṅkoca aṅgīkāre pi iha vinā api arthavādena vidheḥ eva prarocanā śakti kalpanena vidhāyaka tva upapatteḥ tad apekṣā abhāvāt
aṅga bhūta mantra anurodhena soma grahaṇasya iva arthavāda anusāreṇa vidheḥ asaṅkocaḥ iti nirūpaṇam

original: ataśca yathā “indrāya tvā vasumate gṛhṇāmī“tyaindramantrasādhyasyāpi somagrahaṇasya
analyzed: atas ca yathā indrāya tvā vasumate gṛhṇāmi iti aindra mantra sādhyasya api soma grahaṇasya
mantra abhāve dhyāna ādinā api smṛtasya anuṣṭhāna upapatteḥ na aṅga bhūta mantra anurodhena pradhānasya
soma grahaṇasya aindra pradhāna mātra viṣaya tvena saṅkocaḥ iti tṛtīye liṅga viśeṣa nirdeśāt iti adhikaraṇe vakṣyate

original: tadvadaṅgabhūtārthavādānurodhena pradhānabhūtavidheḥ saṅkoco na yukta ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: tadvat aṅga bhūta arthavāda anurodhena pradhāna bhūta vidheḥ saṅkocaḥ na yuktaḥ iti arthaḥ
sūtra gatena sandigdha padena avyavasthita artha grahaṇam iti nirūpaṇam
sandigdha artha nirṇaye iti

original: yadyapi pūrvapakṣe sāmānyarūpatayā niścayāt siddhānte caikavākyatayā dhṛtarūpatvaniścayātsandehāsaṃbhave
analyzed: yadi api pūrvapakṣe sāmānya rūpa tayā niścayāt siddhānte ca eka vākya tayā dhṛta rūpa tva niścayāt sandeha asaṃbhave
sandigdha artha tva abhāvena na siddhānti abhimata sandigdha artha aprāmāṇya niṣedha upasaṃhāraḥ yuktaḥ
tathā api sandigdha śabdena sūtra gatena avyavasthita artha pratīti mātrasya vivakṣaṇāt vidhi uddeśa mātra parāmarśāt

original: bhavantī sā pratītiḥ yathā vākyaśeṣāvadhāritayā vyavasthayā siddhāntinā vāryate,
analyzed: bhavantī sā pratītiḥ yathā vākyaśeṣa avadhāritayā vyavasthayā siddhāntinā vāryate
tad dvārā ca prāmāṇyam arthavādasya sādhyate tatra
kintu avyavasthita artha pratītiḥ eva yuktā iti arthaḥ
arthavāda gata ghṛta padasya gauṇa tva lākṣaṇika tva upalakṣaṇa tva ādinā upapattiḥ pūrvapakṣe
ghṛta padantu vidhi avagata sāmānya dravye ñjana sādhanatva rūpa guṇa yogāt gauṇam
athavā añjana sādhanatva saṃbandhena lākṣaṇikam eva vā
athavā sāmānyena ghṛtasya api prāpta tvāt avayutya anuvādena ghṛta mātra param eva

original: sāmānyāṃśe vidheḥ stāvakatvakalpane 'pi ghṛtāṃśe tadakalpanayā stāvakameva //
analyzed: sāmānya aṃśe vidheḥ stāvaka tva kalpane ghṛta aṃśe tad akalpanayā stāvakam eva
liṅga samavāyāt ghṛta pada lakṣaka tvam iti nyāyasudhākāra ādi mata khaṇḍanena yena kenacid añjanam iti pūrvapakṣa upasaṃhāraḥ
yat tu atra nyāyasudhākāra ādīnām liṅga samavāyāt gauṇa tva pratipādanam

original: tadañjanasādhanadravyāṇāmeka- samudāyasya sattve pramāṇābhāvenānyatamasya sādhanatvānupapatteśca ghṛtacihnasaṃbandhāsaṃbhavādupekṣaṇīyam /
analyzed: tad añjana sādhana dravyāṇām eka samudāyasya sattve pramāṇa abhāvena anyatamasya sādhana tva anupapatteḥ ca ghṛta cihna saṃbandha asaṃbhavāt upekṣaṇīyam
etena alpatvasya api atra nimitta tvam pratyuktam

original: evañca sāmānyasya viśeṣavyabhicāritvena tallakṣakatvānupapatterviśeṣeṇa sāmānyāvyabhicāriṇā sāmānyalakṣaṇopapatteryena kenacidañjanamiti siddham
analyzed: evam ca sāmānyasya viśeṣa vyabhicāri tvena tad lakṣaka tva anupapatteḥ viśeṣeṇa sāmānya avyabhicāriṇā sāmānya lakṣaṇa upapatteḥ yena kenacid añjanam iti siddham

original: (ākṣepataḥ pūrvamevārthavādena ghṛtasyāñjanasādhanatvenānvayāt na yena kenacidañjanamiti siddhāntopakramaḥ)
analyzed: ākṣepataḥ pūrvam eva artha vādena ghṛtasya añjana sādhanatvena anvayāt na yena kenacid añjanam iti siddhānta upakramaḥ
sāmānyena vyavahāra asaṃbhavāt vidheḥ anuṣṭhāpaka tva nirvāhāya yāvat viśeṣa ākṣepaka tvam
kalpanīyam tāvat prarocanā samarpaka tayā avaśya apekṣitena eka vākya tā āpanna artha vādena eva
tad apekṣā śānteḥ tad samarpita viśeṣa para tayā vidheḥ na yuktam vyavasthāpanam
saṅkocasya vyavahāra anumata tvena svārtha tayā eva apekṣaṇāt
atas eva atra na upakrameṇa upasaṃhāra gata artha vādasya upamarda lakṣaṇa bādhaḥ
nava upasaṃhāreṇa upakramasya saṅkoca lakṣaṇaḥ bādhaḥ

original: evañca vidheḥ prarocanāśaktirapi na kalpitā bhavati;
analyzed: evam ca vidheḥ prarocanā śaktiḥ api na kalpitā bhavati

original: ghṛtaprarocanayā samāpte vākye kālpanikyā tailādiprarocanayā vākyāntarārthatāpattyā vākyabhedāpattiśca naprasajyate ityabhipretya siddhāntamāha  #
analyzed: ghṛta prarocanayā samāpte vākye kālpanikyā taila ādi prarocanayā vākya antara artha tā āpattyā vākya bheda āpattiḥ ca na prasajyate iti abhipretya siddhāntam āha
vidheḥ aviśeṣa iti
upakrama ākāṅkṣayā eva artha vādasya upapattau na ghṛta padasya taila ādi upalakṣaka tvam iti
yat ṛcā stuvate etyādīnām ṛc nindayā sāmnā stuvīta iti vidhi viṣaya viṣayatva vat atra api samāna viṣayatvam iti nirūpaṇam

original: ata eva yatra somena yajeteti vidhernairākāṅkṣyaṃ,
analyzed: atas eva yatra somena yajeta iti vidheḥ nairākāṅkṣyam
tatra nā eva guṇa bhūta mantra anurodhena indra pradāna mātra viṣaya tvena saṅkocaḥ

original: evañcopakramākāṅkṣayaivārthavādasyānvayopapattau tatra ghṛtapadasya lakṣaṇāṅgīkaraṇaṃ niṣprayojanaṃ niṣpramāṇakaṃ cetyāha--------- upasaṃhārasthasyeti
analyzed: evam ca upakrama ākāṅkṣayā eva artha vādasya anvaya upapattau tatra ghṛta padasya lakṣaṇa aṅgīkaraṇam niṣprayojanam niṣpramāṇakam ca iti āha upasaṃhāra sthasya iti
eka viṣaya tvasya iti

original: yathā “yadṛcā stuvate tadasurā anvavāyanyatsāmnā stuvīta tadasurā nānvavāyanni” tyarthavāde kimasurāgamanahetutvenātra nindyate,
analyzed: yathā yat ṛcā stuvate tat asurāḥ anvavāyan yat sāmnā stuvīta tat asurāḥ na anvavāyan iti arthavāde kim asura āgamana hetu tvena atra nindyate

original: uta vaśīkartuṃ aśakyānāmasurāṇāmapi vaśīkaraṇahetutayā stutiriti sandigdhe tadanantaraśrutena
analyzed: uta vaśīkartum aśakyānām asurāṇām api vaśīkaraṇa hetutayā stutiḥ iti sandigdhe tad anantara śrutena
yaḥ evam vidvān sāmnā astuvīta iti sāma viṣayeṇa vidhinā vidhitsita sāma praśaṃsā artham ṛc

original: nindyate ityavadhāryate tannindāparatva eva tadekavākyatopapatteriti navame arthaikatvādityadhikaraṇe vakṣyate,
analyzed: nindyate iti avadhāryate tad nindā paratve eva tad ekavākyatā upapatteḥ iti navame artha ekatvāt iti adhikaraṇe vakṣyate
evam iha api eka viṣaya tva anurodhena vidheḥ api vyavasthāpanam iti arthaḥ

original: uktañca vārtike tatraiva --------- vidhistutyoḥ sadā vṛttiḥ samānaviṣayeṣyate /
analyzed: uktam ca vārtike tatra eva vidhi stutyoḥ sadā vṛttiḥ samāna viṣayā iṣyate
tasmāt ekatra sandigdham itareṇa avadhāryate
iti
saṃdigdha padena avyavasthitam sa deha viṣayaḥ ca ubhayam api vivakṣitam

original: ataeva ādityaḥ prāyaṇīya yadāgneya ityādau ca aditidevatātvairṇayaḥ ityādi nirūpaṇam)
analyzed: ataeva ādityaḥ yat āgneyaḥ ityādau ca ityādi nirūpaṇam

original: atraca sūtre sandigdhapadena yaḥ prasiddhaḥ sandehaḥ yaścāvyavasthitārthapratyayaḥ tadubhayamapi sandehatvena vivakṣitam;
analyzed: atra ca sūtre sandigdha padena yaḥ prasiddhaḥ sandehaḥ yaḥ ca avyavasthita artha pratyayaḥ tat ubhayam api sandeha tvena vivakṣitam
anavadhāraṇa rūpa tva aviśeṣāt

original: ata evoktam vyavarāhādhikaraṇavārtike --------- “sandigdheṣu ca sarveṣu vākyaśeṣeṇa nirṇayam /
analyzed: atas eva uktam vyavarāhādhikaraṇa vārtike sandigdheṣu ca sarveṣu vākya śeṣeṇa nirṇayam

original: vakṣyatyeva na tenātra pṛthakkāryā vicāraṇā” iti /
analyzed: vakṣyati eva na tena atra pṛthak kāryā vicāraṇā iti
ataeva vyavasthita artha pratīteḥ prāk eva yatra prakṛti pratyaya sandehaḥ
tatra api arthavādena nirṇayaḥ

original: yathā “ādityaḥ prāyaṇīya” ityatra kimaditiśabdaḥ taddhitaprakṛtiḥ uta āditya iti
analyzed: yathā ādityaḥ prāyaṇīyaḥ iti atra kim aditi śabdaḥ taddhita prakṛtiḥ uta ādityaḥ iti
sandehe diti aditi āditya pati uttara padāt ṇyaḥ iti vihita ṇya pratyaye rūpa aviśeṣe adityā eva ādityān
khanati amum eva ādityam svena bhāgadheyena upadhāvati ityādau ubhayoḥ api devatā tvena
prasiddhi aviśeṣe ca samāne sati api te dityām samāvriyanta ityādi arthavādāt aditi śabdasya eva
tattvena avadhāraṇam
yathāvā āgneyaḥ ṣṭākapālaḥ iti atra agnaye kṛttikābhyaḥ iti atra ekavacana anta tvena tad

original: asmā agnayo draviṇaṃ datve” tyādau bahuvacanāntatvena devatāparāgniśabdanirdeśādekavacanabahuvacanāntatvayoḥ
analyzed: asmai agnayaḥ draviṇam da tve tyādau bahuvacana anta tvena devatā apara agni śabda nirdeśāt ekavacana bahuvacana anta tvayoḥ

original: sandehe “agnaye dhriyasve” tyarthavādenaikavacanāntatvena sa eva prakṛtiravadhāryate,
analyzed: sandehe agnaye dhriyasva iti arthavādena ekavacana anta tvena saḥ eva prakṛtiḥ avadhāryate
evam anyatra api ūhyam

original: evañca yatra vidhau śabdasvarūpameva prakṛtitaḥ pratyayato vā nāvadhāryate,
analyzed: evam ca yatra vidhau śabda svarūpam eva prakṛtitaḥ pratyayataḥ vā na avadhāryate
aneka śakya artha nirṇaye prakṛte vivakṣitaḥ ūrthaḥ na avadhāryate
tatra sarvatra api viśeṣa avadhāraṇa samarthena artha vādena viśeṣa avadhāraṇam etat adhikaraṇa vyutpādyam
na tu upasaṃhāra prābalyena

original: adhikāśaṅkānirāsāya tu punastatra tantre vicārakaraṇamapi na viruddham /
analyzed: adhika āśaṅkā nirāsāya tu punar tatra tantre vicāra karaṇam api na viruddham

original: ataeva “vāsaḥ paridhatte ityatrāpyavyavasthitārthapratītimādāya sandigdhe vidhau “etadvai sarvadevatyaṃ vāso yatkṣaumami” tyarthavādena viśeṣāvadhāraṇamiha  #
analyzed: ataeva vāsaḥ paridhatte iti atra api avyavasthita artha pratītim ādāya sandigdhe vidhau etat vai sarva devatyam vāsaḥ yat kṣaumam iti arthavādena viśeṣa avadhāraṇam iha
bhāṣyakṛtā uktam
yadā tu ajinam vāsaḥ vā ityādau kasya api vāsaḥ śabdāt avyavasthita artha pratīteḥ adarśanāt iha api
vāsaḥ śabdena avyavasthita artha pratītyā sandigdha tvam iti ucyeta tadā api sāmānya vācaka tayā eva avyavasthita artha pratīti saṃbhavāt sandigdha tvam
saṃbhavati eva iti na doṣaḥ
vidhi stutyoḥ eka viṣaya tvam eva etat adhikaraṇa śarīram
evam api veda upakrama adhikaraṇa śarīram āvaśyakam ityādi nirūpaṇena upasaṃhāraḥ

original: ataeva atra viśeṣapravṛttavidheḥ nānuṣṭhāpakatvanirvāhāya viśeṣāpekṣitvena viśeṣāpekṣā,
analyzed: ataeva atra viśeṣa pravṛtta vidheḥ na anuṣṭhāpaka tva nirvāhāya viśeṣa apekṣi tvena viśeṣa apekṣā
vastra dāna ādi vidhau tad apekṣāyāḥ loke darśanāt
tatra api vidhi stutyoḥ eka viṣaya tva siddhaye vidheḥ api utthāpya ākāṅkṣayā viśeṣa avadhāraṇam na anupapannam
atas eva
arthāt vā kalpanā eka deśa tvāt
iti uttara sūtra gata kalpanā eka deśa padayoḥ iha anuṣaṅgeṇa vākyaśeṣāt
kalpanā avadhāraṇā kutas
eka deśa tvāt

original: ekor'tho diśyate pratipādyate yābhyāṃ vidhyarthavādābhyāṃ tāvekadeśau,
analyzed: ekaḥ ūrthaḥ diśyate pratipādyate yābhyām vidhi arthavādābhyām tau eka deśau
tayoḥ bhāvaḥ tattvam eka viṣaya tvam

original: tasmādityarthena sūtrakṛtā ekaviṣayatvameva mukhyatvena hetutayopāttamityabhipretya sarvavyāpakatayā pūjyapādairekaviṣayatvasyāvaśyakatvāccetyuktam
analyzed: tasmāt iti arthena sūtrakṛtā eka viṣaya tvam eva mukhya tvena hetutayā upāttam iti abhipretya sarva vyāpaka tayā pūjya pādaiḥ eka viṣaya tvasya āvaśyaka tvāt ca iti uktam

original: yadyapi “uccaiḥ ṛcā kriyate” ityatrāpi ekaviṣayatvāvaśyakatvenaiva hetunā vedaparatvādetadadhikaraṇaviṣayatvam;
analyzed: yadi api uccais ṛcā kriyate iti atra api eka viṣaya tva āvaśyaka tvena eva hetunā veda paratvāt etad adhikaraṇa viṣayatvam

original: tathāpi tatra ṛgādipadānāṃ niścitārthakatvāt sandigdhatvābhāvena vidhigatatvena cānyathānayanamayuktamityadhikāśaṅkānirāsa upakramaprābalyena  #
analyzed: tathā api tatra ṛk ādi padānām niścita arthaka tvāt sandigdha tva abhāvena vidhi gata tvena ca anyathā nayanam ayuktam iti adhika āśaṅkā nirāsaḥ upakrama prābalyena
darśayiṣyate iti na paunaruktyam

original: nacaikavākyatāṃ vinā paryavasitasya vidhervākyaśeṣāpekṣitve 'pi paryavasitasya tu
analyzed: na ca ekavākyatām vinā paryavasitasya vidheḥ vākyaśeṣa apekṣi tve paryavasitasya tu

original: vidhernaiva saṅkoco yukta ityadhikāśaṅkānirāsāya pravṛttaṃ ṣaṣṭhādyadhikaraṇamapi
analyzed: vidheḥ nā eva saṅkocaḥ yuktaḥ iti adhika āśaṅkā nirāsāya pravṛttam ṣaṣṭha ādi adhikaraṇam api
vyartham iti bhāvaḥ
siddhāntam upasaṃharati yuktam iti
atorthavāda upasthāpita ghṛta vācaka pada kalpanayā tasya eva añjana sādhanatvam abhipretya āha ghṛtena eva añjanam iti
iti caturdaśam akṛ adhikaraṇam
adhyāya pāda adhikaraṇa saṅgatīnām spaṣṭa tvena pūrvapakṣasya su nirasta tvena ca siddhāntena upakramaḥ
viṣaya vākyam udāharati
