original: pūrvatrārthavādasyeveha vidhāyakatayā pratipāditaprāmāṇyasya vidheḥ sāmarthyānugṛhītasya sandigdhārthanirṇaye 'pi vidhānāntareṇa prāmāṇyapratipādanādadhyāyasaṅgatiṃ,
analyzed: pūrvatra arthavādasya iva iha vidhāyaka tayā pratipādita prāmāṇyasya vidheḥ sāmarthya anugṛhītasya sandigdha artha nirṇaye vidhāna antareṇa prāmāṇya pratipādanāt adhyāya saṅgatim
tathā sāmarthya kalpita drava ādi padasya udbhida ādi padasya iva prāmāṇya aprāmāṇya vicārāt pāda saṅgatim
tathā pūrva adhikaraṇa ukta nirṇaya kāraṇasya vākyaśeṣasya abhāvena pūrvapakṣa utthānāt pratyudāharaṇa saṅgatim
athavā sandigdha viṣayatayā upasthita tvāt prasaṅga rūpām anantara saṅgatim ca spaṣṭa tvāt an abhidhāya
tathā ghṛta vat vākyaśeṣe vadeya drava dravya viśeṣasya aśravaṇāt pramāṇa antara gamya vastu sāmarthya apekṣaṇe

original: ca vedasya sāpekṣatayāprāmāṇyāpatteḥ tīkṣṇapuṣkaradhārasya ca struvasya kaṭhinadravyāvadāne
analyzed: ca vedasya sāpekṣa tayā aprāmāṇya āpatteḥ tīkṣṇa puṣkara dhārasya ca struvasya kaṭhina dravya avadāne
pi sāmarthya saṃbhavāt āyasa avaṣṭaṃbhena struva hastayoḥ māṃsa avadāne pi śakti upapatteḥ
koṭaravataḥ ca svadhiteḥ drava dravya avadāne śakti saṃbhava anugrāhaka apekṣāyām api ca
nirapekṣa sādhanatva avighātāt avyavasthā pūrvapakṣasya ca vidheḥ aśakya artha anuṣṭhāna ayogāt
pravartaka tva vyāghātāt sarva vidhīnām api sāmarthyam
apekṣaṇīya sāmarthyasya ca pada padārtha avadhāraṇa vat pramāṇa antara gamya tve pi viṣayasya anyatas
nava gata tvena vedasya prāmāṇya upapatteḥ tīkṣṇa puṣkara dhāreṇa api struveṇa māṃsa avadānasya aśakya tvāt
kevalena api struveṇa drava avadāna upapattau āyasa anugrāhaka tva kalpane māna abhāvāt tad kalpane

original: ca nirapekṣasādhanatvavirodhasya duṣpariharatvāt svadhityādīnāṃ cā jinavāsodhikaraṇanyāyena
analyzed: ca nirapekṣa sādhanatva virodhasya duṣparihara tvāt svadhiti ādīnām ca jina vāsaḥ adhikaraṇa nyāyena
loka siddhasya eva grahaṇa upapatteḥ koṭara karaṇa anupapatteḥ vyavasthā eva yuktā iti evam
ca matvā siddhāntam eva āha vidheḥ iti
vidheḥ asaṃdigdha tvena ukta nyāya pravṛttiḥ iti nirūpaṇam
śeṣa śeṣi bhāva vyavasthā rūpa sandigdha artha nirṇaye sāmarthya sahakṛta vidheḥ eva pramāṇa tvam uktam

original: tena yatra darśapūrṇamāsādividherekādaśoktavyāyena sarvāṅgaviśiṣṭakarmaviṣayakatayā niścitatvena sandeho nāsti,
analyzed: tena yatra darśa pūrṇamāsa ādi vidheḥ ekādaśa ukta vyāyena sarva aṅga viśiṣṭa karma viṣayaka tayā niścita tvena sandehaḥ na asti

original: tatra sāmarthyānusāreṇa prayājādiṣu śakyamātraviṣayatayā naiva saṅkocakalpanamiti vyatirekeṇa sūcitam /
analyzed: tatra sāmarthya anusāreṇa prayāja ādiṣu śakya mātra viṣaya tayā nā eva saṅkoca kalpanam iti vyatirekeṇa sūcitam
saṃhatam iti
kaṭhinam iti arthaḥ
drava ādi pada adhyāhāra para prācīna mata khaṇḍanena vākya artha varṇanam
atra ca sāmarthya sahakṛtaḥ vidhiḥ eva struvā ādīnām avadāna ādi sādhanatvam bodhayan tad anyathā anupapattyā
drava ādi viśeṣa rūpa artha kalpanāyām api tasya aśabdatvena śābda itara arthena anvaya anupapatteḥ drava ādi pada adhyāhāreṇa
veda eka deśa tva rūpa vākyaśeṣa tvena sūtra gata eka deśa padam vyākhyāya drava ādi pada adhyāhāraḥ prācīnaiḥ uktaḥ

original: tasya sāmarthyānugṛhītāvadyatipadenaiva dravādikarmakāvadānoddeśyatvopapatteḥ prayojanābhāvamabhipretyādhyāhāraṃ vinaiva vākyārthaṃ darśayati  #
analyzed: tasya sāmarthya anugṛhīta avadyati padena eva drava ādi karmaka avadāna uddeśya tva upapatteḥ prayojana abhāvam abhipretya adhyāhāram vinā eva vākya artham darśayati  /
atas ca iti
vastutas tu vibhajyamāna sākāṅkṣa saṃhata artha viśiṣṭa eka artha pratipādaka pada samudāyasya
vākya tvāt tasya ca vākya artha pratipatti upāya bhūta kalpya padārtha vāci pada abhāve sākāṅkṣa tvena aparipūrṇasya
viśiṣṭa artha pratipādaka tva ayogāt avadyateḥ karmatva ākāṅkṣasya karma vācaka padam vinā aparipūrṇa tvāt
drava ādi vācaka pada adhyāhāraḥ āvaśyakaḥ eva iti dhyeyam
sāmarthyāt uddeśya viśeṣasya iva vidheya viśeṣasya api nirṇayaḥ iti etad artham udāharaṇa antara pradarśanam
yathā eva dvayoḥ praṇayanti iti vidhau pūrva adhikaraṇa ukta nyāyāt uddeśya viśeṣe nirṇayaḥ tathā
sāmarthyāt uddeśya viśeṣa nirṇayam abhidhāya tadvat eva iha api vidheyasya api sāmarthyāt nirṇayam
darśayitum anyat api udāharati evam iti
atra api devatā bhaya prārthanā ādau dvayoḥ karayoḥ atyanta aṅguli saṃśleṣaṇe ñjali śabda artha tvasya
dṛṣṭa tvāt añjalinā pibet ityādau jala grahaṇa samartha vyākośa ātmaka tvena tad artha darśanāt homa vākye
sandehe saktu homa rūpa uddeśya tāka añjali vidhi sāmarthyāt nirṇayaḥ
anyathā saktu grahaṇa anupapatteḥ iti arthaḥ
vyākośa ātmakaḥ iti viśabdasya vikasita artha tvāt āṅaḥ ca īṣat arthaka tvāt īṣat vikasita kośa pada vācya mukula ākāraḥ iti arthaḥ
anyathā anupapatti sahakṛtasya eva sāmarthyasya nirṇāyaka tvāt puroḍāśa avadānena svadhiti prāptiḥ iti nirūpaṇam
atra ca na kevalam sāmarthya mātrāt eva vyavasthā

original: tathātve svadhiterapi puroḍāśāvadāne sāmarthyasattvena māṃsāvadānavyavasthāyā asiddheḥ,
analyzed: tathātve svadhiteḥ api puroḍāśa avadāne sāmarthya sattvena māṃsa avadāna vyavasthāyāḥ asiddheḥ
kintu anyathā anupapatti sahitāt tasmāt

original: ataśca puroḍāśāvadānasya hastenāpi saṃbhavāt kṣīṇārthāpatterna svadhitiprayojakatvaṃ kalpanīyamityapi jñeyam //
analyzed: atas ca puroḍāśa avadānasya hastena api saṃbhavāt kṣīṇa artha āpatteḥ na svadhiti prayojaka tvam kalpanīyam iti api jñeyam
vā śabda ghaṭitasya api adhikaraṇa antara tayā yojanam

original: yadyapi cārthādveti sūtre vāśabdopādānabalādaikādhikaraṇyameva pūrvasūtraikavākyatayā bhāti;
analyzed: yadi api ca arthāt vā iti sūtre vā śabda upādāna balāt aikādhikaraṇyam eva pūrva sūtra ekavākyatayā bhāti
tathā api eka vākya upātta eka deśa śabdasya artha dvaya paratva anupapatteḥ anuṣaktasya vākya antara arthabhede bādhaka abhāvam abhipretya adhikaraṇa antara para tayā
bhāṣyakāra ādi vyākhyānam draṣṭavyam

original: asmiṃśca vākye pradātavye ityapi padaṃ kaustubhe dhṛtaṃ tasyāhavanīyolmukena mahāvedyāstṛtabarhiṣonte dāhādutthito vaiśvānarognirartho draṣṭavyaḥ
analyzed: asmin ca vākye pradātavye iti api padam kaustubhe dhṛtam tasya āhavanīya ulmukena mahāvedyā āstṛta barhiṣā unte dāhāt utthitaḥ vaiśvānara ugniḥ arthaḥ draṣṭavyaḥ
adhyāya artham upasaṃharati tat evam iti
nāmadheyasya vidhi arthavāda mantra sāmīpye pi nirūpaṇa kramam ādāya smṛti ācārayoḥ tad apekṣayā prāthamyena upādānam

original: mānādhīnatvena meyasiddherāvaśyakasya pramāṇanirūpaṇasyottaratra nirūpaṇe hetutvasūcanadvārā vakṣyamāṇādhyāyārthān śiṣyoparamanirāsārthaṃ pratijānīte  #
analyzed: māna adhīna tvena meya siddheḥ āvaśyakasya pramāṇa nirūpaṇasya uttaratra nirūpaṇe hetutva sūcana dvārā vakṣyamāṇa adhyāya arthān śiṣya uparama nirāsa artham pratijānīte  /
atas param iti
svarūpa jñānasya uktābhyām pramāṇa lakṣaṇābhyām eva siddheḥ uttara vicāra vaiyarthya parihartum bheda ādinā iti uktam
ādi padena viniyoga prayoga vidhi viṣaya tva ādi rūpa antarasya api grahaḥ
gambhīra artha pada adhyāye yat akārṣam nu ṭippaṇam
tat sādhanam guru kṛpā na tu me buddhi vaibhavam
iti
iti pañcadaśam artha sāmarthya adhikaraṇam
iti śrīmat pūrvottara mīmāṃsā pārāvārīṇa dhurīṇa śrīkhaṇḍa deva antevāsika vimaṇḍana śaṃbhu bhaṭṭa viracitāyām bhāṭṭa dīpikā prabhāvalyām prathama adhyāyasya
caturthaḥ pādaḥ
atha prathama adhyāyaḥ samāptaḥ
adhyāyaḥ pādaḥ adhikaraṇa saṃkhyā āditaḥ dhikaraṇa saṃkhyā
